"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 const int mod = 1000000007;\n', '5 const int inv3 = (mod + 1) / 3;\n', '6 const int maxn = 3003003;\n', '7 int fac[maxn], ifac[maxn];\n', '8 int qpow(int a, int n) {\n', '9   int ans = 1;\n', '10   for (; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long maxn = 3000005;\n', '4 const long long dd = (long long)(1e9) + 7;\n', '5 long long n, q;\n', '6 long long dp[maxn][3], sum[maxn], isum[maxn];\n', '7 inline long long read() {\n', '8   long long ret = 0, f = 1;\n', '9   char ch = getchar();\n', '10   while (!isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""11     if (ch == '-') f = -f;\n"", '12     ch = getchar();\n', '13   }\n', '14   while (isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""15     ret = ret * 10 + ch - '0';\n"", '16     ch = getchar();\n', '17   }\n', '18   return ret * f;\n', '19 }\n', '20 inline long long qpow(long long x, long long p) {\n', '21   long long ans = 1;\n', '22   if (x == 0) return 0;\n', '23   while (p) {\n', '24     if (p & 1) ans = ans * x % dd;\n', '25     x = x * x % dd;\n', '26     p >>= 1;\n', '27   }\n', '28   return ans % dd;\n', '29 }\n', '30 inline long long inv(long long x) { return qpow(x, dd - 2) % dd; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '4 int N, X[6005], Y[6005];\n', '5 long long cnt[4][4];\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '8   cin.tie(0);\n', '9   cin >> N;\n', '10   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 6005;\n', '4 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 long long _, n, x[N], y[N], cnt[2][2];\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   cin >> n;\n', '9   return;\n', '10 }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   cin >> n;\n', '13   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '14     cin >> x[i] >> y[i], x[i] /= 2, y[i] /= 2, cnt[x[i] % 2][y[i] % 2]++;\n', '15   long long ans = 0;\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)\n', '17     for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)\n', '18       ans += cnt[i][j] * (cnt[i][j] - 1) / 2 * (n - 2) -\n', '19              cnt[i][j] * (cnt[i][j] - 1) * (cnt[i][j] - 2) / 6 * 2;\n', '20   cout << ans << ""\\n"";\n', '21   return 0;\n', '22 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 6005;\n', '4 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 int _, n, x[N], y[N], cnt[2][2];\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   cin >> n;\n', '9   return;\n', '10 }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   cin >> n;\n', '13   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '14     cin >> x[i] >> y[i], x[i] /= 2, y[i] /= 2, cnt[x[i] % 2][y[i] % 2]++;\n', '15   long long ans = 0;\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)\n', '17     for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)\n', '18       ans += cnt[i][j] * (cnt[i][j] - 1) / 2 * (n - 2) -\n', '19              cnt[i][j] * (cnt[i][j] - 1) * (cnt[i][j] - 2) / 6 * 2;\n', '20   cout << ans << ""\\n"";\n', '21   return 0;\n', '22 }\n']"	"6 long long _, n, x[N], y[N], cnt[2][2];

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optmize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC target(""avx2,sse4"")\n', '5 using namespace std;\n', '6 using ll = long long;\n', '7 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '8 using ld = long double;\n', '9 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '10 ll getrnd(ll l, ll r) { return uniform_int_distribution<ll>(l, r)(rng); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void run_case() {\n', '4   long long n;\n', '5   cin >> n;\n', '6   vector<long long> h(4);\n', '7   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '8     long long x, y;\n', '9     cin >> x >> y;\n', '10     if (x % 4 != 0 && y % 4 != 0) {\n', '11       h[0]++;\n', '12     } else if (x % 4 != 0) {\n', '13       h[1]++;\n', '14     } else if (y % 4 != 0) {\n', '15       h[2]++;\n', '16     } else {\n', '17       h[3]++;\n', '18     }\n', '19   }\n', '20   auto choose = [&](long long n, long long r) {\n', '21     if (r == 2) {\n', '22       return n * (n - 1) / 2;\n', '23     }\n', '24     if (r == 3) {\n', '25       return n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) / 6;\n', '26     }\n', '27   };\n', '28   auto calc = [&](long long x, long long y, long long z) {\n', '29     return (choose(x, 2) + choose(y, 2)) * z;\n', '30   };\n', '31   long long res = 0;\n', '32   for (long long i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long double PI = 3.14159265359;\n', '4 long long inf = 1000000000000000007;\n', '5 long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '6 long long mod1 = 998244353;\n', '7 const bool multi = 0;\n', '8 long long xd[4][4];\n', '9 long long pokor[4][4];\n', '10 long long ans = 0;\n', '11 vector<pair<long long, long long>> v;\n', '12 set<vector<pair<long long, long long>>> S;\n', '13 void bt(long long i) {\n', '14   if (i == 3) {\n', '15     vector<pair<long long, long long>> t = v;\n', '16     sort(t.begin(), t.end());\n', '17     if (S.count(t)) return;\n', '18     S.insert(t);\n', '19     long long lol = 0;\n', '20     if (abs(v[0].first - v[1].first) == 2 ||\n', '21         abs(v[0].second - v[1].second) == 2)\n', '22       lol += 2;\n', '23     if (abs(v[1].first - v[2].first) == 2 ||\n', '24         abs(v[1].second - v[2].second) == 2)\n', '25       lol += 2;\n', '26     if (abs(v[2].first - v[0].first) == 2 ||\n', '27         abs(v[2].second - v[0].second) == 2)\n', '28       lol += 2;\n', '29     if (lol % 4 == 0) {\n', '30       long long ways = 1;\n', '31       memset(pokor, 0, sizeof pokor);\n', '32       for (auto x : v) pokor[x.first][x.second]++;\n', '33       for (long long x = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void fast() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   cout.tie(0);\n', '7 }\n', '8 void ran() { srand(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count()); }\n', '9 long long get_rand() {\n', '10   long long a = rand();\n', '11   long long b = rand();\n', '12   return a * (RAND_MAX + 1ll) + b;\n', '13 }\n', '14 void usaco() {\n', '15   freopen(""problem.in"", ""r"", stdin);\n', '16   freopen(""problem.out"", ""w"", stdout);\n', '17 }\n', '18 template <typename T>\n', '19 using min_pq = priority_queue<T, vector<T>, greater<T>>;\n', '20 int n, m;\n', '21 const int MXN = 6005;\n', '22 int px[MXN], py[MXN];\n', '23 inline int gcd(int a, int b) {\n', '24   a = abs(a), b = abs(b);\n', '25   return (a % 2 || b % 2);\n', '26 }\n', '27 void solve() {\n', '28   cin >> n;\n', '29   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '30     cin >> px[i] >> py[i];\n', '31     px[i] /= 2;\n', '32     py[i] /= 2;\n', '33   }\n', '34   long long ans = 0;\n', '35   int by[2][2];\n', '36   memset(by, 0, sizeof by);\n', '37   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '38     for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; j++) {\n', '39       int ij = gcd(px[i] - px[j], py[i] - py[j]);\n', '40       for (int a = 0; a < 2; a++)\n', '41         for (int b = 0; b < 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 10, inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 int n, m, x, c[N], d[N], stk[N], top, mx[N];\n', '5 int t[N], V[N], tot, ida[N], idb[N];\n', '6 pair<int, int> a[N], b[N];\n', '7 long long ans;\n', '8 bool cmpa_(int u, int v) { return a[u] < a[v]; }\n', '9 bool cmpb_(int u, int v) { return d[u] > d[v]; }\n', '10 void upd_(int x, int k) {\n', '11   for (; x <= tot; x += x & -x) t[x] += k;\n', '12 }\n', '13 int ask_(int x, int res = 0) {\n', '14   for (; x; x -= x & -x) res += t[x];\n', '15   return res;\n', '16 }\n', '17 void work_() {\n', '18   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) V[i] = b[i].first, idb[i] = i;\n', '19   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) ida[i] = i;\n', '20   sort(ida + 1, ida + n + 1, cmpa_);\n', '21   sort(idb + 1, idb + m + 1, cmpb_);\n', '22   sort(V + 1, V + m + 1), tot = unique(V + 1, V + m + 1) - V - 1;\n', '23   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool isSubSequence(string str1, string str2, int m, int n);\n', '4 int CEIL(int a, int b);\n', '5 bool isPrime(int x);\n', '6 int mod_exp(long long x, unsigned int y, int p);\n', '7 int gcd(int a, int b);\n', '8 vector<int> Divisors(int n);\n', '9 int getMSB(int n);\n', '10 void sayyes() { cout << ""YES"" << \'\\n\'; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int hashPower = 31;\n', '4 float pi = 3.141593;\n', '5 long long int power(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '6   long long int res = 1;\n', '7   while (b) {\n', '8     if (b % 2) res = (res * a) % 1000000007;\n', '9     b /= 2;\n', '10     a = (a * a) % 1000000007;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return res;\n', '13 }\n', '14 int main() {\n', '15   long long int t;\n', '16   cin >> t;\n', '17   while (t--) {\n', '18     long long int n;\n', '19     cin >> n;\n', '20     string first, second;\n', '21     cin >> first;\n', '22     cin >> second;\n', '23     int a[n], b[n];\n', '24     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long n, m;\n', '5   cin >> n >> m;\n', '6   long long arr[n];\n', '7   memset(arr, 0, sizeof(arr));\n', '8   long long ans = n;\n', '9   for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""O3"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC target(""sse4"")\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 long long int MOD = 1000000007;\n', '6 long long int powmod(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '7   long long int res = 1;\n', '8   a %= 1000000009;\n', '9   assert(b >= 0);\n', '10   for (; b; b >>= 1) {\n', '11     if (b & 1) res = res * a % 1000000009;\n', '12     a = a * a % 1000000009;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return res;\n', '15 }\n', '16 long long int gcd(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '17   return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a;\n', '18 }\n', '19 long long int add(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '20   return ((a % MOD) + (b % MOD)) % MOD;\n', '21 }\n', '22 long long int mul(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '23   return ((a % MOD) * (b % MOD)) % MOD;\n', '24 }\n', '25 long long int sub(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '26   return ((a % MOD) - (b % MOD) + MOD) % MOD;\n', '27 }\n', '28 long long int binpow(long long int x, long long int y) {\n', '29   long long int z = 1;\n', '30   while (y) {\n', '31     if (y & 1) z = mul(z, x);\n', '32     x = mul(x, x);\n', '33     y >>= 1;\n', '34   }\n', "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 const long long M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '7   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '8   ;\n', '9   int n, m;\n', '10   cin >> n >> m;\n', '11   unordered_map<int, int> hi;\n', '12   int cnt = 0;\n', '13   while (m--) {\n', '14     int u, v;\n', '15     cin >> u >> v;\n', '16     if (!hi[min(u, v)]) cnt++;\n', '17     hi[min(u, v)]++;\n', '18   }\n', '19   int q;\n', '20   cin >> q;\n', '21   while (q--) {\n', '22     int x;\n', '23     cin >> x;\n', '24     if (x == 3)\n', ""25       cout << n - cnt << '\\n';\n"", '26     else {\n', '27       int y, z;\n', '28       cin >> y >> z;\n', '29       if (x == 1) {\n', '30         if (!hi[min(y, z)]) cnt++;\n', '31         hi[min(y, z)]++;\n', '32       } else {\n', '33         hi[min(y, z)]--;\n', '34         if (!hi[min(y, z)]) cnt--;\n', '35       }\n', '36     }\n', '37   }\n', '38   return 0;\n', '39 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 const long long M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '7   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '8   ;\n', '9   int n, m;\n', '10   cin >> n >> m;\n', '11   unordered_map<int, int> hi;\n', '12   int cnt = 0;\n', '13   while (m--) {\n', '14     int u, v;\n', '15     cin >> u >> v;\n', '16     if (!hi[min(u, v)]) cnt++;\n', '17     hi[min(u, v)]++;\n', '18   }\n', '19   int q;\n', '20   cin >> q;\n', '21   while (q--) {\n', '22     int x;\n', '23     cin >> x;\n', '24     if (x == 3)\n', ""25       cout << n - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool isvalid(vector<vector<bool>> ans, int r, int c, int n) {\n', '4   for (int i = 0; i <= c; i++) {\n', '5     if (ans[r][i] == true) return false;\n', '6   }\n', '7   for (int i = 0; i <= r; i++) {\n', '8     if (ans[i][c] == true) return false;\n', '9   }\n', '10   for (int i = r, j = c; i >= 0 && j >= 0; i--, j--) {\n', '11     if (ans[i][j] == true) return false;\n', '12   }\n', '13   for (int i = r, j = c; i >= 0 && j < n; i--, j++) {\n', '14     if (ans[i][j] == true) return false;\n', '15   }\n', '16   return true;\n', '17 }\n', '18 void permute(int qsf, int n, vector<vector<bool>> ans, int ro) {\n', '19   if (qsf == n) {\n', '20     for (int i = 0; i < ans.size(); i++) {\n', '21       for (int j = 0; j < ans[0].size(); j++) {\n', '22         if (ans[i][j] == true)\n', '23           cout << ""Q"";\n', '24         else\n', '25           cout << ""."";\n', '26       }\n', '27       cout << endl;\n', '28     }\n', '29     cout << endl;\n', '30   }\n', '31   for (int i = ro + 1; i < n * n; i++) {\n', '32     int r = i / n;\n', '33     int c = i % n;\n', '34     if (ans[r][c] == false && isvalid(ans, r, c, n)) {\n', '35       ans[r][c] = true;\n', '36       permute(qsf + 1, n, ans, i);\n', '37       ans[r][c] = false;\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40 }\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   int n, m;\n', '43   cin >> n >> m;\n', '44   vector<set<int>> v1(n + 1);\n', '45   for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '46     int x, y;\n', '47     cin >> x >> y;\n', '48     v1[x].insert(y);\n', '49     v1[y].insert(x);\n', '50   }\n', '51   int f = 0;\n', '52   vector<int> vis(n + 1, 0);\n', '53   for (int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '4   if (b == 0) {\n', '5     return a;\n', '6   }\n', '7   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '8 }\n', '9 vector<vector<long long>> gcd_sparse_table(vector<long long>& d) {\n', '10   int N = d.size();\n', '11   int K = ceil(log2(N));\n', '12   vector<vector<long long>> sparse_table(N, vector<long long>(K + 1));\n', '13   for (int i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int maxm = 1e6 + 5;\n', '5 const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '7 const double eps = 1e-10;\n', '8 int dir[4][2] = {{0, 1}, {0, -1}, {-1, 0}, {1, 0}};\n', '9 mt19937 rnd(\n', '10     (unsigned int)chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '11 int build(int rt, int l, int r) {\n', '26   if (l == r) {\n', '27     tree[rt].gcd = d[l];\n', '28     return;\n', '29   }\n', '30   int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '31   build(rt << 1, l, mid);\n', '32   build(rt << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);\n', '33   push_up(rt);\n', '34 }\n', '35 void update(int rt, long long c, int l, int r, int pow) {\n', '36   if (l == r) {\n', '37     tree[rt].gcd += c;\n', '38     return;\n', '39   }\n', '40   int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '41   if (pow <= mid)\n', '42     update(rt << 1, c, l, mid, pow);\n', '43   else\n', '44     update(rt << 1 | 1, c, mid + 1, r, pow);\n', '45   push_up(rt);\n', '46 }\n', '47 long long query(int rt, int l, int r, int L, int R) {\n', '48   if (L <= l && r <= R) return tree[rt].gcd;\n', '49   int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '50   long long g = "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 inline long long ab(long long x) { return x < 0 ? -x : x; }\n', '5 inline long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   return b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b);\n', '7 }\n', '8 long long a[N], dt[N];\n', '9 long long g[N][21];\n', '10 int lg[N], n;\n', '11 void init() {\n', '12   for (int i = 2; i < N; ++i) lg[i] = lg[i >> 1] + 1;\n', '13 }\n', '14 void st() {\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) g[i][0] = a[i];\n', '16   for (int k = 1; k <= lg[n]; ++k) {\n', '17     for (int i = 1; i + (1 << k) - 1 <= n; ++i) {\n', '18       g[i][k] = gcd(g[i][k - 1], g[i + (1 << k - 1)][k - 1]);\n', '19     }\n', '20   }\n', '21 }\n', '22 long long q(int l, int r) {\n', '23   int k = lg[r - l + 1];\n', '24   return gcd(g[l][k], g[r - (1 << k) + 1][k]);\n', '25 }\n', '26 bool qry(int x) {\n', '27   if (x <= 0) return 1;\n', '28   for (int i = 2; i + x - 1 <= n; ++i)\n', '29     if (q(i, i + x - 1) != 1) return 1;\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n', '32 int main() {\n', '33   init();\n', '34   ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '35   cin.tie(0);\n', '36   cout.tie(0);\n', '37   int _;\n', '38   cin >> _;\n', '39   while (_--) {\n', '40     cin >> n;\n', '41     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> a[i];\n', '42     for (int i = n; i; --i) a[i] = ab(a[i] - a[i - 1]);\n', '43     st();\n', '44     int ans = 0;\n', '45     for (int r = 2, l = 2; r <= n; r++) {\n', '46       while (l < r && q(l, r) == 1) l++;\n', '47       if (q(l, r) != 1) ans = max(ans, r - l + 1);\n', '48     }\n', '49     ans++;\n', ""50     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '51   }\n', '52   return 0;\n', '53 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 inline long long ab(long long x) { return x < 0 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MAXN = 200005;\n', '4 const long long K = 24;\n', '5 long long st[MAXN][K + 1];\n', '6 long long LOG[MAXN];\n', '7 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '8   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '9   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '10 }\n', '11 long long query(long long L, long long R) {\n', '12   long long j = LOG[R - L + 1];\n', '13   return gcd(st[L][j], st[R - (1 << j) + 1][j]);\n', '14 }\n', '15 void solve() {\n', '16   long long n;\n', '17   cin >> n;\n', '18   vector<long long> v(n);\n', '19   for (auto &i : v) cin >> i;\n', '20   if (n == 1) {\n', '21     cout << 1 << ""\\n"";\n', '22     return;\n', '23   }\n', '24   long long m = n - 1;\n', '25   vector<long long> diff(m);\n', '26   for (long long i = 0; i < m; i++) diff[i] = abs(v[i + 1] - v[i]);\n', '27   for (long long i = 0; i < m; i++) st[i][0] = diff[i];\n', '28   for (long long j = 1; j <= K; j++) {\n', '29     for (long long i = 0; i + (1 << j) <= m; i++) {\n', '30       st[i][j] = gcd(st[i][j - 1], st[i + (1 << (j - 1))][j - 1]);\n', '31     }\n', '32   }\n', '33   long long j = 0;\n', '34   long long ans = 1;\n', '35   for (long long i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '36     while (j <= i && query(j, i) == 1) j++;\n', '37     ans = max(ans, i - j + 2);\n', '38   }\n', '39   cout << ans << ""\\n"";\n', '40 }\n', '41 int32_t main() {\n', '42   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '43   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '44   LOG[1] = 0;\n', '45   for (long long i = 2; i < MAXN; i++) LOG[i] = LOG[i / 2] + 1;\n', '46   long long tc;\n', '47   tc = 1;\n', '48   cin >> tc;\n', '49   while (tc--) {\n', '50     solve();\n', '51   }\n', '52   return 0;\n', '53 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MAXN = 200005;\n', '4 const long long K = 24;\n', '5 long long st[MAXN][K + 1];\n', '6 long long LOG[MAXN];\n', '7 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '8   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '9   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '10 }\n', '11 long long query(long long L, long long R) {\n', '12   long long j = LOG[R - L + 1];\n', '13   return gcd(st[L][j], st[R - (1 << j) + 1][j]);\n', '14 }\n', '15 void solve() {\n', '16   long long n;\n', '17   cin >> n;\n', '18   vector<long long> v(n);\n', '19   for (auto &i : v) cin >> i;\n', '20   if (n == 1) {\n', '21     cout << 1 << ""\\n"";\n', '22     return;\n', '23   }\n', '24   long long m = n - 1;\n', '25   vector<long long> diff(m);\n', '26   for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) { return !b ? a : gcd(b, a % b); }\n', '5 long long lcm(long long a, long long b) { return (a / gcd(a, b)) * b; }\n', '6 long long seg[4 * N], a[N];\n', '7 void build(int p, int s, int e) {\n', '8   if (s == e) {\n', '9     seg[p] = a[s];\n', '10     return;\n', '11   }\n', '12   int m = (s + e) / 2;\n', '13   build(2 * p, s, m);\n', '14   build(2 * p + 1, m + 1, e);\n', '15   seg[p] = gcd(seg[2 * p], seg[2 * p + 1]);\n', '16 }\n', '17 long long query(int p, int s, int e, int l, int r) {\n', '18   if (s > r || e < l) return 0;\n', '19   if (l <= s && e <= r) return seg[p];\n', '20   int m = (s + e) / 2;\n', '21   return gcd(query(2 * p, s, m, l, r), query(2 * p + 1, m + 1, e, l, r));\n', '22 }\n', '23 void solve() {\n', '24   int n;\n', '25   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '26   long long a[n];\n', '27   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '28     scanf(""%lld"", a + i);\n', '29   }\n', '30   for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {\n', '31     ::a[i] = abs(a[i] - a[i + 1]);\n', '32   }\n', '33   build(1, 0, n - 1);\n', '34   long long l = 0, ans = 1;\n', '35   for (int r = 0; r < n - 1; ++r) {\n', '36     while (r >= l && query(1, 0, n - 1, l, r) == 1) {\n', '37       ++l;\n', '38     }\n', '39     ans = max(ans, r - l + 2);\n', '40   }\n', '41   printf(""%lld\\n"", ans);\n', '42 }\n', '43 int main() {\n', '44   int t = 1;\n', '45   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '46   while (t--) solve();\n', '47 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) { return !b ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     string s;\n', '10     cin >> s;\n', '11     sort(s.begin(), s.end());\n', '12     int n = s.size();\n', '13     for (int i = 0; i <= n - 3; i++) {\n', '14       if (s[i] == s[i + 1] && s[i + 1] == s[i + 2]) {\n', ""15         s[i] = '*';\n"", '16       }\n', '17     }\n', '18     int c = 0;\n', '19     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', ""20       if (s[i] != '*') {\n"", '21         c++;\n', '22       }\n', '23     }\n', '24     cout << (c) / 2 << ""\\n"";\n', '25   }\n', '26 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     string s;\n', '10     cin >> s;\n', '11     sort(s.begin(), s.end());\n', '12     int n = s.size();\n', '13     for (int i = 0; i < n - 3; i++) {\n', '14       if (s[i] == s[i + 1] && s[i + 1] == s[i + 2]) {\n', ""15         s[i] = '*';\n"", '16       }\n', '17     }\n', '18     int c = 0;\n', '19     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', ""20       if (s[i] != '*') {\n"", '21         c++;\n', '22       }\n', '23     }\n', '24     cout << (c) / 2 << ""\\n"";\n', '25   }\n', '26 }\n']"	"13     for (int i = 0; i <= n - 3; i++) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void fast() {\n', '4   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   cout.tie(0);\n', '7 }\n', '8 int a[200005];\n', '9 map<int, vector<int> > mp;\n', '10 void solve() {\n', '11   int n, k;\n', '12   cin >> n >> k;\n', '13   mp.clear();\n', '14   memset(a, 0, n * sizeof(a[0]));\n', '15   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '16     int x;\n', '17     cin >> x;\n', '18     if (mp[x].size() < k) mp[x].push_back(i);\n', '19   }\n', '20   int m = 0;\n', '21   for (auto p : mp) m += p.second.size();\n', '22   m -= m % k;\n', '23   int color = 0;\n', '24   bool ok = 0;\n', '25   for (auto e : mp) {\n', '26     for (auto c : e.second) {\n', '27       a[c] = ++color;\n', '28       color %= k;\n', '29       if (--m == 0) {\n', '30         ok = 1;\n', '31         break;\n', '32       }\n', '33     }\n', '34     if (ok) break;\n', '35   }\n', '36   if (ok) {\n', '37     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << a[i] << "" "";\n', ""38     cout << '\\n';\n"", '39   }\n', '40 }\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   fast();\n', '43   int t = 1;\n', '44   cin >> t;\n', '45   for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {\n', '46     solve();\n', '47   }\n', '48   return 0;\n', '49 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void fast() {\n', '4   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   cout.tie(0);\n', '7 }\n', '8 int a[200001];\n', '9 map<int, vector<int> > mp;\n', '10 void solve() {\n', '11   int n, k;\n', '12   cin >> n >> k;\n', '13   mp.clear();\n', '14   memset(a, 0, n * sizeof(a[0]));\n', '15   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int tam = 1e9 + 5;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   int n, k;\n', '6   cin >> n >> k;\n', '7   vector<int> f[n + 1];\n', '8   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 vector<vector<int>> arr(5, vector<int>(200005));\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   int t, n, i, ans, a, b, c, d, e, m, j, s, curr;\n', '6   string s1;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     cin >> n;\n', '10     for (i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 5 * 10000;\n', '4 const long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   int n;\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   vector<int> a(n), b(n), c(n), d(n), e(n);\n', '9   string str;\n', '10   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct node {\n', '4   long long zs, a, b, c, d, e;\n', '5 } s[200005];\n', '6 bool cmpa(node x, node y) { return x.a * 2 - x.zs > y.a * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '7 bool cmpb(node x, node y) { return x.b * 2 - x.zs > y.b * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '8 bool cmpc(node x, node y) { return x.c * 2 - x.zs > y.c * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '9 bool cmpd(node x, node y) { return x.d * 2 - x.zs > y.d * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '10 bool cmpe(node x, node y) { return x.e * 2 - x.zs > y.e * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   long long t, n, i, j, k, a, b, c, d, e, su, zd;\n', '13   string sr;\n', '14   scanf(""%lld"", &t);\n', '15   while (t--) {\n', '16     scanf(""%lld"", &n);\n', '17     for (i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '18       cin >> sr;\n', '19       for (j = a = b = c = d = e = 0; j <= sr.length() - 1; j++) {\n', ""20         if (sr[j] == 'a') a++;\n"", ""21         if (sr[j] == 'b') b++;\n"", ""22         if (sr[j] == 'c') c++;\n"", ""23         if (sr[j] == 'd') d++;\n"", ""24         if (sr[j] == 'e') e++;\n"", '25       }\n', '26       s[i].a = a, s[i].b = b, s[i].c = c, s[i].d = d, s[i].e = e;\n', '27       s[i].zs = a + b + c + d + e;\n', '28     }\n', '29     sort(s + 1, s + 1 + n, cmpa), zd = 0;\n', '30     for (i = 1, a = su = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '31       a += s[i].a;\n', '32       su += s[i].zs;\n', '33       if (a * 2 > su)\n', '34         zd = max(zd, i);\n', '35       else\n', '36         break;\n', '37     }\n', '38     sort(s + 1, s + 1 + n, cmpb);\n', '39     for (i = 1, b = su = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '40       b += s[i].b;\n', '41       su += s[i].zs;\n', '42       if (b * 2 > su)\n', '43         zd = max(zd, i);\n', '44       else\n', '45         break;\n', '46     }\n', '47     sort(s + 1, s + 1 + n, cmpc);\n', '48     for (i = 1, c = su = 0; }\n', '7 bool cmpb(node x, node y) { return x.b * 2 - x.zs > y.b * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '8 bool cmpc(node x, node y) { return x.c * 2 - x.zs > y.c * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '9 bool cmpd(node x, node y) { return x.d * 2 - x.zs > y.d * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '10 bool cmpe(node x, node y) { return x.e * 2 - x.zs > y.e * 2 - y.zs; }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   long long t, n, i, j, k, a, b, c, d, e, su, zd;\n', '13   string sr;\n', '14   scanf(""%lld"", &t);\n', '15   while (t--) {\n', '16     scanf(""%lld"", &n);\n', '17     for (i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '31       a += s[i].a;\n', '32       su += s[i].zs;\n', '33       if (a * 2 > su)\n', '34         zd = max(zd, i);\n', '35       else\n', '36         break;\n', '37     }\n', '38     sort(s + 1, s + 1 + n, cmpb);\n', '39     for (i = 1, b = su = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t;\n', '4 int n;\n', '5 char li[400001];\n', '6 int num[200001][5];\n', '7 int wat[200001];\n', '8 int l = 1, r = 0;\n', '9 int res;\n', '10 int getsum(int u) {\n', '11   int orz = 0;\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {\n', '13     orz += num[u][i];\n', '14   }\n', '15   return orz;\n', '16 }\n', '17 int getrest(int u, int v) { return num[u][v] * 2 - getsum(u); }\n', '18 void dfs(int u) {\n', '19   int ans = 0;\n', '20   l = 1;\n', '21   r = 0;\n', '22   int rst = 0;\n', '23   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '24     int tmp = getrest(i, u);\n', '25     wat[++r] = tmp;\n', '26   }\n', '27   sort(wat + 1, wat + 1 + r);\n', '28   while (l <= r) {\n', '29     if (rst + wat[r] > 0) {\n', '30       ans++;\n', '31       rst += wat[r];\n', '32       r--;\n', '33       continue;\n', '34     }\n', '35     break;\n', '36   }\n', '37   res = max(res, ans);\n', '38 }\n', '39 int main() {\n', '40   cin >> t;\n', '41   while (t--) {\n', '42     cin >> n;\n', '43     memset(num, 0, sizeof(num));\n', '44     res = 0;\n', '45     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 string lt = ""abcde"";\n', '4 bool Sort(const pair<long long int, long long int> &a,\n', '5           const pair<long long int, long long int> &b) {\n', '6   if (a.first - a.second > b.first - b.second) return true;\n', '7   return false;\n', '8 }\n', '9 int main() {\n', '10   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '11   cin.tie(0);\n', '12   cout.tie(0);\n', '13   long long int t;\n', '14   cin >> t;\n', '15   while (t--) {\n', '16     long long int n;\n', '17     cin >> n;\n', '18     vector<string> v;\n', '19     string s;\n', '20     for (long long int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using namespace std::chrono;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   long long int n, i, m = 0, q = 0, mx = -20000000000000000,\n', '6                       mn = 20000000000000000, k = 0, j = 0, c = 0, d = 0, t = 0,\n', '7                       sum = 0, pdt = 1, l = 0, r = 0;\n', '8   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '9   if (k == 0) {\n', '10     if (n % 2 == 0)\n', '11       cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '12     else\n', '13       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '14     return;\n', '15   }\n', '16   if (m == 1) {\n', '17     cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '18     return;\n', '19   }\n', '20   if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '21     if (m % 2 == 1) {\n', '22       l = (n * (m - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     int n, m, k, p;\n', '8     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '9     p = (n * m) / 2 - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t;\n', '4 int n, m, k;\n', '5 int main(void) {\n', '6   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(nullptr), cout.tie(nullptr);\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   for (int test_case = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class T>\n', '4 void chmax(T& a, const T& b) {\n', '5   a = max(a, b);\n', '6 }\n', '7 template <class T>\n', '8 void chmin(T& a, const T& b) {\n', '9   a = min(a, b);\n', '10 }\n', '11 using ll = long long;\n', '12 using P = pair<int, int>;\n', '13 using VI = vector<int>;\n', '14 using VVI = vector<VI>;\n', '15 using VL = vector<ll>;\n', '16 using VVL = vector<VL>;\n', '17 int main() {\n', '18   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '19   cin.tie(0);\n', '20   int tt;\n', '21   cin >> tt;\n', '22   while (tt--) {\n', '23     int n, m, k;\n', '24     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '25     int k1 = k, k2 = n * m / 2 - k1;\n', '26     bool flipped = false;\n', '27     if (m % 2) {\n', '28       flipped = true;\n', '29       swap(n, m);\n', '30       swap(k1, k2);\n', '31     }\n', '32     if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '33       cout << (k2 % 2 == 0 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 unsigned long long gcd(unsigned long long a, unsigned long long b) {\n', '4   if (a == 0) return b;\n', '5   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '6   if (a == 1 || b == 1) return 1;\n', '7   if (a == b) return a;\n', '8   if (a > b)\n', '9     return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '10   else\n', '11     return gcd(a, b % a);\n', '12 }\n', '13 int32_t main() {\n', '14   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '15   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '16   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '17   int t;\n', '18   cin >> t;\n', '19   while (t--) {\n', '20     int long long n, m, k;\n', '21     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '22     if (n == 1) {\n', '23       if (k == m * n / 2)\n', '24         cout << ""YES""\n', '25              << ""\\n"";\n', '26       else\n', '27         cout << ""NO""\n', '28              << ""\\n"";\n', '29       continue;\n', '30     }\n', '31     if (m == 1) {\n', '32       if (k == 0)\n', '33         cout << ""YES""\n', '34              << ""\\n"";\n', '35       else\n', '36         cout << ""NO""\n', '37              << ""\\n"";\n', '38       continue;\n', '39     }\n', '40     if (n % 2 == 0 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '41       if (k % 2 == 0)\n', '42         cout << ""YES""\n', '43              << ""\\n"";\n', '44       else\n', '45         cout << ""NO""\n', '46              << ""\\n"";\n', '47     } else if (n % 2 == 1 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '48       if (k < m / 2)\n', '49         cout << ""NO""\n', '50              << ""\\n"";\n', '51       else if (k >= m / 2 && (k - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int idx[] = {-1, 1, 0, 0}, idy[] = {0, 0, -1, 1};\n', '4 void print(int n, int m, int k) {\n', '5   cout << ""YES""\n', '6        << ""\\n"";\n', '7   vector<vector<int>> g(n, vector<int>(m, -1));\n', '8   auto isvalid = [&](int i, int j) -> bool {\n', '9     if (i >= 0 && j >= 0 && i < n && j < m) {\n', '10       return true;\n', '11     }\n', '12     return false;\n', '13   };\n', '14   auto findMatch = [&](int i, int j, int ni, int nj) -> int {\n', '15     for (int num = 0; num < 26; num++) {\n', '16       bool flag = false;\n', '17       for (int dir = 0; dir < 4; dir++) {\n', '18         int nx = i + idx[dir], ny = j + idy[dir];\n', '19         int nxx = ni + idx[dir], nyy = nj + idy[dir];\n', '20         if (isvalid(nx, ny) && g[nx][ny] == num) flag = true;\n', '21         if (isvalid(nxx, nyy) && g[nxx][nyy] == num) flag = true;\n', '22       }\n', '23       if (flag) continue;\n', '24       return num;\n', '25     }\n', '26     assert(false);\n', '27     return -1;\n', '28   };\n', '29   if (n % 2) {\n', '30     for (int i = 0; i < m; i += 2) {\n', '31       int c = findMatch(n - 1, i, n - 1, i + 1);\n', '32       g[n - 1][i] = g[n - 1][i + 1] = c;\n', '33       k--;\n', '34     }\n', '35   } else if (m % 2) {\n', '36     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {\n', '37       int c = findMatch(i, m - 1, i + 1, m - 1);\n', '38       g[i][m - 1] = g[i + 1][m - 1] = c;\n', '39     }\n', '40   }\n', '41   int v = 0, h = n - (1 + (n % 2));\n', '42   while (k--) {\n', '43     if (h < 0) h = n - (1 + (n % 2)), v += 2;\n', '44     auto c = findMatch(h, v, h, v + 1);\n', '45     g[h][v] = g[h][v + 1] = c;\n', '46     h--;\n', '47   }\n', '48   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '49     for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '50       if (g[i][j] != -1) continue;\n', '51       auto c = findMatch(i, j, i + 1, j);\n', '52       g[i][j] = g[i + 1][j] = c;\n', '53     }\n', '54   }\n', '55   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '56     for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '57       assert(g[i][j] != -1);\n', ""58       cout << char(g[i][j] + 'a');\n"", '59     }\n', '60     cout << ""\\n"";\n', '61   }\n', '62 }\n', '63 void runCase(int tc) {\n', '64   int n, m, k;\n', '65   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '66   int hor = k, ver = (n * m / 2) - k;\n', '67   if (n % 2 != 0) {\n', '68     int need = m / 2;\n', '69     if (hor < need) {\n', '70       cout << ""NO""\n', '71            << ""\\n"";\n', '72       return;\n', '73     }\n', '74     hor -= need;\n', '75     if (hor % 2 != 0) {\n', '76       cout << ""NO""\n', '77            << ""\\n"";\n', '78     } else {\n', '79       print(n, m, k);\n', '80     }\n', '81   } else if (m % 2 != 0) {\n', '82     int need = n / 2;\n', '83     if (ver < need) {\n', '84       cout << ""NO""\n', '85            << ""\\n"";\n', '86       return;\n', '87     }\n', '88     ver -= need;\n', '89     if (ver % 2 != 0) {\n', '90       cout << ""NO""\n', '91            << ""\\n"";\n', '92     } else\n', '93       print(n, m, k);\n', '94   } else {\n', '95     if (k % 2 != 0) {\n', '96       cout << ""NO""\n', '97            << ""\\n"";\n', '98     } else\n', '99       print(n, m, k);\n', '100   }\n', '101 }\n', '102 int main() {\n', '103   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(0);\n', '104   int t = 1;\n', '105   cin >> t;\n', '106   for (int tc = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m, k, a, b, num[110][110], cur;\n', '4 int ans[110][110];\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '7   if (n % 2 == 0)\n', '8     a = 0;\n', '9   else\n', '10     a = m / 2;\n', '11   b = n * m / 2;\n', '12   if (m % 2 == 1) b -= n / 2;\n', '13   if (k >= a && k <= b && ((k - a) & 1) == 0) {\n', '14     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '15     cur = 0;\n', '16     if (n & 1) {\n', '17       for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m, k, a, b, num[110][110], cur;\n', '4 int ans[110][110];\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '7   if (n % 2 == 0)\n', '8     a = 0;\n', '9   else\n', '10     a = m / 2;\n', '11   b = n * m / 2;\n', '12   if (m % 2 == 1) b -= n / 2;\n', '13   if (k >= a && k <= b && ((k - a) & 1) == 0) {\n', '14     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '15     cur = 0;\n', '16     if (n & 1) {\n', '17       for (int i = 0; i < m; i += 2) {\n', '18         num[n - 1][i] = num[n - 1][i + 1] = cur++;\n', '19         k--;\n', '20       }\n', '21     }\n', '22     if (m & 1) {\n', '23       for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {\n', '24         num[i][m - 1] = num[i + 1][m - 1] = cur++;\n', '25       }\n', '26     }\n', '27     for (int i = 0; i < n / 2 * 2; i += 2) {\n', '28       for (int j = 0; j < m / 2 * 2; j += 2) {\n', '29         if (k) {\n', '30           k -= 2;\n', '31           num[i][j] = num[i][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '32           num[i + 1][j] = num[i + 1][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '33         } else {\n', '34           num[i][j] = num[i + 1][j] = cur++;\n', '35           num[i][j + 1] = num[i + 1][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '36         }\n', '37       }\n', '38     }\n', '39     for (int i = 0; i <= n - 1; i++)\n', '40       for (int j = 0; j <= m - 1; j++) ans[i][j] = -1;\n', '41     for (int i = 0; i <= n - 1; i++) {\n', '42       for (int j = 0; j <= m - 1; j++) {\n', '43         if (ans[i][j] != -1) continue;\n', '44         if (i != n - 1 && num[i][j] == num[i + 1][j]) {\n', '45           for (int t = 0; t <= 26 - 1; t++) {\n', '46             if (i && t == ans[i - 1][j]) continue;\n', '47             if (j && t == ans[i][j - 1]) continue;\n', '48             if (j && t == ans[i + 1][j - 1]) continue;\n', '49             if (j != m - 1 && t == ans[i][j + 1]) continue;\n', '50             ans[i][j] = ans[i + 1][j] = t;\n', '51             break;\n', '52           }\n', '53         } else {\n', '54           for (int t = 0; t <= 26 - 1; t++) {\n', '55             if (i && t == ans[i - 1][j]) continue;\n', '56             if (i && t == ans[i - 1][j + 1]) continue;\n', '57             if (j && t == ans[i][j - 1]) continue;\n', '58             if (j != m - 2 && t == ans[i][j + 2]) continue;\n', '59             ans[i][j] = ans[i][j + 1] = t;\n', '60             break;\n', '61           }\n', '62         }\n', '63       }\n', '64     }\n', '65     for (int i = 0; i <= n - 1; i++) {\n', ""66       for (int j = 0; j <= m - 1; j++) cout << char('a' + ans[i][j]);\n"", '67       cout << endl;\n', '68     }\n', '69   } else\n', '70     cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '71 }\n', '72 int main() {\n', '73   int T;\n', '74   T = 1;\n', '75   cin >> T;\n', '76   while (T--) solve();\n', '77   return 0;\n', '78 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m, k, a, b, num[110][110], cur;\n', '4 int ans[110][110];\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '7   if (n % 2 == 0)\n', '8     a = 0;\n', '9   else\n', '10     a = m / 2;\n', '11   b = n * m / 2;\n', '12   if (m % 2 == 1) b -= n / 2;\n', '13   if (k >= a && k <= b && ((k - a) & 1) == 0) {\n', '14     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '15     cur = 0;\n', '16     if (n & 1) {\n', '17       for (int i = 0; i < n / 2 * 2; i += 2) {\n', '28       for (int j = 0; j < m * 2 / 2; j += 2) {\n', '29         if (k) {\n', '30           k -= 2;\n', '31           num[i][j] = num[i][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '32           num[i + 1][j] = num[i + 1][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '33         } else {\n', '34           num[i][j] = num[i + 1][j] = cur++;\n', '35           num[i][j + 1] = num[i + 1][j + 1] = cur++;\n', '36         }\n', '37       }\n', '38     }\n', '39     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t;\n', '4 int n, m, k;\n', '5 char domino[100][100];\n', '6 bool vst[100][100];\n', '7 void solve(int r, int c, int& cnt, bool block) {\n', '8   if (vst[r][c]) return;\n', '9   vst[r][c] = true;\n', '10   if (cnt == 0) {\n', '11     if (block) {\n', ""12       domino[r][c] = domino[r + 1][c] = 'a';\n"", ""13       domino[r][c + 1] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'b';\n"", '14     } else {\n', ""15       domino[r][c] = domino[r + 1][c] = 'c';\n"", ""16       domino[r][c + 1] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'd';\n"", '17     }\n', '18   } else {\n', '19     if (block) {\n', ""20       domino[r][c] = domino[r][c + 1] = 'a';\n"", ""21       domino[r + 1][c] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'b';\n"", '22     } else {\n', ""23       domino[r][c] = domino[r][c + 1] = 'c';\n"", ""24       domino[r + 1][c] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'd';\n"", '25     }\n', '26     cnt -= 2;\n', '27   }\n', '28   if (c + 2 > m - 1) {\n', '29     if (r + 2 > n - 1) {\n', '30       return;\n', '31     } else {\n', '32       solve(r + 2, c, cnt, !block);\n', '33     }\n', '34   } else {\n', '35     solve(r, c + 2, cnt, !block);\n', '36     if (r + 2 < n - 1) solve(r + 2, c, cnt, !block);\n', '37   }\n', '38 }\n', '39 int main(void) {\n', '40   cin >> t;\n', '41   for (int test_case = 0; test_case < t; test_case++) {\n', '42     memset(domino, 0, sizeof(domino));\n', '43     memset(vst, false, sizeof vst);\n', '44     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '45     bool flag = false;\n', '46     if (n % 2 == 0 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '47       if (k % 2 == 0) {\n', '48         flag = true;\n', '49       }\n', '50     } else if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '51       if (m == 1) {\n', '52         if (k == 0) {\n', '53           flag = true;\n', '54         }\n', '55       } else {\n', '56         if (k % 2 == 0) {\n', '57           if (k <= (m - 1) * (n) / 2) {\n', '58             flag = true;\n', '59           }\n', '60         }\n', '61       }\n', '62     } else {\n', '63       if (n == 1) {\n', '64         if (k == m * n / 2) {\n', '65           flag = true;\n', '66         }\n', '67       } else {\n', '68         if (k >= m / 2) {\n', '69           if ((k - m / 2) % 2 == 0) {\n', '70             flag = true;\n', '71           }\n', '72         }\n', '73       }\n', '74     }\n', '75     if (!flag) {\n', '76       cout << ""NO""\n', '77            << ""\\n"";\n', '78       continue;\n', '79     }\n', '80     cout << ""YES""\n', '81          << ""\\n"";\n', '82     if (n % 2 == 0 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '83       solve(0, 0, k, true);\n', '84     } else if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '85       bool block = true;\n', '86       for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i += 2) {\n', '87         if (block) {\n', ""88           domino[i][0] = 'e';\n"", ""89           domino[i + 1][0] = 'e';\n"", '90           block = !block;\n', '91         } else {\n', ""92           domino[i][0] = 'f';\n"", ""93           domino[i + 1][0] = 'f';\n"", '94           block = !block;\n', '95         }\n', '96       }\n', '97       solve(0, 1, k, true);\n', '98     } else {\n', '99       bool block = true;\n', '100       for (int i = 0; i < m - 1; i += 2) {\n', '101         if (block) {\n', ""102           domino[0][i] = 'e';\n"", ""103           domino[0][i + 1] = 'e';\n"", '104           block = !block;\n', '105         } else {\n', ""106           domino[0][i] = 'f';\n"", ""107           domino[0][i + 1] = 'f';\n"", '108           block = !block;\n', '109         }\n', '110       }\n', '111       k -= m / 2;\n', '112       solve(1, 0, k, true);\n', '113     }\n', '114     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '115       for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '116         cout << domino[i][j];\n', '117       }\n', '118       cout << ""\\n"";\n', '119     }\n', '120   }\n', '121 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t;\n', '4 int n, m, k;\n', '5 char domino[100][100];\n', '6 bool vst[100][100];\n', '7 void solve(int r, int c, int& cnt, bool block) {\n', '8   if (vst[r][c]) return;\n', '9   vst[r][c] = true;\n', '10   if (cnt == 0) {\n', '11     if (block) {\n', ""12       domino[r][c] = domino[r + 1][c] = 'a';\n"", ""13       domino[r][c + 1] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'b';\n"", '14     } else {\n', ""15       domino[r][c] = domino[r + 1][c] = 'c';\n"", ""16       domino[r][c + 1] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'd';\n"", '17     }\n', '18   } else {\n', '19     if (block) {\n', ""20       domino[r][c] = domino[r][c + 1] = 'a';\n"", ""21       domino[r + 1][c] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'b';\n"", '22     } else {\n', ""23       domino[r][c] = domino[r][c + 1] = 'c';\n"", ""24       domino[r + 1][c] = domino[r + 1][c + 1] = 'd';\n"", '25     }\n', '26     cnt -= 2;\n', '27   }\n', '28   if (c + 2 > m - 1) {\n', '29     if (r + 2 > n - 1) {\n', '30       return;\n', '31     } else {\n', '32       solve(r + 2, c, cnt, !block);\n', '33     }\n', '34   } else {\n', '35     solve(r, c + 2, cnt, !block);\n', '36     if (r + 2 < n - 1) solve(r + 2, c, cnt, !block);\n', '37   }\n', '38 }\n', '39 int main(void) {\n', '40   cin >> t;\n', '41   for (int test_case = 0; i < n - 1; i += 2) {\n', '87         if (block) {\n', ""88           domino[i][0] = 'e';\n"", ""89           domino[i + 1][0] = 'e';\n"", '90           block = !block;\n', '91         } else {\n', ""92           domino[i][0] = 'f';\n"", ""93           domino[i + 1][0] = 'f';\n"", '94           block = !block;\n', '95         }\n', '96       }\n', '97       solve(0, 1, k, true);\n', '98     } else {\n', '99       bool block = true;\n', '100       for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '115       for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '116         cout << domino[i][j];\n', '117       }\n', '118       cout << ""\\n"";\n', '119     }\n', '120   }\n', '121 }\n']"	"100       for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 105;\n', '4 long long n, m, k, xx, t, cnt, cnt1, bb[N][N];\n', '5 char ans[N][N], ans1[N][N];\n', '6 void go(int i, int j) {\n', '7   if (k > 0) {\n', '8     if (bb[i][j] == 1) {\n', ""9       ans[i][j] = 'a';\n"", ""10       ans[i][j + 1] = 'a';\n"", ""11       ans[i + 1][j] = 'b';\n"", ""12       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", '13     } else {\n', ""14       ans[i][j] = 'c';\n"", ""15       ans[i][j + 1] = 'c';\n"", ""16       ans[i + 1][j] = 'd';\n"", ""17       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", '18     }\n', '19     k -= 2;\n', '20   } else {\n', '21     if (bb[i][j] == 1) {\n', ""22       ans[i][j] = 'a';\n"", ""23       ans[i + 1][j] = 'a';\n"", ""24       ans[i][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", ""25       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", '26     } else {\n', ""27       ans[i][j] = 'c';\n"", ""28       ans[i + 1][j] = 'c';\n"", ""29       ans[i][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", ""30       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", '31     }\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n', '34 int main() {\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '38     if (n % 2 == 0 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '39       if (k % 2 == 0) {\n', '40         cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '41         cnt1 = 0;\n', '42         for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '43           cnt1++;\n', '44           cnt = cnt1 % 2;\n', '45           for (int j = 1; j <= m; j += 2) {\n', '46             bb[i][j] = bb[i][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '47             bb[i + 1][j] = bb[i + 1][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '48             cnt++;\n', '49             cnt %= 2;\n', '50           }\n', '51         }\n', '52         for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '53           for (int j = 1; j <= m; j += 2) {\n', '54             go(i, j);\n', '55           }\n', '56         }\n', '57         for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '58           for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', '59             cout << ans[i][j] << """";\n', '60           }\n', '61           cout << endl;\n', '62         }\n', '63         continue;\n', '64       }\n', '65       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '66       continue;\n', '67     }\n', '68     long long fff = 0;\n', '69     if (n % 2 == 1) swap(n, m), k = (n * m) / 2 - k, fff = 1;\n', '70     if (k % 2 == 1) {\n', '71       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '72       continue;\n', '73     }\n', '74     xx = n * m - n;\n', '75     xx /= 2;\n', '76     if (k > xx) {\n', '77       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '78       continue;\n', '79     }\n', '80     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '81       cnt1++;\n', '82       cnt = cnt1 % 2;\n', '83       for (int j = 1; j <= m; j += 2) {\n', '84         bb[i][j] = bb[i][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '85         bb[i + 1][j] = bb[i + 1][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '86         cnt++;\n', '87         cnt %= 2;\n', '88       }\n', '89     }\n', '90     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '91       for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', '92       }\n', '93     }\n', '94     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '95       for (int j = 1; j < m; j += 2) {\n', '96         go(i, j);\n', '97       }\n', '98     }\n', '99     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '100       if (bb[i][m] == 1)\n', ""101         ans[i][m] = 'a';\n"", '102       else\n', ""103         ans[i][m] = 'c';\n"", '104     }\n', '105     cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '106     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '107       for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', '108         if (fff) ans1[j][i] = ans[i][j];\n', '109       }\n', '110     }\n', '111     if (fff) swap(n, m);\n', '112     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '113       for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', '114         if (fff)\n', '115           cout << ans1[i][j] << """";\n', '116         else\n', '117           cout << ans[i][j] << """";\n', '118       }\n', '119       cout << endl;\n', '120     }\n', '121   }\n', '122 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 105;\n', '4 long long n, m, k, xx, t, cnt, cnt1, bb[N][N];\n', '5 char ans[N][N], ans1[N][N];\n', '6 void go(int i, int j) {\n', '7   if (k > 0) {\n', '8     if (bb[i][j] == 1) {\n', ""9       ans[i][j] = 'a';\n"", ""10       ans[i][j + 1] = 'a';\n"", ""11       ans[i + 1][j] = 'b';\n"", ""12       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", '13     } else {\n', ""14       ans[i][j] = 'c';\n"", ""15       ans[i][j + 1] = 'c';\n"", ""16       ans[i + 1][j] = 'd';\n"", ""17       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", '18     }\n', '19     k -= 2;\n', '20   } else {\n', '21     if (bb[i][j] == 1) {\n', ""22       ans[i][j] = 'a';\n"", ""23       ans[i + 1][j] = 'a';\n"", ""24       ans[i][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", ""25       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'b';\n"", '26     } else {\n', ""27       ans[i][j] = 'c';\n"", ""28       ans[i + 1][j] = 'c';\n"", ""29       ans[i][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", ""30       ans[i + 1][j + 1] = 'd';\n"", '31     }\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n', '34 int main() {\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '38     if (n % 2 == 0 && m % 2 == 0) {\n', '39       if (k % 2 == 0) {\n', '40         cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '41         cnt1 = 0;\n', '42         for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '43           cnt1++;\n', '44           cnt = cnt1 % 2;\n', '45           for (int j = 1; j <= m; j += 2) {\n', '46             bb[i][j] = bb[i][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '47             bb[i + 1][j] = bb[i + 1][j + 1] = cnt;\n', '48             cnt++;\n', '49             cnt %= 2;\n', '50           }\n', '51         }\n', '52         for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 void test_case() {\n', '5   int n, m, k;\n', '6   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', ""7   vector<vector<char>> table(n, vector<char>(m, '0'));\n"", '8   int horizontal = 0;\n', '9   if (n % 2 == 1) horizontal = m / 2;\n', '10   int max_h = n * (m / 2);\n', '11   if (max_h < k)\n', '12     cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '13   else if (k >= horizontal && (k - horizontal) % 2 == 0) {\n', '14     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '15     string alphabet = ""abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"";\n', '16     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long N = 2e5 + 5, LMAX = 3e18 + 13, IMAX = 2e9 + 13, mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int32_t main() {\n', '5   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '7   long long T;\n', '8   cin >> T;\n', '9   while (T--) {\n', '10     long long n, m, k;\n', '11     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '12     bool swapped = false;\n', '13     if (n & 1) {\n', '14       swap(n, m);\n', '15       k = ((n * m) / 2) - k;\n', '16       swapped = true;\n', '17     }\n', '18     if (k & 1) {\n', '19       cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '20       continue;\n', '21     }\n', '22     char a[n][m];\n', '23     for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 110;\n', '4 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '6 int n, m, k, f;\n', '7 char s[MAXN][MAXN];\n', '8 bool check(int x, int y, int f, char w) {\n', '9   int res = 1;\n', '10   if (f) {\n', '11     res &= s[x][y - 1] != w;\n', '12     res &= s[x - 1][y] != w;\n', '13     res &= s[x - 1][y + 1] != w;\n', '14   } else {\n', '15     res &= s[x][y - 1] != w;\n', '16     res &= s[x + 1][y - 1] != w;\n', '17     res &= s[x - 1][y] != w;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return res;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void work(int x, int y, int f) {\n', ""22   for (char w = 'a'; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 void test_case() {\n', '5   int n, m, k;\n', '6   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', ""7   vector<vector<char>> table(n, vector<char>(m, '0'));\n"", '8   int horizontal = 0;\n', '9   if (n % 2 == 1) horizontal = m / 2;\n', '10   int max_h = n * (m / 2);\n', '11   if (max_h < k)\n', '12     cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '13   else if (k >= horizontal && (k - horizontal) % 2 == 0) {\n', '14     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '15     string alphabet = ""abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"";\n', '16     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long maxn = 2e5 + 50;\n', '4 long long n, dp[maxn], k, a[maxn], b[maxn], tp[maxn];\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) b[i] = i - a[i];\n', '7   long long pos = 1, ans = 1e18;\n', '8   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '9     dp[i] = (b[i] >= 0);\n', '10     for (long long j = 1; j <= i - 1; j++) {\n', '11       if (b[i] >= 0 and a[i] > a[j] and b[j] <= b[i]) {\n', '12         dp[i] = max(dp[i], dp[j] + 1);\n', '13       }\n', '14     }\n', '15     if (dp[i] >= k and b[i] >= 0) {\n', '16       ans = min(ans, b[i]);\n', '17     }\n', '18   }\n', '19   if (ans != 1e18)\n', ""20     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '21   else\n', ""22     cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '23 }\n', '24 void input() {\n', '25   cin >> n >> k;\n', '26   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int task(vector<int> &nums, int k) {\n', '4   int n = nums.size();\n', '5   vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n', '6   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '7     for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {\n', '8       dp[i][j] =\n', '9           max(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1] + ((nums[i - 1] == j) ? 1 : 0));\n', '10     }\n', '11   }\n', '12   int ans = INT_MAX;\n', '13   for (int i = k; i <= n; i++) {\n', '14     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n', '15       if (dp[i][j] >= k) {\n', '16         ans = min(ans, i - j);\n', '17       }\n', '18     }\n', '19   }\n', '20   if (ans == INT_MAX) {\n', '21     return -1;\n', '22   }\n', '23   return ans;\n', '24 }\n', '25 int main() {\n', '26   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '27   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '28   int t;\n', '29   cin >> t;\n', '30   for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {\n', '31     int n, k;\n', '32     cin >> n >> k;\n', '33     vector<int> nums(n);\n', '34     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '35       cin >> nums[j];\n', '36     }\n', '37     int ans = task(nums, k);\n', ""38     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '39   }\n', '40 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int task(vector<int> &nums, int k) {\n', '4   int n = nums.size();\n', '5   vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n', '6   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '7     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n', '8       dp[i][j] =\n', '9           max(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1] + ((nums[i - 1] == j) ? ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<int> a(n);\n', '7   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '8   int dp[n + 1][n + 1];\n', '9   memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {\n', '12       dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\n', '13       dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1] + (a[i - 1] == j));\n', '14     }\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = n; i >= k; i--) {\n', '17     if (dp[n][i] >= k) {\n', '18       cout << n - i << endl;\n', '19       return;\n', '20     }\n', '21   }\n', '22   cout << -1 << endl;\n', '23 }\n', '24 int main() {\n', '25   int t;\n', '26   cin >> t;\n', '27   for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {\n', '28     solve();\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<int> a(n);\n', '7   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '8   int dp[n + 1][n + 1];\n', '9   memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     for (int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {\n', '12       dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\n', '13       dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1] + (a[i - 1] == j));\n', '14     }\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = n; i >= k; i--) {\n', '17     if (dp[n][i] >= k) {\n', '18       cout << n - i << endl;\n', '19       return;\n', '20     }\n', '21   }\n', '22   cout << -1 << endl;\n', '23 }\n', '24 int main() {\n', '25   int t;\n', '26   cin >> t;\n', '27   for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {\n', '28     solve();\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']	"11     for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) {

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2002;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   int n, k;\n', '6   cin >> n >> k;\n', '7   int ans = -1;\n', '8   vector<int> a(n + 1, 0);\n', '9   vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '11   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '12     dp[i][0] = dp[i - 1][0] + (i == a[i]);\n', '13     for (int cnt = 1; cnt <= i; cnt++) {\n', '14       dp[i][cnt] =\n', '15           max(dp[i - 1][cnt - 1], dp[i - 1][cnt] + ((i - cnt) == a[i]));\n', '16     }\n', '17   }\n', '18   for (int i = n; i >= 0; i--)\n', '19     if (dp[n][i] >= k) ans = i;\n', '20   cout << ans << endl;\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '24   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '25   int t;\n', '26   cin >> t;\n', '27   while (t--) {\n', '28     solve();\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2002;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   int n, k;\n', '6   cin >> n >> k;\n', '7   int ans = -1;\n', '8   vector<int> a(n + 1, 0);\n', '9   vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '11   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '12     dp[i][0] = dp[i - 1][0] + (i == a[i]);\n', '13     for (int cnt = 1; cnt <= i; cnt++) {\n', '14       dp[i][cnt] =\n', '15           max(dp[i - 1][cnt - 1], dp[i - 1][cnt] + ((i - cnt) == a[i]));\n', '16     }\n', '17   }\n', '18   for (int i = n; i > 0; i--)\n', '19     if (dp[n][i] >= k) ans = i;\n', '20   cout << ans << endl;\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '24   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '25   int t;\n', '26   cin >> t;\n', '27   while (t--) {\n', '28     solve();\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n']	"18   for (int i = n; i >= 0; i--)

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 long long ceiling(long long a, long long b) {\n', '5   if (a % b == 0)\n', '6     return a / b;\n', '7   else\n', '8     return a / b + 1;\n', '9 }\n', '10 long long power(long long a, long long b) {\n', '11   if (b == 0)\n', '12     return 1;\n', '13   else if (b % 2 == 1) {\n', '14     long long k = power(a, b / 2) % mod;\n', '15     return (((a * k) % mod) * k) % mod;\n', '16   } else {\n', '17     long long k = power(a, b / 2) % mod;\n', '18     return (k * k) % mod;\n', '19   }\n', '20 }\n', '21 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '22   if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '23   if (a == 0) return b;\n', '24   return gcd(b % a, a);\n', '25 }\n', '26 bool comparePairs(vector<long long> &a, vector<long long> &b) {\n', '27   long long cnt = 0;\n', '28   for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {\n', '29     if (a[i] < b[i]) cnt++;\n', '30   }\n', '31   return cnt >= 3;\n', '32 }\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '35   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '36   long long q;\n', '37   cin >> q;\n', '38   while (q--) {\n', '39     long long n, k, i, j;\n', '40     cin >> n >> k;\n', '41     vector<long long> a(n);\n', '42     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '43       cin >> a[i];\n', '44     }\n', '45     vector<vector<long long>> dp(n + 1, vector<long long>(n + 1, 0));\n', '46     long long ans = -1;\n', '47     for (i = 1; i < n + 1; i++) {\n', '48       for (j = 1; j < i + 1; j++) {\n', '49         long long k = (a[i - 1] == j) ? 1 : 0;\n', '50         dp[i][j] = max(k + dp[i - 1][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j]);\n', '51       }\n', '52     }\n', '53     for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '54       if (dp[n][i] >= k) ans = max(ans, i);\n', '55     }\n', '56     if (ans != -1)\n', '57       cout << n - ans << endl;\n', '58     else\n', '59       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '60   }\n', '61 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 long long ceiling(long long a, long long b) {\n', '5   if (a % b == 0)\n', '6     return a / b;\n', '7   else\n', '8     return a / b + 1;\n', '9 }\n', '10 long long power(long long a, long long b) {\n', '11   if (b == 0)\n', '12     return 1;\n', '13   else if (b % 2 == 1) {\n', '14     long long k = power(a, b / 2) % mod;\n', '15     return (((a * k) % mod) * k) % mod;\n', '16   } else {\n', '17     long long k = power(a, b / 2) % mod;\n', '18     return (k * k) % mod;\n', '19   }\n', '20 }\n', '21 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '22   if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '23   if (a == 0) return b;\n', '24   return gcd(b % a, a);\n', '25 }\n', '26 bool comparePairs(vector<long long> &a, vector<long long> &b) {\n', '27   long long cnt = 0;\n', '28   for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {\n', '29     if (a[i] < b[i]) cnt++;\n', '30   }\n', '31   return cnt >= 3;\n', '32 }\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '35   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '36   long long q;\n', '37   cin >> q;\n', '38   while (q--) {\n', '39     long long n, k, i, j;\n', '40     cin >> n >> k;\n', '41     vector<long long> a(n);\n', '42     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '43       cin >> a[i];\n', '44     }\n', '45     vector<vector<long long>> dp(n + 1, vector<long long>(n + 1, 0));\n', '46     long long ans = -1;\n', '47     for (i = 1; i < n + 1; i++) {\n', '48       for (j = 1; j < n + 1; j++) {\n', '49         long long k = (a[i - 1] == j) ? 1 : 0;\n', '50         dp[i][j] = max(k + dp[i - 1][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j]);\n', '51       }\n', '52     }\n', '53     for (i = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '54       if (dp[n][i] >= k) ans = max(ans, i);\n', '55     }\n', '56     if (ans != -1)\n', '57       cout << n - ans << endl;\n', '58     else\n', '59       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '60   }\n', '61 }\n']	"48       for (j = 1; j < i + 1; j++) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<long long> v(n);\n', '7   vector<vector<long long>> dp(n + 5, vector<long long>(n + 5, -1e12));\n', '8   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> v[i];\n', '9   dp[0][0] = dp[0][1] = 0;\n', '10   if (v[0] == 1) dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '11   for (long long i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '12     for (long long j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '13       if (dp[i - 1][j] >= 0) {\n', '14         long long add = 0;\n', '15         if (v[i] == i + 1 - j) add = 1;\n', '16         dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j] + add);\n', '17         if (j + 1 <= n) {\n', '18           dp[i][j + 1] = max(dp[i][j + 1], dp[i - 1][j]);\n', '19         }\n', '20       }\n', '21     }\n', '22   }\n', '23   for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const long long N = 2e3 + 10;\n', '5 long long dp[N][N];\n', '6 long long n, k;\n', '7 long long A[N];\n', '8 long long dfs(long long i, long long removed) {\n', '9   if (removed < 0) {\n', '10     return -MOD;\n', '11   }\n', '12   if (i == 0) {\n', '13     return removed == 0 ? 0 : -MOD;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long &ans = dp[i][removed];\n', '16   if (ans != -1) {\n', '17     return ans;\n', '18   }\n', '19   ans =\n', '20       max(dfs(i - 1, removed) + (A[i] == i - removed), dfs(i - 1, removed - 1));\n', '21   return ans;\n', '22 }\n', '23 void Perform() {\n', '24   cin >> n >> k;\n', '25   for (long long i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '26     for (long long j = 0; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '27       dp[i][j] = -1;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '31     cin >> A[i];\n', '32   }\n', '33   for (long long i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '34     if (dfs(n, i) >= k) {\n', '35       cout << i << ""\\n"";\n', '36       return;\n', '37     }\n', '38   }\n', '39   cout << ""-1\\n"";\n', '40 }\n', '41 int32_t main() {\n', '42   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '43   cin.tie(0);\n', '44   long long tc = 1;\n', '45   cin >> tc;\n', '46   while (tc--) {\n', '47     Perform();\n', '48   }\n', '49   return 0;\n', '50 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const long long N = 2e3 + 10;\n', '5 long long dp[N][N];\n', '6 long long n, k;\n', '7 long long A[N];\n', '8 long long dfs(long long i, long long removed) {\n', '9   if (removed < 0) {\n', '10     return -MOD;\n', '11   }\n', '12   if (i == 0) {\n', '13     return removed == 0 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const int NMAX = 2e3;\n', '3 int a[1 + NMAX];\n', '4 int dp[1 + NMAX][1 + NMAX];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   int tests;\n', '7   std::cin >> tests;\n', '8   while (tests--) {\n', '9     int n, k;\n', '10     std::cin >> n >> k;\n', '11     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<long long> v(n);\n', '7   vector<vector<long long>> dp(n + 5, vector<long long>(n + 5, -1e12));\n', '8   for (long long i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2004;\n', '4 int nums[maxn];\n', '5 int dp[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int n, k;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> nums[i];\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     for (int j = 0; j <= i - 1; j++) {\n', '12       dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] + (i - j == nums[i]);\n', '13     }\n', '14     for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {\n', '15       dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1]);\n', '16     }\n', '17   }\n', '18   int ans = -1;\n', '19   for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '20     if (dp[n][i] >= k) {\n', '21       ans = i;\n', '22       break;\n', '23     }\n', '24   }\n', '25   cout << ans << endl;\n', '26   for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n', '27     for (int u = 0; u <= n; u++) dp[i][u] = 0;\n', '28 }\n', '29 int main() {\n', '30   int t;\n', '31   cin >> t;\n', '32   while (t--) {\n', '33     solve();\n', '34   }\n', '35 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2004;\n', '4 int nums[maxn];\n', '5 int dp[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int n, k;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> nums[i];\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     for (int j = 0; j <= i - 1; j++) {\n', '12       dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j] + (i - j == nums[i]);\n', '13     }\n', '14     for (int j = 1; j < i; j++) {\n', '15       dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - 1]);\n', '16     }\n', '17   }\n', '18   int ans = -1;\n', '19   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '20     if (dp[n][i] >= k) {\n', '21       ans = i;\n', '22       break;\n', '23     }\n', '24   }\n', '25   cout << ans << endl;\n', '26   for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n', '27     for (int u = 0; u <= n; u++) dp[i][u] = 0;\n', '28 }\n', '29 int main() {\n', '30   int t;\n', '31   cin >> t;\n', '32   while (t--) {\n', '33     solve();\n', '34   }\n', '35 }\n']	"19   for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const long long N = 2e3 + 10;\n', '5 long long dp[N][N];\n', '6 long long n, k;\n', '7 long long A[N];\n', '8 long long dfs(long long i, long long removed) {\n', '9   if (removed < 0) {\n', '10     return -MOD;\n', '11   }\n', '12   if (i == 0) {\n', '13     return removed == 0 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int T;\n', '4 int n, k;\n', '5 int a[2010];\n', '6 int dp[2010][2010], mx[2010];\n', '7 template <typename Tp>\n', '8 void read(Tp &x) {\n', '9   x = 0;\n', '10   int f = 1;\n', '11   char c = getchar();\n', ""12   while (c < '0' || c > '9') {\n"", ""13     if (c == '-') f = -1;\n"", '14     c = getchar();\n', '15   }\n', ""16   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {\n"", ""17     x = x * 10 + c - '0';\n"", '18     c = getchar();\n', '19   }\n', '20   x *= f;\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   read(T);\n', '24   while (T--) {\n', '25     read(n), read(k);\n', '26     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) read(a[i]);\n', '27     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '28       for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {\n', '29         dp[i][j] = mx[i - j - 1] + (i - j == a[i]);\n', '30       }\n', '31       for (int j = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""O3"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 template <typename... gcd(y % x, x) : y; }\n', '28 long long exgcd(long long a, long long b, long long &x, long long &y) {\n', '29   long long d = a;\n', '30   if (b == 0)\n', '31     x = 1, y = 0;\n', '32   else {\n', '33     d = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x), y -= a / b * x;\n', '34   }\n', '35   return d;\n', '36 }\n', '37 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '38 inline int read() {\n', '39   int ans = 0;\n', ""40   char last = ' ', ch = getchar();\n"", ""41   while (!(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')) last = ch, ch = getchar();\n"", ""42   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')\n"", ""43     ans = (ans << 3) + (ans << 1) + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '44   return ans;\n', '45 }\n', '46 inline int QPow(long long a, long long b) {\n', '47   long long ans = 1;\n', '48   if (b < 0) return 0;\n', '49   while (b) {\n', '50     if (b & 1) ans = ans * a;\n', '51     a = a * a;\n', '52     b >>= 1;\n', '53   }\n', '54   return ans;\n', '55 }\n', '56 inline int QPow(long long a, long long b, const int &mod) {\n', '57   long long ans = 1;\n', '58   while (b) {\n', '59     if (b & 1) ans = ans * a % mod;\n', '60     a = a * a % mod;\n', '61     b >>= 1;\n', '62   }\n', '63   return ans;\n', '64 }\n', '65 const double PI = 3.141592653589793115997963468544185161590576171875;\n', '66 const double e = 2.718281828459045;\n', '67 void ask(int x) {\n', ""68   cout << '?' << ' ' << x << endl;\n"", '69   cout.flush();\n', '70   ;\n', '71 }\n', '72 void decide(int x) {\n', '73   cout << ""! "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 constexpr ll mod = 1000000007;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '7   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '8   cout << fixed << setprecision(20);\n', '9   int T;\n', '10   cin >> T;\n', '11   while (T--) {\n', '12     int n, k;\n', '13     cin >> n >> k;\n', '14     vector<int> p(n);\n', '15     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '16       cin >> p[i];\n', '17       p[i]--;\n', '18     }\n', '19     vector<int> f(n + 1, -1);\n', '20     f[0] = 0;\n', '21     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '22       vector<int> dp(n + 1, -1);\n', '23       dp[0] = 0;\n', '24       for (int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {\n', '25         if (p[i] == i - j) {\n', '26           dp[j] = max(dp[j], f[j] + 1);\n', '27         } else {\n', '28           dp[j] = max(dp[j], f[j]);\n', '29         }\n', '30         dp[j + 1] = max(dp[j + 1], f[j]);\n', '31       }\n', '32       swap(dp, f);\n', '33     }\n', '34     int ans = -1;\n', '35     for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n', '36       if (f[i] >= k) {\n', '37         ans = i;\n', '38         break;\n', '39       }\n', '40     }\n', ""41     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '42   }\n', '43   return 0;\n', '44 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 constexpr ll mod = 1000000007;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '7   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '8   cout << fixed << setprecision(20);\n', '9   int T;\n', '10   cin >> T;\n', '11   while (T--) {\n', '12     int n, k;\n', '13     cin >> n >> k;\n', '14     vector<int> p(n);\n', '15     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '16       cin >> p[i];\n', '17       p[i]--;\n', '18     }\n', '19     vector<int> f(n + 1, -1);\n', '20     f[0] = 0;\n', '21     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '22       vector<int> dp(n + 1, -1);\n', '23       dp[0] = 0;\n', '24       for (int j = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 const LL mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 int n, k, u, v;\n', '6 vector<int> graph[205];\n', '7 LL dp[205][205];\n', '8 bool vis[205];\n', '9 int main() {\n', '10   int t;\n', '11   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '12   while (t--) {\n', '13     scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '14     for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {\n', '15       scanf(""%d%d"", &u, &v);\n', '16       graph[u].push_back(v);\n', '17       graph[v].push_back(u);\n', '18     }\n', '19     if (k > 2) {\n', '20       LL ans = 0;\n', '21       for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '22         fill_n(vis + 1, n, false);\n', '23         vis[i] = true;\n', '24         vector<int> cnt(graph[i].size(), 0);\n', '25         queue<tuple<int, int, int>> quu;\n', '26         for (int j = 0; j < graph[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '27           quu.push({graph[i][j], j, 1});\n', '28         }\n', '29         int nowHeight = 1;\n', '30         while (!quu.empty()) {\n', '31           auto cur = quu.front();\n', '32           quu.pop();\n', '33           vis[get<0>(cur)] = true;\n', '34           if (get<2>(cur) > nowHeight) {\n', '35             dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '36             for (int j = 1; j <= graph[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '37               for (int l = 0; l <= k; ++l) {\n', '38                 dp[j][l] = (dp[j - 1][l] + dp[j][l]) % mod;\n', '39                 if (l > 0) {\n', '40                   dp[j][l] =\n', '41                       (dp[j - 1][l - 1] * cnt[j - 1] % mod + dp[j][l]) % mod;\n', '42                 }\n', '43               }\n', '44             }\n', '45             ans = (ans + dp[graph[i].size()][k]) % mod;\n', '46             for (int j = 0; j <= graph[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '47               for (int l = 0; l <= k; ++l) {\n', '48                 dp[j][l] = 0;\n', '49               }\n', '50             }\n', '51             fill_n(cnt.begin(), graph[i].size(), 0);\n', '52             ++nowHeight;\n', '53           }\n', '54           ++cnt[get<1>(cur)];\n', '55           for (auto nxt : graph[get<0>(cur)]) {\n', '56             if (vis[nxt]) continue;\n', '57             quu.push({nxt, get<1>(cur), get<2>(cur) + 1});\n', '58           }\n', '59         }\n', '60         dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '61         for (int j = 1; j <= graph[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '62           for (int l = 0; l <= k; ++l) {\n', '63             dp[j][l] = (dp[j - 1][l] + dp[j][l]) % mod;\n', '64             if (l > 0) {\n', '65               dp[j][l] = (dp[j - 1][l - 1] * cnt[j - 1] % mod + dp[j][l]) % mod;\n', '66             }\n', '67           }\n', '68         }\n', '69         ans = (ans + dp[graph[i].size()][k]) % mod;\n', '70         for (int j = 0; j <= graph[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '71           for (int l = 0; l <= k; ++l) {\n', '72             dp[j][l] = 0;\n', '73           }\n', '74         }\n', '75         fill_n(cnt.begin(), graph[i].size(), 0);\n', '76       }\n', '77       printf(""%lld\\n"", ans);\n', '78     } else {\n', '79       printf(""%lld\\n"", 1ll * n * (n - 1) / 2 % mod);\n', '80     }\n', '81     for (int i = 1;
