"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '5 using ld = long double;\n', '6 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '7 inline void chkmin(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '8   if (y < x) x = y;\n', '9 }\n', '10 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '11 inline void chkmax(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '12   if (x < y) x = y;\n', '13 }\n', '14 mt19937 rnd(time(0));\n', '15 const int MAXN = 10e3 + 228;\n', '16 vector<int> g[MAXN];\n', '17 int d[MAXN];\n', '18 int mod = 1000000007;\n', '19 int mul(int a, int b) { return 1ll * a * b % mod; }\n', '20 int add(int a, int b) {\n', '21   if (a + b >= mod) return a + b - mod;\n', '22   return a + b;\n', '23 }\n', '24 int sub(int a, int b) {\n', '25   if (a - b < 0) return a - b + mod;\n', '26   return a - b;\n', '27 }\n', '28 int binpow(int a, int b) {\n', '29   int res = 1;\n', '30   while (b) {\n', '31     if (b & 1) res = mul(res, a);\n', '32     a = mul(a, a);\n', '33     b >>= 1;\n', '34   }\n', '35   return res;\n', '36 }\n', '37 int inv(int x) { return binpow(x, mod - 2); }\n', '38 int fact[MAXN];\n', '39 int rfact[MAXN];\n', '40 int cnk(int n, int k) {\n', '41   if (n < 0 || k > n) return 0;\n', '42   return mul(fact[n], mul(rfact[k], rfact[n - k]));\n', '43 }\n', '44 int tpc[MAXN];\n', '45 void dfs(int v, int p, int tp) {\n', '46   d[v] = d[p] + 1;\n', '47   tpc[v] = tp;\n', '48   for (int i : g[v]) {\n', '49     if (i != p) {\n', '50       int ntp = tp;\n', '51       if (v == p) ntp = i;\n', '52       dfs(i, v, ntp);\n', '53     }\n', '54   }\n', '55 }\n', '56 signed main() {\n', '57   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);\n', '58   cout.precision(20), cout.setf(ios::fixed);\n', '59   fact[0] = 1;\n', '60   for (int i = 1; i < MAXN; ++i) fact[i] = mul(fact[i - 1], i);\n', '61   rfact[MAXN - 1] = inv(fact[MAXN - 1]);\n', '62   for (int i = MAXN - 2; i >= 0; --i) rfact[i] = mul(rfact[i + 1], i + 1);\n', '63   int t;\n', '64   cin >> t;\n', '65   while (t--) {\n', '66     int n, k;\n', '67     cin >> n >> k;\n', '68     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) g[i].clear();\n', '69     for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {\n', '70       int a, b;\n', '71       cin >> a >> b;\n', '72       g[a].push_back(b);\n', '73       g[b].push_back(a);\n', '74     }\n', '75     if (k == 2) {\n', ""76       cout << n * (n - 1) / 2 << '\\n';\n"", '77       continue;\n', '78     }\n', '79     int ans = 0;\n', '80     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '81       fill(d, d + n + 1, 0);\n', '82       dfs(i, i, -1);\n', '83       for (int dd = 2; dd <= n; ++dd) {\n', '84         vector<int> cnts(n + 1);\n', '85         for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '86           if (d[j] == dd) {\n', '87             cnts[tpc[j]]++;\n', '88           }\n', '89         }\n', '90         vector<int> itms;\n', '91         for (int i : cnts) {\n', '92           if (i) itms.push_back(i);\n', '93         }\n', '94         vector<int> dp(n + 1, 0);\n', '95         dp[0] = 1;\n', '96         for (int j : itms) {\n', '97           vector<int> ndp = dp;\n', '98           for (int x = 1; x <= 1; ++x) {\n', '99             for (int gg = 0; gg + x <= n; ++gg) {\n', '100               ndp[gg + x] = add(ndp[gg + x], mul(dp[gg], cnk(j, x)));\n', '101             }\n', '102           }\n', '103           swap(dp, ndp);\n', '104         }\n', '105         ans = add(ans, dp[k]);\n', '106       }\n', '107     }\n', ""108     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '109   }\n', '110 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '5 using ld = long double;\n', '6 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '7 inline void chkmin(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '8   if (y < x) x = y;\n', '9 }\n', '10 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '11 inline void chkmax(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '12   if (x < y) x = y;\n', '13 }\n', '14 mt19937 rnd(time(0));\n', '15 const int MAXN = 10e3 + 228;\n', '16 vector<int> g[MAXN];\n', '17 int d[MAXN];\n', '18 int mod = 1000000007;\n', '19 int mul(int a, int b) { return 1ll * a * b % mod; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long nax = 125, mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long add(long long x, long long y) {\n', '5   x += y;\n', '6   if (x >= mod) x -= mod;\n', '7   return x;\n', '8 }\n', '9 long long mul(long long x, long long y) { return x * y % mod; }\n', '10 vector<long long> g[nax];\n', '11 long long vis[nax], cnt[nax], dp[nax][nax];\n', '12 long long find(long long n, long long k) {\n', '13   for (long long i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n', '14     for (long long j = 0; j <= k; j++) dp[i][j] = 0;\n', '15   dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '16   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '17     for (long long j = 0; j <= k; j++) {\n', '18       dp[i + 1][j] = add(dp[i + 1][j], dp[i][j]);\n', '19       dp[i + 1][j + 1] = add(dp[i + 1][j + 1], mul(dp[i][j], cnt[i]));\n', '20     }\n', '21   return dp[n][k];\n', '22 }\n', '23 int32_t main() {\n', '24   long long t;\n', '25   cin >> t;\n', '26   while (t--) {\n', '27     long long n, k;\n', '28     cin >> n >> k;\n', '29     for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) g[i].clear();\n', '30     for (long long i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '31       long long x, y;\n', '32       cin >> x >> y;\n', '33       g[--x].push_back(--y);\n', '34       g[y].push_back(x);\n', '35     }\n', '36     if (k == 2) {\n', ""37       cout << (n * (n - 1) / 2) % mod << '\\n';\n"", '38       continue;\n', '39     }\n', '40     long long res = 0;\n', '41     for (long long x = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '47         long long y = g[x][i];\n', '48         e.push_back({y, i});\n', '49         cnt[i] = 1;\n', '50         vis[y] = 1;\n', '51       }\n', '52       while (!e.empty()) {\n', '53         res = add(res, find(m, k));\n', '54         vector<pair<long long, long long> > ee;\n', '55         for (auto p : e) {\n', '56           cnt[p.second]--;\n', '57           for (auto y : g[p.first])\n', '58             if (!vis[y]) {\n', '59               ee.push_back({y, p.second});\n', '60               vis[y] = 1;\n', '61               cnt[p.second]++;\n', '62             }\n', '63         }\n', '64         e = ee;\n', '65       }\n', '66     }\n', ""67     cout << res << '\\n';\n"", '68   }\n', '69   return 0;\n', '70 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long nax = 125, mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long add(long long x, long long y) {\n', '5   x += y;\n', '6   if (x >= mod) x -= mod;\n', '7   return x;\n', '8 }\n', '9 long long mul(long long x, long long y) { return x * y % mod; }\n', '10 vector<long long> g[nax];\n', '11 long long vis[nax], cnt[nax], dp[nax][nax];\n', '12 long long find(long long n, long long k) {\n', '13   for (long long i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n', '14     for (long long j = 0; j <= k; j++) dp[i][j] = 0;\n', '15   dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '16   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '17     for (long long j = 0; j < k; j++) {\n', '18       dp[i + 1][j] = add(dp[i + 1][j], dp[i][j]);\n', '19       dp[i + 1][j + 1] = add(dp[i + 1][j + 1], mul(dp[i][j], cnt[i]));\n', '20     }\n', '21   return dp[n][k];\n', '22 }\n', '23 int32_t main() {\n', '24   long long t;\n', '25   cin >> t;\n', '26   while (t--) {\n', '27     long long n, k;\n', '28     cin >> n >> k;\n', '29     for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) g[i].clear();\n', '30     for (long long i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '31       long long x, y;\n', '32       cin >> x >> y;\n', '33       g[--x].push_back(--y);\n', '34       g[y].push_back(x);\n', '35     }\n', '36     if (k == 2) {\n', ""37       cout << (n * (n - 1) / 2) % mod << '\\n';\n"", '38       continue;\n', '39     }\n', '40     long long res = 0;\n', '41     for (long long x = 0; j <= k; j++) {
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int c[101][101];\n', '5 int C(int n, int r) {\n', '6   if (n == r || r == 0) return 1;\n', '7   if (~c[n][r]) return c[n][r];\n', '8   return c[n][r] = (C(n - 1, r - 1) + C(n - 1, r)) % mod;\n', '9 }\n', '10 void solve(int tc) {\n', '11   int n, k;\n', '12   cin >> n >> k;\n', '13   vector<vector<int>> g(n + 1);\n', '14   vector<int> deg(n + 1);\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {\n', '16     int u, v;\n', '17     cin >> u >> v;\n', '18     g[u].push_back(v);\n', '19     g[v].push_back(u);\n', '20   }\n', '21   if (k <= 2) {\n', ""22     cout << C(n, k) << '\\n';\n"", '23     return;\n', '24   }\n', '25   int ans = 0;\n', '26   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '27     if (g[i].size() >= k) {\n', '28       vector<vector<int>> dep(g[i].size(), vector<int>(n + 1));\n', '29       vector<int> dep_cnt(n + 1, 0);\n', '30       for (int j = 0; j < g[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '31         function<void(int, int, int)> dfs = [&](int u, int p, int d) {\n', '32           dep[j][d]++;\n', '33           for (int v : g[u])\n', '34             if (v != p) dfs(v, u, d + 1);\n', '35         };\n', '36         dfs(g[i][j], i, 1);\n', '37       }\n', '38       for (int d = 1; d <= n; ++d) {\n', '39         vector<vector<int>> dp(k, vector<int>(g[i].size(), 0));\n', '40         int cnt = 0;\n', '41         for (int j = 0; j < g[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '42           cnt += !!dep[j][d];\n', '43           dp[0][j] = dep[j][d];\n', '44         }\n', '45         if (cnt < k) break;\n', '46         for (int l = 1; l < k; ++l) {\n', '47           long long sum = 0;\n', '48           for (int j = l; j < g[i].size(); ++j) {\n', '49             sum = (sum + dp[l - 1][j - 1]) % mod;\n', '50             dp[l][j] = sum * dp[0][j] % mod;\n', '51           }\n', '52         }\n', '53         for (int j = k - 1; j < g[i].size(); ++j)\n', '54           ans = (ans + dp[k - 1][j]) % mod;\n', '55       }\n', '56     }\n', '57   }\n', ""58   cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '59 }\n', '60 int main() {\n', '61   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '62   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '63   memset(c, -1, sizeof c);\n', '64   int t = 1;\n', '65   cin >> t;\n', '66   for (int i = 1; i <= t; ++i) solve(i);\n', '67   return 0;\n', '68 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int c[101][101];\n', '5 int C(int n, int r) {\n', '6   if (n == r || r == 0) return 1;\n', '7   if (~c[n][r]) return c[n][r];\n', '8   return c[n][r] = (C(n - 1, r - 1) + C(n - 1, r)) % mod;\n', '9 }\n', '10 void solve(int tc) {\n', '11   int n, k;\n', '12   cin >> n >> k;\n', '13   vector<vector<int>> g(n + 1);\n', '14   vector<int> deg(n + 1);\n', '15   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename _T>\n', '4 inline void read(_T &x) {\n', '5   x = 0;\n', '6   char s = getchar();\n', '7   long long f = 1;\n', ""8   while (s < '0' || s > '9') {\n"", '9     f = 1;\n', ""10     if (s == '-') f = -1;\n"", '11     s = getchar();\n', '12   }\n', ""13   while ('0' <= s && s <= '9') {\n"", ""14     x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + s - '0';\n"", '15     s = getchar();\n', '16   }\n', '17   x *= f;\n', '18 }\n', '19 const long long np = 105;\n', '20 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '21 long long fac[np], inv[np];\n', '22 inline long long power(long long a, long long b) {\n', '23   long long res(1);\n', '24   while (b) {\n', '25     if (b & 1) res = res * a, res %= mod;\n', '26     a = a * a;\n', '27     a %= mod;\n', '28     b >>= 1;\n', '29   }\n', '30   return res;\n', '31 }\n', '32 inline long long c(long long n_, long long m_) {\n', '33   return ((fac[n_] * inv[n_ - m_] % mod) * inv[m_]) % mod;\n', '34 }\n', '35 long long head[np], nxt[np * 2], ver[np * 2], tit;\n', '36 inline void add(long long x, long long y) {\n', '37   ver[++tit] = y;\n', '38   nxt[tit] = head[x];\n', '39   head[x] = tit;\n', '40 }\n', '41 long long dep[np], maxn;\n', '42 long long sub[np][np];\n', '43 long long dp[np][np];\n', '44 long long n, k;\n', '45 inline void dfs(long long x, long long ff, long long id) {\n', '46   dep[x] = dep[ff] + 1;\n', '47   maxn = max(dep[x], maxn);\n', '48   sub[id][dep[x]]++;\n', '49   for (long long i = head[x], v; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod1 = 998244353;\n', '4 const long long mod2 = 1000000007;\n', '5 int t, n, k, u, v;\n', '6 vector<int> con[105];\n', '7 int dp[105][105];\n', '8 int cnt[105][105];\n', '9 int par[105];\n', '10 int res, mx;\n', '11 int dfs(int i, int p = -1) {\n', '12   par[i] = p;\n', '13   int ret = -1;\n', '14   for (int j = 0, l = con[i].size(); j < l; ++j)\n', '15     if (con[i][j] != p) ret = max(ret, dfs(con[i][j], i));\n', '16   return ++ret;\n', '17 }\n', '18 int cnts(int i, int d) {\n', '19   if (cnt[i][d] != -1) return cnt[i][d];\n', '20   if (d == 0) return cnt[i][d] = 1;\n', '21   int ret = 0;\n', '22   for (int j = 0, l = con[i].size(); j < l; ++j)\n', '23     if (con[i][j] != par[i]) ret += cnts(con[i][j], d - 1);\n', '24   return cnt[i][d] = ret;\n', '25 }\n', '26 void Q() {\n', '27   cin >> n >> k;\n', '28   res = 0;\n', '29   for (int i = 1; i <= (n); ++i) con[i].clear();\n', '30   for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {\n', '31     cin >> u >> v;\n', '32     con[u].push_back(v);\n', '33     con[v].push_back(u);\n', '34   }\n', '35   if (k == 2) {\n', '36     cout << 1ll * (n - 1) * n / 2 % mod2 << endl;\n', '37     return;\n', '38   }\n', '39   for (int r = 1; r <= n; ++r) {\n', '40     memset(cnt, -1, sizeof(cnt));\n', '41     mx = dfs(r);\n', '42     for (int d = 1; d <= mx; ++d) {\n', '43       memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n', '44       dp[0][0] = 1;\n', '45       for (int i = 0, l = con[r].size(); i <= l; ++i)\n', '46         for (int j = 0; j <= i && j <= k; ++j) {\n', '47           dp[i + 1][j] += dp[i][j];\n', '48           if (dp[i + 1][j] >= mod2) dp[i + 1][j] -= mod2;\n', '49           if (i != l) {\n', '50             dp[i + 1][j + 1] += 1ll * dp[i][j] * cnts(con[r][i], d - 1) % mod2;\n', '51             if (dp[i + 1][j + 1] >= mod2) dp[i + 1][j + 1] -= mod2;\n', '52           }\n', '53         }\n', '54       res += dp[con[r].size()][k];\n', '55       if (res >= mod2) res -= mod2;\n', '56     }\n', '57   }\n', '58   cout << res << endl;\n', '59 }\n', '60 int main() {\n', '61   cin >> t;\n', '62   while (t--) Q();\n', '63   return 0;\n', '64 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod1 = 998244353;\n', '4 const long long mod2 = 1000000007;\n', '5 int t, n, k, u, v;\n', '6 vector<int> con[105];\n', '7 int dp[105][105];\n', '8 int cnt[105][105];\n', '9 int par[105];\n', '10 int res, mx;\n', '11 int dfs(int i, int p = -1) {\n', '12   par[i] = p;\n', '13   int ret = -1;\n', '14   for (int j = 0, l = con[i].size(); j < l; ++j)\n', '15     if (con[i][j] != p) ret = max(ret, dfs(con[i][j], i));\n', '16   return ++ret;\n', '17 }\n', '18 int cnts(int i, int d) {\n', '19   if (cnt[i][d] != -1) return cnt[i][d];\n', '20   if (d == 0) return cnt[i][d] = 1;\n', '21   int ret = 0;\n', '22   for (int j = 0, l = con[i].size(); j < l; ++j)\n', '23     if (con[i][j] != par[i]) ret += cnts(con[i][j], d - 1);\n', '24   return cnt[i][d] = ret;\n', '25 }\n', '26 void Q() {\n', '27   cin >> n >> k;\n', '28   res = 0;\n', '29   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long add(long long a, long long b) { return (a + b) % mod; }\n', '5 long long sub(long long a, long long b) { return ((a - b) % mod + mod) % mod; }\n', '6 long long mul(long long a, long long b) { return (a * b) % mod; }\n', '7 long long power(long long a, long long b) {\n', '8   if (b == 0) return 1LL;\n', '9   long long tmp = power(a, b / 2);\n', '10   tmp = mul(tmp, tmp);\n', '11   if (b & 1) tmp = mul(tmp, a);\n', '12   return tmp;\n', '13 }\n', '14 const int maxn = 105;\n', '15 long long dp[maxn][maxn], fact[maxn], ifact[maxn], ans;\n', '16 vector<int> adjlist[maxn];\n', '17 int n, k, depth[maxn], groupsize[maxn][maxn];\n', '18 void precalc() {\n', '19   fact[0] = ifact[0] = 1;\n', '20   for (int i = 1; i < maxn; i++) {\n', '21     fact[i] = mul(i, fact[i - 1]);\n', '22     ifact[i] = power(fact[i], mod - 2);\n', '23   }\n', '24 }\n', '25 long long ncr(long long n, long long r) {\n', '26   if (r > n) return 0LL;\n', '27   return mul(fact[n], mul(ifact[n - r], ifact[r]));\n', '28 }\n', '29 void pivot(int p) {\n', '30   if (adjlist[p].size() < k) return;\n', '31   memset(depth, 0, sizeof(depth));\n', '32   memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n', '33   memset(groupsize, 0, sizeof(groupsize));\n', '34   depth[p] = 1;\n', '35   queue<pair<int, int>> q;\n', '36   for (auto u : adjlist[p]) {\n', '37     q.push({u, u});\n', '38     depth[u] = 2;\n', '39   }\n', '40   while (!q.empty()) {\n', '41     pair<int, int> cur = q.front();\n', '42     q.pop();\n', '43     groupsize[cur.second][depth[cur.first]]++;\n', '44     for (auto u : adjlist[cur.first]) {\n', '45       if (depth[u] != 0) continue;\n', '46       depth[u] = depth[cur.first] + 1;\n', '47       q.push({u, cur.second});\n', '48     }\n', '49   }\n', '50   for (int i = 0; i <= adjlist[p].size(); i++) {\n', '51     dp[i][0] = 1;\n', '52   }\n', '53   for (int d = 2; d < maxn; d++) {\n', '54     int tot = 0;\n', '55     for (auto u : adjlist[p]) {\n', '56       tot += min(groupsize[u][d], 1);\n', '57     }\n', '58     if (tot < k) break;\n', '59     for (int i = 0; i < adjlist[p].size(); i++) {\n', '60       for (int j = 1; j <= min(i + 1, k); j++) {\n', '61         dp[i + 1][j] =\n', '62             add(dp[i][j], mul(dp[i][j - 1], groupsize[adjlist[p][i]][d]));\n', '63       }\n', '64     }\n', '65     ans = add(ans, dp[adjlist[p].size()][k]);\n', '66   }\n', '67 }\n', '68 void solve() {\n', '69   ans = 0;\n', '70   memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n', '71   cin >> n >> k;\n', '72   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '73     adjlist[i].clear();\n', '74   }\n', '75   for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '76     int u, v;\n', '77     cin >> u >> v;\n', '78     adjlist[u].push_back(v);\n', '79     adjlist[v].push_back(u);\n', '80   }\n', '81   if (k == 2) {\n', '82     cout << ncr(n, 2);\n', '83     return;\n', '84   }\n', '85   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '86     pivot(i);\n', '87   }\n', '88   cout << ans;\n', '89 }\n', '90 int main() {\n', '91   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '92   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '93   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '94   ;\n', '95   precalc();\n', '96   int t;\n', '97   cin >> t;\n', '98   while (t--) {\n', '99     solve();\n', ""100     cout << '\\n';\n"", '101   }\n', '102   return 0;\n', '103 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long add(long long a, long long b) { return (a + b) % mod; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using VL = vector<ll>;\n', '5 using VVL = vector<VL>;\n', '6 using VI = vector<int>;\n', '7 using VVI = vector<VI>;\n', '8 const ll MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '9 VVI G;\n', '10 VI V;\n', '11 VVL M;\n', '12 ll f(int i, int j) {\n', '13   if (j < 0 or j > i) return 0;\n', '14   ll& res = M[i][j];\n', '15   if (res != -1) return res;\n', '16   if (j == 0) return res = 1;\n', '17   return res = (f(i - 1, j) + V[i - 1] * f(i - 1, j - 1)) % MOD;\n', '18 }\n', '19 void dfs(int x, int p, int d, VI& V) {\n', '20   if (d >= (int)V.size())\n', '21     V.push_back(1);\n', '22   else\n', '23     ++V[d];\n', '24   for (int y : G[x])\n', '25     if (y != p) dfs(y, x, d + 1, V);\n', '26 }\n', '27 int main() {\n', '28   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '29   cin.tie(0);\n', '30   int t;\n', '31   cin >> t;\n', '32   while (t--) {\n', '33     int n, k;\n', '34     cin >> n >> k;\n', '35     G = VVI(n);\n', '36     for (int r = 0; r < n - 1; ++r) {\n', '37       int x, y;\n', '38       cin >> x >> y;\n', '39       --x;\n', '40       --y;\n', '41       G[x].push_back(y);\n', '42       G[y].push_back(x);\n', '43     }\n', '44     if (k == 2)\n', '45       cout << n * (n - 1) / 2 << endl;\n', '46     else {\n', '47       ll res = 0;\n', '48       for (int x = 0; x < n; ++x) {\n', '49         int m = G[x].size();\n', '50         VVI T(m);\n', '51         int mx = 0;\n', '52         for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {\n', '53           dfs(G[x][i], x, 0, T[i]);\n', '54           mx = max(mx, (int)T[i].size());\n', '55         }\n', '56         for (int d = 0; d < mx; ++d) {\n', '57           V.clear();\n', '58           for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i)\n', '59             if (d < (int)T[i].size()) V.push_back(T[i][d]);\n', '60           int q = V.size();\n', '61           if (q >= k) {\n', '62             M = VVL(q + 1, VL(k + 1, -1));\n', '63             res = (res + f(q, k)) % MOD;\n', '64           }\n', '65         }\n', '66       }\n', '67       cout << res << endl;\n', '68     }\n', '69   }\n', '70 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using VL = vector<ll>;\n', '5 using VVL = vector<VL>;\n', '6 using VI = vector<int>;\n', '7 using VVI = vector<VI>;\n', '8 const ll MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '9 VVI G;\n', '10 VI V;\n', '11 VVL M;\n', '12 ll f(int i, int j) {\n', '13   if (j < 0 or j > i) return 0;\n', '14   ll& res = M[i][j];\n', '15   if (res != -1) return res;\n', '16   if (j == 0) return res = 1;\n', '17   return res = (f(i - 1, j) + V[j - 1] * f(i - 1, j - 1)) % MOD;\n', '18 }\n', '19 void dfs(int x, int p, int d, VI& V) {\n', '20   if (d >= (int)V.size())\n', '21     V.push_back(1);\n', '22   else\n', '23     ++V[d];\n', '24   for (int y : G[x])\n', '25     if (y != p) dfs(y, x, d + 1, V);\n', '26 }\n', '27 int main() {\n', '28   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '29   cin.tie(0);\n', '30   int t;\n', '31   cin >> t;\n', '32   while (t--) {\n', '33     int n, k;\n', '34     cin >> n >> k;\n', '35     G = VVI(n);\n', '36     for (int r = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using namespace __detail;\n', '4 template <typename A, typename B>\n', '5 inline void chmin(A &a, B b) {\n', '6   if (a > b) a = b;\n', '7 }\n', '8 template <typename A, typename B>\n', '9 inline void chmax(A &a, B b) {\n', '10   if (a < b) a = b;\n', '11 }\n', '12 int getMinimum(string s, int start) {\n', '13   int mn = start;\n', '14   for (int i = start; i < s.length(); i++) {\n', ""15     if (((s[i] - 'a') <= (s[mn] - 'a')) && (s[i] - 'a' != s[start] - 'a')) {\n"", '16       mn = i;\n', '17     }\n', '18   }\n', '19   return mn;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void solve() {\n', '22   int n;\n', '23   string s;\n', '24   cin >> n;\n', '25   cin >> s;\n', '26   set<int> st;\n', '27   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '28     int mn = getMinimum(s, i);\n', '29     char temp = s[i];\n', '30     s[i] = s[mn];\n', '31     s[mn] = temp;\n', '32     if (i != mn) {\n', '33       st.insert(i);\n', '34       st.insert(mn);\n', '35     }\n', '36   }\n', '37   int sz = st.size();\n', '38   cout << sz << endl;\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '43   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '44   ;\n', '45   int t;\n', '46   cin >> t;\n', '47   while (t--) {\n', '48     solve();\n', '49   }\n', '50 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using namespace __detail;\n', '4 template <typename A, typename B>\n', '5 inline void chmin(A &a, B b) {\n', '6   if (a > b) a = b;\n', '7 }\n', '8 template <typename A, typename B>\n', '9 inline void chmax(A &a, B b) {\n', '10   if (a < b) a = b;\n', '11 }\n', '12 int getMinimum(string s, int start) {\n', '13   int mn = start;\n', '14   for (int i = start; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int b[50];\n', '4 int c[50];\n', '5 int change(string s) {\n', '6   if (s == ""a"") return 1;\n', '7   if (s == ""b"") return 2;\n', '8   if (s == ""c"") return 3;\n', '9   if (s == ""d"") return 4;\n', '10   if (s == ""e"") return 5;\n', '11   if (s == ""f"") return 6;\n', '12   if (s == ""g"") return 7;\n', '13   if (s == ""h"") return 8;\n', '14   if (s == ""i"") return 9;\n', '15   if (s == ""j"") return 10;\n', '16   if (s == ""k"") return 11;\n', '17   if (s == ""l"") return 12;\n', '18   if (s == ""m"") return 13;\n', '19   if (s == ""n"") return 14;\n', '20   if (s == ""o"") return 15;\n', '21   if (s == ""p"") return 16;\n', '22   if (s == ""q"") return 17;\n', '23   if (s == ""r"") return 18;\n', '24   if (s == ""s"") return 19;\n', '25   if (s == ""t"") return 20;\n', '26   if (s == ""u"") return 21;\n', '27   if (s == ""v"") return 22;\n', '28   if (s == ""w"") return 23;\n', '29   if (s == ""x"") return 24;\n', '30   if (s == ""y"") return 25;\n', '31   if (s == ""z"") return 26;\n', '32 }\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   int t;\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     int n;\n', '38     cin >> n;\n', '39     string stringg;\n', '40     cin >> stringg;\n', '41     int f = 0;\n', '42     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 void sort(char string[], int len);\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int tc;\n', '5   scanf(""%d"", &tc);\n', '6   for (int i = 0; i < tc; i++) {\n', '7     int len;\n', '8     scanf(""%d"", &len);\n', '9     char string[len];\n', '10     scanf(""%s"", &string);\n', '11     char dup[len];\n', '12     int l = 0;\n', '13     while (l < len) {\n', '14       dup[l] = string[l];\n', '15       l++;\n', '16     }\n', '17     sort(string, len);\n', '18     int count = 0;\n', '19     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using ld = long double;\n', '5 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '6 using uint = unsigned;\n', '7 inline ll popcnt(ull a) { return __builtin_popcountll(a); }\n', '8 ll intpow(ll a, ll b) {\n', '9   ll ans = 1;\n', '10   while (b) {\n', '11     if (b & 1) ans *= a;\n', '12     a *= a;\n', '13     b /= 2;\n', '14   }\n', '15   return ans;\n', '16 }\n', '17 ll intpow(ll a, ll b, ll m) {\n', '18   ll ans = 1;\n', '19   while (b) {\n', '20     if (b & 1) (ans *= a) %= m;\n', '21     (a *= a) %= m;\n', '22     b /= 2;\n', '23   }\n', '24   return ans;\n', '25 }\n', '26 template <class T>\n', '27 inline bool chmax(T& a, T b) {\n', '28   if (a < b) {\n', '29     a = b;\n', '30     return 1;\n', '31   }\n', '32   return 0;\n', '33 }\n', '34 template <class T>\n', '35 inline bool chmin(T& a, T b) {\n', '36   if (a > b) {\n', '37     a = b;\n', '38     return 1;\n', '39   }\n', '40   return 0;\n', '41 }\n', '42 template <class T>\n', '43 using vc = vector<T>;\n', '44 template <class T>\n', '45 using vvc = vector<vc<T>>;\n', '46 template <class T>\n', '47 using vvvc = vector<vvc<T>>;\n', '48 template <class T>\n', '49 using vvvvc = vector<vvvc<T>>;\n', '50 template <class T>\n', '51 using pq = priority_queue<T>;\n', '52 template <class T>\n', '53 using pqg = priority_queue<T, vector<T>, greater<T>>;\n', '54 template <class T>\n', '55 void scan(T& a) {\n', '56   cin >> a;\n', '57 }\n', '58 template <class T>\n', '59 void scan(vector<T>& a) {\n', '60   for (auto&& i : a) scan(i);\n', '61 }\n', '62 void in() {}\n', '63 template <class Head, class... ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '7   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '8 }\n', '9 void quickSort(int a[], int b[], int l, int r) {\n', '10   int p = a[(l + r) / 2];\n', '11   int i = l, j = r;\n', '12   while (i < j) {\n', '13     while (a[i] < p) {\n', '14       i++;\n', '15     }\n', '16     while (a[j] > p) {\n', '17       j--;\n', '18     }\n', '19     if (i <= j) {\n', '20       int temp = a[i];\n', '21       a[i] = a[j];\n', '22       a[j] = temp;\n', '23       temp = b[i];\n', '24       b[i] = b[j];\n', '25       b[j] = temp;\n', '26       i++;\n', '27       j--;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   if (i < r) {\n', '31     quickSort(a, b, i, r);\n', '32   }\n', '33   if (l < j) {\n', '34     quickSort(a, b, l, j);\n', '35   }\n', '36 }\n', '37 int main() {\n', '38   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '39   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '40   int t;\n', '41   cin >> t;\n', '42   while (t--) {\n', '43     int n, a[N][6];\n', '44     cin >> n;\n', '45     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '46       for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++) cin >> a[i][j];\n', '47     int v = 1;\n', '48     for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '49       int cnt = 0;\n', '50       for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++)\n', '51         if (a[i][j] < a[v][j]) ++cnt;\n', '52       if (cnt >= 3) v = i;\n', '53     }\n', '54     bool ok = 0;\n', '55     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '56       if (i == v) continue;\n', '57       int cnt = 0;\n', '58       for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++)\n', '59         if (a[v][j] > a[i][j]) ++cnt;\n', '60       if (cnt >= 3) {\n', '61         cout << -1 << endl;\n', '62         ok = 1;\n', '63         break;\n', '64       }\n', '65     }\n', '66     if (!ok) cout << v << endl;\n', '67   }\n', '68 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '7   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '8 }\n', '9 void quickSort(int a[], int b[], int l, int r) {\n', '10   int p = a[(l + r) / 2];\n', '11   int i = l, j = r;\n', '12   while (i < j) {\n', '13     while (a[i] < p) {\n', '14       i++;\n', '15     }\n', '16     while (a[j] > p) {\n', '17       j--;\n', '18     }\n', '19     if (i <= j) {\n', '20       int temp = a[i];\n', '21       a[i] = a[j];\n', '22       a[j] = temp;\n', '23       temp = b[i];\n', '24       b[i] = b[j];\n', '25       b[j] = temp;\n', '26       i++;\n', '27       j--;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   if (i < r) {\n', '31     quickSort(a, b, i, r);\n', '32   }\n', '33   if (l < j) {\n', '34     quickSort(a, b, l, j);\n', '35   }\n', '36 }\n', '37 int main() {\n', '38   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '39   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '40   int t;\n', '41   cin >> t;\n', '42   while (t--) {\n', '43     int n, a[N][6];\n', '44     cin >> n;\n', '45     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 bool comp(vector<long long> a, vector<long long> b) {\n', '5   long long cnt1 = 0, cnt2 = 0;\n', '6   for (long long i = long long(0); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC target(""avx2"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimization(""O3"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimization(""unroll-loops"")\n', '5 using namespace std;\n', '6 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '7 const long long MOD2 = 998244353;\n', '8 const long long dx[4] = {1, 0, -1, 0}, dy[4] = {0, 1, 0, -1};\n', '9 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) { return !b ? a : gcd(b, a % b); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<vector<int>> v(k, vector<int>(2));\n', '7   vector<bool> b(2 * n + 1, false);\n', '8   int ans = 0;\n', '9   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int T, N, K, id[101 * 2], a[101], b[101];\n', '4 bool vis[101 * 2];\n', '5 int get() {\n', '6   int x = 0;\n', '7   char c = getchar();\n', ""8   while (c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar();\n"", ""9   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') x = x * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar();\n"", '10   return x;\n', '11 }\n', '12 bool cross(int a, int b, int c, int d) {\n', '13   if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '14   if (c > a && c < b) return d < a || d > b;\n', '15   if (d > a && d < b) return c < a || c > b;\n', '16   return 0;\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   T = get();\n', '20   while (T--) {\n', '21     N = get(), K = get();\n', '22     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void read(vector<long long> &a) {\n', '4   for (long long i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '5 }\n', '6 void read(vector<string> &a) {\n', '7   for (long long i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '8 }\n', '9 bool intersect(pair<long long, long long> c, pair<long long, long long> d) {\n', '10   if (c.first > d.first) swap(c, d);\n', '11   return c.second > d.first and c.second < d.second;\n', '12 }\n', '13 void solve() {\n', '14   long long n, k;\n', '15   cin >> n >> k;\n', '16   vector<pair<long long, long long>> a;\n', '17   vector<bool> used(2 * n + 1, false);\n', '18   for (long long i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '19     long long x, y;\n', '20     cin >> x >> y;\n', '21     if (x < y)\n', '22       a.push_back({x, y});\n', '23     else\n', '24       a.push_back({y, x});\n', '25     used[x] = used[y] = true;\n', '26   }\n', '27   vector<long long> left;\n', '28   for (long long i = 1; i <= 2 * n; i++) {\n', '29     if (!used[i]) left.push_back(i);\n', '30   }\n', '31   for (long long i = 0; i < n - k; i++) {\n', '32     a.push_back({left[i], left[n - k + i]});\n', '33   }\n', '34   long long ans = 0;\n', '35   for (long long i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     long long int n, k;\n', '8     cin >> n >> k;\n', '9     int free[210]{0};\n', '10     int a[105], b[105];\n', '11     long long int l = 2 * n;\n', '12     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long N = 205;\n', '4 long long n, k;\n', '5 vector<long long> lst;\n', '6 vector<pair<long long, long long> > Pair;\n', '7 bool vs[N];\n', '8 void in() {\n', '9   cin >> n >> k;\n', '10   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using P = pair<ll, ll>;\n', '5 using vec = vector<ll>;\n', '6 using vecp = vector<P>;\n', '7 using mat = vector<vec>;\n', '8 using matp = vector<vecp>;\n', '9 const ll MOD = 998244353;\n', '10 const ll INF = 1e18;\n', '11 ll Pow(ll a, ll n) {\n', '12   if (n == 0) return 1;\n', '13   if (n == 1) return a;\n', '14   if (n % 2 == 1) return (a * Pow(a, n - 1));\n', '15   ll t = Pow(a, n / 2);\n', '16   return (t * t);\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ll T;\n', '20   cin >> T;\n', '21   for (long long l = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int a[20], n;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     cin >> n;\n', '10     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '11     long long x = 1;\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x *= 3;\n', '13     bool ans = 0;\n', '14     for (int i = 1; i < x; i++) {\n', '15       int sum = 0;\n', '16       long long y = i;\n', '17       for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '18         if (y % 3 == 2)\n', '19           sum -= a[j];\n', '20         else if (y % 3)\n', '21           sum += a[j];\n', '22         y /= 3;\n', '23       }\n', '24       if (!sum) {\n', '25         ans = 1;\n', '26         break;\n', '27       }\n', '28     }\n', '29     if (ans)\n', '30       cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '31     else\n', '32       cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '33   }\n', '34   return 0;\n', '35 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int a[20], n;\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     cin >> n;\n', '10     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '11     long long x = 1;\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x *= 3;\n', '13     bool ans = 0;\n', '14     for (int i = 1; i < x; i++) {\n', '15       int sum = 0;\n', '16       long long y = i;\n', '17       for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '18         if (y % 3 == 2)\n', '19           sum -= a[i];\n', '20         else if (y % 3)\n', '21           sum += a[i];\n', '22         y /= 3;\n', '23       }\n', '24       if (!sum) {\n', '25         ans = 1;\n', '26         break;\n', '27       }\n', '28     }\n', '29     if (ans)\n', '30       cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '31     else\n', '32       cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '33   }\n', '34   return 0;\n', '35 }\n']"	"19           sum -= a[j];

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, k;\n', '4 struct node {\n', '5   int left;\n', '6   int right;\n', '7   int color;\n', '8   bool operator<(const node &b) const { return right < b.right; }\n', '9 };\n', '10 int t[10005];\n', '11 int last[105], weight[10005];\n', '12 bool vis[105];\n', '13 pair<int, int> ans[105];\n', '14 int main() {\n', '15   int x;\n', '16   vector<node> que;\n', '17   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '18   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 struct interval {\n', '3   int l, r;\n', '4   int operator<(const interval &i) const { return r < i.r; }\n', '5 } is[10005];\n', '6 int n, k, a[10005], tot, app[105][105], cnt[10005], ci, lim, sel[105];\n', '7 int sell[105], selr[105];\n', '8 int main() {\n', '9   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '10   tot = n * k;\n', '11   lim = (n + k - 2) / (k - 1);\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i <= tot; ++i) {\n', '13     scanf(""%d"", a + i);\n', '14     app[a[i]][++cnt[a[i]]] = i;\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)\n', '17     for (int j = 1; j < k; ++j) is[++ci] = (interval){app[i][j], app[i][j + 1]};\n', '18   std::sort(is + 1, is + ci + 1);\n', '19   memset(cnt, 0, sizeof cnt);\n', '20   for (int i = 1; i <= ci; ++i)\n', '21     if (!sel[a[is[i].l]]) {\n', '22       int can = 1;\n', '23       for (int j = is[i].l; j <= is[i].r; ++j) can &= cnt[j] < lim;\n', '24       if (can) {\n', '25         for (int j = is[i].l; j <= is[i].r; ++j) ++cnt[j];\n', '26         sell[a[is[i].l]] = is[i].l;\n', '27         selr[a[is[i].r]] = is[i].r;\n', '28         sel[a[is[i].l]] = 1;\n', '29       }\n', '30     }\n', '31   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAX_N = 1e2 + 14;\n', '4 int n, k, a[MAX_N], b[MAX_N], c[MAX_N * MAX_N];\n', '5 uint8_t blocked[MAX_N * MAX_N];\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   ios::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0);\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   for (int i = 0; i < n * k; ++i) {\n', '10     cin >> c[i];\n', '11     --c[i];\n', '12     if (!b[c[i]]) {\n', '13       int j = i - 1;\n', '14       while (j >= 0 && c[j] != c[i]) --j;\n', '15       if (j >= 0 &&\n', '16           *max_element(blocked + j, blocked + i) < (n + k - 2) / (k - 1)) {\n', '17         a[c[i]] = j;\n', '18         b[c[i]] = i;\n', '19         while (j < i) ++blocked[j++];\n', '20       }\n', '21     }\n', '22   }\n', '23   assert(*min_element(b, b + n));\n', ""24   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cout << a[i] + 1 << ' ' << b[i] + 1 << '\\n';\n"", '25 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAX_N = 1e2 + 14;\n', '4 int n, k, a[MAX_N], b[MAX_N], c[MAX_N * MAX_N];\n', '5 uint8_t blocked[MAX_N * MAX_N];\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   ios::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0);\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   for (int i = 0; i < n * k; ++i) {\n', '10     cin >> c[i];\n', '11     --c[i];\n', '12     if (!b[c[i]]) {\n', '13       int j = i - 1;\n', '14       while (j >= 0 && c[j] != c[i]) --j;\n', '15       if (j >= 0 &&\n', '16           *max_element(blocked + j, blocked + i) <= (n + k - 2) / (k - 1)) {\n', '17         a[c[i]] = j;\n', '18         b[c[i]] = i;\n', '19         while (j < i) ++blocked[j++];\n', '20       }\n', '21     }\n', '22   }\n', '23   assert(*min_element(b, b + n));\n', ""24   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cout << a[i] + 1 << ' ' << b[i] + 1 << '\\n';\n"", '25 }\n']"	"16           *max_element(blocked + j, blocked + i) < (n + k - 2) / (k - 1)) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long power(long long a, long long b, long long md) {\n', '4   return (!b ? 1\n', '5              : (b & 1 ? a * power(a * a % md, b / 2, md) % md\n', '6                       : power(a * a % md, b / 2, md) % md));\n', '7 }\n', '8 const int xn = 4e5 + 10;\n', '9 const int xm = -20 + 10;\n', '10 const int sq = 320;\n', '11 const int inf = 1e9 + 10;\n', '12 const long long INF = 1e18 + 10;\n', '13 const long double eps = 1e-15;\n', '14 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '15 const int base = 257;\n', '16 int n, dp[xn], ps[xn], ans;\n', '17 pair<pair<int, int>, int> a[xn];\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '20   cin.tie(0);\n', '21   cout.tie(0);\n', '22   ;\n', '23   cin >> n;\n', '24   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '25     int fl;\n', '26     cin >> a[i].first.first >> a[i].first.second >> a[i].second;\n', '27     dp[i] = a[i].first.first - a[i].first.second;\n', '28     int lb = 0, rb = i;\n', '29     while (1 < rb - lb) {\n', '30       int mid = lb + rb >> 1;\n', '31       if (a[mid].first.first < a[i].first.second)\n', '32         lb = mid;\n', '33       else\n', '34         rb = mid;\n', '35     }\n', '36     dp[i] = (dp[i] + ps[i - 1]) % mod;\n', '37     dp[i] = (dp[i] - ps[lb] + mod) % mod;\n', '38     ps[i] = (ps[i - 1] + dp[i]) % mod;\n', '39   }\n', '40   ans = a[n].first.first + 1;\n', '41   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)\n', '42     if (a[i].second) ans = (ans + dp[i]) % mod;\n', ""43   cout << ans % mod << '\\n';\n"", '44   return 0;\n', '45 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long power(long long a, long long b, long long md) {\n', '4   return (!b ? ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 vector<long long> x, y, s, dp;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   int n;\n', '6   cin >> n;\n', '7   x.push_back(0);\n', '8   y.push_back(0);\n', '9   s.push_back(0);\n', '10   dp.push_back(0);\n', '11   for (int i = 1; i < n + 1; i++) {\n', '12     x.push_back(0);\n', '13     y.push_back(0);\n', '14     s.push_back(0);\n', '15     dp.push_back(0);\n', '16     cin >> x[i] >> y[i] >> s[i];\n', '17   }\n', '18   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(0);\n', '7   int n, k;\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   vector<vector<int>> indices(k);\n', '10   for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '11     int q;\n', '12     cin >> q;\n', '13     while (q--) {\n', '14       int x;\n', '15       cin >> x;\n', '16       indices[i].push_back(x - 1);\n', '17     }\n', '18     sort(indices[i].begin(), indices[i].end());\n', '19   }\n', '20   if (n == 1) {\n', '21     cout << ""ACCEPTED\\n"";\n', '22     return 0;\n', '23   }\n', '24   vector<int> have(k);\n', '25   vector<ll> already(k);\n', '26   vector<int> first(n, -1);\n', '27   vector<vector<ll>> mask_zero(k);\n', '28   vector<vector<ll>> mask_one(k);\n', '29   for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '30     for (auto index : indices[i]) {\n', '31       if (first[index] == -1) {\n', '32         first[index] = i;\n', '33         have[i] += 1;\n', '34       } else {\n', '35         already[i] |= (1LL << index);\n', '36       }\n', '37     }\n', '38   }\n', '39   for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '40     mask_zero[i].resize(indices[i].size() + 1);\n', '41     mask_one[i].resize(indices[i].size() + 1);\n', '42     for (int zero = 0; zero <= (int)indices[i].size(); zero++) {\n', '43       mask_zero[i][zero] = (1LL << n) - 1;\n', '44       mask_one[i][zero] = 0;\n', '45       for (int j = 0; j < (int)indices[i].size(); j++) {\n', '46         if (j + 1 <= zero) {\n', '47           mask_zero[i][zero] &= ~(1LL << indices[i][j]);\n', '48         } else {\n', '49           mask_one[i][zero] |= (1LL << indices[i][j]);\n', '50         }\n', '51       }\n', '52     }\n', '53   }\n', '54   auto bad = [&]() -> void {\n', '55     cout << ""REJECTED\\n"";\n', '56     exit(0);\n', '57   };\n', '58   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '59     if (first[i] == -1) {\n', '60       bad();\n', '61     }\n', '62   }\n', '63   set<ll> good;\n', '64   for (int zero = 0; zero <= n; zero++) {\n', '65     ll x = (1LL << n) - 1;\n', '66     ll y = (1LL << (n - zero)) - 1;\n', '67     good.insert(x - y);\n', '68   }\n', '69   ll value = 1;\n', '70   function<void(int)> dfs = [&](int depth) -> void {\n', '71     if (depth == k) {\n', '72       if (!good.count(value)) {\n', '73         bad();\n', '74       }\n', '75       return;\n', '76     }\n', '77     int base_one = __builtin_popcountll(value & already[depth]);\n', '78     int base_zero = (int)indices[depth].size() - have[depth] - base_one;\n', '79     for (int zero = 0; zero <= have[depth]; zero++) {\n', '80       int real_zero = base_zero + zero;\n', '81       ll tmp = value;\n', '82       value &= mask_zero[depth][real_zero];\n', '83       value |= mask_one[depth][real_zero];\n', '84       dfs(depth + 1);\n', '85       value = tmp;\n', '86     }\n', '87   };\n', '88   dfs(0);\n', '89   assert(value == 1);\n', '90   cout << ""ACCEPTED\\n"";\n', '91   return 0;\n', '92 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(0);\n', '7   int n, k;\n', '8   cin >> n >> k;\n', '9   vector<vector<int>> indices(k);\n', '10   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 50;\n', '4 const int inf = 1 << 30;\n', '5 long long read() {\n', '6   long long a = 0;\n', '7   char b = 1, c;\n', '8   do\n', '9     if ((c = getchar()) == 45) b = -1;\n', '10   while (c < 48 || c > 57);\n', '11   do a = (a << 3) + (a << 1) + (c & 15);\n', '12   while ((c = getchar()) > 47 && c < 58);\n', '13   return a * b;\n', '14 }\n', '15 void write(long long x, char c) {\n', '16   if (x < 0) putchar(45), x = -x;\n', '17   char a[20], s = 0;\n', '18   do a[++s] = x % 10 | 48;\n', '19   while (x /= 10);\n', '20   do putchar(a[s]);\n', '21   while (--s);\n', '22   putchar(c);\n', '23 }\n', '24 int a[N], s[N];\n', '25 long long g[N][N];\n', '26 set<long long> q;\n', '27 bool dfs(long long res, int i) {\n', '28   if (!i) return q.count(res);\n', '29   int t = __builtin_popcountll(res & g[i][s[i]]);\n', '30   res &= ~g[i][s[i]];\n', '31   for (int j = t + a[i]; j >= t; --j) {\n', '32     if (!dfs(res | g[i][j], i - 1)) {\n', '33       return 0;\n', '34     }\n', '35   }\n', '36   return 1;\n', '37 }\n', '38 bool solve() {\n', '39   int n = read(), m = read();\n', '40   if (n == 1) return 1;\n', '41   long long res = (1LL << n) - 1;\n', '42   for (int i = m; i >= 1; --i) {\n', '43     s[i] = read();\n', '44     for (int j = 1; j <= s[i]; ++j) {\n', '45       g[i][j] = 1LL << read() - 1;\n', '46       if (res & g[i][j]) {\n', '47         ++a[i];\n', '48         res ^= g[i][j];\n', '49       }\n', '50       g[i][j] |= g[i][j - 1];\n', '51     }\n', '52   }\n', '53   if (res) return 0;\n', '54   for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '55     q.insert(res);\n', '56     res |= 1LL << i;\n', '57   }\n', '58   return dfs(0, m);\n', '59 }\n', '60 int main() { puts(solve() ? ""ACCEPTED"" : ""REJECTED""); }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 50;\n', '4 const int inf = 1 << 30;\n', '5 long long read() {\n', '6   long long a = 0;\n', '7   char b = 1, c;\n', '8   do\n', '9     if ((c = getchar()) == 45) b = -1;\n', '10   while (c < 48 || c > 57);\n', '11   do a = (a << 3) + (a << 1) + (c & 15);\n', '12   while ((c = getchar()) > 47 && c < 58);\n', '13   return a * b;\n', '14 }\n', '15 void write(long long x, char c) {\n', '16   if (x < 0) putchar(45), x = -x;\n', '17   char a[20], s = 0;\n', '18   do a[++s] = x % 10 | 48;\n', '19   while (x /= 10);\n', '20   do putchar(a[s]);\n', '21   while (--s);\n', '22   putchar(c);\n', '23 }\n', '24 int a[N], s[N];\n', '25 long long g[N][N];\n', '26 set<long long> q;\n', '27 bool dfs(long long res, int i) {\n', '28   if (!i) return q.count(res);\n', '29   int t = __builtin_popcountll(res & g[i][s[i]]);\n', '30   res &= ~g[i][s[i]];\n', '31   for (int j = t + a[i]; j >= t; --j) {\n', '32     if (!dfs(res | g[i][j], i - 1)) {\n', '33       return 0;\n', '34     }\n', '35   }\n', '36   return 1;\n', '37 }\n', '38 bool solve() {\n', '39   int n = read(), m = read();\n', '40   if (n == 1) return 1;\n', '41   long long res = (1LL << n) - 1;\n', '42   for (int i = m; i >= 1; --i) {\n', '43     s[i] = read();\n', '44     for (int j = 1; j <= s[i]; ++j) {\n', '45       g[i][j] = 1LL << read();\n', '46       if (res & g[i][j]) {\n', '47         ++a[i];\n', '48         res ^= g[i][j];\n', '49       }\n', '50       g[i][j] |= g[i][j - 1];\n', '51     }\n', '52   }\n', '53   if (res) return 0;\n', '54   for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '55     q.insert(res);\n', '56     res |= 1LL << i;\n', '57   }\n', '58   return dfs(0, m);\n', '59 }\n', '60 int main() { puts(solve() ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 inline long long read() {\n', '4   char ch = getchar();\n', '5   long long nega = 1;\n', '6   while (!isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""7     if (ch == '-') nega = -1;\n"", '8     ch = getchar();\n', '9   }\n', '10   long long ans = 0;\n', '11   while (isdigit(ch)) {\n', '12     ans = ans * 10 + ch - 48;\n', '13     ch = getchar();\n', '14   }\n', '15   if (nega == -1) return -ans;\n', '16   return ans;\n', '17 }\n', '18 void print(vector<long long> x) {\n', '19   for (long long i = 0; i < (long long)x.size(); i++)\n', '20     printf(""%lld%c"", x[i], "" \\n""[i == (long long)x.size() - 1]);\n', '21 }\n', '22 long long f[45][45], st[45], siz[45], q[45], n, k, ful;\n', '23 long long popcnt(long long x) { return __builtin_popcountll(x); }\n', '24 long long lowbit(long long x) { return x & (-x); }\n', '25 void dfs(long long dep, long long cur) {\n', '26   if (dep == k + 1) {\n', '27     if (cur != ful && lowbit(cur ^ ful) != cur + 1) {\n', '28       cout << ""REJECTED\\n"";\n', '29       exit(0);\n', '30     }\n', '31     return;\n', '32   }\n', '33   long long go = popcnt(cur & f[dep][q[dep]]);\n', '34   cur &= (~f[dep][q[dep]]);\n', '35   for (long long j = go; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, k;\n', '4 int len[45];\n', '5 bool fl;\n', '6 int q[15][45];\n', '7 int a[45];\n', '8 void yes() { cout << ""ACCEPTED"" << endl; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MOD = 1000000007;\n', '4 const long long maxN = 1e5 + 5;\n', '5 void debug(vector<long long> vec) {\n', '6   long long n = vec.size();\n', '7   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << vec[i] << "" "";\n', '8   cout << endl;\n', '9   return;\n', '10 }\n', '11 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '12   if (b > a) {\n', '13     return gcd(b, a);\n', '14   }\n', '15   if (b == 0) {\n', '16     return a;\n', '17   }\n', '18   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '19 }\n', '20 long long power(long long x, long long y, long long p) {\n', '21   long long res = 1;\n', '22   x = x % p;\n', '23   if (x == 0) return 0;\n', '24   while (y > 0) {\n', '25     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % p;\n', '26     y = y >> 1;\n', '27     x = (x * x) % p;\n', '28   }\n', '29   return res;\n', '30 }\n', '31 long long lcm(long long a, long long b) { return (a / gcd(a, b)) * b; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool equ(string s, string t, int n, int m, int l) {\n', '4   if (m == t.length()) return 1;\n', '5   if (l == 1 && n == 0) {\n', '6     if (m == t.length() - 1) {\n', '7       if (s[n] == t[m]) return 1;\n', '8     }\n', '9     return 0;\n', '10   }\n', '11   int a, b;\n', '12   a = b = 0;\n', '13   if (s[n] != t[m]) return 0;\n', '14   if (n > 0) a = equ(s, t, n - 1, m + 1, 1);\n', '15   if (n < s.length() - 1 && l != 1) {\n', '16     b = equ(s, t, n + 1, m + 1, l);\n', '17   }\n', '18   return a || b;\n', '19 }\n', '20 void solve() {\n', '21   string s, t;\n', '22   cin >> s >> t;\n', '23   if (s.length() == 1) {\n', '24     if (s == t) {\n', '25       cout << ""YES"";\n', '26       return;\n', '27     }\n', '28     cout << ""NO"";\n', '29     return;\n', '30   }\n', '31   int ans = 0;\n', '32   int j = 0;\n', '33   for (auto i : s) {\n', '34     if (i == t[0]) {\n', '35       ans = equ(s, t, j, 0, 0);\n', '36       if (ans == 1) {\n', '37         cout << ""YES"";\n', '38         return;\n', '39       }\n', '40     }\n', '41     j++;\n', '42   }\n', '43   cout << ""NO"";\n', '44 }\n', '45 int32_t main() {\n', '46   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '47   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '48   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '49   int t;\n', '50   cin >> t;\n', '51   while (t--) {\n', '52     solve();\n', '53     cout << ""\\n"";\n', '54   }\n', '55   cerr << ""time taken : "" << (float)clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << "" secs""\n', '56        << ""\\n"";\n', '57   return 0;\n', '58 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool equ(string s, string t, int n, int m, int l) {\n', '4   if (m == t.length()) return 1;\n', '5   if (l == 1 && n == 0) {\n', '6     if (m == t.length() - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int MOD = 998244353;\n', '4 int f[300001];\n', '5 int pow(int n, int i) {\n', '6   int a = n, ans = 1;\n', '7   while (i > 0) {\n', '8     if (i & 1) {\n', '9       ans = (ans * 1LL * a) % MOD;\n', '10     }\n', '11     a = (a * 1LL * a) % MOD;\n', '12     i = i >> 1;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return ans;\n', '15 }\n', '16 void dfs_visit(map<string, vector<string>> adj, map<string, int>& col,\n', '17                string s) {\n', '18   col[s] = 1;\n', '19   for (auto u : adj[s]) {\n', '20     if (col[u] == 0) {\n', '21       dfs_visit(adj, col, u);\n', '22     }\n', '23   }\n', '24 }\n', '25 int dfs_helper(map<string, vector<string>> adj, map<string, int>& col) {\n', '26   int conn = 0;\n', '27   for (auto u : adj) {\n', '28     if (col[u.first] == 0) {\n', '29       conn++;\n', '30       dfs_visit(adj, col, u.first);\n', '31     }\n', '32   }\n', '33   return conn;\n', '34 }\n', '35 int inv(int n) { return pow(n, MOD - 2); }\n', '36 int nCr(int n, int r) {\n', '37   if (r > n)\n', '38     return 0;\n', '39   else {\n', '40     int res = f[n];\n', '41     res = (res * 1LL * inv(f[r])) % MOD;\n', '42     res = (res * 1LL * inv(f[n - r])) % MOD;\n', '43     return res;\n', '44   }\n', '45 }\n', '46 bool exists(string s, string b) {\n', '47   int n = s.length(), t = b.length();\n', '48   if (t > n) return false;\n', '49   for (int i = 0; i < (int)(n - t + 1); ++i) {\n', '50     if (s.substr(i, t) == b) return true;\n', '51   }\n', '52   return false;\n', '53 }\n', '54 int main() {\n', '55   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '56   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '57   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '58   int q;\n', '59   string s, t, a, b = """";\n', '60   cin >> q;\n', '61   while (q--) {\n', '62     cin >> s >> t;\n', '63     int n = t.length();\n', '64     int f = 0;\n', '65     for (int i = 0; i < (int)(n); ++i) {\n', '66       a = t.substr(i + 1, min(i, n - 1 - i));\n', '67       reverse((a).begin(), (a).end());\n', '68       if (t.substr(i - min(i, n - 1 - i), a.length()) == a) {\n', '69         b = i < n - 1 - i ? t.substr(2 * i + 1) : """";\n', '70         reverse((b).begin(), (b).end());\n', '71         b += t.substr(0, i + 1);\n', '72         if (exists(s, b)) {\n', '73           cout << ""YES""\n', '74                << ""\\n"";\n', '75           f = 1;\n', '76           break;\n', '77         }\n', '78       }\n', '79     }\n', '80     if (f == 0)\n', '81       cout << ""NO""\n', '82            << ""\\n"";\n', '83   }\n', '84 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int MOD = 998244353;\n', '4 int f[300001];\n', '5 int pow(int n, int i) {\n', '6   int a = n, ans = 1;\n', '7   while (i > 0) {\n', '8     if (i & 1) {\n', '9       ans = (ans * 1LL * a) % MOD;\n', '10     }\n', '11     a = (a * 1LL * a) % MOD;\n', '12     i = i >> 1;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return ans;\n', '15 }\n', '16 void dfs_visit(map<string, vector<string>> adj, map<string, int>& col,\n', '17                string s) {\n', '18   col[s] = 1;\n', '19   for (auto u : adj[s]) {\n', '20     if (col[u] == 0) {\n', '21       dfs_visit(adj, col, u);\n', '22     }\n', '23   }\n', '24 }\n', '25 int dfs_helper(map<string, vector<string>> adj, map<string, int>& col) {\n', '26   int conn = 0;\n', '27   for (auto u : adj) {\n', '28     if (col[u.first] == 0) {\n', '29       conn++;\n', '30       dfs_visit(adj, col, u.first);\n', '31     }\n', '32   }\n', '33   return conn;\n', '34 }\n', '35 int inv(int n) { return pow(n, MOD - 2); }\n', '36 int nCr(int n, int r) {\n', '37   if (r > n)\n', '38     return 0;\n', '39   else {\n', '40     int res = f[n];\n', '41     res = (res * 1LL * inv(f[r])) % MOD;\n', '42     res = (res * 1LL * inv(f[n - r])) % MOD;\n', '43     return res;\n', '44   }\n', '45 }\n', '46 bool exists(string s, string b) {\n', '47   int n = s.length(), t = b.length();\n', '48   if (t > n) return false;\n', '49   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 bool Is_tp(string t, int k);\n', '5 string Trans_t(string t, int tp);\n', '6 string rv(string s);\n', '7 int main() {\n', '8   ll t;\n', '9   cin >> t;\n', '10   for (ll i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 vector<long long int> p[300005], q[300005], f(500005), a(500005),\n', '4     g(400005, 100), h(400005, 0);\n', '5 vector<vector<long long int>> b(400005, vector<long long int>(20, 0));\n', '6 long long int gcd(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '7   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '8   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '9 }\n', '10 long long int bpow(long long int a, long long int b) {\n', '11   long long int res = 1;\n', '12   while (b > 0) {\n', '13     if (b & 1) res = (res * a) % 998244353;\n', '14     a = (a * a) % 998244353;\n', '15     b >>= 1;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return res % 998244353;\n', '18 }\n', '19 void fact(long long int i) {\n', '20   f[0] = 1;\n', '21   for (long long int k = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long power(long long a, long long n, long long md) {\n', '4   if (n == 0) return 1;\n', '5   if (n == 1) return a % md;\n', '6   if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '7     long long t = power(a, n / 2, md) % md;\n', '8     return (t * t) % md;\n', '9   }\n', '10   return ((a % md) * power(a, n - 1, md) % md) % md;\n', '11 }\n', '12 vector<bool> prime;\n', '13 void sievefunc(long long n) {\n', '14   prime.assign(n + 1, 1);\n', '15   for (long long p = 2; p * p <= n; p++) {\n', '16     if (prime[p] == 1) {\n', '17       for (long long i = p * p; i <= n; i += p) prime[i] = 0;\n', '18     }\n', '19   }\n', '20 }\n', '21 vector<long long> primes;\n', '22 void primenumbers_in_vec(long long n) {\n', '23   sievefunc(n);\n', '24   for (long long i = 2; i < n; i++)\n', '25     if (prime[i]) primes.push_back(i);\n', '26 }\n', '27 bool ispos(string s, long long till, long long tga, long long tqa,\n', '28            long long tgb, long long tqb) {\n', '29   long long ga = 0, qa = 0, gb = 0, qb = 0;\n', '30   for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long a = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long power(long long n, long long m, long long p) {\n', '5   int res = 1;\n', '6   while (m > 0) {\n', '7     if (n & 1) {\n', '8       res = (res * n) % p;\n', '9     }\n', '10     n = (n * n) % p;\n', '11     m >>= 1;\n', '12   }\n', '13   return res % p;\n', '14 }\n', '15 bool prime(long long b) {\n', '16   for (long long i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool prime(long long x) {\n', '4   if (x == 2) {\n', '5     return true;\n', '6   }\n', '7   if (x <= 1) {\n', '8     return false;\n', '9   }\n', '10   for (int i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long double PI = acosl(-1);\n', '4 bool compare_int(int a, int b) { return (a > b); }\n', '5 bool compare_string(string a, string b) { return a.size() < b.size(); }\n', '6 bool compare_pair(const pair<int, int> &a, const pair<int, int> &b) {\n', '7   if (a.second == b.second)\n', '8     return a.first < b.first;\n', '9   else\n', '10     return (a.second > b.second);\n', '11 }\n', '12 bool cmp(pair<string, int> x, pair<string, int> y) {\n', '13   return (x.second < y.second);\n', '14 }\n', '15 void NA() {\n', '16   printf(""NO\\n"");\n', '17   exit(0);\n', '18 }\n', '19 void YA() {\n', '20   printf(""YES\\n"");\n', '21   exit(0);\n', '22 }\n', '23 int32_t main() {\n', '24   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '25   cin.tie(0);\n', '26   cout.tie(0);\n', '27   int t;\n', '28   cin >> t;\n', '29   while (t--) {\n', '30     string s;\n', '31     cin >> s;\n', '32     vector<int> dp1(6, 0), dp2(6, 0), goal1(6, 0), goal2(6, 0);\n', '33     for (int i = 0, k = 1; i < 10; i += 2, k++) {\n', '34       if (i == 0) {\n', ""35         s[i] == '0' ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using i64 = long long;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   std::cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '6   int q;\n', '7   std::cin >> q;\n', '8   while (q--) {\n', '9     std::string s, t;\n', '10     std::cin >> s >> t;\n', '11     int lens = s.size(), lent = t.size();\n', '12     if (lent > lens) {\n', '13       std::cout << ""NO"" << \'\\n\';\n', '14       continue;\n', '15     }\n', '16     int pre = lens, fg = 0;\n', '17     for (int i = lens - 1, j = lent - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n', '18       if (s[i] == t[j] && (pre - i) % 2 == 1) {\n', '19         j--, pre = i;\n', '20       }\n', '21       if (j == -1) {\n', '22         fg = 1;\n', '23         break;\n', '24       }\n', '25     }\n', '26     if (fg) {\n', '27       std::cout << ""YES"" << \'\\n\';\n', '28     } else\n', '29       std::cout << ""NO"" << \'\\n\';\n', '30   }\n', '31   return 0;\n', '32 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using i64 = long long;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   std::cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '6   int q;\n', '7   std::cin >> q;\n', '8   while (q--) {\n', '9     std::string s, t;\n', '10     std::cin >> s >> t;\n', '11     int lens = s.size(), lent = t.size();\n', '12     if (lent > lens) {\n', '13       std::cout << ""NO"" << \'\\n\';\n', '14       continue;\n', '15     }\n', '16     int pre = lens, fg = 0;\n', '17     for (int i = lens - 1, j = lent - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n', '18       if (s[i] == t[j] && (pre - i) % 2 == 1) {\n', '19         j--, pre = i;\n', '20       }\n', '21       if (j == 0) {\n', '22         fg = 1;\n', '23         break;\n', '24       }\n', '25     }\n', '26     if (fg) {\n', '27       std::cout << ""YES"" << \'\\n\';\n', '28     } else\n', '29       std::cout << ""NO"" << \'\\n\';\n', '30   }\n', '31   return 0;\n', '32 }\n']"	"21       if (j == -1) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""O2"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 using namespace std::chrono;\n', '5 long long mul(long long a, long long b) { return (a * b) % 1000000007; }\n', '6 long long modinv(long long a) {\n', '7   long long b = 1000000007 - 2;\n', '8   long long A = a;\n', '9   long long c = 1;\n', '10   for (long long i = 0; i < 62; i++) {\n', '11     if ((long long)1 << i & (b)) {\n', '12       c = mul(c, A);\n', '13     }\n', '14     A *= A;\n', '15     A %= 1000000007;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return c;\n', '18 }\n', '19 long long mul(long long a, long long b, long long c) {\n', '20   return mul(mul(a, b), c);\n', '21 }\n', '22 long long nCr(long long n, long long r) {\n', '23   long long num = 1;\n', '24   long long den = 1;\n', '25   long long k = max(r, n - r);\n', '26   for (long long i = k + 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 vector<long long> vis(3e5 + 10, 0);\n', '4 vector<long long> temp;\n', '5 class graph {\n', '6  private:\n', '7   long long v;\n', '8   list<long long>* adj;\n', '9 \n', '10  public:\n', '11   graph(long long x) {\n', '12     v = x + 1;\n', '13     adj = new list<long long>[v];\n', '14   }\n', '15   void adedge(long long a, long long b) {\n', '16     adj[a].push_back(b);\n', '17     adj[b].push_back(a);\n', '18   }\n', '19   void dfs(long long s);\n', '20   void bfs(long long s);\n', '21 };\n', '22 void graph::dfs(long long s) {\n', '23   vis[s] = 1;\n', '24   temp.push_back(s);\n', '25   list<long long>::iterator it;\n', '26   for (it = adj[s].begin(); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int Maxn = 300005;\n', '4 int T, n, m, ct, x[Maxn], fa[Maxn], cnt[Maxn], ans[Maxn];\n', '5 int get_fa(int x) { return x == fa[x] ? x : fa[x] = get_fa(fa[x]); }\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   scanf(""%d"", &T);\n', '8   while (T--) {\n', '9     ct = 0;\n', '10     scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '11     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cnt[i] = 0;\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '13       scanf(""%d"", &x[i]);\n', '14       x[i]--;\n', '15       cnt[(i - x[i] + n) % n]++;\n', '16     }\n', '17     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '18       if (cnt[i] + 2 * m >= n) {\n', '19         int tmp = 0;\n', '20         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) fa[j] = j;\n', '21         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)\n', '22           if (get_fa(x[j]) != get_fa((j - i + n) % n))\n', '23             tmp++, fa[get_fa((j - i + n) % n)] = get_fa(x[j]);\n', '24         if (tmp <= m) ans[++ct] = i;\n', '25       }\n', '26     printf(""%d "", ct);\n', '27     for (int i = 1; i <= ct; i++) printf(""%d "", ans[i]);\n', '28     puts("""");\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int Maxn = 300005;\n', '4 int T, n, m, ct, x[Maxn], fa[Maxn], cnt[Maxn], ans[Maxn];\n', '5 int get_fa(int x) { return x == fa[x] ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using ld = long double;\n', '5 using pii = pair<int, int>;\n', '6 constexpr int N = 1e5 + 5;\n', '7 constexpr int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '8 constexpr int LOG = 18;\n', '9 template <typename T>\n', '10 void dout(const T& x) {\n', ""11   cout << x << ' ';\n"", '12 }\n', '13 template <typename T, typename... Ts>\n', '14 void dout(const T& v, const Ts&... args) {\n', '15   dout(v);\n', '16   dout(args...);\n', '17 }\n', '18 template <typename... Ts>\n', '19 void vout(const Ts&... args) {\n', '20   dout(args...);\n', '21   cout << ""\\n"";\n', '22   exit(0);\n', '23 }\n', '24 struct seg_tree {\n', '25   seg_tree(int n) : t(n << 2){};\n', '26   void upd(int pos, int i, int l, int r) {\n', '27     if (l + 1 == r) {\n', '28       t[i] = 1;\n', '29       return;\n', '30     }\n', '31     int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '32     if (pos < mid)\n', '33       upd(pos, (i << 1) + 1, l, mid);\n', '34     else\n', '35       upd(pos, (i << 1) + 2, mid, r);\n', '36     t[i] = t[(i << 1) + 1] + t[(i << 1) + 2];\n', '37   }\n', '38   int get(int l, int r, int i, int cl, int cr) {\n', '39     if (l >= r) return 0;\n', '40     if (l == cl && r == cr) return t[i];\n', '41     int mid = (cl + cr) >> 1;\n', '42     return (get(l, min(mid, r), (i << 1) + 1, cl, mid) +\n', '43             get(max(l, mid), r, (i << 1) + 2, mid, cr));\n', '44   }\n', '45   void upd(int l, int r, ll val, int i, int cl, int cr) {\n', '46     if (l >= r) return;\n', '47     if (l == cl && r == cr) {\n', '48       t[i] += val;\n', '49       return;\n', '50     }\n', '51     int mid = (cl + cr) >> 1;\n', '52     upd(l, min(mid, r), val, (i << 1) + 1, cl, mid);\n', '53     upd(max(l, mid), r, val, (i << 1) + 2, mid, cr);\n', '54   }\n', '55   ll get(int pos, int i, int l, int r) {\n', '56     if (l + 1 == r) return t[i];\n', '57     int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '58     return (t[i] + (pos < mid ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const double pi = acos(-1.0);\n', '3 const double eps = 1e-9;\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 const int N = 5e5 + 10;\n', '6 struct Fenwick {\n', '7   long long ft[N];\n', '8   long long sum(int r) {\n', '9     long long result = 0;\n', '10     for (; r >= 0; r = (r & (r + 1)) - 1) result += ft[r];\n', '11     return result;\n', '12   }\n', '13   long long sum(int l, int r) { return (l > r ? 0ll : sum(r) - sum(l - 1)); }\n', '14   void inc(int i, long long delta) {\n', '15     for (; i < N; i = (i | (i + 1))) ft[i] += delta;\n', '16   }\n', '17 } ft1, ft2;\n', '18 void solve() {\n', '19   int n;\n', '20   cin >> n;\n', '21   int MX = 3e5;\n', '22   long long pref = 0, ans = 0;\n', '23   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '24     int x;\n', '25     cin >> x;\n', '26     ans = ans + pref + x * 1ll * (i - 1) - ft1.sum(0, x);\n', '27     for (int j = x; j <= MX; j += x) {\n', '28       int l = j;\n', '29       int r = min(MX, l + x - 1);\n', '30       ans -= ft2.sum(l, r) * j;\n', '31       ft1.inc(l, x);\n', '32     }\n', '33     ft2.inc(x, 1);\n', '34     cout << ans << "" "";\n', '35     pref += x;\n', '36   }\n', '37 }\n', '38 int main() {\n', '39   ios::sync_with_stdio(NULL), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);\n', '40   cout.setf(ios::fixed), cout.precision(10);\n', '41   int step = 1;\n', '42   for (int i = 0; i < step; i++) {\n', '43     solve();\n', '44   }\n', '45 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const double pi = acos(-1.0);\n', '3 const double eps = 1e-9;\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 const int N = 5e5 + 10;\n', '6 struct Fenwick {\n', '7   long long ft[N];\n', '8   long long sum(int r) {\n', '9     long long result = 0;\n', '10     for (; r >= 0; r = (r & (r + 1)) - 1) result += ft[r];\n', '11     return result;\n', '12   }\n', '13   long long sum(int l, int r) { return (l > r ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 template <class T = int>\n', '5 T rd() {\n', '6   T res = 0;\n', '7   T fg = 1;\n', '8   char ch = getchar();\n', '9   while (!isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""10     if (ch == '-') fg = -1;\n"", '11     ch = getchar();\n', '12   }\n', '13   while (isdigit(ch)) res = (res << 1) + (res << 3) + (ch ^ 48), ch = getchar();\n', '14   return res * fg;\n', '15 }\n', '16 const int N = 300010;\n', '17 template <typename T = int>\n', '18 struct Fenwick {\n', '19   const int n;\n', '20   T t[N];\n', '21   Fenwick(int n) : n(n) { memset(t, 0, sizeof t); }\n', '22   void add(int k, T v) {\n', '23     for (; k <= n; k += k & -k) t[k] += v;\n', '24   }\n', '25   T qsum(int k) {\n', '26     T v = 0;\n', '27     for (; k; k -= k & -k) v += t[k];\n', '28     return v;\n', '29   }\n', '30   T get(int l, int r) { return qsum(r) - qsum(l - 1); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 struct fenwick {\n', '5   int n;\n', '6   vector<T> t;\n', '7   T sum(int r) {\n', '8     if (r < 0) return 0;\n', '9     r = min(r, n - 1);\n', '10     T ans = 0;\n', '11     for (; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 7e5 + 113;\n', '4 struct fenw {\n', '5   vector<long long> t;\n', '6   void init() { t.assign(N, 0); }\n', '7   long long getsum(int r) {\n', '8     long long result = 0;\n', '9     for (; r >= 0; r = (r & (r + 1)) - 1) result += t[r];\n', '10     return result;\n', '11   }\n', '12   void inc(int i, long long delta) {\n', '13     for (; i < N; i = (i | (i + 1))) t[i] += delta;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long sum_pos(int pos) {\n', '16     if (pos == 0) return getsum(pos);\n', '17     return getsum(pos);\n', '18   }\n', '19   void inc_segment(int l, int r, long long val) {\n', '20     inc(l, val);\n', '21     inc(r + 1, -val);\n', '22   }\n', '23   long long sum_segment(int l, int r) { return getsum(r) - getsum(l - 1); }\n', '24 };\n', '25 signed main() {\n', '26   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '27   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '28   int n;\n', '29   cin >> n;\n', '30   fenw f1, f2, f3;\n', '31   f1.init(), f2.init(), f3.init();\n', '32   long long res = 0;\n', '33   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '34     int a;\n', '35     cin >> a;\n', '36     long long pr = 0;\n', '37     res += f3.sum_pos(a) + (long long)a * i;\n', '38     for (int j = a - 1; j < N; j += a) {\n', '39       res += f1.sum_segment(j - a + 1, j) - f2.sum_segment(j - a + 1, j) * pr;\n', '40       f3.inc_segment(j - a + 1, j, -pr);\n', '41       pr += a;\n', '42     }\n', '43     f1.inc(a, a);\n', '44     f2.inc(a, 1);\n', ""45     cout << res << ' ';\n"", '46   }\n', '47 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 4e5 + 113;\n', '4 struct fenw {\n', '5   vector<long long> t;\n', '6   void init() { t.assign(N, 0); }\n', '7   long long getsum(int r) {\n', '8     long long result = 0;\n', '9     for (; r >= 0; r = (r & (r + 1)) - 1) result += t[r];\n', '10     return result;\n', '11   }\n', '12   void inc(int i, long long delta) {\n', '13     for (; i < N; i = (i | (i + 1))) t[i] += delta;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long sum_pos(int pos) {\n', '16     if (pos == 0) return getsum(pos);\n', '17     return getsum(pos);\n', '18   }\n', '19   void inc_segment(int l, int r, long long val) {\n', '20     inc(l, val);\n', '21     inc(r + 1, -val);\n', '22   }\n', '23   long long sum_segment(int l, int r) { return getsum(r) - getsum(l - 1); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 inline int read() {\n', '4   int f = 1, r = 0;\n', '5   char c = getchar();\n', ""6   while (!isdigit(c)) f ^= c == '-', c = getchar();\n"", '7   while (isdigit(c)) r = (r << 1) + (r << 3) + (c & 15), c = getchar();\n', '8   return f ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int f[1000005];\n', '4 int Find(int first) {\n', '5   if (f[first] == first) return first;\n', '6   return f[first] = Find(f[first]);\n', '7 }\n', '8 int cnt[1000005];\n', '9 int prime[1000005];\n', '10 vector<int> v[1000005];\n', '11 void solve() {\n', '12   int n, q;\n', '13   scanf(""%d %d"", &n, &q);\n', '14   int a[200005];\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i < 1000005; i++) {\n', '22     if (prime[i]) {\n', '23       for (int j = i * 2; j < 1000005; j += i) prime[j] = 0;\n', '24     }\n', '25   }\n', '26   for (int i = 2; i < 1000005; i++) {\n', '27     int last = -1;\n', '28     if (prime[i])\n', '29       for (int j = i; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 333333, maxm = 1111111, mod = 998244353;\n', '4 template <typename T>\n', '5 inline void read(T &x) {\n', '6   x = 0;\n', '7   bool f = 0;\n', '8   char ch = getchar();\n', ""9   while (ch < '0' || ch > '9') f |= ch == '-', ch = getchar();\n"", ""10   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') x = x * 10 + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '11   if (f) x = -x;\n', '12 }\n', '13 int n, m, q, a[maxn], pr[maxn], pl, mn[maxm], fa[maxn], id[maxn], at[maxm];\n', '14 bool vis[maxm];\n', '15 map<pair<int, int>, bool> mp;\n', '16 inline int getfa(int x) { return x == fa[x] ? x : fa[x] = getfa(fa[x]); }\n', '17 inline void unite(int x, int y) {\n', '18   x = getfa(x);\n', '19   y = getfa(y);\n', '20   if (x != y) fa[x] = y;\n', '21 }\n', '22 inline bool check(int x, int y) {\n', '23   x = getfa(x);\n', '24   y = getfa(y);\n', '25   return x == y;\n', '26 }\n', '27 int main() {\n', '28   read(n);\n', '29   read(q);\n', '30   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) read(a[i]), m = max(m, a[i] + 1);\n', '31   for (int i = (2); i <= (m); i++) {\n', '32     if (!vis[i]) pr[++pl] = i, at[i] = pl + n, mn[i] = i;\n', '33     for (int j = (1); j <= (pl); j++) {\n', '34       if (i * pr[j] > m) break;\n', '35       vis[i * pr[j]] = true;\n', '36       mn[i * pr[j]] = pr[j];\n', '37       if (i % pr[j] == 0) break;\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40   for (int i = (1); i <= (n + pl); i++) fa[i] = i;\n', '41   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '42     int x = a[i];\n', '43     while (x != 1) unite(i, at[mn[x]]), x /= mn[x];\n', '44   }\n', '45   for (int i = (1); i <= (n + pl); i++) id[i] = getfa(i);\n', '46   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '47     int x = a[i], tmp[111], tl = 0;\n', '48     while (x != 1) tmp[++tl] = id[at[mn[x]]], x /= mn[x];\n', '49     x = a[i] + 1;\n', '50     while (x != 1) tmp[++tl] = id[at[mn[x]]], x /= mn[x];\n', '51     sort(tmp + 1, tmp + tl + 1);\n', '52     tl = unique(tmp + 1, tmp + tl + 1) - tmp - 1;\n', '53     for (int j = (1); "
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m, a[1000005], tans[22][1000005], b[1000005], c[1000005];\n', '4 void solve(int k, int l, int r) {\n', '5   if (l >= r) return;\n', '6   int lim = (1 << (k - 1));\n', '7   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) b[i] = -1e9, c[i] = 1e9;\n', '8   int mid = l - 1;\n', '9   while (mid < r && ((a[mid + 1] >> (k - 1)) & 1) == 0) mid++;\n', '10   int mn = max(0, lim - m), mx = min((1 << k) - 1, lim + m);\n', '11   for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) {\n', '12     int u = a[i] & ((1 << k) - 1);\n', '13     for (int j = mn; j < lim; j++) b[u ^ j] = max(b[u ^ j], j);\n', '14     for (int j = lim; j <= mx; j++) c[u ^ j] = min(c[u ^ j], j);\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) tans[k][i] = min(tans[k][i], c[i] - b[i]);\n', '17   solve(k - 1, l, mid);\n', '18   solve(k - 1, mid + 1, r);\n', '19 }\n', '20 int k;\n', '21 int main() {\n', '22   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '23   m = ((1 << k) - 1) / (n - 1);\n', '24   for (int j = 1; j <= k; j++)\n', '25     for (int i = 0; i < (1 << j); i++) tans[j][i] = m;\n', '26   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &a[i]);\n', '27   sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);\n', '28   solve(k, 1, n);\n', '29   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) {\n', '30     int ans = 1e9;\n', '31     for (int j = 1; j <= k; j++) ans = min(ans, tans[j][i & ((1 << j) - 1)]);\n', '32     printf(""%d "", ans);\n', '33   }\n', '34   return 0;\n', '35 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m, a[1000005], tans[22][1000005], b[1000005], c[1000005];\n', '4 void solve(int k, int l, int r) {\n', '5   if (l >= r) return;\n', '6   int lim = (1 << (k - 1));\n', '7   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) b[i] = -1e9, c[i] = 1e9;\n', '8   int mid = l;\n', '9   while (mid < r && ((a[mid + 1] >> (k - 1)) & 1) == 0) mid++;\n', '10   int mn = max(0, lim - m), mx = min((1 << k) - 1, lim + m);\n', '11   for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) {\n', '12     int u = a[i] & ((1 << k) - 1);\n', '13     for (int j = mn; j < lim; j++) b[u ^ j] = max(b[u ^ j], j);\n', '14     for (int j = lim; j <= mx; j++) c[u ^ j] = min(c[u ^ j], j);\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) tans[k][i] = min(tans[k][i], c[i] - b[i]);\n', '17   solve(k - 1, l, mid);\n', '18   solve(k - 1, mid + 1, r);\n', '19 }\n', '20 int k;\n', '21 int main() {\n', '22   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '23   m = ((1 << k) - 1) / (n - 1);\n', '24   for (int j = 1; j <= k; j++)\n', '25     for (int i = 0; i < (1 << j); i++) tans[j][i] = m;\n', '26   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &a[i]);\n', '27   sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);\n', '28   solve(k, 1, n);\n', '29   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) {\n', '30     int ans = 1e9;\n', '31     for (int j = 1; j <= k; j++) ans = min(ans, tans[j][i & ((1 << j) - 1)]);\n', '32     printf(""%d "", ans);\n', '33   }\n', '34   return 0;\n', '35 }\n']"	"8   int mid = l - 1;
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int K = 19, N = 1 << K, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 int n, k, cnt[N], a[N], ans[K][N];\n', '5 vector<int> b[N], c[N];\n', '6 void ckmin(int &x, int y) {\n', '7   if (y < x) x = y;\n', '8 }\n', '9 void calc(vector<int> v, int s, int t) {\n', '10   if (v.size() < 2) return;\n', '11   if (s < t) {\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < 1 << t; i++)\n', '13       ckmin(ans[s][i], abs((v[0] ^ i) - (v[1] ^ i)));\n', '14     return;\n', '15   }\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < 1 << (s + 1); i++) c[i].clear();\n', '17   for (int i = 0; i < 1 << t; i++)\n', '18     for (auto u : v) {\n', '19       int to = i ^ (1 << s);\n', '20       c[to ^ u].push_back(to), to = i ^ (((1 << (s - t)) - 1) << t),\n', '21                                c[to ^ u].push_back(to);\n', '22     }\n', '23   for (int i = 0;
