"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Node {\n', '4   static const int MAX = 1 << 22;\n', '5   int low{MAX};\n', '6   int high{-MAX};\n', '7   int diff{MAX};\n', '8   operator bool() const { return low < MAX; }\n', '9 };\n', '10 void merge(vector<Node> &v, const int &start, const int &half_step) {\n', '11   for (int i = start; i < start + half_step; ++i) {\n', '12     const int only_diff = min(v[i].diff, v[i + half_step].diff);\n', '13     const int diff1 = min(only_diff, v[i + half_step].low - v[i].high);\n', '14     const int diff2 = min(only_diff, (v[i].low ^ half_step) -\n', '15                                          (v[i + half_step].high ^ half_step));\n', '16     v[i].diff = diff1;\n', '17     v[i + half_step].diff = diff2;\n', '18     const int low1 = min(v[i].low, v[i + half_step].low);\n', '19     const int low2 =\n', '20         min(v[i].low ^ half_step, v[i + half_step].low ^ half_step);\n', '21     v[i].low = low1;\n', '22     v[i + half_step].low = low2;\n', '23     const int high1 = max(v[i].high, v[i + half_step].high);\n', '24     const int high2 =\n', '25         max(v[i].high ^ half_step, v[i + half_step].high ^ half_step);\n', '26     v[i].high = high1;\n', '27     v[i + half_step].high = high2;\n', '28   }\n', '29 }\n', '30 int main() {\n', '31   int n, k;\n', '32   cin >> n >> k;\n', '33   int num = 1 << k;\n', '34   vector<Node> first_round(num);\n', '35   for (; i < num; i += step) merge(first_round, i, half_step);\n', '45   }\n', '46   for (int i = 0; i < num; ++i) cout << first_round[i].diff << "" "";\n', '47   cout << endl;\n', '48 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Node {\n', '4   static const int MAX = 1 << 21;\n', '5   int low{MAX};\n', '6   int high{-1};\n', '7   int diff{MAX};\n', '8   operator bool() const { return low < MAX; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<long long int> v(n);\n', '7   for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> v[i];\n', '8   long long int ans = -1e7, m1 = 0, m2 = INT_MAX;\n', '9   m1 = v[0];\n', '10   m2 = 1;\n', '11   for (long long int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '12     long long int c = m2 * (i + 1) - k * (m1 | v[i]);\n', '13     ans = max(ans, c);\n', '14     long long int mm = (ans + (k) * (v[i])) / (i + 1);\n', '15     for (long long int j = i - 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 unsigned long long power(unsigned long long a, unsigned long long p,\n', '4                          unsigned long long mod = 1e9 + 7) {\n', '5   unsigned long long res = 1, run = p % mod;\n', '6   while (p > 0) {\n', '7     if (p & 1) {\n', '8       res = (res * run) % mod;\n', '9     }\n', '10     p = (p >> 1);\n', '11     run = (run * run) % mod;\n', '12   }\n', '13   return res;\n', '14 }\n', '15 unsigned long long inverse(unsigned long long a,\n', '16                            unsigned long long mod = 1e9 + 7) {\n', '17   return power(a, mod - 2, mod);\n', '18 }\n', '19 unsigned long long gcd(unsigned long long a, unsigned long long b) {\n', '20   if (b == 0) return a;\n', '21   return gcd(b, a % b);\n', '22 }\n', '23 void pre() {}\n', '24 void solve() {\n', '25   long long n, k;\n', '26   cin >> n >> k;\n', '27   vector<long long> a(n);\n', '28   for (auto &x : a) cin >> x;\n', '29   long long ans = INT_MIN;\n', '30   for (long long i = max(1LL, n - 2 * k); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 vector<pair<int, int>> vc;\n', '5 void fun(int l, int r, int x) {\n', '6   if (r <= m) {\n', '7     int _l = (l ^ n) & (~x);\n', '8     int _r = _l + x;\n', '9     vc.push_back({_l, _r});\n', '10   } else {\n', '11     int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '12     fun(l, mid, x >> 1);\n', '13     if (m > mid) fun(mid + 1, r, x >> 1);\n', '14   }\n', '15 }\n', '16 void solve() {\n', '17   scanf(""%d %d"", &n, &m);\n', '18   vc.clear();\n', '19   int x = 1;\n', '20   while (x <= m) x <<= 1;\n', '21   fun(0, x - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 200020, MOD = 998244353;\n', '4 inline int read() {\n', '5   int s = 0, w = 1;\n', '6   char ch = getchar();\n', ""7   while (ch > '9' || ch < '0') {\n"", ""8     if (ch == '-') w = -1;\n"", '9     ch = getchar();\n', '10   }\n', ""11   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') s = s * 10 + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '12   return s * w;\n', '13 }\n', '14 int T, n, u, v, f[N];\n', '15 bool flag;\n', '16 vector<int> e[N];\n', '17 int dfs(int k, int fa, int gr) {\n', '18   int cnt = 0;\n', '19   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int recur_depth = 0;\n', '4 const long long sz = 1e5 + 10, mod = 998244353;\n', '5 vector<long long> g[sz];\n', '6 long long ans[sz], dp[sz];\n', '7 void dfs(long long u, long long p, long long k) {\n', '8   for (long long& v : g[u]) {\n', '9     if (v == p) continue;\n', '10     dfs(v, u, k);\n', '11     if (dp[v] % k != 0)\n', '12       dp[v]++;\n', '13     else\n', '14       dp[u]++;\n', '15   }\n', '16 }\n', '17 int main() {\n', '18   long long t;\n', '19   cin >> t;\n', '20   while (t--) {\n', '21     long long n;\n', '22     scanf(""%lld"", &n);\n', '23     for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""-O3"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 mt19937_64 rnd(time(0));\n', '6 long long MOD = 998244353;\n', '7 const long double E = 1e-10;\n', '8 long long n, m, k, T, ans[500005];\n', '9 vector<long long> c[500005];\n', '10 long long binpow(long long h, long long r, long long md) {\n', '11   long long l = 1;\n', '12   while (r) {\n', '13     if (r & 1) l = (l * h) % md;\n', '14     h = (h * h) % md;\n', '15     r /= 2;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return l;\n', '18 }\n', '19 long long read() {\n', '20   char c = getchar();\n', '21   while (!isdigit(c)) {\n', '22     c = getchar();\n', '23   }\n', '24   long long res = 0;\n', '25   while (isdigit(c)) {\n', ""26     res = res * 10 + c - '0';\n"", '27     c = getchar();\n', '28   }\n', '29   return res;\n', '30 }\n', '31 long long gcd(long long x, long long y) {\n', '32   while (x && y) {\n', '33     if (x < y) swap(x, y);\n', '34     x %= y;\n', '35   }\n', '36   return x + y;\n', '37 }\n', '38 pair<long long, long long> dfs(int h, int p = -1) {\n', '39   long long z = 0;\n', '40   for (int i = 0; i < c[h].size(); i++)\n', '41     if (c[h][i] != p) {\n', '42       pair<long long, long long> u = dfs(c[h][i], h);\n', '43       if (!u.first) return make_pair(0, 0);\n', '44       z += u.second;\n', '45     }\n', '46   if (z % T == 0)\n', '47     return make_pair(1, 1);\n', '48   else if ((z + 1) % T == 0)\n', '49     return make_pair(1, 0);\n', '50   else\n', '51     return make_pair(0, 0);\n', '52 }\n', '53 void solve() {\n', '54   cin >> n;\n', '55   long long x = n - 1, p = sqrt(x);\n', '56   vector<long long> v;\n', '57   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) ans[i] = 0, c[i].clear();\n', '58   for (int i = 1; i <= p; i++)\n', '59     if (x % i == 0) {\n', '60       v.push_back(i);\n', '61       if (x / i != i) v.push_back(x / i);\n', '62     }\n', '63   for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n', '64     long long x, y;\n', '65     cin >> x >> y;\n', '66     c[x].push_back(y);\n', '67     c[y].push_back(x);\n', '68   }\n', '69   ans[1] = binpow(2, n - 1, MOD);\n', '70   for (int i = 1; i < v.size(); i++) {\n', '71     T = v[i];\n', '72     pair<long long, long long> o = dfs(1);\n', '73     if (o.first && o.second) ans[v[i]] = 1;\n', '74   }\n', '75   for (int i = n; i > 0; i--) {\n', '76     for (int j = i * 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t, n;\n', '4 vector<int> g[100100];\n', '5 long long ans[100100];\n', '6 bool extra[100100];\n', '7 bool poss(int c, int l, int k) {\n', '8   int cv = 0;\n', '9   for (int i : g[c]) {\n', '10     if (i == l) continue;\n', '11     if (!poss(i, c, k)) return false;\n', '12     cv += extra[i];\n', '13   }\n', '14   if (cv % k == 0) {\n', '15     extra[c] = true;\n', '16     return true;\n', '17   }\n', '18   if ((cv + 1) % k == 0) {\n', '19     extra[c] = false;\n', '20     return true;\n', '21   }\n', '22   return false;\n', '23 }\n', '24 int main() {\n', '25   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '26   while (t--) {\n', '27     scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '28     long long ctot = 1;\n', '29     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC target(""avx2"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimize(""O3"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '5 using namespace std;\n', '6 using ll = long long;\n', '7 using ld = long double;\n', '8 const ll MOD = 998244353;\n', '9 const ll root = 3;\n', '10 ll binpow(ll a, ll b) {\n', '11   ll res = 1;\n', '12   while (b) {\n', '13     if (b & 1) res = (res * a) % MOD;\n', '14     a = (a * a) % MOD;\n', '15     b >>= 1;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return res;\n', '18 }\n', '19 ll modInv(ll a) { return binpow(a, MOD - 2); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int dp[1005];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '7   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '8   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '9   int t;\n', '10   cin >> t;\n', '11   while (t--) {\n', '12     int W, H;\n', '13     cin >> W >> H;\n', '14     int x1, y1, x2, y2;\n', '15     cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;\n', '16     int w, h;\n', '17     cin >> w >> h;\n', '18     int res = INT_MAX;\n', '19     if (x1 >= w) {\n', '20       res = 0;\n', '21     } else if (x2 - ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     long long int W, H, w, h;\n', '8     cin >> W >> H;\n', '9     long long int x1, y1, x2, y2;\n', '10     cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;\n', '11     cin >> w >> h;\n', '12     long long int disth, distw;\n', '13     distw = max(x1, W - x2);\n', '14     disth = max(y1, H - y2);\n', '15     long long int ans1 = INT_MAX, ans2 = INT_MAX;\n', '16     if (h <= disth || w <= distw) {\n', '17       cout << 0 << endl;\n', '18     } else if (h + abs(y2 - y1) > H && w + abs(x2 - x1) > W) {\n', '19       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '20     } else {\n', '21       if (h + y2 - y1 <= H) {\n', '22         ans1 = abs(disth - h);\n', '23       }\n', '24       if (w + abs(x2 - x1) <= W) {\n', '25         ans2 = abs(distw - w);\n', '26       }\n', '27       cout << min(ans1, ans2) << endl;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     long long int W, H, w, h;\n', '8     cin >> W >> H;\n', '9     long long int x1, y1, x2, y2;\n', '10     cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;\n', '11     cin >> w >> h;\n', '12     long long int disth, distw;\n', '13     distw = max(x1, w - x2);\n', '14     disth = max(y1, h - y2);\n', '15     long long int ans1 = INT_MAX, ans2 = INT_MAX;\n', '16     if (h <= disth || w <= distw) {\n', '17       cout << 0 << endl;\n', '18     } else if (h + abs(y2 - y1) > H && w + abs(x2 - x1) > W) {\n', '19       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '20     } else {\n', '21       if (h + y2 - y1 <= H) {\n', '22         ans1 = abs(disth - h);\n', '23       }\n', '24       if (w + abs(x2 - x1) <= W) {\n', '25         ans2 = abs(distw - w);\n', '26       }\n', '27       cout << min(ans1, ans2) << endl;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n']	"13     distw = max(x1, W - x2);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 T gcd(T a, T b) {\n', '5   return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a;\n', '6 }\n', '7 template <typename T>\n', '8 T lcm(T a, T b) {\n', '9   return a * b / gcd(a, b);\n', '10 }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   int t;\n', '13   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '14   long long W, H, w, h, x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, mih, miw;\n', '15   while (t--) {\n', '16     scanf(""%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld"", &W, &H, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2, &w,\n', '17           &h);\n', '18     double mid1 = (x1 + x2) / 2.0;\n', '19     double mid2 = (y1 + y2) / 2.0;\n', '20     double mid3 = W / 2.0;\n', '21     double mid4 = H / 2.0;\n', '22     double ans = -1;\n', '23     if (mid1 < mid3 && mid2 >= mid4) {\n', '24       x3 = W, y3 = 0;\n', '25       x4 = W - w, y4 = h;\n', '26       mih = y4 - y1, miw = x2 - x4;\n', '27       if (mih <= 0 || miw <= 0) {\n', '28         ans = 0.0;\n', '29       } else if (H - y2 >= mih && x1 >= miw) {\n', '30         ans = min((double)mih, (double)miw);\n', '31       } else if (H - ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int min(int a, int b) {\n', '4   if (a <= b)\n', '5     return a;\n', '6   else\n', '7     return b;\n', '8 }\n', '9 int min_dis(int W, int H, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int w, int h) {\n', '10   int dis = 1e9;\n', '11   if (h > H || w > W) {\n', '12     return -1;\n', '13   } else {\n', '14     if ((x2 - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     int h, w, H, W, minn = 999999999;\n', '8     cin >> w >> h;\n', '9     int xx, dx, xy, dy;\n', '10     cin >> xx >> xy >> dx >> dy;\n', '11     cin >> W >> H;\n', '12     if (W + dx - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int power(long long int x, long long int y, long long int p) {\n', '4   long long int res = 1;\n', '5   x = x % p;\n', '6   while (y > 0) {\n', '7     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % p;\n', '8     y = y >> 1;\n', '9     x = (x * x) % p;\n', '10   }\n', '11   return res;\n', '12 }\n', '13 long long int modInverse(long long int n, long long int p) {\n', '14   return power(n, p - 2, p);\n', '15 }\n', '16 long long int nCrModPFermat(long long int n, long long int r, long long int p) {\n', '17   if (r == 0) return 1;\n', '18   long long int fac[n + 1];\n', '19   fac[0] = 1;\n', '20   for (long long int i = 1; i <= n; i++) fac[i] = (fac[i - 1] * i) % p;\n', '21   return (fac[n] * modInverse(fac[r], p) % p * modInverse(fac[n - r], p) % p) %\n', '22          p;\n', '23 }\n', '24 long long int log2_32bit(long long int x) {\n', '25   long long int res = 0;\n', '26   while (x >>= 1) res++;\n', '27   return res;\n', '28 }\n', '29 long long int isPowerof2(long long int x) { return (x && !(x & x - 1)); }\n', '30 int main() {\n', '31   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '32   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '33   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '34   long long int t;\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     long long int n;\n', '38     cin >> n;\n', '39     long long int a[n];\n', '40     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '41     ;\n', '42     long long int b[n];\n', '43     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '44       cin >> b[i];\n', '45     }\n', '46     if (n == 1) {\n', '47       cout << 0 << ""\\n"";\n', '48       continue;\n', '49     }\n', '50     long long int ans = 1000000007;\n', '51     long long int pre[n - 1];\n', '52     pre[0] = b[0];\n', '53     for (int i = 1; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '54       pre[i] = pre[i - 1] + b[i];\n', '55     }\n', '56     long long int suf[n - 1];\n', '57     suf[n - 2] = a[n - 1];\n', '58     for (int i = n - 2; i >= 1; i--) {\n', '59       suf[i - 1] = suf[i] + a[i];\n', '60     }\n', '61     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC target(""sse,sse2,sse3,sse4,popcnt,abm,mmx,avx,avx2,fma"")\n', '5 #pragma GCC optimization(""unroll-loops"")\n', '6 const long long INF = 1e10;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   int m;\n', '9   cin >> m;\n', '10   vector<long long> a(m), b(m), s1(m + 1), s2(m + 1);\n', '11   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int inf = 1e9;\n', '5 int n, m, v[maxn], l[maxn], ans[maxn], r[maxn], p[maxn];\n', '6 char c;\n', '7 int main() {\n', '8   cin >> n >> m;\n', '9   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '10     cin >> c;\n', ""11     v[i] = c - 'a';\n"", '12   }\n', '13   vector<int> k;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) k.push_back(i);\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) ans[i] = inf;\n', '16   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) cin >> l[i] >> r[i];\n', '17   do {\n', '18     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '19       p[i] = p[i - 1] + (k[i % 3] != v[i]);\n', '20     }\n', '21     for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) ans[i] = min(ans[i], p[r[i]] - p[l[i] - 1]);\n', '22   } while (next_permutation(k.begin(), k.end()));\n', '23   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) cout << ans[i] << ""\\n"";\n', '24 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int inf = 1e9;\n', '5 int n, m, v[maxn], l[maxn], ans[maxn], r[maxn], p[maxn];\n', '6 char c;\n', '7 int main() {\n', '8   cin >> n >> m;\n', '9   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '10     cin >> c;\n', ""11     v[i] = c - 'a';\n"", '12   }\n', '13   vector<int> k;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) k.push_back(i);\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) ans[i] = inf;\n', '16   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) cin >> l[i] >> r[i];\n', '17   do {\n', '18     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '19       p[i] = p[i - 1] + (p[i % 3] != v[i]);\n', '20     }\n', '21     for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) ans[i] = min(ans[i], p[r[i]] - p[l[i] - 1]);\n', '22   } while (next_permutation(k.begin(), k.end()));\n', '23   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) cout << ans[i] << ""\\n"";\n', '24 }\n']"	"19       p[i] = p[i - 1] + (k[i % 3] != v[i]);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int n;\n', '5   int queryn;\n', '6   string s;\n', '7   cin >> n >> queryn;\n', '8   cin >> s;\n', '9   int dp[6][n];\n', '10   int query[queryn][2];\n', '11   string com[6] = {""abc"", ""acb"", ""bac"", ""bca"", ""cab"", ""cba""};\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < queryn; i++) {\n', '13     cin >> query[i][0] >> query[i][1];\n', '14   }\n', '15   for (int k = 0; k < 6; k++) {\n', '16     int cost = 0;\n', '17     for (int i = 0, it = 0; i < n; i++, it++) {\n', '18       it = it % 3;\n', '19       if (s[i] != com[k][it]) {\n', '20         dp[k][i] = ++cost;\n', '21       } else {\n', '22         dp[k][i] = cost;\n', '23       }\n', '24     }\n', '25   }\n', '26   for (int w = 0; w < queryn; w++) {\n', '27     int sum = 100000000;\n', '28     for (int k = 0; k < 6; k++) {\n', '29       sum = min(dp[k][query[w][1] - 1] -\n', '30                     ((query[w][0] - 2 >= 0) ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Data {\n', '4   int l, r, w;\n', '5   Data(int a, int b, int c) {\n', '6     l = a;\n', '7     r = b;\n', '8     w = c;\n', '9   }\n', '10   Data(){};\n', '11 };\n', '12 bool cmp(Data a, Data b) { return a.w < b.w; }\n', '13 int tree[4 * 1000005], lazy[4 * 1000005];\n', '14 void push(int indx) {\n', '15   tree[2 * indx] += lazy[indx];\n', '16   tree[2 * indx + 1] += lazy[indx];\n', '17   lazy[2 * indx] += lazy[indx];\n', '18   lazy[2 * indx + 1] += lazy[indx];\n', '19   lazy[indx] = 0;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void update(int node, int st, int en, int l, int r, int val) {\n', '22   if (st > r || en < l) return;\n', '23   if (st >= l && en <= r) {\n', '24     lazy[node] += val;\n', '25     tree[node] += val;\n', '26   } else {\n', '27     int mid = (st + en) / 2;\n', '28     push(node);\n', '29     update(2 * node, st, mid, l, r, val);\n', '30     update(2 * node + 1, mid + 1, en, l, r, val);\n', '31     tree[node] = min(tree[2 * node], tree[2 * node + 1]);\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n', '34 int query(int node, int st, int en, int l, int r) {\n', '35   if (st > r || en < l) return 1e8;\n', '36   if (st >= l && en <= r) {\n', '37     return tree[node];\n', '38   }\n', '39   int m = (st + en) / 2;\n', '40   push(node);\n', '41   return min(query(2 * node, st, m, l, r),\n', '42              query(2 * node + 1, m + 1, en, l, r));\n', '43 }\n', '44 int main() {\n', '45   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '46   cin.tie(0);\n', '47   cout.tie(0);\n', '48   int n, m;\n', '49   cin >> n >> m;\n', '50   std::vector<Data> v(n);\n', '51   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '52     int l, r, w;\n', '53     cin >> l >> r >> w;\n', '54     v[i] = Data(l, r, w);\n', '55   }\n', '56   sort(v.begin(), v.end(), cmp);\n', '57   int i = 0, j = 0, ans = 1e9;\n', '58   while (j < n) {\n', '59     int a = v[j].l;\n', '60     if (a != 1) ++a;\n', '61     update(1, 1, m, a, v[j].r, 1);\n', '62     ++j;\n', '63     int x = query(1, 1, m, 1, m);\n', '64     while (x != 0) {\n', '65       ans = min(ans, v[j - 1].w - v[i].w);\n', '66       a = v[i].l;\n', '67       int b = v[i].r;\n', '68       if (a != 1) ++a;\n', '69       if (a <= b) update(1, 1, m, a, b, -1);\n', '70       ++i;\n', '71       x = query(1, 1, m, 1, m);\n', '72     }\n', '73   }\n', ""74   cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '75   return 0;\n', '76 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Data {\n', '4   int l, r, w;\n', '5   Data(int a, int b, int c) {\n', '6     l = a;\n', '7     r = b;\n', '8     w = c;\n', '9   }\n', '10   Data(){};\n', '11 };\n', '12 bool cmp(Data a, Data b) { return a.w < b.w; }\n', '13 int tree[4 * 1000005], lazy[4 * 1000005];\n', '14 void push(int indx) {\n', '15   tree[2 * indx] += lazy[indx];\n', '16   tree[2 * indx + 1] += lazy[indx];\n', '17   lazy[2 * indx] += lazy[indx];\n', '18   lazy[2 * indx + 1] += lazy[indx];\n', '19   lazy[indx] = 0;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void update(int node, int st, int en, int l, int r, int val) {\n', '22   if (st > r || en < l) return;\n', '23   if (st >= l && en <= r) {\n', '24     lazy[node] += val;\n', '25     tree[node] += val;\n', '26   } else {\n', '27     int mid = (st + en) / 2;\n', '28     push(node);\n', '29     update(2 * node, st, mid, l, r, val);\n', '30     update(2 * node + 1, mid + 1, en, l, r, val);\n', '31     tree[node] = min(tree[2 * node], tree[2 * node + 1]);\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n', '34 int query(int node, int st, int en, int l, int r) {\n', '35   if (st > r || en < l) return 1e8;\n', '36   if (st >= l && en <= r) {\n', '37     return tree[node];\n', '38   }\n', '39   int m = (st + en) / 2;\n', '40   push(node);\n', '41   return min(query(2 * node, st, m, l, r),\n', '42              query(2 * node + 1, m + 1, en, l, r));\n', '43 }\n', '44 int main() {\n', '45   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '46   cin.tie(0);\n', '47   cout.tie(0);\n', '48   int n, m;\n', '49   cin >> n >> m;\n', '50   std::vector<Data> v(n);\n', '51   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int st[4 * 1000001];\n', '4 int lazy[4 * 1000001];\n', '5 void build(int si, int ss, int se) {\n', '6   if (ss == se) {\n', '7     return;\n', '8   }\n', '9   int mid = (ss + se) / 2;\n', '10   build(2 * si, ss, mid);\n', '11   build(2 * si + 1, mid + 1, se);\n', '12   st[si] = min(st[2 * si], st[2 * si + 1]);\n', '13 }\n', '14 void update(int si, int ss, int se, int qs, int qe, int x) {\n', '15   if (lazy[si] != 0) {\n', '16     int lz_sum = lazy[si];\n', '17     st[si] += lz_sum;\n', '18     lazy[si] = 0;\n', '19     if (ss != se) {\n', '20       lazy[2 * si] += lz_sum;\n', '21       lazy[2 * si + 1] += lz_sum;\n', '22     }\n', '23   }\n', '24   if (ss > qe || se < qs) return;\n', '25   if (ss >= qs && se <= qe) {\n', '26     st[si] += x;\n', '27     if (ss != se) {\n', '28       lazy[2 * si] += x;\n', '29       lazy[2 * si + 1] += x;\n', '30     }\n', '31     return;\n', '32   }\n', '33   int mid = (ss + se) / 2;\n', '34   update(2 * si, ss, mid, qs, qe, x);\n', '35   update(2 * si + 1, mid + 1, se, qs, qe, x);\n', '36   st[si] = min(st[2 * si], st[2 * si + 1]);\n', '37 }\n', '38 int query(int si, int ss, int se, int qs, int qe) {\n', '39   if (lazy[si] != 0) {\n', '40     int lz_sum = lazy[si];\n', '41     st[si] += lz_sum;\n', '42     lazy[si] = 0;\n', '43     if (ss != se) {\n', '44       lazy[2 * si] += lz_sum;\n', '45       lazy[2 * si + 1] += lz_sum;\n', '46     }\n', '47   }\n', '48   if (ss > qe || se < qs) return INT_MAX;\n', '49   if (ss >= qs && se <= qe) {\n', '50     return st[si];\n', '51   }\n', '52   int mid = (ss + se) / 2;\n', '53   return min(query(2 * si, ss, mid, qs, qe),\n', '54              query(2 * si + 1, mid + 1, se, qs, qe));\n', '55 }\n', '56 struct seg "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 long long power(long long x, long long n) {\n', '5   long long res = 1;\n', '6   while (n) {\n', '7     if (n & 1) res = 1LL * res * x % mod;\n', '8     x = 1LL * x * x % mod;\n', '9     n >>= 1;\n', '10   }\n', '11   return res;\n', '12 }\n', '13 bool isPrime(long long n) {\n', '14   static long long i = 2;\n', '15   if (n == 0 || n == 1) {\n', '16     return false;\n', '17   }\n', '18   if (n == i) return true;\n', '19   if (n % i == 0) {\n', '20     return false;\n', '21   }\n', '22   i++;\n', '23   return isPrime(n);\n', '24 }\n', '25 int32_t main() {\n', '26   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '27   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '28   long long t;\n', '29   cin >> t;\n', '30   while (t--) {\n', '31     long long c, d;\n', '32     cin >> c >> d;\n', '33     if (c == 0 && d == 0) {\n', ""34       cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '35       continue;\n', '36     }\n', '37     long long diff = abs(c - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int a, b;\n', '5   cin >> a >> b;\n', '6   if (abs(a - b) % 2 == 1) {\n', ""7     cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '8   } else if (a == b && a == 0) {\n', ""9     cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '10   } else if (a == b) {\n', ""11     cout << 1 << '\\n';\n"", '12   } else {\n', ""13     cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '14   }\n', '15 }\n', '16 signed main() {\n', '17   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '18   cin.tie(0);\n', '19   int t;\n', '20   cin >> t;\n', '21   while (t--) solve();\n', '22 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int a, b;\n', '5   cin >> a >> b;\n', '6   if ((a - b) % 2 == 1) {\n', ""7     cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '8   } else if (a == b && a == 0) {\n', ""9     cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '10   } else if (a == b) {\n', ""11     cout << 1 << '\\n';\n"", '12   } else {\n', ""13     cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '14   }\n', '15 }\n', '16 signed main() {\n', '17   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '18   cin.tie(0);\n', '19   int t;\n', '20   cin >> t;\n', '21   while (t--) solve();\n', '22 }\n']"	"6   if (abs(a - b) % 2 == 1) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int T;\n', '5   cin >> T;\n', '6   while (T--) {\n', '7     int x, y;\n', '8     cin >> x >> y;\n', '9     int d = abs(x - y);\n', '10     if (d == 1) {\n', ""11       cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '12     } else if (d == 0) {\n', '13       if (x == 0) {\n', ""14         cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '15       } else {\n', ""16         cout << 1 << '\\n';\n"", '17       }\n', '18     } else if (d == 2) {\n', ""19       cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '20     } else {\n', '21       if (d % 2 == 0) {\n', '22         if (x == 0 || y == 0) {\n', ""23           cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '24         } else {\n', ""25           cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '26         }\n', '27       } else\n', ""28         cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '29     }\n', '30   }\n', '31 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int T;\n', '5   cin >> T;\n', '6   while (T--) {\n', '7     int x, y;\n', '8     cin >> x >> y;\n', '9     int d = abs(x - y);\n', '10     if (d == 1) {\n', ""11       cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '12     } else if (d == 0) {\n', '13       if (x == 0) {\n', ""14         cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '15       } else {\n', ""16         cout << 1 << '\\n';\n"", '17       }\n', '18     } else if (d == 2) {\n', ""19       cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '20     } else {\n', '21       if (d % 2 == 0) {\n', '22         if (x == 0 || y == 0) {\n', ""23           cout << 2 << '\\n';\n"", '24         } else {\n', ""25           cout << 3 << '\\n';\n"", '26         }\n', '27       } else\n', ""28         cout << -1 << '\\n';\n"", '29     }\n', '30   }\n', '31 }\n']"	"25           cout << 2 << '\n';

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void show(int ans[], int n) {\n', '4   for (int i = (0); i < (n); ++i) {\n', '5     cout << ans[i] << "" "";\n', '6   }\n', '7   cout << ""\\n"";\n', '8 }\n', '9 bool isPrime(int n) {\n', '10   for (int i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long c, j, d, t, k, i, x, n, m, u;\n', '4 signed main() {\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   for (i = 1; i <= t; i++) {\n', '7     cin >> n;\n', '8     vector<long long> v;\n', '9     for (j = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main(void) {\n', '4   int t, n, i, j, x;\n', '5   int n1, n2;\n', '6   int a, b, p, q;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   for (i = 0; i < t; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 void maxi() {\n', '5   long long n;\n', '6   vector<int> v[2];\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   v[0].clear(), v[1].clear();\n', '9   for (int i = 0, x; i < n; i++) cin >> x, v[x & 1].push_back(i);\n', '10   if (v[0].size() < v[1].size()) swap(v[0], v[1]);\n', '11   if (v[0].size() != (n + 1) / 2) {\n', '12     cout << -1 << endl;\n', '13     return;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long ret = n * n;\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < 2 - (n & 1); i++) {\n', '17     long long x = 0;\n', '18     for (int j = 0; j < v[i].size(); j++) x += abs(v[i][j] - 2 * j);\n', '19     ret = min(ret, x);\n', '20   }\n', '21   cout << ret << endl;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   long long t;\n', '25   cin >> t;\n', '26   while (t--) {\n', '27     maxi();\n', '28   }\n', '29   return 0;\n', '30 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 void maxi() {\n', '5   long long n;\n', '6   vector<int> v[2];\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   v[0].clear(), v[1].clear();\n', '9   for (int i = 0, x; i < n; i++) cin >> x, v[x & 1].push_back(i);\n', '10   if (v[0].size() < v[1].size()) swap(v[0], v[1]);\n', '11   if (v[0].size() != (n + 1) / 2) {\n', '12     cout << -1 << endl;\n', '13     return;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long ret = n * 1;\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < 2 - (n & 1); i++) {\n', '17     long long x = 0;\n', '18     for (int j = 0; j < v[i].size(); j++) x += abs(v[i][j] - 2 * j);\n', '19     ret = min(ret, x);\n', '20   }\n', '21   cout << ret << endl;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   long long t;\n', '25   cin >> t;\n', '26   while (t--) {\n', '27     maxi();\n', '28   }\n', '29   return 0;\n', '30 }\n']	"15   long long ret = n * n;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class... Args>\n', '4 void debug(Args... args) {\n', ""5   auto tmp = {(cout << args << '\\t', 0)...};\n"", '6   cout << endl;\n', '7 }\n', '8 using ll = long long;\n', '9 const int N = 1e3 + 10;\n', '10 const int mod = 4933;\n', '11 const double eps = 1e-9;\n', '12 ll a[N];\n', '13 int n;\n', '14 int main() {\n', '15   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '16   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '17   cin >> n;\n', '18   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '19     cin >> a[i];\n', '20   }\n', '21   ll ans = 0;\n', '22   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '23     ll x = 0;\n', '24     ll y = 0;\n', '25     ll z = 1;\n', '26     for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; j += 2) {\n', '27       ll d = abs(x - y);\n', '28       if (x == y) {\n', '29         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i], a[j]) - z + 1);\n', '30       } else if (x > y) {\n', '31         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i], a[j] - d) - z + 1);\n', '32       } else {\n', '33         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i] - d, a[j]) - max(1ll, z - d) + 1);\n', '34       }\n', '35       y += a[j];\n', '36       z = max(z, y - x);\n', '37       x += a[j + 1];\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40   cout << ans;\n', '41 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class... Args>\n', '4 void debug(Args... args) {\n', ""5   auto tmp = {(cout << args << '\\t', 0)...};\n"", '6   cout << endl;\n', '7 }\n', '8 using ll = long long;\n', '9 const int N = 1e3 + 10;\n', '10 const int mod = 4933;\n', '11 const double eps = 1e-9;\n', '12 ll a[N];\n', '13 int n;\n', '14 int main() {\n', '15   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '16   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '17   cin >> n;\n', '18   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '19     cin >> a[i];\n', '20   }\n', '21   ll ans = 0;\n', '22   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '23     ll x = 0;\n', '24     ll y = 0;\n', '25     ll z = 1;\n', '26     for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; j += 2) {\n', '27       int d = abs(x - y);\n', '28       if (x == y) {\n', '29         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i], a[j]) - z + 1);\n', '30       } else if (x > y) {\n', '31         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i], a[j] - d) - z + 1);\n', '32       } else {\n', '33         ans += max(0ll, min(a[i] - d, a[j]) - max(1ll, z - d) + 1);\n', '34       }\n', '35       y += a[j];\n', '36       z = max(z, y - x);\n', '37       x += a[j + 1];\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40   cout << ans;\n', '41 }\n']"	"27       ll d = abs(x - y);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 clock_t startTime, endTime;\n', '4 const long long INF_ll = 1e18;\n', '5 const int INF_int = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 void read(){};\n', '7 template <typename _Tp, typename... _Tps>\n', '8 void read(_Tp& x, _Tps&... Ar) {\n', '9   x = 0;\n', '10   char c = getchar();\n', '11   bool flag = 0;\n', ""12   while (c < '0' || c > '9') flag |= (c == '-'), c = getchar();\n"", ""13   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9')\n"", '14     x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + (c ^ 48), c = getchar();\n', '15   if (flag) x = -x;\n', '16   read(Ar...);\n', '17 }\n', '18 template <typename T>\n', '19 inline void write(T x) {\n', '20   if (x < 0) {\n', '21     x = ~(x - 1);\n', ""22     putchar('-');\n"", '23   }\n', '24   if (x > 9) write(x / 10);\n', ""25   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '26 }\n', '27 void rd_test() {}\n', '28 void Time_test() {}\n', '29 int vec[300000];\n', '30 int main() {\n', '31   int n;\n', '32   read(n);\n', '33   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '34     read(vec[i]);\n', '35   }\n', '36   long long ans = 0;\n', '37   int len = n;\n', '38   if (len % 2 == 1) len--;\n', '39   for (int i = 1; i <= len; i += 2) {\n', '40     long long sum = vec[i];\n', '41     long long L = 0;\n', '42     for (int j = i + 1; j <= len; j++) {\n', '43       if (j % 2 == 1)\n', '44         L += vec[j];\n', '45       else {\n', '46         long long R = vec[j];\n', '47         long long k = min(L, R);\n', '48         if (k) {\n', '49           R -= k;\n', '50           L -= k;\n', '51           if (L == 0) ans++;\n', '52         }\n', '53         if (R > 0) {\n', '54           long long k = min(R, sum);\n', '55           R -= k;\n', '56           sum -= k;\n', '57           ans += k;\n', '58         }\n', '59         if (R > 0) break;\n', '60       }\n', '61     }\n', '62   }\n', '63   printf(""%lld\\n"", ans);\n', '64 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 clock_t startTime, endTime;\n', '4 const long long INF_ll = 1e18;\n', '5 const int INF_int = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 void read(){};\n', '7 template <typename _Tp, typename... _Tps>\n', '8 void read(_Tp& x, _Tps&... Ar) {\n', '9   x = 0;\n', '10   char c = getchar();\n', '11   bool flag = 0;\n', ""12   while (c < '0' || c > '9') flag |= (c == '-'), c = getchar();\n"", ""13   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9')\n"", '14     x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + (c ^ 48), c = getchar();\n', '15   if (flag) x = -x;\n', '16   read(Ar...);\n', '17 }\n', '18 template <typename T>\n', '19 inline void write(T x) {\n', '20   if (x < 0) {\n', '21     x = ~(x - 1);\n', ""22     putchar('-');\n"", '23   }\n', '24   if (x > 9) write(x / 10);\n', ""25   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '26 }\n', '27 void rd_test() {}\n', '28 void Time_test() {}\n', '29 int vec[300000];\n', '30 int main() {\n', '31   int n;\n', '32   read(n);\n', '33   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '34     read(vec[i]);\n', '35   }\n', '36   long long ans = 0;\n', '37   int len = n;\n', '38   if (len % 2 == 1) len--;\n', '39   for (int i = 1; i <= len; i += 2) {\n', '40     long long sum = vec[i];\n', '41     long long L = 0;\n', '42     for (int j = i + 1; j <= len; j++) {\n', '43       if (j % 2 == 1)\n', '44         L += vec[j];\n', '45       else {\n', '46         long long R = vec[j];\n', '47         long long k = min(L, R);\n', '48         if (k) {\n', '49           R -= k;\n', '50           L -= k;\n', '51           if (L == 0) ans++;\n', '52         }\n', '53         if (R > 0) {\n', '54           long long k = min(R, sum);\n', '55           R -= k;\n', '56           sum -= k;\n', '57           ans += k;\n', '58         }\n', '59         if (R > 0) break;\n', '60       }\n', '61     }\n', '62   }\n', '63   printf(""%d\\n"", ans);\n', '64 }\n']"	"63   printf(""%lld\n"", ans);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<int> v;\n', '7   int x, y, z, a, b, c;\n', '8   int x1, y1;\n', '9   cout << ""and 1 2"" << endl;\n', '10   cin >> x1;\n', '11   cout << ""or 1 2"" << endl;\n', '12   cin >> y1;\n', '13   x = x1 + y1;\n', '14   cout << ""and 3 2"" << endl;\n', '15   cin >> x1;\n', '16   cout << ""or 3 2"" << endl;\n', '17   cin >> y1;\n', '18   z = x1 + y1;\n', '19   cout << ""and 1 3"" << endl;\n', '20   cin >> x1;\n', '21   cout << ""or 1 3"" << endl;\n', '22   cin >> y1;\n', '23   y = x1 + y1;\n', '24   a = (x - z + y) / 2;\n', '25   b = (z - y + x) / 2;\n', '26   c = (y + z - x) / 2;\n', '27   v.push_back(a);\n', '28   v.push_back(b);\n', '29   v.push_back(c);\n', '30   for (int i = 4; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void OJ() { ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(NULL), cout.tie(NULL); }\n', '4 long long fp(long long a, long long b, long long m = 1000000007) {\n', '5   a %= m;\n', '6   if (a == 0) return 0;\n', '7   long long ans = 1;\n', '8   while (b) {\n', '9     if (b & 1) ans = (ans * a) % m;\n', '10     a = (a * a) % m;\n', '11     b >>= 1;\n', '12   }\n', '13   return ans;\n', '14 }\n', '15 void solve() {\n', '16   OJ();\n', '17   long long t = 1;\n', '18   while (t--) {\n', '19     vector<long long> temp;\n', '20     long long n, k;\n', '21     cin >> n >> k;\n', '22     cout << ""or "" << 1 << "" "" << 2 << endl;\n', '23     long long o1;\n', '24     cin >> o1;\n', '25     cout << ""or "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '26     long long o2;\n', '27     cin >> o2;\n', '28     cout << ""or "" << 1 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '29     long long o3;\n', '30     cin >> o3;\n', '31     cout << ""and "" << 1 << "" "" << 2 << endl;\n', '32     long long a1;\n', '33     cin >> a1;\n', '34     cout << ""and "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '35     long long a2;\n', '36     cin >> a2;\n', '37     cout << ""and "" << 1 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '38     long long a3;\n', '39     cin >> a3;\n', '40     long long a = (a1 | a3);\n', '41     for (long long i = 30; i >= 0; i--) {\n', '42       long long v = (a >> i) & 1;\n', '43       if (v == 1) continue;\n', '44       long long v2 = (o1 >> i) & 1, v3 = (o3 >> i) & 1;\n', '45       if (v2 == 0 || v3 == 0) continue;\n', '46       long long v4 = (a2 >> i) & 1;\n', '47       if (v4 == 1) continue;\n', '48       a |= (1 << i);\n', '49     }\n', '50     long long b = (a1 | a2) | (a ^ o1);\n', '51     long long c = (a2 | a3) | (o3 ^ a);\n', '52     temp.push_back(a);\n', '53     temp.push_back(b);\n', '54     temp.push_back(c);\n', '55     for (long long i = 4; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename __T1, typename __T2>\n', '4 ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, pair<__T1, __T2> &__VAR) {\n', '5   cout << ""["" << __VAR.first << "", "" << __VAR.second << ""]"";\n', '6   return out;\n', '7 }\n', '8 template <typename __T>\n', '9 ostream &operator<<(ostream &out, vector<__T> &__VAR) {\n', '10   cout << ""["";\n', '11   for (int i = 0; i + 2 <= N; i += 3) {\n', '63     auto tup = solve(i, i + 1, i + 2);\n', '64     auto [A, B, C] = tup;\n', '65     a[i] = A;\n', '66     a[i + 1] = B;\n', '67     a[i + 2] = C;\n', '68     last = i + 2;\n', '69   }\n', '70   for (int i = last + 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int M = 1e4 + 5;\n', '4 inline int read() {\n', '5   char c = getchar();\n', '6   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', ""7   for (; c < '0' || c > '9'; c = getchar())\n"", ""8     if (c == '-') f = 0;\n"", ""9   for (; c <= '9' && c >= '0'; c = getchar())\n"", '10     x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (c ^ 48);\n', '11   return f ? x : -x;\n', '12 }\n', '13 inline int abs(int x) { return x > 0 ? x : -x; }\n', '14 inline int min(int a, int b) { return a < b ? a : b; }\n', '15 inline int max(int a, int b) { return a > b ? a : b; }\n', '16 inline void swap(int &a, int &b) { a ^= b ^= a ^= b; }\n', '17 int n, k, a[M], c[M], t1, t2;\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   n = read(), k = read();\n', '20   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '21     printf(""and %d %d\\n"", i - 1, i);\n', '22     fflush(stdout);\n', '23     scanf(""%d"", &t1);\n', '24     printf(""or %d %d\\n"", i - 1, i);\n', '25     fflush(stdout);\n', '26     scanf(""%d"", &t2);\n', '27     c[i] = t1 + t2;\n', '28   }\n', '29   printf(""and 1 3\\n"");\n', '30   fflush(stdout);\n', '31   scanf(""%d"", &t1);\n', '32   printf(""or 1 3\\n"");\n', '33   fflush(stdout);\n', '34   scanf(""%d"", &t2);\n', '35   a[2] = c[2] - t1 - t2 + c[3] >> 1, a[1] = c[2] - a[2];\n', '36   for (register int i = 3; i <= n; i++) a[i] = c[i] - a[i - 1];\n', '37   sort(a + 1, a + 1 + n);\n', '38   printf(""finish %d\\n"", a[k]);\n', '39   fflush(stdout);\n', '40   return 0;\n', '41 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int M = 1e4 + 5;\n', '4 inline int read() {\n', '5   char c = getchar();\n', '6   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', ""7   for (; c < '0' || c > '9'; c = getchar())\n"", ""8     if (c == '-') f = 0;\n"", ""9   for (; c <= '9' && c >= '0'; c = getchar())\n"", '10     x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (c ^ 48);\n', '11   return f ? x : -x;\n', '12 }\n', '13 inline int abs(int x) { return x > 0 ? x : -x; }\n', '14 inline int min(int a, int b) { return a < b ? a : b; }\n', '15 inline int max(int a, int b) { return a > b ? a : b; }\n', '16 inline void swap(int &a, int &b) { a ^= b ^= a ^= b; }\n', '17 int n, k, a[M], c[M], t1, t2;\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   n = read(), k = read();\n', '20   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '21     printf(""and %d %d\\n"", i - 1, i);\n', '22     fflush(stdout);\n', '23     scanf(""%d"", &t1);\n', '24     printf(""or %d %d\\n"", i - 1, i);\n', '25     fflush(stdout);\n', '26     scanf(""%d"", &t2);\n', '27     c[i] = t1 + t2;\n', '28   }\n', '29   printf(""ans 1 3\\n"");\n', '30   fflush(stdout);\n', '31   scanf(""%d"", &t1);\n', '32   printf(""or 1 3\\n"");\n', '33   fflush(stdout);\n', '34   scanf(""%d"", &t2);\n', '35   a[2] = c[2] - t1 - t2 + c[3] >> 1, a[1] = c[2] - a[2];\n', '36   for (register int i = 3; i <= n; i++) a[i] = c[i] - a[i - 1];\n', '37   sort(a + 1, a + 1 + n);\n', '38   printf(""finish %d\\n"", a[k]);\n', '39   fflush(stdout);\n', '40   return 0;\n', '41 }\n']"	"29   printf(""and 1 3\n"");

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long ask1(long long a, long long b) {\n', '4   cout << ""and "" << a << "" "" << b << ""\\n"";\n', '5   long long n;\n', '6   cin >> n;\n', '7   return n;\n', '8 }\n', '9 long long ask2(long long a, long long b) {\n', '10   cout << ""or "" << a << "" "" << b << ""\\n"";\n', '11   long long n;\n', '12   cin >> n;\n', '13   return n;\n', '14 }\n', '15 int32_t main() {\n', '16   long long T = 1;\n', '17   while (T--) {\n', '18     long long n, k;\n', '19     cin >> n >> k;\n', '20     vector<long long> v(n);\n', '21     long long a12 = ask1(1, 2);\n', '22     long long o12 = ask2(1, 2);\n', '23     long long a23 = ask1(2, 3);\n', '24     long long o23 = ask2(2, 3);\n', '25     long long a13 = ask1(1, 3);\n', '26     long long o13 = ask2(1, 3);\n', '27     long long o123 = o12 | o23;\n', '28     long long a123 = a12 & a23;\n', '29     long long a = (o123 - o23 + a12 + a13 - a123);\n', '30     long long b = o12 - (a - a12);\n', '31     long long c = o13 - (a - a13);\n', '32     v[0] = a;\n', '33     v[1] = b;\n', '34     v[2] = c;\n', '35     for (long long i = 3; i < n; i++) {\n', '36       long long ba = ask1(1, i + 1);\n', '37       long long bo = ask2(1, i + 1);\n', '38       v[i] = bo - (a - ba);\n', '39     }\n', '40     sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '41     cout << ""finish "" << v[k - 1] << ""\\n"";\n', '42   }\n', '43 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long ask1(long long a, long long b) {\n', '4   cout << ""and "" << a << "" "" << b << ""\\n"";\n', '5   long long n;\n', '6   cin >> n;\n', '7   return n;\n', '8 }\n', '9 long long ask2(long long a, long long b) {\n', '10   cout << ""or "" << a << "" "" << b << ""\\n"";\n', '11   long long n;\n', '12   cin >> n;\n', '13   return n;\n', '14 }\n', '15 int32_t main() {\n', '16   long long T = 1;\n', '17   while (T--) {\n', '18     long long n, k;\n', '19     cin >> n >> k;\n', '20     vector<long long> v(n);\n', '21     long long a12 = ask1(1, 2);\n', '22     long long o12 = ask2(1, 2);\n', '23     long long a23 = ask1(2, 3);\n', '24     long long o23 = ask2(2, 3);\n', '25     long long a13 = ask1(1, 3);\n', '26     long long o13 = ask2(1, 3);\n', '27     long long o123 = o12 | o23;\n', '28     long long a123 = a12 | a23;\n', '29     long long a = -(o123 - o23 + a12 + a13 - a123);\n', '30     long long b = o12 - (a - a12);\n', '31     long long c = o13 - (a - a13);\n', '32     v[0] = a;\n', '33     v[1] = b;\n', '34     v[2] = c;\n', '35     for (long long i = 3; i < n; i++) {\n', '36       long long ba = ask1(1, i + 1);\n', '37       long long bo = ask2(1, i + 1);\n', '38       v[i] = bo - (a - ba);\n', '39     }\n', '40     sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '41     cout << ""finish "" << v[k - 1] << ""\\n"";\n', '42   }\n', '43 }\n']"	"28     long long a123 = a12 & a23;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long a[1005];\n', '4 char op[] = ""and"";\n', '5 char op2[] = ""or"";\n', '6 char op3[] = ""finish"";\n', '7 int n, k;\n', '8 void solve() {\n', '9   int f = 0;\n', '10   int num = 0;\n', '11   int m = n / 3;\n', '12   int x = 1;\n', '13   vector<int> res;\n', '14   int s = 1;\n', '15   while (num < 6 * m) {\n', '16     int sum1, sum2, sum3;\n', '17     int x, y, z;\n', '18     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op, s, s + 1);\n', '19     fflush(stdout);\n', '20     scanf(""%d"", &x);\n', '21     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op2, s, s + 1);\n', '22     fflush(stdout);\n', '23     scanf(""%d"", &sum1);\n', '24     sum1 += x;\n', '25     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op, s + 1, s + 2);\n', '26     fflush(stdout);\n', '27     scanf(""%d"", &y);\n', '28     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op2, s + 1, s + 2);\n', '29     fflush(stdout);\n', '30     scanf(""%d"", &sum2);\n', '31     sum2 += y;\n', '32     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op, s, s + 2);\n', '33     fflush(stdout);\n', '34     scanf(""%d"", &z);\n', '35     printf(""%s %d %d\\n"", op2, s, s + 2);\n', '36     fflush(stdout);\n', '37     scanf(""%d"", &sum3);\n', '38     sum3 += z;\n', '39     y = sum1 + sum2 - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 namespace {\n', '3 const int L = 30;\n', '4 std::vector<int> GetBits(int x) {\n', '5   std::vector<int> r(L);\n', '6   for (int i = L - 1; i >= 0; --i) {\n', '7     r[i] = (x % 2);\n', '8     x /= 2;\n', '9   }\n', '10   return r;\n', '11 }\n', '12 int GetValue(const std::vector<int>& r) {\n', '13   int value = 0;\n', '14   for (int bit : r) {\n', '15     value = (2 * value) + bit;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return value;\n', '18 }\n', '19 std::vector<int> AskAnd(int x, int y) {\n', '20   printf(""and %d %d\\n"", x, y);\n', '21   fflush(stdout);\n', '22   int answer;\n', '23   scanf(""%d"", &answer);\n', '24   return GetBits(answer);\n', '25 }\n', '26 void ApplyAndResult(std::vector<std::vector<int>>* a_ptr, int x, int y,\n', '27                     const std::vector<int>& and_r) {\n', '28   std::vector<std::vector<int>>& a = (*a_ptr);\n', '29   for (int k = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long num[500005];\n', '4 void solve(int x) {\n', '5   long long a, o;\n', '6   printf(""and 1 %d\\n"", x);\n', '7   fflush(stdout);\n', '8   scanf(""%lld"", &a);\n', '9   printf(""or 1 %d\\n"", x);\n', '10   fflush(stdout);\n', '11   scanf(""%lld"", &o);\n', '12   long long wei[40];\n', '13   for (int i = 1; i <= 34; ++i) {\n', '14     if (a & (1ll << (i - 1)))\n', '15       wei[i] = 1;\n', '16     else if (o & (1ll << (i - 1))) {\n', '17       if (num[1] & (1ll << (i - 1)))\n', '18         wei[i] = 0;\n', '19       else\n', '20         wei[i] = 1;\n', '21     } else\n', '22       wei[i] = 0;\n', '23   }\n', '24   long long now = 0;\n', '25   for (int i = 1; i <= 34; ++i) {\n', '26     now += wei[i] << (i - 1);\n', '27   }\n', '28   num[x] = now;\n', '29 }\n', '30 int main() {\n', '31   int n, k;\n', '32   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '33   long long a12, o12, a13, o13, a23, o23;\n', '34   printf(""and 1 2\\n"");\n', '35   fflush(stdout);\n', '36   scanf(""%lld"", &a12);\n', '37   printf(""or 1 2\\n"");\n', '38   fflush(stdout);\n', '39   scanf(""%lld"", &o12);\n', '40   printf(""and 1 3\\n"");\n', '41   fflush(stdout);\n', '42   scanf(""%lld"", &a13);\n', '43   printf(""or 1 3\\n"");\n', '44   fflush(stdout);\n', '45   scanf(""%lld"", &o13);\n', '46   printf(""and 2 3\\n"");\n', '47   fflush(stdout);\n', '48   scanf(""%lld"", &a23);\n', '49   printf(""or 2 3\\n"");\n', '50   fflush(stdout);\n', '51   scanf(""%lld"", &o23);\n', '52   long long a[5][40];\n', '53   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 namespace {\n', '3 const int L = 30;\n', '4 std::vector<int> GetBits(int x) {\n', '5   std::vector<int> r(L);\n', '6   for (int i = L - 1; i >= 0; --i) {\n', '7     r[i] = (x % 2);\n', '8     x /= 2;\n', '9   }\n', '10   return r;\n', '11 }\n', '12 int GetValue(const std::vector<int>& r) {\n', '13   int value = 0;\n', '14   for (int bit : r) {\n', '15     value = (2 * value) + bit;\n', '16   }\n', '17   return value;\n', '18 }\n', '19 std::vector<int> AskAnd(int x, int y) {\n', '20   printf(""and %d %d\\n"", x, y);\n', '21   fflush(stdout);\n', '22   int answer;\n', '23   scanf(""%d"", &answer);\n', '24   return GetBits(answer);\n', '25 }\n', '26 void ApplyAndResult(std::vector<std::vector<int>>* a_ptr, int x, int y,\n', '27                     const std::vector<int>& and_r) {\n', '28   std::vector<std::vector<int>>& a = (*a_ptr);\n', '29   for (int k = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const double EPS = 1e-10;\n', '4 using ll = long long;\n', '5 using Pi = pair<int, int>;\n', '6 using Pl = pair<ll, ll>;\n', '7 int dh[] = {-1, 1, 0, 0};\n', '8 int dw[] = {0, 0, 1, -1};\n', '9 int main() {\n', '10   int n, k;\n', '11   cin >> n >> k;\n', '12   vector<int> c(n - 1), d(n - 1);\n', '13   for (int i = (int)(2); i < (int)(31); i++) {\n', '25     for (int j = (int)(0); j < (int)(n - 1); j++) {\n', '26       if ((c[j] >> i & 1) && (d[j] >> i & 1)) a0[i] = 1;\n', '27       if (!(c[j] >> i & 1) && !(d[j] >> i & 1)) a0[i] = 0;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   cout << ""and "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '31   int xx;\n', '32   cin >> xx;\n', '33   cout << ""or "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << endl;\n', '34   int yy;\n', '35   cin >> yy;\n', '36   for (int i = (int)(0); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int n, k;\n', '5   cin >> n >> k;\n', '6   vector<long long> v;\n', '7   long long x, y;\n', '8   cout << ""and "" << 1 << "" "" << 2 << ""\\n"";\n', '9   cout.flush();\n', '10   cin >> x;\n', '11   cout << ""or "" << 1 << "" "" << 2 << ""\\n"";\n', '12   cout.flush();\n', '13   cin >> y;\n', '14   long long r1 = x + y;\n', '15   cout << ""and "" << 1 << "" "" << 3 << ""\\n"";\n', '16   cout.flush();\n', '17   cin >> x;\n', '18   cout << ""or "" << 1 << "" "" << 3 << ""\\n"";\n', '19   cout.flush();\n', '20   cin >> y;\n', '21   long long r2 = x + y;\n', '22   cout << ""and "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << ""\\n"";\n', '23   cout.flush();\n', '24   cin >> x;\n', '25   cout << ""or "" << 2 << "" "" << 3 << ""\\n"";\n', '26   cout.flush();\n', '27   cin >> y;\n', '28   long long r3 = x + y;\n', '29   long long a = (r1 + r2 - r3) / 2;\n', '30   long long b = r1 - a;\n', '31   long long c = r2 - a;\n', '32   v.push_back(a);\n', '33   v.push_back(b);\n', '34   v.push_back(c);\n', '35   for (int i = 4; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 long long a[100100], mn[400100], mx[400100];\n', '5 void build(int x, int l, int r) {\n', '6   if (l == r) {\n', '7     mn[x] = mx[x] = a[l];\n', '8     return;\n', '9   }\n', '10   build(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1)), build(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r);\n', '11   mn[x] = min(mn[x << 1], mn[x << 1 | 1]);\n', '12   mx[x] = max(mx[x << 1], mx[x << 1 | 1]);\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long qmn(int x, int l, int r, int L, int R) {\n', '15   if (l > R || r < L) return 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '16   if (L <= l && r <= R) return mn[x];\n', '17   return min(qmn(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1), L, R),\n', '18              qmn(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r, L, R));\n', '19 }\n', '20 long long qmx(int x, int l, int r, int L, int R) {\n', '21   if (l > R || r < L) return -0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '22   if (L <= l && r <= R) return mx[x];\n', '23   return max(qmx(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1), L, R),\n', '24              qmx(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r, L, R));\n', '25 }\n', '26 int main() {\n', '27   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '28   for (int i = 1, x; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &x), a[i] += x;\n', '29   for (int i = 1, x; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &x), a[i] -= x;\n', '30   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) a[i] += a[i - 1];\n', '31   build(1, 1, n);\n', '32   for (int i = 1, l, r; i <= m; i++) {\n', '33     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '34     if (a[l - 1] != a[r]) {\n', '35       puts(""-1"");\n', '36       continue;\n', '37     }\n', '38     if (qmx(1, 1, n, l, r) > a[l - 1]) {\n', '39       puts(""-1"");\n', '40       continue;\n', '41     }\n', '42     printf(""%lld\\n"", a[l - 1] - qmn(1, 1, n, l, r));\n', '43   }\n', '44   return 0;\n', '45 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 long long a[100100], mn[400100], mx[400100];\n', '5 void build(int x, int l, int r) {\n', '6   if (l == r) {\n', '7     mn[x] = mx[x] = a[l];\n', '8     return;\n', '9   }\n', '10   build(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1)), build(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r);\n', '11   mn[x] = min(mn[x << 1], mx[x << 1 | 1]);\n', '12   mx[x] = max(mx[x << 1], mx[x << 1 | 1]);\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long qmn(int x, int l, int r, int L, int R) {\n', '15   if (l > R || r < L) return 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '16   if (L <= l && r <= R) return mn[x];\n', '17   return min(qmn(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1), L, R),\n', '18              qmn(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r, L, R));\n', '19 }\n', '20 long long qmx(int x, int l, int r, int L, int R) {\n', '21   if (l > R || r < L) return -0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '22   if (L <= l && r <= R) return mx[x];\n', '23   return max(qmx(x << 1, l, ((l + r) >> 1), L, R),\n', '24              qmx(x << 1 | 1, ((l + r) >> 1) + 1, r, L, R));\n', '25 }\n', '26 int main() {\n', '27   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '28   for (int i = 1, x; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 int n, q;\n', '5 long long a[N], b[N], c[N];\n', '6 long long dpa[N][50], dpi[N][50];\n', '7 void rmq_init() {\n', '8   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '9     dpi[i][0] = c[i];\n', '10     dpa[i][0] = c[i];\n', '11   }\n', '12   for (int j = 1; (1 << j) <= n; j++)\n', '13     for (int i = 1; i + (1 << j) - 1 <= n; i++) {\n', '14       dpi[i][j] = min(dpi[i][j - 1], dpi[i + (1 << j - 1)][j - 1]);\n', '15       dpa[i][j] = max(dpa[i][j - 1], dpa[i + (1 << j - 1)][j - 1]);\n', '16     }\n', '17 }\n', '18 long long rmq_min(int l, int r) {\n', '19   int k = 0;\n', '20   while ((1 << (k + 1)) <= r - l + 1) k++;\n', '21   return min(dpi[l][k], dpi[r - (1 << k) + 1][k]);\n', '22 }\n', '23 long long rmq_max(int l, int r) {\n', '24   int k = 0;\n', '25   while ((1 << (k + 1)) <= r - l + 1) k++;\n', '26   return max(dpa[l][k], dpa[r - (1 << k) + 1][k]);\n', '27 }\n', '28 void add(int pos, int x) {\n', '29   for (; pos <= n; pos += (pos & -pos)) {\n', '30     c[pos] += x;\n', '31   }\n', '32 }\n', '33 long long get(int pos) {\n', '34   long long ans = 0;\n', '35   while (pos > 0) {\n', '36     ans += c[pos];\n', '37     pos -= (pos & -pos);\n', '38   }\n', '39   return ans;\n', '40 }\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &q);\n', '43   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '44     scanf(""%lld"", a + i);\n', '45   }\n', '46   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '47     scanf(""%lld"", b + i);\n', '48     c[i] = c[i - 1] + a[i] - b[i];\n', '49   }\n', '50   rmq_init();\n', '51   int l, r;\n', '52   for (int i = 1; i <= q; i++) {\n', '53     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '54     long long tmp = c[l - 1];\n', '55     if (c[r] != tmp && rmq_max(l, r) > tmp) {\n', '56       printf(""-1\\n"");\n', '57     } else {\n', '58       printf(""%lld\\n"", tmp - rmq_min(l, r));\n', '59     }\n', '60   }\n', '61 }\n']"	"55     if (c[r] != tmp || rmq_max(l, r) > tmp) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 struct DST {\n', '5   function<T(T, T)> calcfn;\n', '6   int n;\n', '7   vector<vector<T> > dat;\n', '8   DST(\n', '9       const vector<T>& v = {},\n', '10       function<T(T, T)> calcfn_ = [](T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; })\n', '11       : calcfn(calcfn_) {\n', '12     n = v.size();\n', '13     dat.push_back(v);\n', '14     for (int i = 2; i < n; i <<= 1) {\n', '15       dat.push_back(vector<T>(n));\n', '16       for (int j = i; j < n; j += i << 1) {\n', '17         dat.back()[j - 1] = dat[0][j - 1];\n', '18         for (int k = 2; k <= i; k++) {\n', '19           dat.back()[j - k] = calcfn(dat[0][j - k], dat.back()[j - k + 1]);\n', '20         }\n', '21         dat.back()[j] = dat[0][j];\n', '22         for (int k = 2; k <= i && j + k <= n; k++) {\n', '23           dat.back()[j + k - 1] =\n', '24               calcfn(dat.back()[j + k - 2], dat[0][j + k - 1]);\n', '25         }\n', '26       }\n', '27     }\n', '28   }\n', '29   T query(int l, int r) const {\n', '30     if (l < 0) l = 0;\n', '31     if (r > n) r = n;\n', '32     r--;\n', '33     if (l == r) return dat[0][l];\n', '34     int k = 31 - __builtin_clz(l ^ r);\n', '35     return calcfn(dat[k][l], dat[k][r]);\n', '36   }\n', '37 };\n', '38 int N, Q;\n', '39 int A[1 << 17], B[1 << 17];\n', '40 long long S[1 << 17];\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   scanf(""%d%d"", &N, &Q);\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) scanf(""%d"", &A[i]);\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) scanf(""%d"", &B[i]);\n', '45   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {\n', '46     S[i + 1] = S[i] + B[i] - A[i];\n', '47   }\n', '48   DST<long long> MAX(vector<long long>(S, S + N + 1),\n', '49                      [](long long a, long long b) { return a < b ? b : a; });\n', '50   DST<long long> MIN(vector<long long>(S, S + N + 1),\n', '51                      [](long long a, long long b) { return a > b ? b : a; });\n', '52   for (; Q--;) {\n', '53     int l, r;\n', '54     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '55     l--;\n', '56     if (S[l] != S[r])\n', '57       puts(""-1"");\n', '58     else if (MIN.query(l, r + 1) < S[l])\n', '59       puts(""-1"");\n', '60     else\n', '61       printf(""%lld\\n"", MAX.query(l, r + 1) - S[l]);\n', '62   }\n', '63 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 struct DST {\n', '5   function<T(T, T)> calcfn;\n', '6   int n;\n', '7   vector<vector<T> > dat;\n', '8   DST(\n', '9       const vector<T>& v = {},\n', '10       function<T(T, T)> calcfn_ = [](T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; })\n', '11       : calcfn(calcfn_) {\n', '12     n = v.size();\n', '13     dat.push_back(v);\n', '14     for (int i = 2; i < n; i <<= 1) {\n', '15       dat.push_back(vector<T>(n));\n', '16       for (int j = i; j < n; j += i << 1) {\n', '17         dat.back()[j - 1] = dat[0][j - 1];\n', '18         for (int k = 2; k <= i; k++) {\n', '19           dat.back()[j - k] = calcfn(dat[0][j - k], dat.back()[j - k + 1]);\n', '20         }\n', '21         dat.back()[j] = dat[0][j];\n', '22         for (int k = 2; k <= i && j + k <= n; k++) {\n', '23           dat.back()[j + k - 1] =\n', '24               calcfn(dat.back()[j + k - 2], dat[0][j + k - 1]);\n', '25         }\n', '26       }\n', '27     }\n', '28   }\n', '29   T query(int l, int r) const {\n', '30     if (l < 0) l = 0;\n', '31     if (r > n) r = n;\n', '32     r--;\n', '33     if (l == r) return dat[0][l];\n', '34     int k = 31 - __builtin_clz(l ^ r);\n', '35     return calcfn(dat[k][l], dat[k][r]);\n', '36   }\n', '37 };\n', '38 int N, Q;\n', '39 int A[1 << 17], B[1 << 17];\n', '40 long long S[1 << 17];\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   scanf(""%d%d"", &N, &Q);\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) scanf(""%d"", &A[i]);\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) scanf(""%d"", &B[i]);\n', '45   for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {\n', '46     S[i + 1] = S[i] + B[i] - A[i];\n', '47   }\n', '48   DST<long long> MAX(vector<long long>(S, S + N + 1),\n', '49                      [](long long a, long long b) { return a < b ? b : a; });\n', '50   DST<long long> MIN(vector<long long>(S, S + N + 1),\n', '51                      [](long long a, long long b) { return a > b ? b : a; });\n', '52   for (; Q--;) {\n', '53     int l, r;\n', '54     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '55     l--;\n', '56     if (S[l] != S[r])\n', '57       puts(""-1"");\n', '58     else if (MIN.query(l, r + 1) < S[l])\n', '59       puts(""-1"");\n', '60     else\n', '61       printf(""%d\\n"", MAX.query(l, r + 1) - S[l]);\n', '62   }\n', '63 }\n']"	"61       printf(""%lld\n"", MAX.query(l, r + 1) - S[l]);
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 1e6 + 5;\n', '4 const long long inf = 1e17 + 5;\n', '5 struct SegmentTree {\n', '6   int l, r;\n', '7   long long minPref, maxPref, maxDiff;\n', '8   SegmentTree *L, *R;\n', '9   SegmentTree() : L(nullptr), R(nullptr), minPref(inf), maxPref(0) {}\n', '10   SegmentTree(int l, int r) : SegmentTree() {\n', '11     this->l = l;\n', '12     this->r = r;\n', '13   }\n', '14   void recalc() {\n', '15     minPref = min(L->minPref, R->minPref);\n', '16     maxPref = max(L->maxPref, R->maxPref);\n', '17     maxDiff = max(L->maxDiff, R->maxDiff);\n', '18   }\n', '19   void build(long long *pref, long long *a, long long *b) {\n', '20     if (l == r) {\n', '21       minPref = maxPref = pref[l];\n', '22       maxDiff = llabs(a[l] - b[l]);\n', '23       return;\n', '24     }\n', '25     L = new SegmentTree(l, (l + r) / 2);\n', '26     R = new SegmentTree((l + r) / 2 + 1, r);\n', '27     L->build(pref, a, b);\n', '28     R->build(pref, a, b);\n', '29     recalc();\n', '30   }\n', '31   long long queryMinPref(int ql, int qr) {\n', '32     if (l >= ql && r <= qr) return minPref;\n', '33     if (r < ql || l > qr) return inf;\n', '34     return min(L->queryMinPref(ql, qr), R->queryMinPref(ql, qr));\n', '35   }\n', '36   long long queryMaxPref(int ql, int qr) {\n', '37     if (l >= ql && r <= qr) return maxPref;\n', '38     if (r < ql || l > qr) return -inf;\n', '39     return max(L->queryMaxPref(ql, qr), R->queryMaxPref(ql, qr));\n', '40   }\n', '41   long long queryMaxDiff(int ql, int qr) {\n', '42     if (l >= ql && r <= qr) return maxDiff;\n', '43     if (r < ql || l > qr) return 0;\n', '44     return max(L->queryMaxDiff(ql, qr), R->queryMaxDiff(ql, qr));\n', '45   }\n', '46 };\n', '47 int n;\n', '48 long long a[MAXN], b[MAXN];\n', '49 long long pref[MAXN];\n', '50 SegmentTree *T = nullptr;\n', '51 void init() {\n', '52   long long sum = 0;\n', '53   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '54     sum += b[i] - a[i];\n', '55     pref[i] = sum;\n', '56   }\n', '57   T = new SegmentTree(0, n - 1);\n', '58   T->build(pref, a, b);\n', '59 }\n', '60 long long getMinPref(int l, int r) { return T->queryMinPref(l, r); }\n', '61 long long getMaxPref(int l, int r) { return T->queryMaxPref(l, r); }\n', '62 void doQuery() {\n', '63   int l, r;\n', '64   cin >> l >> r;\n', '65   l--;\n', '66   r--;\n', '67   long long toSub = ((l == 0) ? 0 : pref[l - 1]);\n', '68   long long minVal = getMinPref(l, r) - toSub;\n', '69   if (pref[r] != toSub) {\n', '70     cout << ""-1"" << \'\\n\';\n', '71     return;\n', '72   }\n', '73   if (minVal < 0)\n', '74     cout << ""-1"" << \'\\n\';\n', '75   else\n', ""76     cout << llabs(getMaxPref(l, r) - toSub) << '\\n';\n"", '77 }\n', '78 int main() {\n', '79   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '80   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '81   int Q;\n', '82   cin >> n >> Q;\n', '83   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '84   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> b[i];\n', '85   init();\n', '86   while (Q--) doQuery();\n', '87 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 1e6 + 5;\n', '4 const long long inf = 1e17 + 5;\n', '5 struct SegmentTree {\n', '6   int l, r;\n', '7   long long minPref, maxPref, maxDiff;\n', '8   SegmentTree *L, *R;\n', '9   SegmentTree() : L(nullptr), R(nullptr), minPref(inf), maxPref(0) {}\n', '10   SegmentTree(int l, int r) : SegmentTree() {\n', '11     this->l = l;\n', '12     this->r = r;\n', '13   }\n', '14   void recalc() {\n', '15     minPref = min(L->minPref, R->minPref);\n', '16     maxPref = max(L->maxPref, R->maxPref);\n', '17     maxDiff = max(L->maxDiff, R->maxDiff);\n', '18   }\n', '19   void build(long long *pref, long long *a, long long *b) {\n', '20     if (l == r) {\n', '21       minPref = maxPref = pref[l];\n', '22       maxDiff = llabs(a[l] - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long read() {\n', '4   long long a = 0;\n', '5   long long d = 1;\n', '6   char c;\n', ""7   while (c = getchar(), c < '0' || c > '9')\n"", ""8     if (c == '-') d = -1;\n"", '9   a = a * 10 + c - 48;\n', ""10   while (c = getchar(), c >= '0' && c <= '9') a = a * 10 + c - 48;\n"", '11   a *= d;\n', '12   return a;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long n, m;\n', '15 long long st[105000][50];\n', '16 long long stt[105000][50];\n', '17 long long a[105000];\n', '18 long long lg[105000] = {-1};\n', '19 void init() {\n', '20   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '21     st[i][0] = a[i];\n', '22     stt[i][0] = a[i];\n', '23     lg[i] = lg[i >> 1] + 1;\n', '24   }\n', '25   for (long long i = 1; i <= lg[n]; i++)\n', '26     for (long long j = 1; j + (1 << i) - 1 <= n; j++)\n', '27       st[j][i] = max(st[j][i - 1], st[j + (1 << (i - 1))][i - 1]),\n', '28       stt[j][i] = min(stt[j][i - 1], stt[j + (1 << (i - 1))][i - 1]);\n', '29 }\n', '30 long long query(long long l, long long r) {\n', '31   long long lglen = lg[r - l + 1];\n', '32   return max(st[l][lglen], st[r - (1 << lglen) + 1][lglen]);\n', '33 }\n', '34 long long queryy(long long l, long long r) {\n', '35   long long lglen = lg[r - l + 1];\n', '36   return min(stt[l][lglen], stt[r - (1 << lglen) + 1][lglen]);\n', '37 }\n', '38 signed main() {\n', '39   n = read();\n', '40   m = read();\n', '41   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 100005;\n', '4 const int M = 20;\n', '5 int n, q, m, a[N], bin[M];\n', '6 class data {\n', '7  public:\n', '8   long long mx, lef, rig;\n', '9   data() { mx = lef = rig = 0; }\n', '10 } f[N][M];\n', '11 void merge(data &ans, data x, data y) {\n', '12   if (x.lef >= y.rig) {\n', '13     ans.lef = x.lef + y.lef - y.rig;\n', '14     ans.rig = x.rig;\n', '15     ans.mx = max(x.mx, y.mx + x.lef - y.rig);\n', '16   } else {\n', '17     ans.lef = y.lef;\n', '18     ans.rig = x.rig + y.rig - x.lef;\n', '19     ans.mx = max(x.mx + y.rig - x.lef, y.mx);\n', '20   }\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &q);\n', '24   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &a[i]);\n', '25   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '26     int x;\n', '27     scanf(""%d"", &x);\n', '28     a[i] = x - a[i];\n', '29   }\n', '30   m = 0;\n', '31   while (1 << (m + 1) <= n) m++;\n', '32   bin[0] = 1;\n', '33   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) bin[i] = bin[i - 1] * 2;\n', '34   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '35     f[i][0].mx = abs(a[i]);\n', '36     if (a[i] > 0)\n', '37       f[i][0].lef = a[i];\n', '38     else\n', '39       f[i][0].rig = -a[i];\n', '40   }\n', '41   for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)\n', '42     for (int i = 1; i + bin[j] - 1 <= n; i++) {\n', '43       merge(f[i][j], f[i][j - 1], f[i + bin[j - 1]][j - 1]);\n', '44     }\n', '45   while (q--) {\n', '46     int l, r;\n', '47     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '48     data ans;\n', '49     for (int i = m; i >= 0; i--)\n', '50       if (l + bin[i] - 1 <= r) {\n', '51         merge(ans, ans, f[l][i]);\n', '52         l += bin[i];\n', '53       }\n', '54     if (!ans.lef && !ans.rig)\n', '55       printf(""%lld\\n"", ans.mx);\n', '56     else\n', '57       puts(""-1"");\n', '58   }\n', '59   return 0;\n', '60 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 100005;\n', '4 const int M = 20;\n', '5 int n, q, m, a[N], bin[M];\n', '6 class data {\n', '7  public:\n', '8   long long mx, lef, rig;\n', '9   data() { mx = lef = rig = 0; }\n', '10 } f[N][M];\n', '11 void merge(data &ans, data x, data y) {\n', '12   if (x.lef >= y.rig) {\n', '13     ans.lef = x.lef + y.lef - y.rig;\n', '14     ans.rig = x.rig;\n', '15     ans.mx = max(x.mx, y.mx + x.lef - y.rig);\n', '16   } else {\n', '17     ans.lef = y.lef;\n', '18     ans.rig = x.rig + y.rig - x.lef;\n', '19     ans.mx = max(x.mx + y.rig - x.lef, y.mx);\n', '20   }\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &q);\n', '24   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) bin[i] = bin[i - 1] * 2;\n', '34   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '35     f[i][0].mx = abs(a[i]);\n', '36     if (a[i] > 0)\n', '37       f[i][0].lef = a[i];\n', '38     else\n', '39       f[i][0].rig = -a[i];\n', '40   }\n', '41   for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)\n', '42     for (int i = 1; i + bin[j] - 1 <= n; i++) {\n', '43       merge(f[i][j], f[i][j - 1], f[i + bin[j - 1]][j - 1]);\n', '44     }\n', '45   while (q--) {\n', '46     int l, r;\n', '47     scanf(""%d%d"", &l, &r);\n', '48     data ans;\n', '49     for (int i = m; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '4 struct node {\n', '5   long long sum;\n', '6   long long maxPref;\n', '7   long long minPref;\n', '8   long long maxSuff;\n', '9   long long minSuff;\n', '10   long long maxSum;\n', '11   long long minSum;\n', '12   node() { sum = maxPref = maxSuff = minPref = minSuff = minSum = maxSum = 0; }\n', '13   node(int x) {\n', '14     sum = x;\n', '15     maxPref = max(0, x);\n', '16     maxSuff = max(0, x);\n', '17     maxSum = max(0, x);\n', '18     minPref = min(0, x);\n', '19     minSuff = min(0, x);\n', '20     minSum = min(0, x);\n', '21   }\n', '22 };\n', '23 node lacz(node a, node b) {\n', '24   node c;\n', '25   c.sum = a.sum + b.sum;\n', '26   c.maxPref = max(a.maxPref, a.sum + b.maxPref);\n', '27   c.maxSuff = max(b.maxSuff, b.sum + a.maxSuff);\n', '28   c.maxSum =\n', '29       max({a.maxSum, b.maxSum, a.maxSuff + b.maxPref, c.maxPref, c.maxSuff});\n', '30   c.minPref = min(a.minPref, a.sum + b.minPref);\n', '31   c.minSuff = min(b.minSuff, b.sum + a.minSuff);\n', '32   c.minSum =\n', '33       min({a.minSum, b.minSum, a.minSuff + b.minPref, c.minSuff, c.minPref});\n', '34   return c;\n', '35 }\n', '36 vector<node> tree;\n', '37 node query(int p, int q, int pocz, int kon, int ind) {\n', '38   if (p == pocz && q == kon) return tree[ind];\n', '39   int sr = (pocz + kon) / 2;\n', '40   if (q <= sr)\n', '41     return query(p, q, pocz, sr, 2 * ind);\n', '42   else if (p > sr)\n', '43     return query(p, q, sr + 1, kon, 2 * ind + 1);\n', '44   else {\n', '45     return lacz(query(p, sr, pocz, sr, 2 * ind),\n', '46                 query(sr + 1, q, sr + 1, kon, 2 * ind + 1));\n', '47   }\n', '48 }\n', '49 int P;\n', '50 void solve() {\n', '51   int n, q;\n', '52   cin >> n >> q;\n', '53   vector<int> a(n), b(n);\n', '54   for (int i = (0); i < (n); ++i) {\n', '55     cin >> a[i];\n', '56   }\n', '57   for (int i = (0); i < (n); ++i) {\n', '58     cin >> b[i];\n', '59   }\n', '60   P = 1;\n', '61   while (P < n) {\n', '62     P <<= 1;\n', '63   }\n', '64   tree.resize(2 * P);\n', '65   for (int i = (0); i < (n); ++i) {\n', '66     tree[P + i] = node(a[i] - b[i]);\n', '67   }\n', '68   for (int i = ((int)(P)) - 1; i >= (1); --i) {\n', '69     tree[i] = lacz(tree[2 * i], tree[2 * i + 1]);\n', '70   }\n', '71   for (int i = (0); i < (q); ++i) {\n', '72     int l, r;\n', '73     cin >> l >> r;\n', '74     node res = query(l, r, 1, P, 1);\n', '75     if (res.sum != 0 || res.maxPref > 0 || res.minSuff < 0) {\n', '76       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '77     } else {\n', '78       cout << max(res.maxSum, -res.minSum) << endl;\n', '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81 }\n', '82 int main() {\n', '83   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '84   cin.tie(0);\n', '85   int t;\n', '86   t = 1;\n', '87   while (t--) {\n', '88     solve();\n', '89   }\n', '90 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '4 struct node {\n', '5   long long sum;\n', '6   long long maxPref;\n', '7   long long minPref;\n', '8   long long maxSuff;\n', '9   long long minSuff;\n', '10   long long maxSum;\n', '11   long long minSum;\n', '12   node() { sum = maxPref = maxSuff = minPref = minSuff = minSum = maxSum = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 inline int read() {\n', '4   int res = 0, f = 1;\n', '5   char ch;\n', ""6   while (ch = getchar(), ch < '0' || ch > '9')\n"", ""7     if (ch == '-') f = -1;\n"", ""8   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') res = res * 10 + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '9   return res * f;\n', '10 }\n', '11 const int N = 14, M = 4782969, P = 1e9 + 7;\n', '12 inline int qpow(int a, int b) {\n', '13   int ans = 1, base = a;\n', '14   while (b) {\n', '15     if (b & 1) ans = 1ll * ans * base % P;\n', '16     base = 1ll * base * base % P;\n', '17     b >>= 1;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ans;\n', '20 }\n', '21 int rev[1 << N], cnt[1 << N], n, A, a[N];\n', '22 int F[1 << N], G[1 << N], v[N][1 << N];\n', '23 inline int get(int S, int T) {\n', '24   if (!S) return 1;\n', '25   if (G[S]) return G[S];\n', '26   return G[S] = 1ll * get(S & (S - 1), T) * v[rev[S & -S]][T] % P;\n', '27 }\n', '28 int main() {\n', '29   n = read(), A = (1 << n) - 1;\n', '30   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) a[i] = read(), rev[1 << i] = i;\n', '31   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '32     v[i][0] = 1;\n', '33     for (int S = 1; S < (1 << n); ++S)\n', '34       v[i][S] = 1ll * v[i][S & (S - 1)] * a[i] % P *\n', '35                 qpow((a[rev[S & -S]] + a[i]) % P, P - 2) % P;\n', '36   }\n', '37   for (int S = 1;
