"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 namespace IO {\n', '4 char in[1 << 24];\n', '5 char const *o;\n', '6 void init_in() {\n', '7   o = in;\n', '8   in[fread(in, 1, sizeof(in) - 4, stdin)] = 0;\n', '9 }\n', '10 int rd() {\n', '11   unsigned u = 0, s = 0;\n', '12   while (*o && *o <= 32) ++o;\n', ""13   if (*o == '-')\n"", '14     s = ~s, ++o;\n', ""15   else if (*o == '+')\n"", '16     ++o;\n', ""17   while (*o >= '0' && *o <= '9') u = (u << 3) + (u << 1) + (*o++ - '0');\n"", '18   return static_cast<int>((u ^ s) + !!s);\n', '19 }\n', '20 char *rdstr(char *s) {\n', '21   while (*o && *o <= 32) ++o;\n', '22   while (*o > 32) *s++ = *o++;\n', '23   return s;\n', '24 }\n', '25 }  // namespace IO\n', '26 template <typename T>\n', '27 void chkmax(T &a, const T &b) {\n', '28   a = max(a, b);\n', '29 }\n', '30 template <typename T>\n', '31 void chkmin(T &a, const T &b) {\n', '32   a = min(a, b);\n', '33 }\n', '34 pair<int, int> operator+(const pair<int, int> &a, const pair<int, int> &b) {\n', '35   return make_pair(a.first + b.first, a.second + b.second);\n', '36 }\n', '37 using IO::rd;\n', '38 const int N = 14, S = 1 << N;\n', '39 int a[N];\n', '40 int n;\n', '41 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '42 long long b[N][N];\n', '43 long long h[N][S], pr[S];\n', '44 inline void reduce(long long &x) {\n', '45   if (x >= mod) x -= mod;\n', '46 }\n', '47 inline long long g(int s, int t) {\n', '48   long long ret = 1;\n', '49   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '50     if (s & (1 << i)) ret = ret * h[i][t] % mod;\n', '51   }\n', '52   return ret;\n', '53 }\n', '54 int Q_pow(long long x, int y) {\n', '55   long long ret = 1;\n', '56   while (y) {\n', '57     if (y & 1) ret = ret * x % mod;\n', '58     x = x * x % mod;\n', '59     y >>= 1;\n', '60   }\n', '61   return ret;\n', '62 }\n', '63 inline int inv(int x) { return Q_pow(x, mod - 2); }\n', '64 void solve() {\n', '65   n = rd();\n', '66   int m = 1 << n;\n', '67   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) a[i] = rd();\n', '68   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '69     for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j) {\n', '70       long long x = inv(a[i] + a[j]);\n', '71       b[i][j] = a[i] * x % mod;\n', '72       b[j][i] = a[j] * x % mod;\n', '73     }\n', '74   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '75     for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j) {\n', '76       h[i][j] = 1;\n', '77       for (int k = 0; k < n; ++k) {\n', '78         if (k != i && j & (1 << k)) h[i][j] = h[i][j] * b[i][k] % mod;\n', '79       }\n', '80     }\n', '81   int mask = m - 1;\n', '82   for (int i = 1; i < m; ++i) {\n', '83     pr[i] = 1;\n', '84     for (int j = (i - 1) & i; j; j = (j - 1) & i) {\n', '85       reduce(pr[i] += mod - (g(j, i ^ j) * pr[j] % mod));\n', '86     }\n', '87   }\n', '88   long long ans = 0;\n', '89   for (int i = 1; i < m; ++i) {\n', '90     ans += pr[i] * g(i, mask ^ i) % mod * __builtin_popcount(i) % mod;\n', '91   }\n', ""92   cout << ans % mod << '\\n';\n"", '93 }\n', '94 int main() {\n', '95   IO::init_in();\n', '96   solve();\n', '97   return 0;\n', '98 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 namespace IO {\n', '4 char in[1 << 24];\n', '5 char const *o;\n', '6 void init_in() {\n', '7   o = in;\n', '8   in[fread(in, 1, sizeof(in) - 4, stdin)] = 0;\n', '9 }\n', '10 int rd() {\n', '11   unsigned u = 0, s = 0;\n', '12   while (*o && *o <= 32) ++o;\n', ""13   if (*o == '-')\n"", '14     s = ~s, ++o;\n', ""15   else if (*o == '+')\n"", '16     ++o;\n', ""17   while (*o >= '0' && *o <= '9') u = (u << 3) + (u << 1) + (*o++ - '0');\n"", '18   return static_cast<int>((u ^ s) + !!s);\n', '19 }\n', '20 char *rdstr(char *s) {\n', '21   while (*o && *o <= 32) ++o;\n', '22   while (*o > 32) *s++ = *o++;\n', '23   return s;\n', '24 }\n', '25 }  // namespace IO\n', '26 template <typename T>\n', '27 void chkmax(T &a, const T &b) {\n', '28   a = max(a, b);\n', '29 }\n', '30 template <typename T>\n', '31 void chkmin(T &a, const T &b) {\n', '32   a = min(a, b);\n', '33 }\n', '34 pair<int, int> operator+(const pair<int, int> &a, const pair<int, int> &b) {\n', '35   return make_pair(a.first + b.first, a.second + b.second);\n', '36 }\n', '37 using IO::rd;\n', '38 const int N = 14, S = 1 << N;\n', '39 int a[N];\n', '40 int n;\n', '41 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '42 long long b[N][N];\n', '43 long long h[N][S], pr[N];\n', '44 inline void reduce(long long &x) {\n', '45   if (x >= mod) x -= mod;\n', '46 }\n', '47 inline long long g(int s, int t) {\n', '48   long long ret = 1;\n', '49   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '50     if (s & (1 << i)) ret = ret * h[i][t] % mod;\n', '51   }\n', '52   return ret;\n', '53 }\n', '54 int Q_pow(long long x, int y) {\n', '55   long long ret = 1;\n', '56   while (y) {\n', '57     if (y & 1) ret = ret * x % mod;\n', '58     x = x * x % mod;\n', '59     y >>= 1;\n', '60   }\n', '61   return ret;\n', '62 }\n', '63 inline int inv(int x) { return Q_pow(x, mod - 2); i < m; ++i) {\n', '90     ans += pr[i] * g(i, mask ^ i) % mod * __builtin_popcount(i) % mod;\n', '91   }\n', ""92   cout << ans % mod << '\\n';\n"", '93 }\n', '94 int main() {\n', '95   IO::init_in();\n', '96   solve();\n', '97   return 0;\n', '98 }\n']"	"43 long long h[N][S], pr[S];

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 1e5 + 10;\n', '4 const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 long long a[20], dp[20010], prob[20][20], n;\n', '6 long long pw(long long a, long long n) {\n', '7   long long base = a, res = 1;\n', '8   while (n) {\n', '9     if (n & 1) res = res * base % MOD;\n', '10     base = base * base % MOD;\n', '11     n >>= 1;\n', '12   }\n', '13   return res;\n', '14 }\n', '15 long long inv(long long a) { return pw(a, MOD - 2); }\n', '16 long long get_dp(int x) {\n', '17   if (dp[x] >= 0) return dp[x];\n', '18   vector<int> b;\n', '19   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '20     if ((1 << i) & x) b.push_back(i);\n', '21   }\n', '22   long long res = 1;\n', '23   int m = b.size();\n', '24   if (m == 1) {\n', '25     dp[x] = 1;\n', '26     return dp[x];\n', '27   }\n', '28   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << m) - 1; i++) {\n', '29     int y = 0;\n', '30     for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '31       if (i & (1 << j)) y |= (1 << b[j]);\n', '32     }\n', '33     long long t = get_dp(y);\n', '34     for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '35       for (int k = 0; k < m; k++) {\n', '36         if (((1 << j) & i) == 0 && ((1 << k) & i) != 0)\n', '37           t = t * prob[b[j]][b[k]] % MOD;\n', '38       }\n', '39     }\n', '40     res = res - t % MOD;\n', '41     res = (res + MOD) % MOD;\n', '42   }\n', '43   dp[x] = res;\n', '44   return res;\n', '45 }\n', '46 int main() {\n', '47   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '48   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '49   cin >> n;\n', '50   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '51   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '52     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '53       if (i == j)\n', '54         prob[i][j] = 1;\n', '55       else {\n', '56         prob[i][j] = a[i] * inv(a[i] + a[j]) % MOD;\n', '57       }\n', '58     }\n', '59   }\n', '60   memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp));\n', '61   dp[0] = 1;\n', '62   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n); i++) {\n', '63     get_dp(i);\n', '64   }\n', '65   long long ans = n;\n', '66   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n) - 1; i++) {\n', '67     long long cnt = 0;\n', '68     for (int j = 0; j < n; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MOD = (long long)1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const int SIZE = 1000002;\n', '5 const long long INF = 1LL << 30;\n', '6 const double eps = 1e-4;\n', '7 const double PI = 3.1415926535897932;\n', '8 struct ModInt {\n', '9   unsigned x;\n', '10   ModInt() : x(0) {}\n', '11   ModInt(signed sig) : x(sig % MOD) {}\n', '12   ModInt(signed long long sig) : x(sig % MOD) {}\n', '13   int get() const { return (int)x; }\n', '14   ModInt pow(long long p) {\n', '15     ModInt res = 1, a = *this;\n', '16     while (p) {\n', '17       if (p & 1) res *= a;\n', '18       a *= a;\n', '19       p >>= 1;\n', '20     }\n', '21     return res;\n', '22   }\n', '23   ModInt &operator+=(ModInt that) {\n', '24     if ((x += that.x) >= MOD) x -= MOD;\n', '25     return *this;\n', '26   }\n', '27   ModInt &operator-=(ModInt that) {\n', '28     if ((x += MOD - that.x) >= MOD) x -= MOD;\n', '29     return *this;\n', '30   }\n', '31   ModInt &operator*=(ModInt that) {\n', '32     x = (unsigned long long)x * that.x % MOD;\n', '33     return *this;\n', '34   }\n', '35   ModInt &operator/=(ModInt that) { return (*this) *= that.pow(MOD - 2); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int P = 1e9 + 7, N = 17, M = 16389, O = 131;\n', '4 int qp(int a, int b) {\n', '5   int r = 1;\n', '6   for (; b; b >>= 1, a = a * 1ll * a % P)\n', '7     if (b & 1) r = r * 1ll * a % P;\n', '8   return r;\n', '9 }\n', '10 int a[N], e[N][N], p[M], n, ll[O][O], lr[O][O], rl[O][O], rr[O][O];\n', '11 int g(int x, int y) {\n', '12   int i, j, s = 1;\n', '13   for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '14     if (x >> i & 1)\n', '15       for (j = 0; j < n; ++j)\n', '16         if (y >> j & 1) s = s * 1ll * e[i][j] % P;\n', '17   return s;\n', '18 }\n', '19 int h(int x, int y) {\n', '20   return ll[x & 127][y & 127] * 1ll * lr[x & 127][y >> 7] % P *\n', '21          rl[x >> 7][y & 127] % P * rr[x >> 7][y >> 7] % P;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   int m, i, j, w = 0;\n', '25   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '26   for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) scanf(""%d"", a + i);\n', '27   for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '28     for (j = 0; j < n; ++j) e[i][j] = a[i] * 1ll * qp(a[i] + a[j], P - 2) % P;\n', '29   for (i = 0; i < O; ++i)\n', '30     for (j = 0; j < O; ++j) ll[i][j] = lr[i][j] = rl[i][j] = rr[i][j] = 1;\n', '31   for (i = 0, m = 1 << min(n, 7); i < m; ++i)\n', '32     for (j = 0; j < m; ++j)\n', '33       if (!(i & j)) ll[i][j] = g(i, j);\n', '34   if (n > 7) {\n', '35     for (i = 0, m = 1 << n - 7; b; b >>= 1, a = a * 1ll * a % P)\n', '7     if (b & 1) r = r * 1ll * a % P;\n', '8   return r;\n', '9 }\n', '10 int a[N], e[N][N], p[N], n, ll[O][O], lr[O][O], rl[O][O], rr[O][O];\n', '11 int g(int x, int y) {\n', '12   int i, j, s = 1;\n', '13   for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '14     if (x >> i & 1)\n', '15       for (j = 0; j < n; ++j)\n', '16         if (y >> j & 1) s = s * 1ll * e[i][j] % P;\n', '17   return s;\n', '18 }\n', '19 int h(int x, int y) {\n', '20   return ll[x & 127][y & 127] * 1ll * lr[x & 127][y >> 7] % P *\n', '21          rl[x >> 7][y & 127] % P * rr[x >> 7][y >> 7] % P;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   int m, i, j, w = 0;\n', '25   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '26   for (i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC target( \\\n', '5     ""sse,sse2,sse3,ssse3,sse4,popcnt,abm,mmx,avx,avx2,tune=native"")\n', '6 using namespace std;\n', '7 const long long N = 15;\n', '8 const long long M = 2e6 + 5;\n', '9 const long long SZ = 550;\n', '10 const double eps = 1e-9;\n', '11 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '12 const long long inf = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '13 long long read() {\n', '14   long long x = 0, f = 1;\n', '15   char ch = getchar();\n', ""16   while (ch > '9' || ch < '0') {\n"", ""17     if (ch == '-') f = -1;\n"", '18     ch = getchar();\n', '19   }\n', ""20   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') {\n"", ""21     x = x * 10 + ch - '0';\n"", '22     ch = getchar();\n', '23   }\n', '24   return x * f;\n', '25 }\n', '26 void wt(long long x) {\n', '27   if (x < 0) {\n', ""28     putchar('-');\n"", '29     x = -x;\n', '30   }\n', '31   if (x >= 10) wt(x / 10), putchar(10);\n', ""32   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '33 }\n', '34 long long ksm(long long x, long long y = mod - 2, long long z = mod) {\n', '35   long long ret = 1;\n', '36   while (y) {\n', '37     if (y & 1) ret = (ret * x) % z;\n', '38     x = (x * x) % z;\n', '39     y >>= 1;\n', '40   }\n', '41   return ret;\n', '42 }\n', '43 long long inv[M], fac[M], ifc[M];\n', '44 void Init(long long n) {\n', '45   inv[1] = 1;\n', '46   for (long long i = 2; i <= n; i++)\n', '47     inv[i] = 1ll * inv[mod % i] * (mod - mod / i) % mod;\n', '48   fac[0] = 1;\n', '49   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) fac[i] = 1ll * fac[i - 1] * i % mod;\n', '50   ifc[0] = 1;\n', '51   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) ifc[i] = 1ll * ifc[i - 1] * inv[i] % mod;\n', '52 }\n', '53 long long C(long long n, long long m) {\n', '54   if (m < 0 || m > n) return 0;\n', '55   return 1ll * fac[n] * ifc[m] % mod * ifc[n - m] % mod;\n', '56 }\n', '57 long long n, ans;\n', '58 long long a[N], g[N][N];\n', '59 long long f[1 << 14];\n', '60 vector<long long> v1, v2;\n', '61 signed main() {\n', '62   Init(M - 1);\n', '63   n = read();\n', '64   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) a[i] = read();\n', '65   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++)\n', '66     for (long long j = 0; j < n; j++) g[i][j] = a[i] * inv[a[i] + a[j]] % mod;\n', '67   for (long long S = 1; S < (1 << n); S++) {\n', '68     f[S] = 1;\n', '69     for (long long T = (S - 1) & S; T; T = (T - 1) & S) {\n', '70       long long X = S - T;\n', '71       v1.clear();\n', '72       v2.clear();\n', '73       for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '74         if (T >> i & 1) v1.push_back(i);\n', '75         if (X >> i & 1) v2.push_back(i);\n', '76       }\n', '77       long long P = 1;\n', '78       for (long long i : v1)\n', '79         for (long long j : v2) P = P * g[i][j] % mod;\n', '80       f[S] = (f[S] - P * f[T] % mod + mod) % mod;\n', '81     }\n', '82   }\n', '83   for (long long S = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long power[15];\n', '4 long long prob[15][15];\n', '5 long long py[1 << 15][15];\n', '6 long long dp[1 << 15];\n', '7 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '8 long long ksm(long long a, long long b) {\n', '9   long long ans = 1;\n', '10   while (b) {\n', '11     if (b & 1) ans = ans * a % mod;\n', '12     a = a * a % mod;\n', '13     b >>= 1;\n', '14   }\n', '15   return ans;\n', '16 }\n', '17 int main() {\n', '18   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '19   cin.tie(0);\n', '20   cout.tie(0);\n', '21   int n;\n', '22   cin >> n;\n', '23   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long exp(long long x, long long y) {\n', '4   long long MOD = 1000000007;\n', '5   if (y == 1) {\n', '6     return x;\n', '7   }\n', '8   long long z = exp(x, y / 2);\n', '9   z = (z * z) % MOD;\n', '10   if (y % 2 == 1) {\n', '11     z = (z * x) % MOD;\n', '12   }\n', '13   return z;\n', '14 }\n', '15 long long inv(long long x) { return exp(x, 1000000005); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1000000007ll;\n', '4 const int N = 14;\n', '5 long long power(long long a, long long x) {\n', '6   long long ans = 1;\n', '7   while (x) {\n', '8     if (x & 1) ans = ans * a % mod;\n', '9     a = a * a % mod;\n', '10     x >>= 1;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return ans;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long inv(long long x) { return power(x, mod - 2); }\n', '15 long long h[N + 5][1 << N];\n', '16 long long p[N + 5][N + 5];\n', '17 long long a[N + 5], f[1 << N];\n', '18 long long g[1 << N];\n', '19 int cal(int x) {\n', '20   int ans = 0;\n', '21   while (x) {\n', '22     ans += x & 1;\n', '23     x >>= 1;\n', '24   }\n', '25   return ans;\n', '26 }\n', '27 int main() {\n', '28   int n;\n', '29   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '30   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%lld"", &a[i]);\n', '31   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '32     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) p[i][j] = a[i] * inv(a[i] + a[j]) % mod;\n', '33   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '34     for (int j = 0; j < (1 << n); j++) {\n', '35       if (j & (1 << (i - 1))) continue;\n', '36       h[i][j] = 1;\n', '37       for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '38         if (j & (1 << (k - 1))) h[i][j] = h[i][j] * p[i][k] % mod;\n', '39     }\n', '40   long long ans = 0;\n', '41   for (int i = 1; i < 1 << n; i++) {\n', '42     g[i] = 1;\n', '43     for (int j = i & (i - 1); j; j = (j - 1) & i) {\n', '44       for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '45         if ((i & (1 << (k - 1))) && !(j & (1 << (k - 1)))) {\n', '46           g[j] = g[j ^ (1 << (k - 1))] * h[k][((1 << n) - 1) ^ i] % mod;\n', '47           break;\n', '48         }\n', '49       f[i] = (f[i] + (mod - f[j]) * g[j] % mod) % mod;\n', '50     }\n', '51     for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '52       if ((i & (1 << (k - 1)))) {\n', '53         g[0] = g[(1 << (k - 1))] * h[k][((1 << n) - 1) ^ i] % mod;\n', '54         break;\n', '55       }\n', '56     f[i] = (f[i] + g[0]) % mod;\n', '57     ans = (ans + f[i] * cal(i) % mod) % mod;\n', '58   }\n', '59   printf(""%lld"", ans);\n', '60   return 0;\n', '61 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1000000007ll;\n', '4 const int N = 14;\n', '5 long long power(long long a, long long x) {\n', '6   long long ans = 1;\n', '7   while (x) {\n', '8     if (x & 1) ans = ans * a % mod;\n', '9     a = a * a % mod;\n', '10     x >>= 1;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return ans;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long inv(long long x) { return power(x, mod - 2); }\n', '15 long long h[N + 5][1 << N];\n', '16 long long p[N + 5][N + 5];\n', '17 long long a[N + 5], f[1 << N];\n', '18 long long g[N << 5];\n', '19 int cal(int x) {\n', '20   int ans = 0;\n', '21   while (x) {\n', '22     ans += x & 1;\n', '23     x >>= 1;\n', '24   }\n', '25   return ans;\n', '26 }\n', '27 int main() {\n', '28   int n;\n', '29   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '30   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%lld"", &a[i]);\n', '31   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '32     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) p[i][j] = a[i] * inv(a[i] + a[j]) % mod;\n', '33   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '34     for (int j = 0; j < (1 << n); j++) {\n', '35       if (j & (1 << (i - 1))) continue;\n', '36       h[i][j] = 1;\n', '37       for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '38         if (j & (1 << (k - 1))) h[i][j] = h[i][j] * p[i][k] % mod;\n', '39     }\n', '40   long long ans = 0;\n', '41   for (int i = 1; i < 1 << n; i++) {\n', '42     g[i] = 1;\n', '43     for (int j = i & (i - 1); j; j = (j - 1) & i) {\n', '44       for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '45         if ((i & (1 << (k - 1))) && !(j & (1 << (k - 1)))) {\n', '46           g[j] = g[j ^ (1 << (k - 1))] * h[k][((1 << n) - 1) ^ i] % mod;\n', '47           break;\n', '48         }\n', '49       f[i] = (f[i] + (mod - f[j]) * g[j] % mod) % mod;\n', '50     }\n', '51     for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)\n', '52       if ((i & (1 << (k - 1)))) {\n', '53         g[0] = g[(1 << (k - 1))] * h[k][((1 << n) - 1) ^ i] % mod;\n', '54         break;\n', '55       }\n', '56     f[i] = (f[i] + g[0]) % mod;\n', '57     ans = (ans + f[i] * cal(i) % mod) % mod;\n', '58   }\n', '59   printf(""%lld"", ans);\n', '60   return 0;\n', '61 }\n']"	"18 long long g[1 << N];
"
['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = static_cast<long long>(1e9 + 7);\n', '4 long long P, Q = 1;\n', '5 int n;\n', '6 long long a[15];\n', '7 pair<long long, long long> f[15][1 << 14];\n', '8 pair<long long, long long> g[5000000];\n', '9 pair<long long, long long> p[1 << 14];\n', '10 pair<long long, long long> h[1 << 14];\n', '11 int count(int x) {\n', '12   if (!x) return 0;\n', '13   return (x & 1) + count(x >> 1);\n', '14 }\n', '15 void Init_F() {\n', '16   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '17     for (int s = 0; s < (1 << n); ++s) {\n', '18       if ((1 << (i - 1)) & s) {\n', '19         continue;\n', '20       }\n', '21       f[i][s] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '22       for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '23         if ((1 << (j - 1)) & s) {\n', '24           f[i][s].first = f[i][s].first * a[i] % mod;\n', '25           f[i][s].second = f[i][s].second * (a[i] + a[j]) % mod;\n', '26         }\n', '27       }\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n', '31 int GetIndexBase3(int left, int right) {\n', '32   int idx = 0;\n', '33   for (int i = n; i > 0; --i) {\n', '34     idx *= 3;\n', '35     if (left & (1 << (i - 1))) {\n', '36       idx += 1;\n', '37     } else if (right & (1 << (i - 1))) {\n', '38       idx += 2;\n', '39     }\n', '40   }\n', '41   return idx;\n', '42 }\n', '43 void Recursively_Init_G(int left, int right, int cur) {\n', '44   if (cur > n) {\n', '45     int idx = GetIndexBase3(left, right);\n', '46     g[idx] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '47     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '48       if ((1 << (i - 1)) & left) {\n', '49         g[idx].first = g[idx].first * f[i][right].first % mod;\n', '50         g[idx].second = g[idx].second * f[i][right].second % mod;\n', '51       }\n', '52     }\n', '53   } else {\n', '54     Recursively_Init_G(left, right, cur + 1);\n', '55     Recursively_Init_G(left + (1 << (cur - 1)), right, cur + 1);\n', '56     Recursively_Init_G(left, right + (1 << (cur - 1)), cur + 1);\n', '57   }\n', '58 }\n', '59 void Init_P() {\n', '60   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n); ++i) {\n', '61     p[i] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '62     for (int j = 1; j < i; ++j) {\n', '63       if ((i | j) == i) {\n', '64         long long upper = p[j].first * g[GetIndexBase3(j, i - j)].first % mod;\n', '65         long long lower = p[j].second * g[GetIndexBase3(j, i - j)].second % mod;\n', '66         p[i].first =\n', '67             ((p[i].first * lower - upper * p[i].second) % mod + mod) % mod;\n', '68         p[i].second = p[i].second * lower % mod;\n', '69       }\n', '70     }\n', '71   }\n', '72 }\n', '73 void Solve() {\n', '74   Init_F();\n', '75   Recursively_Init_G(0, 0, 1);\n', '76   Init_P();\n', '77   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n); ++i) {\n', '78     int j = (1 << n) - 1 - i;\n', '79     long long upper =\n', '80         count(i) * p[i].first % mod * g[GetIndexBase3(i, j)].first % mod;\n', '81     long long lower = p[i].second * g[GetIndexBase3(i, j)].second % mod;\n', '82     P = (P * lower + Q * upper) % mod;\n', '83     Q = Q * lower % mod;\n', '84   }\n', '85 }\n', '86 long long Pow(long long x, long long y) {\n', '87   long long res = 1;\n', '88   while (y) {\n', '89     if (y & 1) {\n', '90       res = res * x % mod;\n', '91     }\n', '92     x = x * x % mod;\n', '93     y >>= 1;\n', '94   }\n', '95   return res;\n', '96 }\n', '97 int main() {\n', '98   cin >> n;\n', '99   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> a[i];\n', '100   Solve();\n', '101   cout << P * Pow(Q, mod - 2) % mod << endl;\n', '102   return 0;\n', '103 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = static_cast<long long>(1e9 + 7);\n', '4 long long P, Q = 1;\n', '5 int n;\n', '6 long long a[15];\n', '7 pair<long long, long long> f[15][1 << 14];\n', '8 pair<long long, long long> g[5000000];\n', '9 pair<long long, long long> p[1 << 14];\n', '10 pair<long long, long long> h[1 << 14];\n', '11 int count(int x) {\n', '12   if (!x) return 0;\n', '13   return (x & 1) + count(x >> 1);\n', '14 }\n', '15 void Init_F() {\n', '16   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '17     for (int s = 0; s < (1 << n); ++s) {\n', '18       if ((1 << (i - 1)) & s) {\n', '19         continue;\n', '20       }\n', '21       f[i][s] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '22       for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '23         if ((1 << (j - 1)) & s) {\n', '24           f[i][s].first = f[i][s].first * a[i] % mod;\n', '25           f[i][s].second = f[i][s].second * (a[i] + a[j]) % mod;\n', '26         }\n', '27       }\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30 }\n', '31 int GetIndexBase3(int left, int right) {\n', '32   int idx = 0;\n', '33   for (int i = n; i > 0; --i) {\n', '34     idx *= 3;\n', '35     if (left & (1 << (i - 1))) {\n', '36       idx += 1;\n', '37     } else if (right & (1 << (i - 1))) {\n', '38       idx += 2;\n', '39     }\n', '40   }\n', '41   return idx;\n', '42 }\n', '43 void Recursively_Init_G(int left, int right, int cur) {\n', '44   if (cur > n) {\n', '45     int idx = GetIndexBase3(left, right);\n', '46     g[idx] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '47     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '48       if ((1 << (i - 1)) & left) {\n', '49         g[idx].first = g[idx].first * f[i][right].first % mod;\n', '50         g[idx].second = g[idx].second * f[i][right].second % mod;\n', '51       }\n', '52     }\n', '53   } else {\n', '54     Recursively_Init_G(left, right, cur + 1);\n', '55     Recursively_Init_G(left + (1 << (cur - 1)), right, cur + 1);\n', '56     Recursively_Init_G(left, right + (1 << (cur - 1)), cur + 1);\n', '57   }\n', '58 }\n', '59 void Init_P() {\n', '60   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n); ++i) {\n', '61     p[i] = make_pair(1, 1);\n', '62     for (int j = 1; j < i; ++j) {\n', '63       if ((i | j) == i) {\n', '64         long long upper = p[j].first * g[GetIndexBase3(j, i - j)].first % mod;\n', '65         long long lower = p[j].second * g[GetIndexBase3(j, i - j)].second % mod;\n', '66         p[i].first =\n', '67             ((p[i].first * lower - upper * p[i].second) % mod + mod) % mod;\n', '68         p[i].second = p[i].second * lower % mod;\n', '69       }\n', '70     }\n', '71   }\n', '72 }\n', '73 void Solve() {\n', '74   Init_F();\n', '75   Recursively_Init_G(0, 0, 1);\n', '76   Init_P();\n', '77   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << n); ++i) {\n', '78     int j = (1 << n) - 1 - i;\n', '79     long long upper =\n', '80         count(i) * p[i].first * g[GetIndexBase3(i, j)].first % mod;\n', '81     long long lower = p[i].second * g[GetIndexBase3(i, j)].second % mod;\n', '82     P = (P * lower + Q * upper) % mod;\n', '83     Q = Q * lower % mod;\n', '84   }\n', '85 }\n', '86 long long Pow(long long x, long long y) {\n', '87   long long res = 1;\n', '88   while (y) {\n', '89     if (y & 1) {\n', '90       res = res * x % mod;\n', '91     }\n', '92     x = x * x % mod;\n', '93     y >>= 1;\n', '94   }\n', '95   return res;\n', '96 }\n', '97 int main() {\n', '98   cin >> n;\n', '99   for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> a[i];\n', '100   Solve();\n', '101   cout << P * Pow(Q, mod - 2) % mod << endl;\n', '102   return 0;\n', '103 }\n']	"80         count(i) * p[i].first % mod * g[GetIndexBase3(i, j)].first % mod;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 5e4 + 5, MAXM = 1e7;\n', '4 int n, m;\n', '5 long long a[MAXN], b[MAXN];\n', '6 int ans[MAXN];\n', '7 int cntp, rt, lc[MAXM], rc[MAXM], tag[MAXM];\n', '8 inline void add(int &k, int v) {\n', '9   if (!k) k = ++cntp;\n', '10   tag[k] = v;\n', '11 }\n', '12 inline void pushdwn(int k) {\n', '13   if (tag[k]) {\n', '14     add(lc[k], tag[k]);\n', '15     add(rc[k], tag[k]);\n', '16     tag[k] = 0;\n', '17   }\n', '18 }\n', '19 void Modify(int &k, long long l, long long r, long long x, long long y, int v) {\n', '20   if (!k) k = ++cntp;\n', '21   if (x <= l && r <= y) return add(k, v);\n', '22   pushdwn(k);\n', '23   long long mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '24   if (x <= mid) Modify(lc[k], l, mid, x, y, v);\n', '25   if (mid < y) Modify(rc[k], mid + 1, r, x, y, v);\n', '26   return;\n', '27 }\n', '28 int Query(int k, long long l, long long r, long long w) {\n', '29   if (tag[k]) return k;\n', '30   long long mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '31   if (w <= mid) return Query(lc[k], l, mid, w);\n', '32   return Query(rc[k], mid + 1, r, w);\n', '33 }\n', '34 int pre[MAXM];\n', '35 int fnd(int x) {\n', '36   if (x != pre[x]) pre[x] = fnd(pre[x]);\n', '37   return pre[x];\n', '38 }\n', '39 vector<pair<int, int> > vec[MAXN];\n', '40 void Dfs2(int k, int p) {\n', '41   if (tag[k] && tag[p]) {\n', '42     vec[min(tag[k], tag[p])].push_back(make_pair(k, p));\n', '43     return;\n', '44   }\n', '45   int l = lc[k], r = lc[p];\n', '46   if (!l) l = k;\n', '47   if (!r) r = p;\n', '48   Dfs2(l, r);\n', '49   l = rc[k], r = rc[p];\n', '50   if (!l) l = k;\n', '51   if (!r) r = p;\n', '52   Dfs2(l, r);\n', '53   return;\n', '54 }\n', '55 void Dfs1(int k) {\n', '56   if (!lc[k]) return;\n', '57   Dfs2(lc[k], rc[k]);\n', '58   Dfs1(lc[k]);\n', '59   Dfs1(rc[k]);\n', '60   return;\n', '61 }\n', '62 int main() {\n', '63   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '64   add(rt, m + 1);\n', '65   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '66     char op[10];\n', '67     scanf(""%s%lld%lld"", op, a + i, b + i);\n', ""68     if (op[0] == 'b') ans[i] = -1, Modify(rt, 0, (1ll << n) - 1, a[i], b[i], i);\n"", '69   }\n', '70   Dfs1(rt);\n', '71   for (int i = 1; i <= cntp; i++) pre[i] = i;\n', '72   ans[m + 1] = -1;\n', '73   for (int i = m + 1; i; i--) {\n', '74     for (int j = 0; j < vec[i].size(); j++) {\n', '75       int x = fnd(vec[i][j].first), y = fnd(vec[i][j].second);\n', '76       if (x != y) pre[x] = y;\n', '77     }\n', '78     if (!ans[i])\n', '79       ans[i] = (fnd(Query(rt, 0, (1ll << n) - 1, a[i])) ==\n', '80                 fnd(Query(rt, 0, (1ll << n) - 1, b[i])));\n', '81   }\n', '82   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)\n', '83     if (ans[i] >= 0) printf(""%d\\n"", ans[i]);\n', '84   return 0;\n', '85 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 5e4 + 5, MAXM = 1e7;\n', '4 int n, m;\n', '5 long long a[MAXN], b[MAXN];\n', '6 int ans[MAXN];\n', '7 int cntp, rt, lc[MAXM], rc[MAXM], tag[MAXM];\n', '8 inline void add(int &k, int v) {\n', '9   if (!k) k = ++cntp;\n', '10   tag[k] = v;\n', '11 }\n', '12 inline void pushdwn(int k) {\n', '13   if (tag[k]) {\n',  if (mid < y) Modify(rc[k], mid + 1, r, x, y, v);\n', '26   return;\n', '27 }\n', '28 int Query(int k, long long l, long long r, long long w) {\n', '29   if (tag[k]) return k;\n', '30   long long mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '31   if (w <= mid) return Query(lc[k], l, mid, w);\n', '32   return Query(rc[k], mid + 1, r, w);\n', '33 }\n', '34 int pre[MAXM];\n', '35 int fnd(int x) {\n', '36   if (x != pre[x]) pre[x] = fnd(pre[x]);\n', '37   return pre[x];\n', '38 }\n', '39 vector<pair<int, int> > vec[MAXN];\n', '40 void Dfs2(int k, int p) {\n', '41   if (tag[k] && tag[p]) {\n', '42     vec[min(tag[k],     char op[10];\n', '67     scanf(""%s%d%d"", op, a + i, b + i);\n', ""68     if (op[0] == 'b') ans[i] = -1, Modify(rt, 0, (1ll << n) - 1, a[i], b[i], i);\n"", '69   }\n', '70   Dfs1(rt);\n', '71   for (int i = 1; i <= cntp; i++) pre[i] = i;\n', '72   ans[m + 1] = -1;\n', '73   for (int i = m + 1; i; i--) {\n', '74     for (int j = 0; j < vec[i].size(); j++) {\n', '75       int x =                 fnd(Query(rt, 0, (1ll << n) - 1, b[i])));\n', '81   }\n', '82   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)\n', '83     if (ans[i] >= 0) printf(""%d\\n"", ans[i]);\n', '84   return 0;\n', '85 }\n']"	"67     scanf(""%s%lld%lld"", op, a + i, b + i);

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 constexpr int maxn = 50;\n', '5 int w[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int p[maxn];\n', '7 int gp(int u) { return p[u] == u ? u : p[u] = gp(p[u]); }\n', '8 vector<pair<int, int>> pr[100 + 1];\n', '9 int n, k, d[maxn], e[maxn];\n', '10 pair<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> get(vector<pair<int, int>>& cur, int u,\n', '11                                       int v) {\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '13   vector<pair<int, int>> ncur;\n', '14   LL nans = 0;\n', '15   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) e[i] = 0;\n', '16   for (auto [x, y] : cur) {\n', '17     if (w[u][v] < w[x][y]) {\n', '18       int pu = gp(u), pv = gp(v);\n', '19       if (pu != pv) {\n', '20         p[pu] = pv;\n', '21         ncur.push_back({u, v});\n', '22         nans += w[u][v];\n', '23         e[u] += 1;\n', '24         e[v] += 1;\n', '25       }\n', '26     }\n', '27     int px = gp(x), py = gp(y);\n', '28     if (px != py) {\n', '29       p[px] = py;\n', '30       ncur.push_back({x, y});\n', '31       nans += w[x][y];\n', '32       e[x] += 1;\n', '33       e[y] += 1;\n', '34     }\n', '35   }\n', '36   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1)\n', '37     if (e[i] > d[i]) return {INT_MAX, {}};\n', '38   return {nans, ncur};\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin >> n >> k;\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) cin >> d[i];\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '45     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) {\n', '46       cin >> w[i][j];\n', '47       w[j][i] = w[i][j];\n', '48       pr[w[i][j]].push_back({i, j});\n', '49     }\n', '50   for (int i = k; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '51   vector<pair<int, int>> p;\n', '52   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '53     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) p.push_back({i, j});\n', '54   int res = INT_MAX;\n', '55   srand(time(0));\n', '56   for (int i = 0; i < 300; i += 1) {\n', '57     random_shuffle(p.begin(), p.end());\n', '58     int ans = 0;\n', '59     vector<pair<int, int>> cur;\n', '60     int r = rand() % (n - k) + k;\n', '61     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '62       if (i != r) {\n', '63         cur.push_back({i, r});\n', '64         ans += w[i][r];\n', '65       }\n', '66     sort(cur.begin(), cur.end(),\n', '67          [&](const pair<int, int>& p, const pair<int, int>& q) {\n', '68            return w[p.first][p.second] < w[q.first][q.second];\n', '69          });\n', '70     while (true) {\n', '71       res = min(res, ans);\n', '72       int ok = 1;\n', '73       for (auto [i, j] : p) {\n', '74         auto [nans, ncur] = get(cur, i, j);\n', '75         if (nans < ans) {\n', '76           ans = nans;\n', '77           ncur.swap(cur);\n', '78           ok = 0;\n', '79         }\n', '80       }\n', '81       if (ok) break;\n', '82     }\n', '83     res = min(res, ans);\n', '84   }\n', '85   cout << res;\n', '86   return 0;\n', '87 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 constexpr int maxn = 50;\n', '5 int w[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int p[maxn];\n', '7 int gp(int u) { return p[u] == u ? u : p[u] = gp(p[u]); }\n', '8 vector<pair<int, int>> pr[100 + 1];\n', '9 int n, k, d[maxn], e[maxn];\n', '10 pair<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> get(vector<pair<int, int>>& cur, int u,\n', '11                                       int v) {\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1)\n', '37     if (e[i] > d[i]) return {INT_MAX, {}};\n', '38   return {nans, ncur};\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin >> n >> k;\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) cin >> d[i];\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '45     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) {\n', '46       cin >> w[i][j];\n', '47       w[j][i] = w[i][j];\n', '48       pr[w[i][j]].push_back({i, j});\n', '49     }\n', '50   for (int i = k; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '51   vector<pair<int, int>> p;\n', '52   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '53     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) p.push_back({i, j});\n', '54   int res = INT_MAX;\n', '55   srand(time(0));\n', '56   for (int i = 0; i < 100; i += 1) {\n', '57     random_shuffle(p.begin(), p.end());\n', '58     int ans = 0;\n', '59     vector<pair<int, int>> cur;\n', '60     int r = rand() % (n - k) + k;\n', '61     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '62       if (i != r) {\n', '63         cur.push_back({i, r});\n', '64         ans += w[i][r];\n', '65       }\n', '66     sort(cur.begin(), cur.end(),\n', '67          [&](const pair<int, int>& p, const pair<int, int>& q) {\n', '68            return w[p.first][p.second] < w[q.first][q.second];\n', '69          });\n', '70     while (true) {\n', '71       res = min(res, ans);\n', '72       int ok = 1;\n', '73       for (auto [i, j] : p) {\n', '74         auto [nans, ncur] = get(cur, i, j);\n', '75         if (nans < ans) {\n', '76           ans = nans;\n', '77           ncur.swap(cur);\n', '78           ok = 0;\n', '79         }\n', '80       }\n', '81       if (ok) break;\n', '82     }\n', '83     res = min(res, ans);\n', '84   }\n', '85   cout << res;\n', '86   return 0;\n', '87 }\n']	"56   for (int i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 constexpr int maxn = 50;\n', '5 int w[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int p[maxn];\n', '7 int gp(int u) { return p[u] == u ? u : p[u] = gp(p[u]); }\n', '8 vector<pair<int, int>> pr[100 + 1];\n', '9 int n, k, d[maxn], e[maxn];\n', '10 pair<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> get(vector<pair<int, int>>& cur, int u,\n', '11                                       int v) {\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '13   vector<pair<int, int>> ncur;\n', '14   LL nans = 0;\n', '15   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) e[i] = 0;\n', '16   for (auto [x, y] : cur) {\n', '17     if (w[u][v] < w[x][y]) {\n', '18       int pu = gp(u), pv = gp(v);\n', '19       if (pu != pv) {\n', '20         p[pu] = pv;\n', '21         ncur.push_back({u, v});\n', '22         nans += w[u][v];\n', '23         e[u] += 1;\n', '24         e[v] += 1;\n', '25       }\n', '26     }\n', '27     int px = gp(x), py = gp(y);\n', '28     if (px != py) {\n', '29       p[px] = py;\n', '30       ncur.push_back({x, y});\n', '31       nans += w[x][y];\n', '32       e[x] += 1;\n', '33       e[y] += 1;\n', '34     }\n', '35   }\n', '36   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1)\n', '37     if (e[i] > d[i]) return {INT_MAX, {}};\n', '38   return {nans, ncur};\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin >> n >> k;\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) cin >> d[i];\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '45     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) {\n', '46       cin >> w[i][j];\n', '47       w[j][i] = w[i][j];\n', '48       pr[w[i][j]].push_back({i, j});\n', '49     }\n', '50   for (int i = k; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '51   vector<pair<int, int>> p;\n', '52   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '53     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) p.push_back({i, j});\n', '54   int res = INT_MAX;\n', '55   srand(time(0));\n', '56   for (int i = 0; i < 1500; i += 1) {\n', '57     random_shuffle(p.begin(), p.end());\n', '58     int ans = 0;\n', '59     vector<pair<int, int>> cur;\n', '60     int r = rand() % (n - k) + k;\n', '61     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '62       if (i != r) {\n', '63         cur.push_back({i, r});\n', '64         ans += w[i][r];\n', '65       }\n', '66     sort(cur.begin(), cur.end(),\n', '67          [&](const pair<int, int>& p, const pair<int, int>& q) {\n', '68            return w[p.first][p.second] < w[q.first][q.second];\n', '69          });\n', '70     while (true) {\n', '71       res = min(res, ans);\n', '72       int ok = 1;\n', '73       for (auto [i, j] : p) {\n', '74         auto [nans, ncur] = get(cur, i, j);\n', '75         if (nans < ans) {\n', '76           ans = nans;\n', '77           ncur.swap(cur);\n', '78           ok = 0;\n', '79         }\n', '80       }\n', '81       if (ok) break;\n', '82     }\n', '83     res = min(res, ans);\n', '84   }\n', '85   cout << res;\n', '86   return 0;\n', '87 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 constexpr int maxn = 50;\n', '5 int w[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int p[maxn];\n', '7 int gp(int u) { return p[u] == u ? u : p[u] = gp(p[u]); }\n', '8 vector<pair<int, int>> pr[100 + 1];\n', '9 int n, k, d[maxn], e[maxn];\n', '10 pair<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> get(vector<pair<int, int>>& cur, int u,\n', '11                                       int v) {\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1)\n', '37     if (e[i] > d[i]) return {INT_MAX, {}};\n', '38   return {nans, ncur};\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin >> n >> k;\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) cin >> d[i];\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '45     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) {\n', '46       cin >> w[i][j];\n', '47       w[j][i] = w[i][j];\n', '48       pr[w[i][j]].push_back({i, j});\n', '49     }\n', '50   for (int i = k; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '51   vector<pair<int, int>> p;\n', '52   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '53     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) p.push_back({i, j});\n', '54   int res = INT_MAX;\n', '55   srand(time(0));\n', '56   for (int i = 0; i < 1; i += 1) {\n', '57     random_shuffle(p.begin(), p.end());\n', '58     int ans = 0;\n', '59     vector<pair<int, int>> cur;\n', '60     int r = rand() % (n - k) + k;\n', '61     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '62       if (i != r) {\n', '63         cur.push_back({i, r});\n', '64         ans += w[i][r];\n', '65       }\n', '66     sort(cur.begin(), cur.end(),\n', '67          [&](const pair<int, int>& p, const pair<int, int>& q) {\n', '68            return w[p.first][p.second] < w[q.first][q.second];\n', '69          });\n', '70     while (true) {\n', '71       res = min(res, ans);\n', '72       int ok = 1;\n', '73       for (auto [i, j] : p) {\n', '74         auto [nans, ncur] = get(cur, i, j);\n', '75         if (nans < ans) {\n', '76           ans = nans;\n', '77           ncur.swap(cur);\n', '78           ok = 0;\n', '79         }\n', '80       }\n', '81       if (ok) break;\n', '82     }\n', '83     res = min(res, ans);\n', '84   }\n', '85   cout << res;\n', '86   return 0;\n', '87 }\n']	"56   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '13   vector<pair<int, int>> ncur;\n', '14   LL nans = 0;\n', '15   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) e[i] = 0;\n', '16   for (auto [x, y] : cur) {\n', '17     if (w[u][v] < w[x][y]) {\n', '18       int pu = gp(u), pv = gp(v);\n', '19       if (pu != pv) {\n', '20         p[pu] = pv;\n', '21         ncur.push_back({u, v});\n', '22         nans += w[u][v];\n', '23         e[u] += 1;\n', '24         e[v] += 1;\n', '25       }\n', '26     }\n', '27     int px = gp(x), py = gp(y);\n', '28     if (px != py) {\n', '29       p[px] = py;\n', '30       ncur.push_back({x, y});\n', '31       nans += w[x][y];\n', '32       e[x] += 1;\n', '33       e[y] += 1;\n', '34     }\n', '35   }\n', '36   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1)\n', '37     if (e[i] > d[i]) return {INT_MAX, {}};\n', '38   return {nans, ncur};\n', '39 }\n', '40 int main() {\n', '41   cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '42   cin >> n >> k;\n', '43   for (int i = 0; i < k; i += 1) cin >> d[i];\n', '44   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '45     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) {\n', '46       cin >> w[i][j];\n', '47       w[j][i] = w[i][j];\n', '48       pr[w[i][j]].push_back({i, j});\n', '49     }\n', '50   for (int i = k; i < n; i += 1) p[i] = i;\n', '51   vector<pair<int, int>> p;\n', '52   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '53     for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j += 1) p.push_back({i, j});\n', '54   int res = INT_MAX;\n', '55   srand(time(0));\n', '56   for (int i = 0; i < 500; i += 1) {\n', '57     random_shuffle(p.begin(), p.end());\n', '58     int ans = 0;\n', '59     vector<pair<int, int>> cur;\n', '60     int r = rand() % (n - k) + k;\n', '61     for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1)\n', '62       if (i != r) {\n', '63         cur.push_back({i, r});\n', '64         ans += w[i][r];\n', '65       }\n', '66     sort(cur.begin(), cur.end(),\n', '67          [&](const pair<int, int>& p, const pair<int, int>& q) {\n', '68            return w[p.first][p.second] < w[q.first][q.second];\n', '69          });\n', '70     while (true) {\n', '71       res = min(res, ans);\n', '72       int ok = 1;\n', '73       for (auto [i, j] : p) {\n', '74         auto [nans, ncur] = get(cur, i, j);\n', '75         if (nans < ans) {\n', '76           ans = nans;\n', '77           ncur.swap(cur);\n', '78           ok = 0;\n', '79         }\n', '80       }\n', '81       if (ok) break;\n', '82     }\n', '83     res = min(res, ans);\n', '84   }\n', '85   cout << res;\n', '86   return 0;\n', '87 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 constexpr int maxn = 50;\n', '5 int w[maxn][maxn];\n', '6 int p[maxn];\n', '7 int gp(int u) { return p[u] == u ? u : p[u] = gp(p[u]); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     int n;\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     vector<int> a(n);\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '13       cin >> a[i];\n', '14     }\n', '15     sort(a.begin(), a.end());\n', '16     vector<long long> pref(n + 1);\n', '17     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '18       pref[i + 1] = pref[i] + a[i];\n', '19     }\n', '20     double ans = -1e30;\n', '21     for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '22       double x = (double)pref[i + 1] / (i + 1);\n', '23       double y = (double)(pref[n] - pref[i + 1]) / (n - i - 1);\n', '24       ans = max(ans, x + y);\n', '25     }\n', ""26     cout << fixed << setprecision(17) << ans << '\\n';\n"", '27   }\n', '28   return 0;\n', '29 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     int n;\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     vector<int> a(n);\n', '12     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '13       cin >> a[i];\n', '14     }\n', '15     sort(a.begin(), a.end());\n', '16     vector<int> pref(n + 1);\n', '17     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '18       pref[i + 1] = pref[i] + a[i];\n', '19     }\n', '20     double ans = -1e30;\n', '21     for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '22       double x = (double)pref[i + 1] / (i + 1);\n', '23       double y = (double)(pref[n] - pref[i + 1]) / (n - i - 1);\n', '24       ans = max(ans, x + y);\n', '25     }\n', ""26     cout << fixed << setprecision(17) << ans << '\\n';\n"", '27   }\n', '28   return 0;\n', '29 }\n']"	"16     vector<long long> pref(n + 1);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""O3"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC target(""sse4"")\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 template <class T>\n', '6 bool ckmin(T& a, const T& b) {\n', '7   return b < a ? a = b, 1 : 0;\n', '8 }\n', '9 template <class T>\n', '10 bool ckmax(T& a, const T& b) {\n', '11   return a < b ? a = b, 1 : 0;\n', '12 }\n', '13 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '14 const int MOD = 1000000007;\n', ""15 const char nl = '\\n';\n"", '16 const int MX = 100001;\n', '17 void ap_99() {\n', '18   freopen(""input.txt"", ""r"", stdin);\n', '19   freopen(""output.txt"", ""w"", stdout);\n', '20 }\n', '21 void solve() {\n', '22   int n;\n', '23   cin >> n;\n', '24   vector<int> v;\n', '25   long double sum = 0;\n', '26   for (int i = 0; i < (n); i++) {\n', '27     int t;\n', '28     cin >> t;\n', '29     sum += t;\n', '30     v.push_back(t);\n', '31   }\n', '32   sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '33   reverse(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '34   long double avg = 0;\n', '35   long double sum1 = 0;\n', '36   long double sum2 = 0;\n', '37   long double mx = -2000000001;\n', '38   for (int i = 0; i < (n - 1); i++) {\n', '39     sum1 += v[i];\n', '40     sum2 = sum - sum1;\n', '41     avg = sum1 / (i + 1) + sum2 / (n - i - 1);\n', '42     if (avg > mx) {\n', '43       mx = avg;\n', '44     }\n', '45   }\n', '46   cout << fixed << setprecision(12) << mx;\n', ""47   cout << '\\n';\n"", '48 }\n', '49 int main() {\n', '50   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '51   cin.tie(0);\n', '52   int T = 1;\n', '53   cin >> T;\n', '54   while (T--) {\n', '55     solve();\n', '56   }\n', '57   return 0;\n', '58 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""O3"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC target(""sse4"")\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 template <class T>\n', '6 bool ckmin(T& a, const T& b) {\n', '7   return b < a ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long int t, n;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     double s = 0.0;\n', '8     cin >> n;\n', '9     int ara[n];\n', '10     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '11       cin >> ara[i];\n', '12       s += ara[i];\n', '13     }\n', '14     sort(ara, ara + n);\n', '15     s -= ara[n - 1];\n', '16     s = s / (n - 1) * 1.0 + ara[n - 1] * 1.0;\n', '17     printf(""%0.8lf\\n"", s);\n', '18   }\n', '19 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long int t, n;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     double s = 0.0;\n', '8     cin >> n;\n', '9     int ara[n];\n', '10     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '11       cin >> ara[i];\n', '12       s += ara[i];\n', '13     }\n', '14     sort(ara, ara + n);\n', '15     s -= ara[n - 1];\n', '16     s = s / (n - 1) * 1.0 + ara[n - 1] * 1.0;\n', '17     printf(""%0.8lf"", s);\n', '18   }\n', '19 }\n']"	"17     printf(""%0.8lf\n"", s);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long n;\n', '5   cin >> n;\n', '6   long long a[n];\n', '7   double sum = 0.0;\n', '8   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '9     cin >> a[i];\n', '10     sum += a[i];\n', '11   }\n', '12   sort(a, a + n);\n', '13   sum -= a[n - 1];\n', '14   sum = sum / (n - 1);\n', '15   double ans = (a[n - 1] / 1) + sum;\n', '16   printf(""%.9f\\n"", ans);\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '20   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '21   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '22   long long test = 1;\n', '23   cin >> test;\n', '24   while (test--) {\n', '25     solve();\n', '26   }\n', '27   return 0;\n', '28 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   long long n;\n', '5   cin >> n;\n', '6   long long a[n];\n', '7   double sum = 0.0;\n', '8   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '9     cin >> a[i];\n', '10     sum += a[i];\n', '11   }\n', '12   sort(a, a + n);\n', '13   sum -= a[n - 1];\n', '14   sum = sum / (n - 1);\n', '15   double ans = (a[n - 1] / 1) + sum;\n', '16   printf(""%.9f"", ans);\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '20   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '21   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '22   long long test = 1;\n', '23   cin >> test;\n', '24   while (test--) {\n', '25     solve();\n', '26   }\n', '27   return 0;\n', '28 }\n']"	"16   printf(""%.9f\n"", ans);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     int n, k;\n', '8     cin >> n >> k;\n', '9     vector<pair<int, int>> a(n);\n', '10     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '11       cin >> a[i].first;\n', '12       a[i].second = i;\n', '13     }\n', '14     sort(a.begin(), a.end());\n', '15     int j = 0, part = 1;\n', '16     for (j = 1; j < n; j++) {\n', '17       if (a[j - 1].second + 1 != a[j].second) {\n', '18         part++;\n', '19       }\n', '20     }\n', '21     if (part <= k) {\n', '22       cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '23     } else {\n', '24       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     int n, k;\n', '8     cin >> n >> k;\n', '9     vector<pair<int, int>> a(n);\n', '10     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '11       cin >> a[i].first;\n', '12       a[i].second = i;\n', '13     }\n', '14     sort(a.begin(), a.end());\n', '15     int j = 0, part = 0;\n', '16     for (j = 1; j < n; j++) {\n', '17       if (a[j - 1].second + 1 != a[j].second) {\n', '18         part++;\n', '19       }\n', '20     }\n', '21     if (part <= k) {\n', '22       cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '23     } else {\n', '24       cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n']"	"15     int j = 0, part = 1;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool isPrime(long long n) {\n', '4   if (n == 1) return false;\n', '5   if (n == 2) return true;\n', '6   for (long long i = 2; i * i <= n; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int_fast64_t M = 1000000007;\n', '4 struct snode {\n', '5   int_fast64_t data;\n', '6   int_fast64_t left, right;\n', '7   snode* left_child;\n', '8   snode* right_child;\n', '9 };\n', '10 int_fast64_t poww(int_fast64_t x, int_fast64_t y, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '11   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '12   while (y) {\n', '13     if (y % 2) {\n', '14       ans = (ans * x) % m;\n', '15     }\n', '16     x = x * x % m;\n', '17     y = y / 2;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ans;\n', '20 }\n', '21 const int32_t maxm = 2000007;\n', '22 int_fast64_t SOE[maxm];\n', '23 int_fast64_t fact(int_fast64_t a, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '24   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '25   while (a > 1) {\n', '26     ans *= a;\n', '27     ans %= m;\n', '28     a--;\n', '29   }\n', '30   return ans;\n', '31 }\n', '32 int_fast64_t nCr(int_fast64_t n, int_fast64_t r, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '33   int_fast64_t a = fact(n, M);\n', '34   int_fast64_t ans = a;\n', '35   int_fast64_t b = fact(n - r, M);\n', '36   int_fast64_t c = fact(r, M);\n', '37   b = poww(b, m - 2, m);\n', '38   c = poww(c, m - 2, m);\n', '39   ans = (ans * b) % m;\n', '40   ans = (ans * c) % m;\n', '41   return ans;\n', '42 }\n', '43 snode* make_seg_tree(snode* root, int_fast64_t arr[], int_fast64_t left,\n', '44                      int_fast64_t right) {\n', '45   snode* temp = new snode;\n', '46   temp->left = left;\n', '47   temp->right = right;\n', '48   temp->left_child = NULL;\n', '49   temp->right_child = NULL;\n', '50   if (left == right) {\n', '51     return temp;\n', '52   }\n', '53   int_fast64_t l1, r1, l2, r2;\n', '54   l1 = left;\n', '55   r2 = right;\n', '56   r1 = (left + right) / 2;\n', '57   l2 = r1 + 1;\n', '58   temp->left_child = make_seg_tree(temp, arr, l1, r1);\n', '59   temp->right_child = make_seg_tree(temp, arr, l2, r2);\n', '60   return temp;\n', '61 }\n', '62 bool check(int_fast64_t m) {}\n', '63 int_fast64_t res;\n', '64 void binary_search(int_fast64_t len) {\n', '65   int_fast64_t l = 1, r = len;\n', '66   bool res;\n', '67   while (l <= r) {\n', '68     int_fast64_t m = (l + r) / 2;\n', '69     if (check(m)) {\n', '70       res = m;\n', '71       l = m + 1;\n', '72     } else\n', '73       r = m - 1;\n', '74   }\n', '75   return;\n', '76 }\n', '77 int_fast64_t fac[1000003];\n', '78 int_fast64_t inv[1000003];\n', '79 int_fast64_t ANS[1000003];\n', '80 int_fast64_t nCk(int_fast64_t n, int_fast64_t k) {\n', '81   int_fast64_t ANS = fac[n];\n', '82   ANS *= ((inv[n - k] * inv[k]) % M);\n', '83   return ANS % M;\n', '84 }\n', '85 void solve() {\n', '86   int_fast64_t n, t;\n', '87   cin >> n >> t;\n', '88   pair<int_fast64_t, int_fast64_t> arr[n];\n', '89   for (int_fast64_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '90     cin >> arr[i].first;\n', '91     arr[i].second = i;\n', '92   }\n', '93   sort(arr, arr + n);\n', '94   int_fast64_t c = 0;\n', '95   for (int_fast64_t i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '96     if (arr[i].second != arr[i + 1].second - 1) {\n', '97       c++;\n', '98     }\n', '99   }\n', '100   if (c < t) {\n', '101     cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '102   } else {\n', '103     cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '104   };\n', '105   return;\n', '106 }\n', '107 int32_t main() {\n', '108   ios::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);\n', '109   int_fast64_t t;\n', '110   t = 1;\n', '111   cin >> t;\n', '112   while (t--) {\n', '113     solve();\n', '114   }\n', '115 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int_fast64_t M = 1000000007;\n', '4 struct snode {\n', '5   int_fast64_t data;\n', '6   int_fast64_t left, right;\n', '7   snode* left_child;\n', '8   snode* right_child;\n', '9 };\n', '10 int_fast64_t poww(int_fast64_t x, int_fast64_t y, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '11   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '12   while (y) {\n', '13     if (y % 2) {\n', '14       ans = (ans * x) % m;\n', '15     }\n', '16     x = x * x % m;\n', '17     y = y / 2;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ans;\n', '20 }\n', '21 const int32_t maxm = 2000007;\n', '22 int_fast64_t SOE[maxm];\n', '23 int_fast64_t fact(int_fast64_t a, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '24   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '25   while (a > 1) {\n', '26     ans *= a;\n', '27     ans %= m;\n', '28     a--;\n', '29   }\n', '30   return ans;\n', '31 }\n', '32 int_fast64_t nCr(int_fast64_t n, int_fast64_t r, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '33   int_fast64_t a = fact(n, M);\n', '34   int_fast64_t ans = a;\n', '35   int_fast64_t b = fact(n - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int_fast64_t M = 1000000007;\n', '4 struct snode {\n', '5   int_fast64_t data;\n', '6   int_fast64_t left, right;\n', '7   snode* left_child;\n', '8   snode* right_child;\n', '9 };\n', '10 int_fast64_t poww(int_fast64_t x, int_fast64_t y, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '11   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '12   while (y) {\n', '13     if (y % 2) {\n', '14       ans = (ans * x) % m;\n', '15     }\n', '16     x = x * x % m;\n', '17     y = y / 2;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ans;\n', '20 }\n', '21 const int32_t maxm = 2000007;\n', '22 int_fast64_t SOE[maxm];\n', '23 int_fast64_t fact(int_fast64_t a, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '24   int_fast64_t ans = 1;\n', '25   while (a > 1) {\n', '26     ans *= a;\n', '27     ans %= m;\n', '28     a--;\n', '29   }\n', '30   return ans;\n', '31 }\n', '32 int_fast64_t nCr(int_fast64_t n, int_fast64_t r, int_fast64_t m) {\n', '33   int_fast64_t a = fact(n, M);\n', '34   int_fast64_t ans = a;\n', '35   int_fast64_t b = fact(n - 1;\n', '74   }\n', '75   return;\n', '76 }\n', '77 int_fast64_t fac[1000003];\n', '78 int_fast64_t inv[1000003];\n', '79 int_fast64_t ANS[1000003];\n', '80 int_fast64_t nCk(int_fast64_t n, int_fast64_t k) {\n', '81   int_fast64_t ANS = fac[n];\n', '82   ANS *= ((inv[n - k] * inv[k]) % M);\n', '83   return ANS % M;\n', '84 }\n', '85 void solve() {\n', '86   int_fast64_t n, t;\n', '87   cin >> n >> t;\n', '88   pair<int_fast64_t, int_fast64_t> arr[n];\n', '89   for (int_fast64_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '90     cin >> arr[i].first;\n', '91     arr[i].second = i;\n', '92   }\n', '93   sort(arr, arr + n);\n', '94   int_fast64_t c = 0;\n', '95   for (int_fast64_t i = 0; i < n - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAX = 1e5 + 10;\n', '4 int n, k;\n', '5 struct st {\n', '6   int v, p;\n', '7 };\n', '8 bool cmp(st a, st b) { return a.v < b.v; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 signed main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '6   long long int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     long long int n, k;\n', '10     cin >> n >> k;\n', '11     long long int a[n + 10];\n', '12     set<long long int> s;\n', '13     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '14       cin >> a[i];\n', '15       s.insert(a[i]);\n', '16     }\n', '17     long long int ctr = 1;\n', '18     for (long long int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '19       if (a[i + 1] > a[i]) {\n', '20         auto it = s.find(a[i + 1]);\n', '21         --it;\n', '22         if (a[i] == (*it)) {\n', '23           continue;\n', '24         }\n', '25       }\n', '26       ctr++;\n', '27     }\n', '28     if (ctr <= k)\n', '29       cout << ""Yes\\n"";\n', '30     else\n', '31       cout << ""No\\n"";\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 signed main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '6   long long int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   while (t--) {\n', '9     long long int n, k;\n', '10     cin >> n >> k;\n', '11     long long int a[n + 10];\n', '12     set<long long int> s;\n', '13     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '14       cin >> a[i];\n', '15       s.insert(a[i]);\n', '16     }\n', '17     long long int ctr = 0;\n', '18     for (long long int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n', '19       if (a[i + 1] > a[i]) {\n', '20         auto it = s.find(a[i + 1]);\n', '21         --it;\n', '22         if (a[i] == (*it)) {\n', '23           continue;\n', '24         }\n', '25       }\n', '26       ctr++;\n', '27     }\n', '28     if (ctr <= k)\n', '29       cout << ""Yes\\n"";\n', '30     else\n', '31       cout << ""No\\n"";\n', '32   }\n', '33 }\n']"	"17     long long int ctr = 1;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using int64 = int64_t;\n', '4 vector<int> xs(100000), ys(100000);\n', '5 vector<int> ms(100000);\n', '6 map<int, int> xsIndexMap;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   int n, k;\n', '9   cin >> n >> k;\n', '10   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '11     cin >> xs[i];\n', '12     ys[i] = xs[i];\n', '13     xsIndexMap[xs[i]] = i;\n', '14   }\n', '15   sort(ys.begin(), ys.begin() + n);\n', '16   int m = 0;\n', '17   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '18     int y0 = ys[i];\n', '19     int xStart = xsIndexMap[y0];\n', '20     int xEnd = xStart + 1;\n', '21     while (xEnd < n && xs[xEnd] == ys[i + xEnd - xStart]) {\n', '22       ++xEnd;\n', '23     }\n', '24     i += xEnd - xStart - 1;\n', '25     ms[m] = xEnd - xStart;\n', '26     ++m;\n', '27   }\n', '28   bool result = false;\n', '29   if (m == k) {\n', '30     result = true;\n', '31   } else if (m > k) {\n', '32     result = false;\n', '33   } else {\n', '34     int m2 = m;\n', '35     for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {\n', '36       m2 += ms[i] - 1;\n', '37     }\n', '38     result = (m2 >= k);\n', '39   }\n', '40   if (result) {\n', '41     cout << ""YES"" << endl;\n', '42   } else {\n', '43     cout << ""NO"" << endl;\n', '44   }\n', '45 }\n', '46 int main() {\n', '47   int nCases;\n', '48   cin >> nCases;\n', '49   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '11     cin >> xs[i];\n', '12     ys[i] = xs[i];\n', '13     xsIndexMap[xs[i]] = i;\n', '14   }\n', '15   sort(ys.begin(), ys.begin() + n);\n', '16   int m = 0;\n', '17   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '18     int y0 = ys[i];\n', '19     int xStart = xsIndexMap[y0];\n', '20     int xEnd = xStart + 1;\n', '21     while (xEnd < n && xs[xEnd] == ys[i + xEnd - xStart]) {\n', '22       ++xEnd;\n', '23     }\n', '24     i += xEnd - xStart - 1;\n', '25     ms[i] = xEnd - xStart;\n', '26     ++m;\n', '27   }\n', '28   bool result = false;\n', '29   if (m == k) {\n', '30     result = true;\n', '31   } else if (m > k) {\n', '32     result = false;\n', '33   } else {\n', '34     int m2 = m;\n', '35     for (int i = 0; "
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 inline void read(T &n) {\n', '5   T w = 1;\n', '6   n = 0;\n', '7   char ch = getchar();\n', '8   while (!isdigit(ch) && ch != EOF) {\n', ""9     if (ch == '-') w = -1;\n"", '10     ch = getchar();\n', '11   }\n', '12   while (isdigit(ch) && ch != EOF) {\n', '13     n = (n << 1) + (n << 3) + (ch & 15);\n', '14     ch = getchar();\n', '15   }\n', '16   n *= w;\n', '17 }\n', '18 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '19 int T, n, k;\n', '20 long long a[N + 2], ia[N + 2], b[N + 2], s[N + 2];\n', '21 long long ksm(long long a, long long b) {\n', '22   long long x = 1;\n', '23   while (b) {\n', '24     if (b & 1) x = x * a % 1000000007;\n', '25     a = a * a % 1000000007;\n', '26     b >>= 1;\n', '27   }\n', '28   return x;\n', '29 }\n', '30 long long dp(int i) {\n', '31   if (i > k) return 1;\n', '32   long long res = (s[(n - 1) >> 1] + (n & 1)) * dp(i + 1) % 1000000007;\n', '33   return (res + (n % 2 == 0) * ksm(b[k - i], n)) % 1000000007;\n', '34 }\n', '35 int main() {\n', '36   read(T);\n', '37   a[0] = ia[0] = 1;\n', '38   for (int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const int mx = 2e5 + 5;\n', '5 vector<int> fact(mx, 1), inv(mx, 1);\n', '6 long long binpow(long long a, long long b, long long m) {\n', '7   a %= m;\n', '8   long long res = 1;\n', '9   while (b > 0) {\n', '10     if (b & 1) res = res * a % m;\n', '11     a = a * a % m;\n', '12     b >>= 1;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return res;\n', '15 }\n', '16 void precompute() {\n', '17   fact[0] = inv[0] = 1;\n', '18   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 priority_queue<long long int, vector<long long int>, greater<long long int> >\n', '4     pq;\n', '5 double startTime;\n', '6 double getCurrentTime() {\n', '7   return ((double)clock() - startTime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;\n', '8 }\n', '9 bool isPrime(long long int n) {\n', '10   if (n <= 1) return false;\n', '11   if (n <= 3) return true;\n', '12   if (n % 2 == 0 || n % 3 == 0) return false;\n', '13   for (long long int i = 5; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long power(long long a, int k) {\n', '3   long long p = 1;\n', '4   while (k) {\n', '5     if (k & 1) p = p * a % 1000000007;\n', '6     a = a * a % 1000000007;\n', '7     k >>= 1;\n', '8   }\n', '9   return p;\n', '10 }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   int t;\n', '13   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '14   while (t--) {\n', '15     int n, k, i, ans;\n', '16     scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '17     if (k == 0)\n', '18       printf(""1\\n"");\n', '19     else if (n % 2 == 1)\n', '20       printf(""%lld\\n"", power(power(2, n - 1) + 1, k));\n', '21     else {\n', '22       ans = power(power(2, n - 1) - 1, k);\n', '23       for (i = 0; i < k; i++)\n', '24         ans = (ans +\n', '25                power(power(2, n - 1) - 1, i) * power(power(2, n), k - 1 - i)) %\n', '26               1000000007;\n', '27       printf(""%d\\n"", ans);\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long power(long long a, int k) {\n', '3   long long p = 1;\n', '4   while (k) {\n', '5     if (k & 1) p = p * a % 1000000007;\n', '6     a = a * a % 1000000007;\n', '7     k >>= 1;\n', '8   }\n', '9   return p;\n', '10 }\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   int t;\n', '13   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '14   while (t--) {\n', '15     int n, k, i, ans;\n', '16     scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '17     if (k == 0)\n', '18       printf(""1\\n"");\n', '19     else if (n % 2 == 1)\n', '20       printf(""%lld\\n"", power(power(2, n - 1) + 1, k));\n', '21     else {\n', '22       ans = power(power(2, n - 1) - 1, n);\n', '23       for (i = 0; i < k; i++)\n', '24         ans = (ans +\n', '25                power(power(2, n - 1) - 1, i) * power(power(2, n), k - 1 - i)) %\n', '26               1000000007;\n', '27       printf(""%d\\n"", ans);\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']"	"22       ans = power(power(2, n - 1) - 1, k);

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int mod_pow(int b, int p) {\n', '5   int ans = 1;\n', '6   while (p) {\n', '7     if (p & 1) {\n', '8       ans = (1ll * ans * b) % mod;\n', '9       p--;\n', '10     }\n', '11     b = (1ll * b * b) % mod;\n', '12     p /= 2;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return ans;\n', '15 }\n', '16 const int N = (2e5 + 5);\n', '17 int fac[N], inv_fac[N];\n', '18 void calc_fac() {\n', '19   fac[0] = 1;\n', '20   inv_fac[0] = 1;\n', '21   for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) {\n', '22     fac[i] = (1ll * fac[i - 1] * i) % mod;\n', '23     inv_fac[i] = mod_pow(fac[i], mod - 2);\n', '24   }\n', '25 }\n', '26 void solve() {\n', '27   int n, k;\n', '28   cin >> n >> k;\n', '29   if (k == 0) {\n', '30     cout << 1;\n', ""31     cout << '\\n';\n"", '32     return;\n', '33   }\n', '34   int e = 0;\n', '35   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {\n', '36     e = (e + 1ll * fac[n] * inv_fac[n - i] % mod * inv_fac[i] % mod) % mod;\n', '37   }\n', '38   if (n & 1) e = (e + 1) % mod;\n', '39   if (n & 1) {\n', '40     int ans = mod_pow(e, k);\n', '41     cout << ans;\n', ""42     cout << '\\n';\n"", '43     return;\n', '44   }\n', '45   int p = mod_pow(2, n);\n', '46   int pp = mod_pow(p, k);\n', '47   int ans = 0;\n', '48   int left = 1;\n', '49   int right = pp;\n', '50   for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '51     right = 1ll * right * mod_pow(p, mod - 2) % mod;\n', '52     ans = (ans + 1ll * left * right) % mod;\n', '53     left = (1ll * left * e) % mod;\n', '54   }\n', '55   ans = (ans + 1ll * left) % mod;\n', '56   cout << ans;\n', ""57   cout << '\\n';\n"", '58 }\n', '59 int32_t main() {\n', '60   ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '61   cin.tie(0);\n', '62   calc_fac();\n', '63   int tc;\n', '64   cin >> tc;\n', '65   while (tc--) solve();\n', '66   return 0;\n', '67 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int mod_pow(int b, int p) {\n', '5   int ans = 1;\n', '6   while (p) {\n', '7     if (p & 1) {\n', '8       ans = (1ll * ans * b) % mod;\n', '9       p--;\n', '10     }\n', '11     b = (1ll * b * b) % mod;\n', '12     p /= 2;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return ans;\n', '15 }\n', '16 const int N = (2e5 + 5);\n', '17 int fac[N], inv_fac[N];\n', '18 void calc_fac() {\n', '19   fac[0] = 1;\n', '20   inv_fac[0] = 1;\n', '21   for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) {\n', '22     fac[i] = (fac[i - 1] * i) % mod;\n', '23     inv_fac[i] = mod_pow(fac[i], mod - 2);\n', '24   }\n', '25 }\n', '26 void solve() {\n', '27   int n, k;\n', '28   cin >> n >> k;\n', '29   if (k == 0) {\n', '30     cout << 1;\n', ""31     cout << '\\n';\n"", '32     return;\n', '33   }\n', '34   int e = 0;\n', '35   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {\n', '36     e = (e + 1ll * fac[n] * inv_fac[n - i] % mod * inv_fac[i] % mod) % mod;\n', '37   }\n', '38   if (n & 1) e = (e + 1) % mod;\n', '39   if (n & 1) {\n', '40     int ans = mod_pow(e, k);\n', '41     cout << ans;\n', ""42     cout << '\\n';\n"", '43     return;\n', '44   }\n', '45   int p = mod_pow(2, n);\n', '46   int pp = mod_pow(p, k);\n', '47   int ans = 0;\n', '48   int left = 1;\n', '49   int right = pp;\n', '50   for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '51     right = 1ll * right * mod_pow(p, mod - 2) % mod;\n', '52     ans = (ans + 1ll * left * right) % mod;\n', '53     left = (1ll * left * e) % mod;\n', '54   }\n', '55   ans = (ans + 1ll * left) % mod;\n', '56   cout << ans;\n', ""57   cout << '\\n';\n"", '58 }\n', '59 int32_t main() {\n', '60   ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '61   cin.tie(0);\n', '62   calc_fac();\n', '63   int tc;\n', '64   cin >> tc;\n', '65   while (tc--) solve();\n', '66   return 0;\n', '67 }\n']"	"22     fac[i] = (1ll * fac[i - 1] * i) % mod;
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '4 int n, k;\n', '5 long long f[200005];\n', '6 long long ff;\n', '7 long long powlc(long long ac, long long bc) {\n', '8   if (bc == 0) return 1;\n', '9   if (bc == 1) return (ac % mod);\n', '10   long long cc = powlc(ac, bc / 2) % mod;\n', '11   cc = (cc * cc) % mod;\n', '12   if (bc % 2 == 1) cc = (cc * ac) % mod;\n', '13   return cc;\n', '14 }\n', '15 long long Cmod(int nx, int mx) {\n', '16   long long res =\n', '17       ((f[nx] * powlc(f[mx], mod - 2) % mod) * powlc(f[nx - mx], mod - 2)) %\n', '18       mod;\n', '19   return res;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void process() {\n', '22   f[0] = 1;\n', '23   for (int i = 1; i >= 1; i--) {\n', '45       if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '46         res = (res + (bounus * powlc(powlc(2, i - 1), n) % mod)) % mod;\n', '47       }\n', '48       bounus = (bounus * ff) % mod;\n', '49     }\n', '50     res = (res + bounus) % mod;\n', '51     cout << res << endl;\n', '52   }\n', '53 }\n', '54 int online = 2;\n', '55 int main() {\n', '56   ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '57   cin.tie(0);\n', '58   cout.tie(0);\n', '59   if (online == 0) {\n', '60     freopen(""in.inp"", ""r"", stdin);\n', '61     freopen(""out.out"", ""w"", stdout);\n', '62   } else if (online == 1) {\n', '63     freopen("".inp"", ""r"", stdin);\n', '64     freopen("".out"", ""w"", stdout);\n', '65   }\n', '66   process();\n', '67   return 0;\n', '68 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '4 int n, k;\n', '5 long long f[200005];\n', '6 long long ff;\n', '7 long long powlc(long long ac, long long bc) {\n', '8   if (bc == 0) return 1;\n', '9   if (bc == 1) return (ac % mod);\n', '10   long long cc = powlc(ac, bc / 2) % mod;\n', '11   cc = (cc * cc) % mod;\n', '12   if (bc % 2 == 1) cc = (cc * ac) % mod;\n', '13   return cc;\n', '14 }\n', '15 long long Cmod(int nx, int mx) {\n', '16   long long res =\n', '17       ((f[nx] * powlc(f[mx], mod - 2) % mod) * powlc(f[nx - mx], mod - 2)) %\n', '18       mod;\n', '19   return res;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void process() {\n', '22   f[0] = 1;\n', '23   for (int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long luth[200005];\n', '3 class game {\n', '4  private:\n', '5   int n, k;\n', '6 \n', '7  public:\n', '8   long long dp[200005][5];\n', '9   long long res = 0;\n', '10   void in() {\n', '11     int x, y;\n', '12     std::cin >> x >> y;\n', '13     n = x;\n', '14     k = y;\n', '15   }\n', '16   void solve() {\n', '17     dp[0][0] = luth[n];\n', '18     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 400010;\n', '4 const int INF = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '6 const double Pi = acos(-1.0);\n', '7 int n, m, k, t;\n', '8 long long fact[maxn], invFact[maxn];\n', '9 int dir[][2] = {{0, 0},  {0, 1},   {-1, 0}, {0, -1}, {1, 0},\n', '10                 {-1, 1}, {-1, -1}, {1, -1}, {1, 1}};\n', '11 inline int read() {\n', '12   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', '13   char ch = getchar();\n', '14   while (!isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""15     if (ch == '-') f = -1;\n"", '16     ch = getchar();\n', '17   }\n', '18   while (isdigit(ch)) {\n', '19     x = x * 10 + ch - 48;\n', '20     ch = getchar();\n', '21   }\n', '22   return x * f;\n', '23 }\n', '24 inline void print(int x) {\n', '25   if (x < 0) {\n', ""26     putchar('-');\n"", '27     x = -x;\n', '28   }\n', '29   if (x > 9) print(x / 10);\n', ""30   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '31 }\n', '32 inline int gcd(int x, int y) {\n', '33   if (!x) return y;\n', '34   return gcd(y % x, x);\n', '35 }\n', '36 inline long long power(long long x, long long k, long long p) {\n', '37   long long res = 1;\n', '38   for (; k; k >>= 1, x = (long long)x * x % p)\n', '39     if (k & 1) res = (long long)res * x % p;\n', '40   return res;\n', '41 }\n', '42 long long A(int n, int k) {\n', '43   if (k > n) {\n', '44     return 0;\n', '45   }\n', '46   return fact[n] * invFact[k] % mod * invFact[n - k] % mod;\n', '47 }\n', '48 void solve() {\n', '49   n = read();\n', '50   k = read();\n', '51   fact[0] = invFact[0] = 1;\n', '52   for (int i = 1; i >= 1; --i) {\n', '73       now += power(nn, i - 1, mod) * power(ans, k - i, mod);\n', '74       now %= mod;\n', '75     }\n', '76   }\n', '77   printf(""%lld\\n"", now);\n', '78   return;\n', '79 }\n', '80 int main() {\n', '81   t = read();\n', '82   while (t--) {\n', '83     solve();\n', '84   }\n', '85   return 0;\n', '86 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 400010;\n', '4 const int INF = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '6 const double Pi = acos(-1.0);\n', '7 int n, m, k, t;\n', '8 long long fact[maxn], invFact[maxn];\n', '9 int dir[][2] = {{0, 0},  {0, 1},   {-1, 0}, {0, -1}, {1, 0},\n', '10                 {-1, 1}, {-1, -1}, {1, -1}, {1, 1}};\n', '11 inline int read() {\n', '12   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', '13   char ch = getchar();\n', '14   while (!isdigit(ch)) {\n', ""15     if (ch == '-') f = -1;\n"", '16     ch = getchar();\n', '17   }\n', '18   while (isdigit(ch)) {\n', '19     x = x * 10 + ch - 48;\n', '20     ch = getchar();\n', '21   }\n', '22   return x * f;\n', '23 }\n', '24 inline void print(int x) {\n', '25   if (x < 0) {\n', ""26     putchar('-');\n"", '27     x = -x;\n', '28   }\n', '29   if (x > 9) print(x / 10);\n', ""30   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '31 }\n', '32 inline int gcd(int x, int y) {\n', '33   if (!x) return y;\n', '34   return gcd(y % x, x);\n', '35 }\n', '36 inline long long power(long long x, long long k, long long p) {\n', '37   long long res = 1;\n', '38   for (; "
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC target( \\\n', '3     ""sse,sse2,sse3,ssse3,sse4,sse4.1,sse4.2,abm,mmx,avx,avx2,popcnt"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"")\n', '5 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '6 using namespace std;\n', '7 using ll = long long;\n', '8 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '9 using ld = long double;\n', '10 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '11 inline void chkmin(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '12   if (y < x) x = y;\n', '13 }\n', '14 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '15 inline void chkmax(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '16   if (x < y) x = y;\n', '17 }\n', '18 mt19937 rnd(time(0));\n', '19 int mod = 1000000007;\n', '20 int mul(int a, int b) { return 1ll * a * b % mod; }\n', '21 int add(int a, int b) {\n', '22   if (a + b >= mod) return a + b - mod;\n', '23   return a + b;\n', '24 }\n', '25 int sub(int a, int b) {\n', '26   if (a - b < 0) return a - b + mod;\n', '27   return a - b;\n', '28 }\n', '29 int binpow(int a, int b) {\n', '30   int res = 1;\n', '31   while (b) {\n', '32     if (b & 1) res = mul(res, a);\n', '33     a = mul(a, a);\n', '34     b >>= 1;\n', '35   }\n', '36   return res;\n', '37 }\n', '38 const int MAXN = 2e5 + 228;\n', '39 int inv(int x) { return binpow(x, mod - 2); }\n', '40 int fact[MAXN];\n', '41 int rfact[MAXN];\n', '42 int cnk(int n, int k) {\n', '43   if (k < 0 || k > n) return 0;\n', '44   return mul(fact[n], mul(rfact[k], rfact[n - k]));\n', '45 }\n', '46 signed main() {\n', '47   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);\n', '48   cout.precision(20), cout.setf(ios::fixed);\n', '49   fact[0] = 1;\n', '50   for (int i = 1; i < MAXN; ++i) fact[i] = mul(fact[i - 1], i);\n', '51   rfact[MAXN - 1] = inv(fact[MAXN - 1]);\n', '52   for (int i = MAXN - 2; i >= 0; --i) rfact[i] = mul(rfact[i + 1], i + 1);\n', '53   int t;\n', '54   cin >> t;\n', '55   while (t--) {\n', '56     int n, k;\n', '57     cin >> n >> k;\n', '58     if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '59       int am = 0;\n', '60       for (int bt = 0; bt < n; bt += 2) {\n', '61         am = add(am, cnk(n, bt));\n', '62       }\n', '63       int gl = binpow(2, n);\n', '64       int ans = 0;\n', '65       int nw = 1;\n', '66       for (int fbt = k - 1; fbt >= 0; --fbt) {\n', '67         ans = add(ans, mul(nw, binpow(gl, fbt)));\n', '68         nw = mul(nw, am);\n', '69       }\n', '70       ans = add(ans, nw);\n', '71       cout << ans << endl;\n', '72     } else {\n', '73       int am = 1;\n', '74       for (int bt = 0; bt <= n; bt += 2) {\n', '75         am = add(am, cnk(n, bt));\n', '76       }\n', '77       am = binpow(am, k);\n', ""78       cout << am << '\\n';\n"", '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC target( \\\n', '3     ""sse,sse2,sse3,ssse3,sse4,sse4.1,sse4.2,abm,mmx,avx,avx2,popcnt"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"")\n', '5 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '6 using namespace std;\n', '7 using ll = long long;\n', '8 using ull = unsigned long long;\n', '9 using ld = long double;\n', '10 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '11 inline void chkmin(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '12   if (y < x) x = y;\n', '13 }\n', '14 template <typename T1, typename T2>\n', '15 inline void chkmax(T1& x, const T2& y) {\n', '16   if (x < y) x = y;\n', '17 }\n', '18 mt19937 rnd(time(0));\n', '19 int mod = 1000000007;\n', '20 int mul(int a, int b) { return 1ll * a * b % mod; }\n', '21 int add(int a, int b) {\n', '22   if (a + b >= mod) return a + b - mod;\n', '23   return a + b;\n', '24 }\n', '25 int sub(int a, int b) {\n', '26   if (a - b < 0) return a - b + mod;\n', '27   return a - b;\n', '28 }\n', '29 int binpow(int a, int b) {\n', '30   int res = 1;\n', '31   while (b) {\n', '32     if (b & 1) res = mul(res, a);\n', '33     a = mul(a, a);\n', '34     b >>= 1;\n', '35   }\n', '36   return res;\n', '37 }\n', '38 const int MAXN = 2e5 + 228;\n', '39 int inv(int x) { return binpow(x, mod - 2); i < MAXN; ++i) fact[i] = mul(fact[i - 1], i);\n', '51   rfact[MAXN - 1] = inv(fact[MAXN - 1]);\n', '52   for (int i = MAXN - 2; i >= 0; --i) rfact[i] = mul(rfact[i + 1], i + 1);\n', '53   int t;\n', '54   cin >> t;\n', '55   while (t--) {\n', '56     int n, k;\n', '57     cin >> n >> k;\n', '58     if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '59       int am = 0;\n', '60       for (int bt = 0;
