fbt >= 0; --fbt) {\n', '67         ans = add(ans, mul(nw, binpow(gl, fbt)));\n', '68         nw = mul(nw, am);\n', '69       }\n', '70       ans = add(ans, nw);\n', '71       cout << ans << endl;\n', '72     } else {\n', '73       int am = 1;\n', '74       for (int bt = 0; bt <= n; bt += 2) {\n', '75         am = add(am, cnk(n, bt));\n', '76       }\n', '77       am = binpow(am, k);\n', ""78       cout << am << '\\n';\n"", '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81 }\n']"	"63       int gl = binpow(2, n);

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) { return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a; }\n', '5 long long ksm(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   long long ret = 1;\n', '7   while (b) {\n', '8     if (b & 1) ret = ret * a % mod;\n', '9     a = a * a % mod;\n', '10     b >>= 1;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return ret;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long ans, t, n, k;\n', '15 const int N = 2e5 + 5;\n', '16 long long p[N];\n', '17 void solve0() {\n', '18   long long ans = 0, cur = 1;\n', '19   for (int i = k; i >= 1; i--) {\n', '20     ans = (ans + cur * ksm(p[i - 1], n) % mod) % mod;\n', '21     cur = cur * (p[n - 1] - 1) % mod;\n', '22   }\n', '23   cout << (ans + cur) % mod << endl;\n', '24 }\n', '25 void solve1() {\n', '26   long long ans = 0, cur = 1;\n', '27   for (int i = k; i >= 1; i--) {\n', '28     cur = cur * (p[n - 1] + 1) % mod;\n', '29   }\n', '30   cout << cur << endl;\n', '31 }\n', '32 int main() {\n', '33   p[0] = 1;\n', '34   for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) p[i] = p[i - 1] * 2 % mod;\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     cin >> n >> k;\n', '38     ans = 0;\n', '39     if (k == 0) {\n', '40       cout << 1 << endl;\n', '41       continue;\n', '42     }\n', '43     if (n % 2 == 0)\n', '44       solve0();\n', '45     else\n', '46       solve1();\n', '47   }\n', '48   return 0;\n', '49 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) { return b ? ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long dp1[200005][2];\n', '5 long long dp3[200005];\n', '6 long long f1(long long i, long long j) {\n', '7   if (dp1[i][j] != -1) return dp1[i][j];\n', '8   if (i == 0) {\n', '9     if (j == 0)\n', '10       return dp1[i][j] = 1;\n', '11     else\n', '12       return dp1[i][j] = 0;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return dp1[i][j] = (f1(i - 1, j) + f1(i - 1, (j + 1) % 2)) % mod;\n', '15 }\n', '16 long long f2(vector<long long> &dp2, long long i, long long n) {\n', '17   if (i == 0) {\n', '18     return dp3[i] = 1;\n', '19   }\n', '20   if (dp3[i] != -1) return dp3[i];\n', '21   long long ans = 0;\n', '22   if (n % 2) {\n', '23     ans += f2(dp2, i - 1, n);\n', '24     ans %= mod;\n', '25   } else {\n', '26     ans += dp2[i - 1];\n', '27     ans %= mod;\n', '28   }\n', '29   long long d = dp1[n][0];\n', '30   if (n % 2 == 0) {\n', '31     d = (d - 1 + mod) % mod;\n', '32   }\n', '33   ans += d * f2(dp2, i - 1, n) % mod;\n', '34   ans %= mod;\n', '35   return dp3[i] = ans;\n', '36 }\n', '37 void solvef() {\n', '38   long long n, k;\n', '39   cin >> n >> k;\n', '40   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct tri {\n', '4   long long x, y, z;\n', '5   tri() : x(0), y(0), z(0) {}\n', '6   tri(const long long x, const long long y, const long long z)\n', '7       : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}\n', '8   tri(const tri &t) : x(t.x), y(t.y), z(t.z) {}\n', '9 };\n', '10 bool query_compare(const tri &a, const tri &b) { return a.x < b.x; }\n', '11 class OverlapCompare {\n', '12  public:\n', '13   bool operator()(const tri &a, const tri &b) {\n', '14     if (a.y == b.y) return a.x < b.x;\n', '15     return a.y < b.y;\n', '16   }\n', '17 };\n', '18 long long n, m;\n', '19 tri querys[300005];\n', '20 set<tri, OverlapCompare> overlap;\n', '21 long long dp[300005];\n', '22 long long record[300005];\n', '23 list<tri> be_add, be_remove;\n', '24 bool removed[300005];\n', '25 int main() {\n', '26   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '27   cin.tie(0);\n', '28   cout.tie(0);\n', '29   cin >> n >> m;\n', '30   for (long long i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '31     cin >> querys[i].x >> querys[i].y >> querys[i].z;\n', '32   }\n', '33   stable_sort(querys, querys + m, query_compare);\n', '34   fill_n(dp, n + 1, 1);\n', '35   for (long long i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '36     set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator lb =\n', '37         overlap.lower_bound(tri(-1LL, querys[i].y, querys[i].z));\n', '38     set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator ub =\n', '39         overlap.upper_bound(tri((long long)1e15, querys[i].z, 0LL));\n', '40     if (lb != overlap.begin()) {\n', '41       if ((--lb)->z < querys[i].y) {\n', '42         ++lb;\n', '43       }\n', '44     }\n', '45     for (set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator it = lb; it != ub; it++) {\n', '46       if (it->x == querys[i].x) continue;\n', '47       if (dp[querys[i].x] < dp[it->x] + 1) {\n', '48         dp[querys[i].x] = dp[it->x] + 1;\n', '49         record[querys[i].x] = it->x;\n', '50       }\n', '51     }\n', '52     be_add.clear();\n', '53     be_remove.clear();\n', '54     for (set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator it = lb; it != ub; it++) {\n', '55       bool cur_be_remove = false;\n', '56       if (it->y < querys[i].y && it->z >= querys[i].y) {\n', '57         be_add.push_back(tri(it->x, it->y, querys[i].y - 1));\n', '58         cur_be_remove = true;\n', '59       }\n', '60       if (it->y <= querys[i].z && querys[i].z < it->z) {\n', '61         be_add.push_back(tri(it->x, querys[i].z + 1, it->z));\n', '62         cur_be_remove = true;\n', '63       }\n', '64       if (it->y >= querys[i].y && it->z <= querys[i].z) {\n', '65         cur_be_remove = true;\n', '66       }\n', '67       if (cur_be_remove) {\n', '68         be_remove.push_back(*it);\n', '69       }\n', '70     }\n', '71     for (list<tri>::iterator it = be_remove.begin(); it != be_remove.end();\n', '72          it++) {\n', '73       overlap.erase(*it);\n', '74     }\n', '75     for (list<tri>::iterator it = be_add.begin(); it != be_add.end(); it++) {\n', '76       overlap.insert(*it);\n', '77     }\n', '78     overlap.insert(querys[i]);\n', '79   }\n', '80   long long rst_idx = 1;\n', '81   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '82     if (dp[i] > dp[rst_idx]) rst_idx = i;\n', '83   }\n', '84   long long i = rst_idx;\n', '85   fill_n(removed, n + 1, true);\n', '86   while (i != 0) {\n', '87     removed[i] = false;\n', '88     i = record[i];\n', '89   }\n', ""90   cout << n - dp[rst_idx] << '\\n';\n"", '91   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', ""92     if (removed[i]) cout << i << ' ';\n"", '93   }\n', ""94   cout << '\\n';\n"", '95   return 0;\n', '96 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct tri {\n', '4   long long x, y, z;\n', '5   tri() : x(0), y(0), z(0) {}\n', '6   tri(const long long x, const long long y, const long long z)\n', '7       : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}\n', '8   tri(const tri &t) : x(t.x), y(t.y), z(t.z) {}\n', '9 };\n', '10 bool query_compare(const tri &a, const tri &b) { return a.x < b.x; i < m; i++) {\n', '36     set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator lb =\n', '37         overlap.lower_bound(tri(-1LL, querys[i].y, querys[i].z));\n', '38     set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator ub =\n', '39         overlap.upper_bound(tri((long long)1e15, querys[i].z, 0LL));\n', '40     if (lb != overlap.begin()) {\n', '41       if ((--lb)->z < querys[i].y) {\n', '42         ++lb;\n', '43       }\n', '44     }\n', '45     for (set<tri, OverlapCompare>::iterator it = lb; it != be_remove.end();\n', '72          it++) {\n', '73       overlap.erase(*it);\n', '74     }\n', '75     for (list<tri>::iterator it = be_add.begin(); it != be_add.end(); it++) {\n', '76       overlap.insert(*it);\n', '77     }\n', '78     overlap.insert(querys[i]);\n', '79   }\n', '80   long long rst_idx = 0;\n', '81   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 signed main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   cout.tie(0);\n', '7   long long t;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     long long n;\n', '11     cin >> n;\n', '12     vector<long long> v(n);\n', '13     for (long long &first : v) cin >> first;\n', '14     bool flag = false;\n', '15     for (long long i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int qpow(int a, int b) {\n', '5   int res = 1;\n', '6   while (b) {\n', '7     if (b & 1) res = (long long)res * a % mod;\n', '8     a = (long long)a * a % mod;\n', '9     b >>= 1;\n', '10   }\n', '11   return res;\n', '12 }\n', '13 int fac[200015 << 1], ifac[200015 << 1];\n', '14 int C(int n, int m) {\n', '15   if (n < m || m < 0) return 0;\n', '16   return (long long)fac[n] * ifac[m] % mod * ifac[n - m] % mod;\n', '17 }\n', '18 int t, n, m, x[200015], y[200015];\n', '19 int sum[200015];\n', '20 void add(int p, int v) {\n', '21   for (; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct BIT {\n', '4   vector<long long> bit;\n', '5   long long n;\n', '6   BIT(long long size) {\n', '7     n = size + 1;\n', '8     bit.assign(n, 0);\n', '9   }\n', '10   void upd(long long pos, long long val) {\n', '11     for (++pos; pos < n; pos += pos & -pos) {\n', '12       bit[pos] += val;\n', '13     }\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long get(long long pos) {\n', '16     long long ret = 0;\n', '17     for (++pos; pos > 0; pos -= pos & -pos) {\n', '18       ret += bit[pos];\n', '19     }\n', '20     return ret;\n', '21   }\n', '22 };\n', '23 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '24 long long x[200005], y[200005];\n', '25 long long pos[200005];\n', '26 long long binpow(long long a, long long b) {\n', '27   long long res = 1;\n', '28   while (b > 0) {\n', '29     if (b & 1) res = res * a % mod;\n', '30     a = a * a % mod;\n', '31     b >>= 1;\n', '32   }\n', '33   return res;\n', '34 }\n', '35 long long fact[2 * 200005];\n', '36 long long ans(long long a, long long b) {\n', '37   return fact[a] * binpow(fact[b], mod - 2) % mod *\n', '38          binpow(fact[a - b], mod - 2) % mod;\n', '39 }\n', '40 BIT bt(200005);\n', '41 void solve() {\n', '42   long long n, m;\n', '43   cin >> n >> m;\n', '44   for (long long i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '45     cin >> x[i] >> y[i];\n', '46   }\n', '47   map<long long, long long> ck;\n', '48   for (long long i = m; i >= 1; i--) {\n', '49     long long l = 1, r = n;\n', '50     while (l < r) {\n', '51       long long m = (l + r) / 2;\n', '52       if (m - bt.get(m) < y[i]) {\n', '53         l = m + 1;\n', '54       } else\n', '55         r = m;\n', '56     }\n', '57     pos[i] = l;\n', '58     ck[l] = 1;\n', '59     bt.upd(l, 1);\n', '60   }\n', '61   set<long long> s2;\n', '62   for (long long i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '63     if (!ck[pos[i] + 1]) {\n', '64       s2.insert(pos[i] + 1);\n', '65     }\n', '66   }\n', '67   map<long long, long long> mp;\n', '68   long long cnt = 0;\n', '69   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = (int)4e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int MOD = 998244353;\n', '5 const int K = 3500;\n', '6 const int M = 60;\n', '7 const long long S = (1ll << M) - 1;\n', '8 int addMod(int a, int b, int m = MOD) { return a + b < m ? a + b : a + b - m; }\n', '9 int mulMod(int a, int b, int m = MOD) { return a * 1ll * b % m; }\n', '10 int binPow(int a, int b, int m = MOD) {\n', '11   int ret = 1;\n', '12   while (b > 0) {\n', '13     if (b & 1) {\n', '14       ret = mulMod(ret, a, m);\n', '15     }\n', '16     a = mulMod(a, a, m);\n', '17     b >>= 1;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ret;\n', '20 }\n', '21 int fact[MAXN], inv[MAXN];\n', '22 int n, m;\n', '23 void pre() {\n', '24   fact[0] = 1;\n', '25   for (int i = (1); i < (MAXN); ++i) {\n', '26     fact[i] = mulMod(fact[i - 1], i);\n', '27   }\n', '28   inv[MAXN - 1] = binPow(fact[MAXN - 1], MOD - 2);\n', '29   for (int i = MAXN - 1; i; --i) {\n', '30     inv[i - 1] = mulMod(inv[i], i);\n', '31   }\n', '32 }\n', '33 int C(int n, int k) { return mulMod(fact[n], mulMod(inv[k], inv[n - k])); }\n', '34 bool bit(long long x, int p) { return x & (1ll << p); }\n', '35 long long B[K + 1];\n', '36 void solve() {\n', '37   cin >> n >> m;\n', '38   fill(B, B + K + 1, 0ll);\n', '39   for (int i = (0); i < (m); ++i) {\n', '40     int x, y;\n', '41     cin >> x >> y;\n', '42     --y;\n', '43     int idx = y / M;\n', '44     y %= M;\n', '45     B[idx] |= (1ll << y);\n', '46     for (int j = K - 1; j > idx; --j) {\n', '47       B[j + 1] |= bit(B[j], M - 1);\n', '48       B[j] = ((B[j] << 1) & S);\n', '49     }\n', '50     long long a = (B[idx] & ((1ll << y) - 1));\n', '51     long long b = (B[idx] ^ a);\n', '52     B[idx + 1] |= bit(b, M - 1);\n', '53     B[idx] = ((a + (b << 1)) & S);\n', '54   }\n', '55   int cnt = n - 1;\n', '56   for (int i = (0); i < (K); ++i) {\n', '57     cnt -= __builtin_popcountll(B[i]);\n', '58   }\n', '59   int ans = C(n + cnt, n);\n', ""60   cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '61 }\n', '62 int main() {\n', '63   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '64   cin.tie(0);\n', '65   cout.tie(0);\n', '66   int tt = 1;\n', '67   cin >> tt;\n', '68   pre();\n', '69   for (int i = 1; i <= tt; ++i) {\n', '70     solve();\n', '71   }\n', '72   return 0;\n', '73 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = (int)4e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int MOD = 998244353;\n', '5 const int K = 3500;\n', '6 const int M = 60;\n', '7 const long long S = (1ll << M) - 1;\n', '8 int addMod(int a, int b, int m = MOD) { return a + b < m ? a + b : a + b - m; }\n', '9 int mulMod(int a, int b, int m = MOD) { return a * 1ll * b % m; }\n', '10 int binPow(int a, int b, int m = MOD) {\n', '11   int ret = 1;\n', '12   while (b > 0) {\n', '13     if (b & 1) {\n', '14       ret = mulMod(ret, a, m);\n', '15     }\n', '16     a = mulMod(a, a, m);\n', '17     b >>= 1;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return ret;\n', '20 }\n', '21 int fact[MAXN], inv[MAXN];\n', '22 int n, m;\n', '23 void pre() {\n', '24   fact[0] = 1;\n', '25   for (int i = (1); i < (MAXN); ++i) {\n', '26     fact[i] = mulMod(fact[i - 1], i);\n', '27   }\n', '28   inv[MAXN - 1] = binPow(fact[MAXN - 1], MOD - 2);\n', '29   for (int i = MAXN - 1; i; --i) {\n', '30     inv[i - 1] = mulMod(inv[i], i);\n', '31   }\n', '32 }\n', '33 int C(int n, int k) { return mulMod(fact[n], mulMod(inv[k], inv[n - k])); }\n', '34 bool bit(long long x, int p) { return x & (1 << p); }\n', '35 long long B[K + 1];\n', '36 void solve() {\n', '37   cin >> n >> m;\n', '38   fill(B, B + K + 1, 0ll);\n', '39   for (int i = (0); i <= tt; ++i) {\n', '70     solve();\n', '71   }\n', '72   return 0;\n', '73 }\n']"	"34 bool bit(long long x, int p) { return x & (1ll << p); }
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1005;\n', '4 int n, m, suc;\n', '5 vector<int> e[N];\n', '6 int a[N], b[N], fr[N];\n', '7 long long ATK;\n', '8 int vis[N];\n', '9 void dfs(int x, int fa, long long ATK) {\n', '10   if (suc) return;\n', '11   for (auto i : e[x])\n', '12     if (i != fa && a[i] < ATK) {\n', '13       if (vis[i] && vis[x]) continue;\n', '14       if (vis[i]) {\n', '15         suc = 1;\n', '16         for (int j = x; j; j = fr[j]) vis[j] = 1;\n', '17       } else if (fr[i]) {\n', '18         suc = 1;\n', '19         for (int j = i; j; j = fr[j]) vis[j] = 1;\n', '20         for (int j = x; j; j = fr[j]) vis[j] = 1;\n', '21       } else {\n', '22         fr[i] = x;\n', '23         dfs(i, x, ATK + b[i]);\n', '24       }\n', '25       if (suc) return;\n', '26     }\n', '27 }\n', '28 bool check(int v) {\n', '29   int rem = n - 1;\n', '30   memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis));\n', '31   vis[1] = 1;\n', '32   for (;;) {\n', '33     bool flg = 0;\n', '34     suc = 0;\n', '35     long long ATK = v;\n', '36     memset(fr, 0, sizeof(fr));\n', '37     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '38       if (vis[i])\n', '39         ATK += b[i];\n', '40       else\n', '41         flg = 1;\n', '42     if (!flg) return 1;\n', '43     for (int i = 1; i <= n && !suc; i++)\n', '44       if (vis[i]) dfs(i, 0, ATK);\n', '45     if (!suc) return 0;\n', '46   }\n', '47 }\n', '48 void solve() {\n', '49   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '50   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int M = 1005;\n', '4 const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 int read() {\n', '6   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', '7   char c;\n', ""8   while ((c = getchar()) < '0' || c > '9') {\n"", ""9     if (c == '-') f = -1;\n"", '10   }\n', ""11   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {\n"", '12     x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + (c ^ 48);\n', '13     c = getchar();\n', '14   }\n', '15   return x * f;\n', '16 }\n', '17 int T, n, m, ans, a[M], b[M], vis[M], cur[M], pre[M];\n', '18 vector<int> g[M];\n', '19 int path(int x) {\n', '20   if (vis[x]) return 0;\n', '21   vis[x] = 1;\n', '22   return min(inf, path(pre[x]) + b[x]);\n', '23 }\n', '24 int dfs(int u, int x) {\n', '25   x = min(inf, x + b[u]);\n', '26   cur[u] = 1;\n', '27   for (auto v : g[u]) {\n', '28     if (v == pre[u] || x <= a[v]) continue;\n', '29     if (cur[v]) return path(u) + path(v);\n', '30     pre[v] = u;\n', '31     int f = dfs(v, x);\n', '32     if (f != -1) return f;\n', '33   }\n', '34   return -1;\n', '35 }\n', '36 int check(int x) {\n', '37   int f = 0;\n', '38   memset(vis, 0, sizeof vis);\n', '39   vis[1] = 1;\n', '40   while (f != -1) {\n', '41     f = -1;\n', '42     memcpy(cur, vis, sizeof cur);\n', '43     for (int u = 1; u <= n && f == -1; u++)\n', '44       if (vis[u])\n', '45         for (auto v : g[u])\n', '46           if (!vis[v] && x > a[v]) {\n', '47             pre[v] = u;\n', '48             f = dfs(v, x);\n', '49             if (f != -1) break;\n', '50           }\n', '51     if (f == -1) {\n', '52       for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '53         if (!vis[i]) return 0;\n', '54       return 1;\n', '55     }\n', '56     x = min(inf, x + f);\n', '57   }\n', '58   return 0;\n', '59 }\n', '60 void dich(int l, int r) {\n', '61   if (l > r) return;\n', '62   int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '63   if (check(mid)) {\n', '64     ans = mid;\n', '65     dich(l, mid - 1);\n', '66   } else\n', '67     dich(mid + 1, r);\n', '68 }\n', '69 void work() {\n', '70   n = read();\n', '71   m = read();\n', '72   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) g[i].clear();\n', '73   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) a[i] = read();\n', '74   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) b[i] = read();\n', '75   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '76     int u = read(), v = read();\n', '77     g[u].push_back(v);\n', '78     g[v].push_back(u);\n', '79   }\n', '80   dich(0, inf);\n', '81   printf(""%d\\n"", ans);\n', '82 }\n', '83 signed main() {\n', '84   T = read();\n', '85   while (T--) work();\n', '86 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int M = 1005;\n', '4 const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 int read() {\n', '6   int x = 0, f = 1;\n', '7   char c;\n', ""8   while ((c = getchar()) < '0' || c > '9') {\n"", ""9     if (c == '-') f = -1;\n"", '10   }\n', ""11   while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {\n"", '12     x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + (c ^ 48);\n', '13     c = getchar();\n', '14   }\n', '15   return x * f;\n', '16 }\n', '17 int T, n, m, ans, a[M], b[M], vis[M], cur[M], pre[M];\n', '18 vector<int> g[M];\n', '19 int path(int x) {\n', '20   if (vis[x]) return 0;\n', '21   vis[x] = 1;\n', '22   return min(inf, path(pre[x]) + b[x]);\n', '23 }\n', '24 int dfs(int u, int x) {\n', '25   x = min(inf, x + b[u]);\n', '26   cur[u] = 1;\n', '27   for (auto v : g[u]) {\n', '28     if (v == pre[u] || x <= a[v]) continue;\n', '29     if (cur[v]) return path(u) + path(v);\n', '30     pre[v] = u;\n', '31     int f = dfs(v, x);\n', '32     if (f != -1) return f;\n', '33   }\n', '34   return -1;\n', '35 }\n', '36 int check(int x) {\n', '37   int f = 0;\n', '38   memset(vis, 0, sizeof vis);\n', '39   vis[1] = 1;\n', '40   while (f != -1) {\n', '41     f = -1;\n', '42     memcpy(cur, vis, sizeof cur);\n', '43     for (int u = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long n, m, a[2005], b[2005], inset[2005], from[2005], vis[2005];\n', '4 long long dt;\n', '5 vector<long long> e[2005], vec;\n', '6 void fuck(long long x) {\n', '7   while (!inset[x]) {\n', '8     dt += b[x];\n', '9     vec.push_back(x);\n', '10     inset[x] = 1;\n', '11     x = from[x];\n', '12   }\n', '13 }\n', '14 bool dfs(long long u, long long pw) {\n', '15   vis[u] = 1;\n', '16   for (auto v : e[u]) {\n', '17     if (pw <= a[v]) continue;\n', '18     if (inset[u] && inset[v]) continue;\n', '19     if (v == from[u]) continue;\n', '20     if (vis[v]) {\n', '21       fuck(v);\n', '22       fuck(u);\n', '23       return 1;\n', '24     } else {\n', '25       from[v] = u;\n', '26       if (dfs(v, pw + b[v])) return 1;\n', '27     }\n', '28   }\n', '29   return 0;\n', '30 }\n', '31 bool check(long long p) {\n', '32   vec.clear();\n', '33   for (long long i = (1); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const int N = 1010;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 int n, m;\n', '5 int a[N], b[N];\n', '6 int used[N];\n', '7 vector<int> v[N];\n', '8 int par[N];\n', '9 int X, Y;\n', '10 void dfs(int x, int p, long long k) {\n', '11   k += b[x];\n', '12   used[x] = 1;\n', '13   par[x] = p;\n', '14   for (int y : v[x]) {\n', '15     if (y == p || k <= a[y]) {\n', '16       continue;\n', '17     } else if (used[y]) {\n', '18       X = x;\n', '19       Y = y;\n', '20     } else {\n', '21       dfs(y, x, k);\n', '22     }\n', '23     if (X != -1) {\n', '24       break;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n', '28 bool can(long long k) {\n', '29   int cnt = 1;\n', '30   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '31     used[i] = 0;\n', '32   }\n', '33   used[1] = 2;\n', '34   while (cnt < n) {\n', '35     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '36       if (used[i] == 1) {\n', '37         used[i] = 0;\n', '38       }\n', '39       par[i] = -1;\n', '40     }\n', '41     X = Y = -1;\n', '42     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '43       if (used[i] == 2) {\n', '44         for (int j : v[i]) {\n', '45           if (used[j] == 2 || k <= a[j]) {\n', '46             continue;\n', '47           }\n', '48           if (used[j] == 1) {\n', '49             X = i;\n', '50             Y = j;\n', '51           } else {\n', '52             dfs(j, i, k);\n', '53           }\n', '54           if (X != -1) {\n', '55             break;\n', '56           }\n', '57         }\n', '58       }\n', '59       if (X != -1) {\n', '60         break;\n', '61       }\n', '62     }\n', '63     if (X == -1) {\n', '64       return false;\n', '65     }\n', '66     for (int x : {X, Y}) {\n', '67       while (used[x] != 2) {\n', '68         used[x] = 2;\n', '69         k += b[x];\n', '70         x = par[x];\n', '71         cnt += 1;\n', '72       }\n', '73     }\n', '74   }\n', '75   return cnt == n;\n', '76 }\n', '77 void solve() {\n', '78   cin >> n >> m;\n', '79   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '80     v[i].clear();\n', '81   }\n', '82   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '83     cin >> a[i];\n', '84   }\n', '85   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '86     cin >> b[i];\n', '87   }\n', '88   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '89     int x, y;\n', '90     cin >> x >> y;\n', '91     v[x].push_back(y);\n', '92     v[y].push_back(x);\n', '93   }\n', '94   int l = 0, r = 1e9 + 1;\n', '95   while (l < r) {\n', '96     int m = (l + r) / 2;\n', '97     if (can(m)) {\n', '98       r = m;\n', '99     } else {\n', '100       l = m + 1;\n', '101     }\n', '102   }\n', '103   cout << l << ""\\n"";\n', '104 }\n', '105 int main() {\n', '106   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '107   int t;\n', '108   cin >> t;\n', '109   while (t--) {\n', '110     solve();\n', '111   }\n', '112 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const int N = 1010;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 int n, m;\n', '5 int a[N], b[N];\n', '6 int used[N];\n', '7 vector<int> v[N];\n', '8 int par[N];\n', '9 int X, Y;\n', '10 void dfs(int x, int p, long long k) {\n', '11   k += b[x];\n', '12   used[x] = 1;\n', '13   par[x] = p;\n', '14   for (int y : v[x]) {\n', '15     if (y == p || k <= a[y]) {\n', '16       continue;\n', '17     } else if (used[y]) {\n', '18       X = x;\n', '19       Y = y;\n', '20     } else {\n', '21       dfs(y, x, k);\n', '22     }\n', '23     if (X != -1) {\n', '24       break;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n', '28 bool can(long long k) {\n', '29   int cnt = 1;\n', '30   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int Inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 int N, M;\n', '5 int a[1005], b[1005];\n', '6 vector<int> nei[1005];\n', '7 bool lgl[1005];\n', '8 bool in[1005];\n', '9 long long nhp;\n', '10 bool dfs(int now, int lst, long long hp) {\n', '11   if (hp < a[now]) return 0;\n', '12   lgl[now] = 1;\n', '13   for (int i = 0; i < (((int)(nei[now]).size())); ++i) {\n', '14     int to = nei[now][i];\n', '15     if (to == lst) continue;\n', '16     if (lgl[to] || in[to]) return nhp = hp + b[now], in[now] = 1, 1;\n', '17     if (dfs(to, now, hp + b[now])) {\n', '18       in[now] = 1;\n', '19       return 1;\n', '20     }\n', '21   }\n', '22   return 0;\n', '23 }\n', '24 bool check(long long hp) {\n', '25   memset(in, 0, sizeof(in));\n', '26   in[1] = 1;\n', '27   while (1) {\n', '28     memset(lgl, 0, sizeof(lgl));\n', '29     bool fnd = 0;\n', '30     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int a[1010];\n', '4 int b[1010];\n', '5 bool mark[1010];\n', '6 int from[1010];\n', '7 int cnt = 0;\n', '8 vector<int> outgo[1010];\n', '9 bool extendFlag = false;\n', '10 int baseValue = 0;\n', '11 void update(int x) {\n', '12   if (mark[x]) return;\n', '13   baseValue += b[x];\n', '14   if (baseValue > 1000000001) baseValue = 1000000001;\n', '15   mark[x] = true;\n', '16   cnt++;\n', '17   update(from[x]);\n', '18 }\n', '19 void dfs(int now, int str) {\n', '20   if (extendFlag) return;\n', '21   if (str > 1000000001) str = 1000000001;\n', '22   for (int i = 0; i < outgo[now].size(); i++) {\n', '23     int to = outgo[now][i];\n', '24     if (to == from[now]) continue;\n', '25     if (mark[to] && mark[now]) continue;\n', '26     if (from[to] == -1) {\n', '27       if (mark[to]) {\n', '28         update(now);\n', '29         extendFlag = true;\n', '30         return;\n', '31       } else if (a[to] < str) {\n', '32         from[to] = now;\n', '33         dfs(to, str + b[to]);\n', '34       }\n', '35     } else {\n', '36       if (mark[to]) {\n', '37         extendFlag = true;\n', '38         update(now);\n', '39         return;\n', '40       } else if (a[to] < str) {\n', '41         update(to);\n', '42         update(now);\n', '43         extendFlag = true;\n', '44         return;\n', '45       }\n', '46     }\n', '47   }\n', '48 }\n', '49 int main() {\n', '50   int T;\n', '51   scanf(""%d"", &T);\n', '52   while (T--) {\n', '53     int n, m;\n', '54     scanf(""%d %d"", &n, &m);\n', '55     for (int i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 const int N = 1005;\n', '3 void work(int u);\n', '4 bool dfs(int u, long long now);\n', '5 int a[N], b[N];\n', '6 std::vector<int> G[N];\n', '7 int fa[N];\n', '8 bool vis[N];\n', '9 long long now;\n', '10 int cnt;\n', '11 int n, m;\n', '12 int main() {\n', '13   int T;\n', '14   scanf(""%d"", &T);\n', '15   while (T--) {\n', '16     scanf(""%d %d"", &n, &m);\n', '17     for (int i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const int MAXN = 1e3 + 1;\n', '5 vector<int> g[MAXN];\n', '6 int n, m, a[MAXN], b[MAXN];\n', '7 bool vis[MAXN];\n', '8 long long dis[MAXN];\n', '9 int pre[MAXN];\n', '10 bool check(int x) {\n', '11   memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis));\n', '12   vis[1] = 1;\n', '13   long long totb = 0;\n', '14   while (true) {\n', '15     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) dis[i] = -1;\n', '16     totb = 0;\n', '17     bool ok = false;\n', '18     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)\n', '19       if (vis[i]) totb += b[i];\n', '20     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) ok |= !vis[i];\n', '21     if (!ok) break;\n', '22     totb += x;\n', '23     queue<int> q;\n', '24     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)\n', '25       if (vis[i])\n', '26         for (auto it : g[i]) {\n', '27           if (!vis[it] && a[it] < totb && dis[it] == -1) {\n', '28             q.push(it);\n', '29             dis[it] = totb;\n', '30             pre[it] = i;\n', '31           }\n', '32         }\n', '33     ok = false;\n', '34     while (!q.empty()) {\n', '35       int now = q.front();\n', '36       q.pop();\n', '37       for (auto it : g[now])\n', '38         if (it != pre[now]) {\n', '39           if (vis[it]) {\n', '40             ok = 1;\n', '41             while (!vis[now]) {\n', '42               vis[now] = 1;\n', '43               now = pre[now];\n', '44             }\n', '45             break;\n', '46           } else {\n', '47             if (dis[now] + b[now] <= a[it]) {\n', '48               continue;\n', '49             }\n', '50             if (dis[it] != -1) {\n', '51               ok = 1;\n', '52               while (!vis[now]) {\n', '53                 vis[now] = 1;\n', '54                 now = pre[now];\n', '55               }\n', '56               now = it;\n', '57               while (!vis[now]) {\n', '58                 vis[now] = 1;\n', '59                 now = pre[now];\n', '60               }\n', '61               break;\n', '62             } else {\n', '63               pre[it] = now;\n', '64               dis[it] = dis[now] + b[now];\n', '65               q.push(it);\n', '66             }\n', '67           }\n', '68         }\n', '69       if (ok) break;\n', '70     }\n', '71     if (!ok) return false;\n', '72   }\n', '73   return true;\n', '74 }\n', '75 void solve() {\n', '76   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &m);\n', '77   for (int i = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 1010;\n', '4 int T, n, m, a[maxn], b[maxn], vis[maxn], lst[maxn];\n', '5 long long d[maxn];\n', '6 vector<int> G[maxn];\n', '7 int main() {\n', '8   scanf(""%d"", &T);\n', '9   while (T--) {\n', '10     scanf(""%d %d"", &n, &m);\n', '11     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 4005, inf = 1e9;\n', '4 int n, m, a[N], b[N], lst[N];\n', '5 vector<int> g[N];\n', '6 long long dis[N];\n', '7 bool rns[N];\n', '8 bool asdf(long long &w) {\n', '9   queue<int> q;\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     if (rns[i])\n', '12       q.push(i), dis[i] = w, lst[i] = -1;\n', '13     else\n', '14       dis[i] = -1, lst[i] = -1;\n', '15   }\n', '16   while (!q.empty()) {\n', '17     int u = q.front();\n', '18     q.pop();\n', '19     for (auto v : g[u])\n', '20       if (a[v] < dis[u] && !(rns[u] && rns[v]) && lst[u] != v) {\n', '21         if (dis[v] == -1)\n', '22           dis[v] = dis[u] + b[v], lst[v] = u, q.push(v);\n', '23         else {\n', '24           for (int x = u; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     if (rns[i])\n', '12       q.push(i), dis[i] = w, lst[i] = -1;\n', '13     else\n', '14       dis[i] = -1, lst[i] = -1;\n', '15   }\n', '16   while (!q.empty()) {\n', '17     int u = q.front();\n', '18     q.pop();\n', '19     for (auto v : g[u])\n', '20       if (a[v] < dis[u] && !(rns[u] && rns[v]) && lst[u] != v) {\n', '21         if (dis[v] == -1)\n', '22           dis[v] = dis[u] + b[v], lst[v] = u, q.push(v);\n', '23         else {\n', '24           for (int x = u; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC target(""avx2"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimization(""O3"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimization(""unroll-loops"")\n', '5 using namespace std;\n', '6 clock_t timeStart, timeFinish;\n', '7 void timeBegin() { timeStart = clock(); }\n', '8 void timeEnd() { timeFinish = clock(); }\n', '9 void timeDuration() {\n', '10   timeEnd();\n', '11   double time_taken = double(timeFinish - timeStart) / double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC);\n', '12   cout << ""Time taken by program is : "" << fixed << time_taken\n', '13        << setprecision(5);\n', '14   cout << "" sec "" << endl;\n', '15 }\n', '16 class InputReader {\n', '17  public:\n', '18   InputReader() {\n', '19     input_file = stdin;\n', '20     cursor = 0;\n', '21     fread(buffer, SIZE, 1, input_file);\n', '22   }\n', '23   InputReader(const char *file_name) {\n', '24     input_file = fopen(file_name, ""r"");\n', '25     cursor = 0;\n', '26     fread(buffer, SIZE, 1, input_file);\n', '27   }\n', '28   inline InputReader &operator>>(int &n) {\n', ""29     while ((buffer[cursor] < '0' || buffer[cursor] > '9') &&\n"", ""30            buffer[cursor] != '-') {\n"", '31       advance();\n', '32     }\n', '33     int sign = 1;\n', ""34     if (buffer[cursor] == '-') {\n"", '35       sign = -1;\n', '36       advance();\n', '37     }\n', '38     n = 0;\n', ""39     while ('0' <= buffer[cursor] && buffer[cursor] <= '9') {\n"", ""40       n = n * 10 + buffer[cursor] - '0';\n"", '41       advance();\n', '42     }\n', '43     n *= sign;\n', '44     return *this;\n', '45   }\n', '46 \n', '47  private:\n', '48   FILE *input_file;\n', '49   static const int SIZE = 1 << 17;\n', '50   int cursor;\n', '51   char buffer[SIZE];\n', '52   inline void advance() {\n', '53     ++cursor;\n', '54     if (cursor == SIZE) {\n', '55       cursor = 0;\n', '56       fread(buffer, SIZE, 1, input_file);\n', '57     }\n', '58   }\n', '59 };\n', '60 const int MAXN = 1000;\n', '61 const int INF = 1000000001;\n', '62 int a[1 + MAXN], b[1 + MAXN];\n', '63 vector<int> g[1 + MAXN];\n', '64 bool taken[1 + MAXN];\n', '65 int dad[1 + MAXN], total;\n', '66 long long power;\n', '67 bool found;\n', '68 void take(int node) {\n', '69   while (dad[node] != node) {\n', '70     if (!taken[node]) {\n', '71       taken[node] = true;\n', '72       total++;\n', '73       power += b[node];\n', '74     }\n', '75     node = dad[node];\n', '76   }\n', '77 }\n', '78 void DFS(int node, long long current) {\n', '79   for (auto neighbour : g[node]) {\n', '80     if (dad[neighbour] != 0 && neighbour != dad[node] &&\n', '81         (!taken[node] || !taken[neighbour])) {\n', '82       found = true;\n', '83       take(node);\n', '84       take(neighbour);\n', '85       return;\n', '86     }\n', '87     if (dad[neighbour] == 0 && current > a[neighbour]) {\n', '88       dad[neighbour] = node;\n', '89       DFS(neighbour, current + b[neighbour]);\n', '90     }\n', '91     if (found) {\n', '92       return;\n', '93     }\n', '94   }\n', '95 }\n', '96 bool check(int n, int start) {\n', '97   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '98     taken[i] = false;\n', '99   }\n', '100   taken[1] = true;\n', '101   total = 1;\n', '102   power = start;\n', '103   while (total < n) {\n', '104     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '105       if (taken[i]) {\n', '106         dad[i] = i;\n', '107       } else {\n', '108         dad[i] = 0;\n', '109       }\n', '110     }\n', '111     found = false;\n', '112     for (int i = 1; i <= n && !found; i++) {\n', '113       if (taken[i]) {\n', '114         DFS(i, power);\n', '115       }\n', '116     }\n', '117     if (!found) {\n', '118       return false;\n', '119     }\n', '120   }\n', '121   return true;\n', '122 }\n', '123 int main() {\n', '124   timeBegin();\n', '125   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '126   cin.tie(0);\n', '127   srand(time(0));\n', '128   int tests;\n', '129   cin >> tests;\n', '130   for (int test = 1; test <= tests; test++) {\n', '131     int n, m;\n', '132     cin >> n >> m;\n', '133     for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '134       cin >> a[i];\n', '135     }\n', '136     for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '137       cin >> b[i];\n', '138     }\n', '139     for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '140       int a, b;\n', '141       cin >> a >> b;\n', '142       g[a].push_back(b);\n', '143       g[b].push_back(a);\n', '144     }\n', '145     int left = 1, right = INF, answer = INF;\n', '146     while (left <= right) {\n', '147       int middle = (left + right) / 2;\n', '148       if (check(n, middle)) {\n', '149         answer =     advance();\n', '42     }\n', '43     n *= sign;\n', '44     return *this;\n', '45   }\n', '46 \n', '47  private:\n', '48   FILE *input_file;\n', '49   static const int SIZE = 1 << 17;\n', '50 '71       taken[node] = true;\n', '72       total++;\n', '73       power += b[node];\n', '74     }\n', '75     node = dad[node];\n', '76   }\n', '77 }\n', '78 void DFS(int node, long long current)       take(node);\n', '84       take(neighbour);\n', '85       return;\n', '86     }\n', '87     if (dad[neighbour] == 0 && current > a[neighbour]) {\n', '88       dad[neighbour] = node;\n', '89 "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 #pragma GCC target(""avx2"")\n', '4 #pragma GCC optimization(""O3"")\n', '5 #pragma GCC optimization(""unroll-loops"")\n', '6 void solve() {\n', '7   long long int n;\n', '8   cin >> n;\n', '9   string s;\n', '10   cin >> s;\n', '11   vector<vector<int>> temp;\n', '12   vector<int> k;\n', '13   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long double pai = 3.1415926536;\n', '4 const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 const long long INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 const unsigned long long bas = 2333;\n', '7 const int MAXN = 6e5 + 10;\n', '8 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '9 int dx[] = {-1, 0, 1, -1, 1, -1, 0, 1};\n', '10 int dy[] = {-1, -1, -1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1};\n', '11 template <typename T>\n', '12 void rd(T &x) {\n', '13   char ch = getchar();\n', '14   x = 0;\n', '15   int f = 1;\n', ""16   while (ch < '0' || ch > '9') {\n"", ""17     if (ch == '-') f = -1;\n"", '18     ch = getchar();\n', '19   }\n', ""20   while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') {\n"", ""21     x = x * 10 + ch - '0';\n"", '22     ch = getchar();\n', '23   }\n', '24   x *= f;\n', '25 }\n', '26 template <typename T>\n', '27 inline void wt(T a) {\n', ""28   if (a < 0) putchar('-'), a = -a;\n"", '29   if (a >= 10) wt(a / 10);\n', '30   putchar(a % 10 + 48);\n', '31 }\n', '32 char s[110];\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '35   int T = 1;\n', '36   cin >> T;\n', '37   while (T--) {\n', '38     int n, p = 0;\n', '39     cin >> n >> s + 1;\n', '40     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int n;\n', '5   cin >> n;\n', '6   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '7     int k = 0;\n', '8     cin >> k;\n', '9     bool already_ok = false;\n', '10     bool left_down = false;\n', '11     vector<int> ans;\n', '12     int cur = -1;\n', '13     for (int j = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '5   cin.tie(0);\n', '6   cout.tie(0);\n', '7   ;\n', '8   int t;\n', '9   cin >> t;\n', '10   while (t--) {\n', '11     int n;\n', '12     cin >> n;\n', '13     int a[n];\n', '14     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 inline T gcd(T a, T b) {\n', '5   return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a;\n', '6 }\n', '7 template <typename T>\n', '8 inline T lowbit(T x) {\n', '9   return x & -x;\n', '10 }\n', '11 const int N = 2e5 + 10;\n', '12 int n;\n', '13 int a[N];\n', '14 void solve() {\n', '15   cin >> n;\n', '16   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> a[i];\n', '17   bool flag = false;\n', '18   int pos = 0;\n', '19   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '20     if (a[i] == 0 && a[(i + 1) % n] == 1) {\n', '21       flag = true;\n', '22       pos = i;\n', '23       break;\n', '24     }\n', '25   }\n', '26   if (a[0] == 1) {\n', '27     printf(""%d "", n + 1);\n', '28     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf(""%d "", i);\n', '29     printf(""\\n"");\n', '30     return;\n', '31   } else if (a[n - 1] == 0) {\n', '32     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf(""%d "", i);\n', '33     printf(""%d "", n + 1);\n', '34     printf(""\\n"");\n', '35     return;\n', '36   }\n', '37   if (!flag)\n', '38     puts(""-1"");\n', '39   else {\n', '40     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '41       printf(""%d "", i + 1);\n', '42       if (pos == i) printf(""%d "", n + 1);\n', '43     }\n', '44     printf(""\\n"");\n', '45   }\n', '46 }\n', '47 signed main() {\n', '48   int t;\n', '49   cin >> t;\n', '50   while (t--) solve();\n', '51   return 0;\n', '52 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 inline T gcd(T a, T b) {\n', '5   return b ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int findParent(long long int node, vector<long long int> &parent) {\n', '4   if (parent[node] == node) return node;\n', '5   parent[node] = findParent(parent[node], parent);\n', '6   return parent[node];\n', '7 }\n', '8 void solve(long long int caseno) {\n', '9   long long int n, m1, m2, v1, v2, p1, p2;\n', '10   cin >> n >> m1 >> m2;\n', '11   vector<long long int> par1(n + 1, 0), par2(n + 1, 0), rank1(n + 1, 0),\n', '12       rank2(n + 1, 0);\n', '13   vector<pair<long long int, long long int> > ans;\n', '14   for (long long int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 1000;\n', '4 int n, m, t;\n', '5 int parent2[N], rank2[N], parent1[N], rank1[N];\n', '6 bool used1[N], used2[N];\n', '7 int find_set_1(int v) {\n', '8   if (v == parent1[v]) return v;\n', '9   return parent1[v] = find_set_1(parent1[v]);\n', '10 }\n', '11 void make_set_1(int v) {\n', '12   parent1[v] = v;\n', '13   rank1[v] = 0;\n', '14 }\n', '15 void union_sets_1(int a, int b) {\n', '16   a = find_set_1(a);\n', '17   b = find_set_1(b);\n', '18   if (a != b) {\n', '19     if (rank1[a] < rank1[b]) "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long N = 1e5 + 5, mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 void time_leap() {\n', '5   ios::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(nullptr), cout.tie(nullptr);\n', '6 }\n', '7 vector<int> par2(1001), par3(1001);\n', '8 int findParent(int u, vector<int>& par) {\n', '9   if (par[u] == u) return u;\n', '10   return par[u] = findParent(par[u], par);\n', '11 }\n', '12 void join(int a, int b, vector<int>& par) {\n', '13   a = findParent(a, par);\n', '14   b = findParent(b, par);\n', '15   if (a != b) {\n', '16     par[a] = b;\n', '17   }\n', '18 }\n', '19 int main() {\n', '20   time_leap();\n', '21   int n, m1, m2;\n', '22   cin >> n >> m1 >> m2;\n', '23   iota(((par2).begin()), ((par2).end()), 0);\n', '24   iota(((par3).begin()), ((par3).end()), 0);\n', '25   vector<pair<int, int>> ans;\n', '26   for (int i = 0; i < m1; ++i) {\n', '27     int u, v;\n', '28     cin >> u >> v;\n', '29     join(u, v, par2);\n', '30   }\n', '31   for (int i = 0; i < m2; ++i) {\n', '32     int u, v;\n', '33     cin >> u >> v;\n', '34     join(u, v, par3);\n', '35   }\n', '36   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 100010;\n', '4 int n, m1, m2, f[N], f2[N], sum, ansu[N], ansv[N];\n', '5 int find(int x) { return f[x] = f[x] == x ? x : find(f[x]); }\n', '6 int find2(int x) { return f2[x] = f2[x] == x ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const int N = 1e5 + 500;\n', '5 int n, m1, m2, u, v;\n', '6 int sup[3][N];\n', '7 vector<pair<int, int> > ans;\n', '8 inline long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '9   return b > 0 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int parent[2][100002];\n', '4 int findParent(int child, int par[]) {\n', '5   if (child == par[child]) return child;\n', '6   return par[child] = findParent(par[child], par);\n', '7 }\n', '8 void merge(int u, int v, int par[]) {\n', '9   int x = findParent(u, par);\n', '10   int y = findParent(v, par);\n', '11   if (x == y) return;\n', '12   par[y] = x;\n', '13 }\n', '14 bool cycleCheck(int u, int v, int par[]) {\n', '15   if (findParent(u, par) == findParent(v, par)) return true;\n', '16   return false;\n', '17 }\n', '18 void Set2Vector(set<int>& tmpset, vector<int>& tmpv) {\n', '19   for (auto k : tmpset) tmpv.push_back(k);\n', '20 }\n', '21 int main() {\n', '22   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '23   cin.tie(nullptr);\n', '24   int n, m[2];\n', '25   cin >> n >> m[0] >> m[1];\n', '26   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '4 const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;\n', '5 int cnt = 0, vis[maxn], prime[maxn], mu[maxn];\n', '6 int f[55][maxn], l[55], r[55], l1[55], r1[55];\n', '7 void init(int n) {\n', '8   vis[1] = mu[1] = 1;\n', '9   for (int i = (2); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '10     if (!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1;\n', '11     for (int j = (1); j <= (cnt); j++) {\n', '12       if (i * prime[j] > n) break;\n', '13       vis[i * prime[j]] = 1;\n', '14       if (i % prime[j] == 0) {\n', '15         mu[i * prime[j]] = 0;\n', '16         break;\n', '17       }\n', '18       mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i];\n', '19     }\n', '20   }\n', '21 }\n', '22 int n, m;\n', '23 int calc(int x) {\n', '24   long long sum = 0;\n', '25   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '26     l[i] = (l1[i] - 1) / x + 1;\n', '27     r[i] = r1[i] / x;\n', '28     sum += l[i];\n', '29     if (i == 1)\n', '30       for (int j = (l[i]); j <= (r[i]); j++) f[1][j] = 1;\n', '31     else {\n', '32       for (int j = (sum); j <= (m / x); j++) {\n', '33         int L = max(1, j - r[i]), R = j - l[i];\n', '34         f[i][j] = ((f[i - 1][R] - f[i - 1][L - 1]) % mod + mod) % mod;\n', '35       }\n', '36     }\n', '37     for (int j = (1); j <= (m / x); j++) (f[i][j] += f[i][j - 1]) %= mod;\n', '38   }\n', '39   return f[n][m / x];\n', '40 }\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   init(1e5);\n', '43   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '44   scanf(""%d"", &m);\n', '45   int mnr = 1e9;\n', '46   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '47     scanf(""%d"", &l1[i]), scanf(""%d"", &r1[i]);\n', '48     mnr = min(mnr, r1[i]);\n', '49   }\n', '50   long long ans = 0;\n', '51   for (int x = (1); x <= (mnr); x++) {\n', '52     ans = ((ans + calc(x) * mu[x]) % mod + mod) % mod;\n', '53   }\n', '54   cout << ans;\n', '55 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '4 const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;\n', '5 int cnt = 0, vis[maxn], prime[maxn], mu[maxn];\n', '6 int f[55][maxn], l[55], r[55], l1[55], r1[55];\n', '7 void init(int n) {\n', '8   vis[1] = mu[1] = 1;\n', '9   for (int i = (2); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '10     if (!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1;\n', '11     for (int j = (1); j <= (cnt); j++) {\n', '12       if (i * prime[j] > n) break;\n', '13       vis[i * prime[j]] = 1;\n', '14       if (i % prime[j] == 0) {\n', '15         mu[i * prime[j]] = 0;\n', '16         break;\n', '17       }\n', '18       mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i];\n', '19     }\n', '20   }\n', '21 }\n', '22 int n, m;\n', '23 int calc(int x) {\n', '24   long long sum = 0;\n', '25   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); i++) {\n', '26     l[i] = (l1[i] - 1) / x + 1;\n', '27     r[i] = r1[i] / x;\n', '28     sum += l[i];\n', '29     if (i == 1)\n', '30       for (int j = (l[i]); j <= (r[i]); j++) f[1][j] = 1;\n', '31     else {\n', '32       for (int j = (sum); ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long INF_LL = 1e18;\n', '4 const int INF = 1e9 + 100;\n', '5 const int MOD = 998244353;\n', '6 const long double EPS = 1e-10;\n', '7 const int BLOCK = 550;\n', '8 const int dx[4] = {-1, 0, 1, 0};\n', '9 const int dy[4] = {0, 1, 0, -1};\n', '10 mt19937 rnd(chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '11 void open_file() {}\n', '12 const int maxN = 6e5 + 100;\n', '13 void sol() {\n', '14   int n, m;\n', '15   cin >> n >> m;\n', '16   vector<int> L(n), R(n);\n', '17   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> L[i] >> R[i];\n', '18   auto calc = [&](int x) {\n', '19     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '20       int a = (L[i] + x - 1) / x;\n', '21       int b = R[i] / x;\n', '22       if (a > b || b == 0) return 0;\n', '23     }\n', '24     int nm = m / x;\n', '25     vector<int> dp(nm + 1, 0);\n', '26     dp[0] = 1;\n', '27     for (int i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 pair<int, int> a[55];\n', '5 long long dp[55][100005], res[100005] = {0}, s[100005];\n', '6 inline void solve(int x) {\n', '7   int g = m / x;\n', '8   pair<int, int> b[55];\n', '9   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 unsigned long long MOD = 998244353;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   int N, M, gmax = -1;\n', '6   cin >> N >> M;\n', '7   vector<pair<int, int>> l(N);\n', '8   for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {\n', '9     cin >> l[i].first >> l[i].second;\n', '10     gmax = max(gmax, l[i].second);\n', '11   }\n', '12   vector<bool> is_prime(gmax + 1, true);\n', '13   is_prime[1] = false;\n', '14   vector<int> mu(gmax + 1, 1);\n', '15   vector<int> prime;\n', '16   for (int i = 2; i <= gmax; ++i) {\n', '17     if (is_prime[i]) {\n', '18       prime.push_back(i);\n', '19       mu[i] = -1;\n', '20     }\n', '21     for (auto p : prime) {\n', '22       if (i * p > gmax) break;\n', '23       is_prime[i * p] = false;\n', '24       if (i % p == 0) {\n', '25         mu[i * p] = 0;\n', '26         break;\n', '27       } else {\n', '28         mu[i * p] = -mu[i];\n', '29       }\n', '30     }\n', '31   }\n', '32   unsigned long long ans = 0;\n', '33   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long t, a, b, c;\n', '5   for (cin >> t; t--;) {\n', '6     cin >> a >> b >> c;\n', '7     int n = abs(a - b);\n', '8     int a1 = 1;\n', '9     int b1 = n + 1;\n', '10     n = n << 1;\n', '11     if (a > n || b > n || c > n) {\n', '12       cout << ""-1"" << endl;\n', '13       continue;\n', '14     }\n', '15     if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '16     if (a - a1 != b - b1) {\n', '17       cout << ""-1"" << endl;\n', '18       continue;\n', '19     }\n', '20     if (c == 1)\n', '21       cout << b1 << endl;\n', '22     else if (c == b1)\n', '23       cout << 1 << endl;\n', '24     else if (c > b1) {\n', '25       cout << 1 + c - b1 << endl;\n', '26     } else {\n', '27       cout << b1 + c - 1 << endl;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long t, a, b, c;\n', '5   for (cin >> t; t--;) {\n', '6     cin >> a >> b >> c;\n', '7     int n = abs(a - b);\n', '8     int a1 = 1;\n', '9     int b1 = n + 1;\n', '10     n = n << 1;\n', '11     if (a > n || b > n || c > n) {\n', '12       cout << ""-1"" << endl;\n', '13       continue;\n', '14     }\n', '15     if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '16     if (a - a1 != b - b1) {\n', '17       cout << ""-1"" << endl;\n', '18       continue;\n', '19     }\n', '20     if (c == 1)\n', '21       cout << b1 << endl;\n', '22     else if (c == b1)\n', '23       cout << 1 << endl;\n', '24     else if (c > b1) {\n', '25       cout << 1 + b1 - c << endl;\n', '26     } else {\n', '27       cout << b1 + c - 1 << endl;\n', '28     }\n', '29   }\n', '30   return 0;\n', '31 }\n']"	"25       cout << 1 + c - b1 << endl;

['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int t, a, b, c;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     cin >> a >> b >> c;\n', '8     int max_number = (max(a, b) - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 int t, a, b, c, k;\n', '3 inline int read() {\n', '4   int d = 0, f = 0, c = getchar();\n', ""5   for (; c < 48 || c > 57; c = getchar()) f |= (c == '-');\n"", '6   for (; c > 47 && c < 58; c = getchar()) d = (d << 1) + (d << 3) + (c ^ 48);\n', '7   return f ? -d : d;\n', '8 }\n', '9 inline void swap(int& a, int& b) { a ^= b ^= a ^= b; }\n', '10 int main() {\n', '11   t = read();\n', '12   for (; t; t--) {\n', '13     a = read(), b = read(), c = read();\n', '14     if (a < b) swap(a, b);\n', '15     k = a - b;\n', '16     if (b > k)\n', '17       puts(""-1"");\n', '18     else if (c > 2 * k)\n', '19       puts(""-1"");\n', '20     else if (c > k)\n', '21       printf(""%d\\n"", c - k);\n', '22     else\n', '23       printf(""%d\\n"", c + k);\n', '24   }\n', '25   return 0;\n', '26 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 int t, a, b, c, k;\n', '3 inline int read() {\n', '4   int d = 0, f = 0, c = getchar();\n', ""5   for (; c < 48 || c > 57; c = getchar()) f |= (c == '-');\n"", '6   for (; c > 47 && c < 58; c = getchar()) d = (d << 1) + (d << 3) + (c ^ 48);\n', '7   return f ? -d : d;\n', '8 }\n', '9 inline void swap(int& a, int& b) { a ^= b ^= a ^= b; }\n', '10 int main() {\n', '11   t = read();\n', '12   for (; t; t--) {\n', '13     a = read(), b = read(), c = read();\n', '14     if (a < b) swap(a, b);\n', '15     k = a - b;\n', '16     if (b > k)\n', '17       puts(""-1"");\n', '18     else if (c >= 2 * k)\n', '19       puts(""-1"");\n', '20     else if (c > k)\n', '21       printf(""%d\\n"", c - k);\n', '22     else\n', '23       printf(""%d\\n"", c + k);\n', '24   }\n', '25   return 0;\n', '26 }\n']"	"18     else if (c > 2 * k)

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   for (long long f = 1; f <= t; f++) {\n', '7     long long k;\n', '8     cin >> k;\n', '9     long long root = sqrt(k);\n', '10     if (root * root == k) {\n', '11       cout << root << "" ""\n', '12            << ""1"" << endl;\n', '13       continue;\n', '14     }\n', '15     if (k == 2) {\n', '16       cout << ""1""\n', '17            << "" ""\n', '18            << ""2"" << endl;\n', '19       continue;\n', '20     }\n', '21     if (k == 3) {\n', '22       cout << ""2""\n', '23            << "" ""\n', '24            << ""2"" << endl;\n', '25       continue;\n', '26     }\n', '27     long long row;\n', '28     long long column;\n', '29     long long pivot = ((root + 1) * (root + 1) + root * root + 1) / 2;\n', '30     if (k > pivot) {\n', '31       row = (root + 1);\n', '32       column = (2 * pivot - k) % (root * root);\n', '33     } else {\n', '34       column = root + 1;\n', '35       row = k % (root * root);\n', '36     }\n', '37     cout << row << "" "" << column << endl;\n', '38   }\n', '39 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   long long t;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   for (long long f = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class T>\n', '4 T gcd(T a, T b) {\n', '5   return b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b);\n', '6 }\n', '7 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '8 void solve() {\n', '9   int n, i = 1, p = 1;\n', '10   cin >> n;\n', '11   while (1) {\n', '12     if ((n - i) <= 0) {\n', '13       if (n <= p) {\n', '14         cout << n << "" "" << p << \'\\n\';\n', '15         return;\n', '16       } else {\n', '17         cout << p << "" "" << 2 * p - n << \'\\n\';\n', '18         return;\n', '19       }\n', '20     }\n', '21     n = n - i;\n', '22     i = i + 2;\n', '23     p++;\n', '24   }\n', '25 }\n', '26 int main() {\n', '27   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '28   cin.tie(0);\n', '29   cout.tie(0);\n', '30   int T = 1;\n', '31   cin >> T;\n', '32   while (T--) {\n', '33     solve();\n', '34   }\n', '35   return 0;\n', '36 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class T>\n', '4 T gcd(T a, T b) {\n', '5   return b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b);\n', '6 }\n', '7 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '8 void solve() {\n', '9   int n, i = 1, p = 1;\n', '10   cin >> n;\n', '11   while (1) {\n', '12     if ((n - i) < 0) {\n', '13       if (n <= p) {\n', '14         cout << n << "" "" << p << \'\\n\';\n', '15         return;\n', '16       } else {\n', '17         cout << p << "" "" << 2 * p - n << \'\\n\';\n', '18         return;\n', '19       }\n', '20     }\n', '21     n = n - i;\n', '22     i = i + 2;\n', '23     p++;\n', '24   }\n', '25 }\n', '26 int main() {\n', '27   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '28   cin.tie(0);\n', '29   cout.tie(0);\n', '30   int T = 1;\n', '31   cin >> T;\n', '32   while (T--) {\n', '33     solve();\n', '34   }\n', '35   return 0;\n', '36 }\n']"	"12     if ((n - i) <= 0) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int solve(string s, string w) {\n', '4   long long int a, b, c, i, j, k;\n', '5   i = 0;\n', '6   j = 0;\n', '7   a = s.length();\n', '8   b = w.length();\n', '9   for (i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n', '10     if (j == w.length()) break;\n', '11     if (s.at(i) == w.at(j)) {\n', '12       b--;\n', '13       a--;\n', '14       j++;\n', '15     }\n', '16   }\n', '17   return a + b;\n', '18 }\n', '19 int main() {\n', '20   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '21   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '22   int q, T;\n', '23   cin >> T;\n', '24   for (q = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '5   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '6   int t;\n', '7   cin >> t;\n', '8   long long a[66];\n', '9   a[0] = 1;\n', '10   vector<string> powers;\n', '11   powers.push_back(to_string(a[0]));\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i < 64; i++) {\n', '13     a[i] = a[i - 1] * 2;\n', '14     string str = to_string(a[i]);\n', '15     powers.push_back(str);\n', '16   }\n', '17   while (t--) {\n', '18     string nss;\n', '19     cin >> nss;\n', '20     long long ans = nss.size() + 1;\n', '21     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 string pow2[70];\n', '4 void precalc() {\n', '5   long long i = 1;\n', '6   int cur = 0;\n', '7   while (cur < 61) {\n', '8     pow2[cur] = to_string(i);\n', '9     i *= 2;\n', '10     cur++;\n', '11   }\n', '12 }\n', '13 long long calc(string a, string b) {\n', '14   int i = 0, j = 0;\n', '15   while (i < a.length() && j < b.length()) {\n', '16     if (a[i] == b[j]) {\n', '17       j++;\n', '18     }\n', '19     i++;\n', '20   }\n', '21   return b.length() - j + a.length() - j;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   int q;\n', '25   precalc();\n', '26   cin >> q;\n', '27   while (q--) {\n', '28     string s1;\n', '29     cin >> s1;\n', '30     long long ans = 10;\n', '31     for (int i = 0; i < 60; i++) {\n', '32       ans = min(ans, calc(s1, pow2[i]));\n', '33     }\n', ""34     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '35     ;\n', '36   }\n', '37   return 0;\n', '38 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 string pow2[70];\n', '4 void precalc() {\n', '5   int i = 1;\n', '6   int cur = 0;\n', '7   while (cur < 61) {\n', '8     pow2[cur] = to_string(i);\n', '9     i *= 2;\n', '10     cur++;\n', '11   }\n', '12 }\n', '13 long long calc(string a, string b) {\n', '14   int i = 0, j = 0;\n', '15   while (i < a.length() && j < b.length()) {\n', '16     if (a[i] == b[j]) {\n', '17       j++;\n', '18     }\n', '19     i++;\n', '20   }\n', '21   return b.length() - j + a.length() - j;\n', '22 }\n', '23 int main() {\n', '24   int q;\n', '25   precalc();\n', '26   cin >> q;\n', '27   while (q--) {\n', '28     string s1;\n', '29     cin >> s1;\n', '30     long long ans = 10;\n', '31     for (int i = 0; i < 60; i++) {\n', '32       ans = min(ans, calc(s1, pow2[i]));\n', '33     }\n', ""34     cout << ans << '\\n';\n"", '35     ;\n', '36   }\n', '37   return 0;\n', '38 }\n']"	"5   long long i = 1;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int cntsrc[30];\n', '4 pair<string, string> decode(string s) {\n', '5   memset(cntsrc, 0, sizeof(cntsrc));\n', '6   reverse(s.begin(), s.end());\n', '7   string del;\n', '8   for (auto c : s) {\n', ""9     if (!cntsrc[c - 'a']) del.push_back(c);\n"", ""10     cntsrc[c - 'a']++;\n"", '11   }\n', '12   int orignLength = 0;\n', '13   int m = del.size();\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', ""15     orignLength += cntsrc[del[i] - 'a'] / (m - i);\n"", '16   }\n', '17   reverse(del.begin(), del.end());\n', '18   return {string(s.rbegin(), s.rbegin() + orignLength), del};\n', '19 }\n', '20 string encode(pair<string, string> p) {\n', '21   string result = p.first;\n', '22   for (auto c : p.second) {\n', '23     string temp;\n', '24     for (auto d : p.first)\n', '25       if (d != c) {\n', '26         temp.push_back(d);\n', '27         result.push_back(d);\n', '28       }\n', '29     p.first = temp;\n', '30   }\n', '31   return result;\n', '32 }\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   int t;\n', '35   cin >> t;\n', '36   while (t--) {\n', '37     string s;\n', '38     cin >> s;\n', '39     auto ans = decode(s);\n', '40     auto check = encode(ans);\n', '41     if (check == s)\n', ""42       cout << ans.first << ' ' << ans.second << endl;\n"", '43     else\n', '44       cout << -1 << endl;\n', '45   }\n', '46   return 0;\n', '47 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 char cntsrc[30];\n', '4 pair<string, string> decode(string s) {\n', '5   memset(cntsrc, 0, sizeof(cntsrc));\n', '6   reverse(s.begin(), s.end());\n', '7   string del;\n', '8   for (auto c : s) {\n', ""9     if (!cntsrc[c - 'a']) del.push_back(c);\n"", ""10     cntsrc[c - 'a']++;\n"", '11   }\n', '12   int orignLength = 0;\n', '13   int m = del.size();\n', '14   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 void solve() {\n', '5   string s;\n', '6   cin >> s;\n', '7   map<char, int> mp;\n', '8   for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n', '9     mp[s[i]] += 1;\n', '10   }\n', '11   int dist = mp.size();\n', '12   int n = s.length();\n', '13   int i = n - 1;\n', '14   string rem = """";\n', '15   char cur = s[i];\n', '16   if (dist != 0 and mp[cur] % dist) {\n', '17     cout << -1 << endl;\n', '18     return;\n', '19   }\n', '20   if (dist == 1) {\n', '21     cout << s << "" "" << s[0] << endl;\n', '22     return;\n', '23   }\n', '24   int cdist = mp[cur] / dist;\n', '25   int match[26] = {0};\n', ""26   match[cur - 'a'] = cdist;\n"", '27   string ans = """";\n', '28   int vis[26] = {0};\n', '29   while (i >= 0) {\n', '30     if (cur == s[i]) {\n', '31       cdist -= 1;\n', '32     }\n', '33     if (!cdist) {\n', ""34       vis[cur - 'a'] = 1;\n"", '35       rem += cur;\n', '36       dist -= 1;\n', '37       int pre = i;\n', '38       while (i >= 0) {\n', ""39         if (!vis[s[i] - 'a']) {\n"", '40           cur = s[i];\n', '41           i += 1;\n', '42           break;\n', '43         }\n', '44         i -= 1;\n', '45       }\n', '46       if (dist != 0 and mp[cur] % dist) {\n', '47         cout << -1 << endl;\n', '48         return;\n', '49       }\n', '50       cdist = mp[cur] / dist;\n', ""51       match[cur - 'a'] = cdist;\n"", '52       if (dist == 1 or dist == 0) {\n', '53         rem += cur;\n', '54         break;\n', '55       }\n', '56     }\n', '57     i -= 1;\n', '58   }\n', '59   int match1[26] = {0};\n', '60   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '61     bool f = true;\n', ""62     match1[s[i] - 'a'] += 1;\n"", '63     ans += s[i];\n', '64     for (int j = 0; j < 26; j++) {\n', '65       if (match1[j] != match[j]) {\n', '66         f = false;\n', '67         break;\n', '68       }\n', '69     }\n', '70     if (f) {\n', '71       break;\n', '72     }\n', '73   }\n', '74   reverse(rem.begin(), rem.end());\n', '75   string cs = ans;\n', '76   string tot = cs;\n', '77   for (int k = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast,unroll-loops"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 using vll = vector<long long>;\n', '5 using vi = vector<int>;\n', '6 long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '7 long long mod2 = 998244353;\n', '8 long long ipow(long long base, long long k, long long M) {\n', '9   base %= M;\n', '10   k = k % (M - 1);\n', '11   long long total = 1;\n', '12   while (k) {\n', '13     if (k & 1) {\n', '14       total = (total * base) % M;\n', '15     }\n', '16     base = (base * base) % M;\n', '17     k >>= 1;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return total;\n', '20 }\n', '21 long long fact(long long n) {\n', '22   long long ans = 1;\n', '23   for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '24     ans = ans * i;\n', '25     ans = ans % mod;\n', '26   }\n', '27   return ans;\n', '28 }\n', '29 long long modu(long long a, long long b) {\n', '30   long long c = a % b;\n', '31   return (c < 0) ? c + b : c;\n', '32 }\n', '33 void solve() {\n', '34   string s;\n', '35   cin >> s;\n', '36   long long n = s.length();\n', '37   map<char, long long> cnt;\n', '38   vector<char> order;\n', '39   for (long long i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n', '40     if (cnt[s[i]] == 0) {\n', '41       order.push_back(s[i]);\n', '42     }\n', '43     cnt[s[i]]++;\n', '44   }\n', '45   long long ct = order.size();\n', '46   map<char, long long> times;\n', '47   for (long long i = 0; i < order.size(); i++) {\n', '48     if (cnt[order[i]] % ct != 0) {\n', '49       cout << -1 << ""\\n"";\n', '50       return;\n', '51     }\n', '52     times[order[i]] = cnt[order[i]] / ct;\n', '53     ct--;\n', '54   }\n', '55   cnt.clear();\n', '56   long long good = 0;\n', '57   string t = """";\n', '58   for (long long i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '59     cnt[s[i]]++;\n', '60     t.push_back(s[i]);\n', '61     if (cnt[s[i]] > times[s[i]]) {\n', '62       cout << -1 << ""\\n"";\n', '63       return;\n', '64     }\n', '65     if (cnt[s[i]] == times[s[i]]) good++;\n', '66     if (good == order.size()) break;\n', '67   }\n', '68   long long ind = t.length();\n', '69   map<char, bool> vis;\n', '70   for (long long i = order.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n', '71     vis[order[i]] = 1;\n', '72     for (long long j = 0; j < t.length(); j++) {\n', '73       if (vis[t[j]]) continue;\n', '74       if (t[j] != s[ind++]) {\n', '75         cout << -1 << ""\\n"";\n', '76         return;\n', '77       }\n', '78     }\n', '79   }\n', '80   if (ind != s.length()) {\n', '81     cout << -1 << ""\\n"";\n', '82     return;\n', '83   }\n', '84   cout << t << "" "";\n', '85   for (long long i = order.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << order[i];\n', '86   cout << ""\\n"";\n', '87 }\n', '88 int main() {\n', '89   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '90   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '91   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '92   long long tc = 1;\n', '93   cin >> tc;\n', '94   long long caseno = 1;\n', '95   while (tc--) {\n', '96     solve();\n', '97     caseno++;\n', '98   }\n', '99 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast,unroll-loops"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 using vll = vector<long long>;\n', '5 using vi = vector<int>;\n', '6 long long mod = 1000000007;\n', '7 long long mod2 = 998244353;\n', '8 long long ipow(long long base, long long k, long long M) {\n', '9   base %= M;\n', '10   k = k % (M - 1);\n', '11   long long total = 1;\n', '12   while (k) {\n', '13     if (k & 1) {\n', '14       total = (total * base) % M;\n', '15     }\n', '16     base = (base * base) % M;\n', '17     k >>= 1;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return total;\n', '20 }\n', '21 long long fact(long long n) {\n', '22   long long ans = 1;\n', '23   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 set<int> ans1, ans2;\n', '4 int x1, x2;\n', '5 void rec(int i, int x) {\n', '6   ans1.insert(x);\n', '7   if (x1 == x2) {\n', '8     ans2.insert(x);\n', '9   }\n', '10   if (i == 9) {\n', '11     return;\n', '12   }\n', '13   rec(i + 1, x * 10 + x1);\n', '14   rec(i + 1, x * 10 + x2);\n', '15 }\n', '16 int main() {\n', '17   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '18   cin.tie(0);\n', '19   int t, n, k;\n', '20   cin >> t;\n', '21   for (x1 = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int a[150];\n', '4 int vis[10];\n', '5 long long ans, len;\n', '6 string s;\n', '7 void dfs(int p, int k, long long n, int f) {\n', '8   if (k == -1) return;\n', '9   if (p >= len) {\n', '10     ans = min(ans, n);\n', '11     return;\n', '12   }\n', '13   if (f) {\n', '14     int mn;\n', '15     if (k)\n', '16       mn = 0;\n', '17     else {\n', '18       for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int a[150];\n', '4 int vis[10];\n', '5 long long ans, len;\n', '6 string s;\n', '7 void dfs(int p, int k, long long n, int f) {\n', '8   if (k == -1) return;\n', '9   if (p >= len) {\n', '10     ans = min(ans, n);\n', '11     return;\n', '12   }\n', '13   if (f) {\n', '14     int mn;\n', '15     if (k)\n', '16       mn = 0;\n', '17     else {\n', '18       for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 const int N = 500005;\n', '5 const long long Mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   int t, k;\n', '8   string n;\n', '9   cin >> t;\n', '10   while (t--) {\n', '11     cin >> n >> k;\n', '12     string ans;\n', ""13     for (char a = '0'; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long vis[10];\n', '4 vector<char> ans;\n', '5 string f;\n', '6 long long mx = -1;\n', '7 void go() {\n', '8   string res = """";\n', ""9   vis[f[0] - '0']++;\n"", '10   string ff = f;\n', ""11   mx = max(mx, f[0] - '0' + 0ll);\n"", '12   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 mt19937 rng(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '4 void file_i_o();\n', '5 void solve() {\n', '6   int n, k;\n', '7   cin >> n >> k;\n', '8   string s = to_string(n);\n', '9   string check = s;\n', '10   int m = s.length();\n', '11   while (true) {\n', '12     int i = 0;\n', '13     set<char> mark;\n', '14     while (i < m) {\n', '15       mark.insert(s[i]);\n', '16       if (mark.size() > k) {\n', ""17         while (s[i] == '9') i--;\n"", '18         s[i]++;\n', '19         break;\n', '20       } else if (s[i] > check[i]) {\n', '21         string ans = s.substr(0, i + 1);\n', ""22         if (mark.size() < k) mark.insert('0');\n"", '23         for (int j = i + 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using ld = long double;\n', '5 const long double pi = 2 * acos(0.0);\n', '6 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '7 const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '8 void solve() {\n', '9   int n;\n', '10   cin >> n;\n', '11   vector<int> a(n);\n', '12   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];\n', '13   ;\n', '14   vector<int> b = a;\n', '15   sort(b.begin(), b.end());\n', '16   bool ok = 1;\n', '17   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '18     if (a[i] != b[i]) {\n', '19       ok = 0;\n', '20       break;\n', '21     }\n', '22   }\n', '23   if (ok) {\n', ""24     cout << 0 << '\\n';\n"", '25     return;\n', '26   }\n', '27   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int siz = 1e5;\n', '4 int t, n;\n', '5 vector<int> cvs[siz + 5];\n', '6 vector<pair<long long, int>> mnps;\n', '7 void clear() {\n', '8   for (int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 vector<long long> prime;\n', '5 bool num[1000005 + 2];\n', '6 void sieve() {\n', '7   num[0] = true;\n', '8   num[1] = true;\n', '9   for (long long i = 2; i <= 1000005; i++) {\n', '10     if (num[i] == false) {\n', '11       prime.push_back(i);\n', '12       for (long long j = 2 * i; j <= 1000005; j = j + i) {\n', '13         num[j] = true;\n', '14       }\n', '15     }\n', '16   }\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '20   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '21   long long n, m, i, j, k, l, a, b, c, p, q, r, t, ans, sum;\n', '22   cin >> t;\n', '23   vector<pair<long long, long long> > v;\n', '24   while (t--) {\n', '25     cin >> n;\n', '26     m = n;\n', '27     j = 0;\n', '28     while (n--) {\n', '29       cin >> k >> a;\n', '30       b = a + 1;\n', '31       c = b + 1;\n', '32       for (i = 1; i < k; i++) {\n', '33         cin >> a;\n', '34         if (a >= c) {\n', '35           b = b + (a - c) + 1;\n', '36           c = a + 2;\n', '37         } else\n', '38           c++;\n', '39       }\n', '40       v.push_back(make_pair(b, k));\n', '41     }\n', '42     sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '43     b = v[0].first + v[0].second;\n', '44     a = v[0].first;\n', '45     for (i = 1; i < m; i++) {\n', '46       if (v[i].first > b) {\n', '47         c = v[i].first - b;\n', '48         b = v[i].first + v[i].second;\n', '49         a = a + c;\n', '50       } else {\n', '51         b = b + v[i].second;\n', '52       }\n', '53     }\n', '54     cout << a << endl;\n', '55     v.clear();\n', '56   }\n', '57   return 0;\n', '58 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long M = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 vector<long long> prime;\n', '5 bool num[1000005 + 2];\n', '6 void sieve() {\n', '7   num[0] = true;\n', '8   num[1] = true;\n', '9   for (long long i = 2; i <= 1000005; i++) {\n', '10     if (num[i] == false) {\n', '11       prime.push_back(i);\n', '12       for (long long j = 2 * i; j <= 1000005; j = j + i) {\n', '13         num[j] = true;\n', '14       }\n', '15     }\n', '16   }\n', '17 }\n', '18 int main() {\n', '19   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '20   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '21   long long n, m, i, j, k, l, a, b, c, p, q, r, t, ans, sum;\n', '22   cin >> t;\n', '23   vector<pair<long long, long long> > v;\n', '24   while (t--) {\n', '25     cin >> n;\n', '26     m = n;\n', '27     j = 0;\n', '28     while (n--) {\n', '29       cin >> k >> a;\n', '30       b = a + 1;\n', '31       c = b + 1;\n', '32       for (i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 10;\n', '4 const int P = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '6 int t, n;\n', '7 pair<long long, long long> res[N];\n', '8 bool cmp(pair<long long, long long> a, pair<long long, long long> b) {\n', '9   return (a.first - a.second) < (b.first - b.second);\n', '10 }\n', '11 void solve() {\n', '12   int k;\n', '13   long long x, minn, ans = 0;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int mod = pow(10, 9) + 7;\n', '4 signed main() {\n', '5   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(0);\n', '7   cout.tie(0);\n', '8   long long int T = 1;\n', '9   cin >> T;\n', '10   while (T--) {\n', '11     long long int n;\n', '12     cin >> n;\n', '13     vector<long long int> v[n];\n', '14     for (long long int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t, n, m, x;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     cin >> n;\n', '8     vector<pair<int, int> > cave(n);\n', '9     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '10       cin >> m;\n', '11       cave[i] = make_pair(0, m);\n', '12       for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '13         cin >> x;\n', '14         cave[i].first = max(x - j, cave[i].first);\n', '15       }\n', '16     }\n', '17     int pow = 0, sol = 0;\n', '18     sort(cave.begin(), cave.end());\n', '19     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '20       if (cave[i].first >= pow) {\n', '21         sol += cave[i].first - pow + 1;\n', '22         pow += cave[i].first - pow + 1;\n', '23       }\n', '24       pow += cave[i].second;\n', '25     }\n', ""26     cout << sol << '\\n';\n"", '27   }\n', '28 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t, n, m, x;\n', '5   cin >> t;\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     cin >> n;\n', '8     vector<pair<int, int> > cave(n);\n', '9     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '10       cin >> m;\n', '11       cave[i] = make_pair(0, m);\n', '12       for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {\n', '13         cin >> x;\n', '14         cave[i].first = max(x - j, cave[i].first);\n', '15       }\n', '16     }\n', '17     int pow = 0, sol = 0;\n', '18     sort(cave.begin(), cave.end());\n', '19     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '20       if (cave[i].first > pow) {\n', '21         sol += cave[i].first - pow + 1;\n', '22         pow += cave[i].first - pow + 1;\n', '23       }\n', '24       pow += cave[i].second;\n', '25     }\n', ""26     cout << sol << '\\n';\n"", '27   }\n', '28 }\n']"	"20       if (cave[i].first >= pow) {

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long MAX_N = 1e5 + 1;\n', '4 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const long long INF = 1e9;\n', '6 const long long LINF = 1e18;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   long long n;\n', '9   cin >> n;\n', '10   vector<vector<long long>> caves(n);\n', '11   for (long long i{}; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool isPossFirst(vector<long long> armor, long long mid) {\n', '4   for (int i = 0; i < armor.size(); i++) {\n', '5     if (mid <= armor[i]) return 0;\n', '6     mid++;\n', '7   }\n', '8   return true;\n', '9 }\n', '10 pair<long long, long long> findMin(vector<long long> armor) {\n', '11   long long l = 0, r = 10000000000;\n', '12   long long mid = 0, ans = 10000000000;\n', '13   while (l <= r) {\n', '14     mid = l + (r - l) / 2;\n', '15     if (isPossFirst(armor, mid)) {\n', '16       ans = min(ans, mid);\n', '17       r = mid - 1;\n', '18     } else {\n', '19       l = mid + 1;\n', '20     }\n', '21   }\n', '22   return {ans, armor.size()};\n', '23 }\n', '24 bool isPoss(vector<pair<long long, long long>> minEntry, long long mid) {\n', '25   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long double eps = 1e-8;\n', '4 const int N = 2e5 + 10;\n', '5 const int M = 1e6 + 10;\n', '6 long long dp1[N];\n', '7 long long dp2[N];\n', '8 void run() {\n', '9   long long n, m;\n', '10   scanf(""%lld%lld"", &n, &m);\n', '11   dp1[1] = 1;\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '13     dp2[i] = 1;\n', '14   }\n', '15   for (int i = 2, sum = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '16     dp2[i] = (dp2[i] + dp2[i - 1]) % m;\n', '17     dp1[i] = (dp2[i] + sum) % m;\n', '18     dp1[i] = (dp1[i] - dp1[i - 1] + m) % m;\n', '19     sum = (sum + dp1[i]) % m;\n', '20     long long now = (dp1[i] - dp1[i - 1] + m) % m;\n', '21     for (int j = i; j <= n; j += i) dp2[j] = (dp2[j] + now) % m;\n', '22   }\n', '23   printf(""%lld\\n"", dp1[n]);\n', '24 }\n', '25 int main() {\n', '26   run();\n', '27   return 0;\n', '28 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long double eps = 1e-8;\n', '4 const int N = 2e5 + 10;\n', '5 const int M = 1e6 + 10;\n', '6 long long dp1[N];\n', '7 long long dp2[N];\n', '8 void run() {\n', '9   long long n, m;\n', '10   scanf(""%lld%lld"", &n, &m);\n', '11   dp1[1] = 1;\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '13     dp2[i] = 1;\n', '14   }\n', '15   for (int i = 2, sum = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '16     dp2[i] = (dp2[i] + dp2[i - 1]) % m;\n', '17     dp1[i] = (dp2[i] + sum) % m;\n', '18     dp1[i] = (dp1[i] - dp1[i - 1] + m) % m;\n', '19     sum = (sum + dp1[i]) % m;\n', '20     long long now = (dp1[i] - dp1[i - 1] + m) % m;\n', '21     for (int j = i; j <= n; j += i) dp2[j] = (dp2[i] + now) % m;\n', '22   }\n', '23   printf(""%lld\\n"", dp1[n]);\n', '24 }\n', '25 int main() {\n', '26   run();\n', '27   return 0;\n', '28 }\n']"	"21     for (int j = i; j <= n; j += i) dp2[j] = (dp2[j] + now) % m;
