L - 1 : 1, rb = L < n ? L + 1 : n;\n', '82       for (L = lb; L <= rb; ++L) modify(1, 1, n);\n', '83     } else {\n', '84       cnt = 0;\n', '85       query(1, 1, n);\n', '86       Node ans = *li[0];\n', '87       for (int i = 1; i < cnt; ++i) {\n', '88         Node temp = ans;\n', '89         pullup(ans, temp, *li[i], li[i - 1]->L, li[i - 1]->R, li[i]->R);\n', '90       }\n', '91       printf(""%lld\\n"", ans.s);\n', '92     }\n', '93   }\n', '94 }\n']"	"6 } node[(800010)];
"
['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const long long mod = 1e18;\n', '5 const long long inf = 1e18;\n', '6 long long n, q, a[maxn], seg[maxn * 4], bl[maxn * 4], br[maxn * 4];\n', '7 long long ans, al, ar;\n', '8 void fix(long long ind, long long v = 1, long long s = 0, long long e = n) {\n', '9   if ((e - s) == 1) {\n', '10     seg[v] = 1;\n', '11     bl[v] = 1;\n', '12     br[v] = 1;\n', '13     return;\n', '14   }\n', '15   long long mid = (e + s) / 2ll, lc = v + v, rc = lc | 1;\n', '16   if (ind < mid)\n', '17     fix(ind, lc, s, mid);\n', '18   else\n', '19     fix(ind, rc, mid, e);\n', '20   if (a[mid] < a[mid - 1]) {\n', '21     seg[v] = seg[lc] + seg[rc];\n', '22     bl[v] = bl[lc];\n', '23     br[v] = br[rc];\n', '24     return;\n', '25   }\n', '26   seg[v] = seg[lc] + seg[rc] + br[lc] * bl[rc];\n', '27   if (bl[lc] == (mid - s))\n', '28     bl[v] = bl[lc] + bl[rc];\n', '29   else\n', '30     bl[v] = bl[lc];\n', '31   if (br[rc] == (e - mid))\n', '32     br[v] = br[rc] + br[lc];\n', '33   else\n', '34     br[v] = br[rc];\n', '35 }\n', '36 void solve(long long l, long long r, long long v = 1, long long s = 0,\n', '37            long long e = n) {\n', '38   if ((l >= e) || (r <= s)) return;\n', '39   if ((l <= s) && (e <= r)) {\n', '40     if (ans == -1) {\n', '41       ans = seg[v];\n', '42       al = bl[v];\n', '43       ar = br[v];\n', '44       return;\n', '45     }\n', '46     if (a[s - 1] > a[s]) {\n', '47       ans += seg[v];\n', '48       ar = br[v];\n', '49       return;\n', '50     }\n', '51     ans += seg[v] + ar * bl[v];\n', '52     if (br[v] == (e - s))\n', '53       ar += br[v];\n', '54     else\n', '55       ar = br[v];\n', '56     if (al == (s - 1] = y;\n', '77       fix(x - 1);\n', '78       continue;\n', '79     }\n', '80     long long l1, r1;\n', '81     cin >> l1 >> r1;\n', '82     ans = -1;\n', '83     solve(l1 - 1, r1);\n', '84     cout << ans << endl;\n', '85   }\n', '86 }\n']	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const long long mod = 1e18;\n', '5 const long long inf = 1e18;\n', '6 long long n, q, a[maxn], seg[maxn * 4], bl[maxn * 4], br[maxn * 4];\n', '7 long long ans, al, ar;\n', '8 void fix(long long ind, long long v = 1, long long s = 0, long long e = n) {\n', '9   if ((e - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const double eps = 1e-6;\n', '5 const double PI = acos(-1.0);\n', '6 inline long long read() {\n', '7   char ch;\n', '8   long long x = 0;\n', '9   bool f = true;\n', '10   for (ch = getchar(); !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar())\n', ""11     if (ch == '-') f ^= f;\n"", '12   for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + ch - 48;\n', '13   return f ? x : -x;\n', '14 }\n', '15 const int N = 1010;\n', '16 char ch[N][N];\n', '17 int h[N * N], e[2 * N * N], ne[2 * N * N], idx;\n', '18 int ans[N][N];\n', '19 void add(int a, int b) {\n', '20   e[++idx] = b;\n', '21   ne[idx] = h[a];\n', '22   h[a] = idx;\n', '23 }\n', '24 void dfs(int u, int res) {\n', '25   if (ans[u / N][u % N]) return;\n', '26   int t = (res == 1 ? 4 : 1);\n', '27   ans[u / N][u % N] = res;\n', '28   for (int i = h[u]; i; i = ne[i]) {\n', '29     int j = e[i];\n', '30     dfs(j, t);\n', '31   }\n', '32 }\n', '33 int z(int x, int y) { return x * N + y; }\n', '34 int dx[] = {-1, 0, 1, 0}, dy[] = {0, -1, 0, 1};\n', '35 void solve() {\n', '36   int n = read(), m = read();\n', '37   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> (ch[i] + 1);\n', '38   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '39     for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)\n', ""40       if (ch[i][j] == 'X') {\n"", '41         vector<int> vs;\n', '42         for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {\n', ""43           if (ch[i + dx[k]][j + dy[k]] != '.') continue;\n"", '44           vs.push_back(z(i + dx[k], j + dy[k]));\n', '45         }\n', '46         if (vs.size() % 2 == 1) return printf(""NO\\n""), void(0);\n', '47         for (int k = 0; k < vs.size(); k += 2)\n', '48           add(vs[k], vs[k + 1]), add(vs[k + 1], vs[k]);\n', '49       }\n', '50   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)\n', '51     for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', ""52       if (ch[i][j] == 'X') continue;\n"", '53       if (ans[i][j]) continue;\n', '54       dfs(z(i, j), 1);\n', '55     }\n', '56   cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '57   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '58     for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n', ""59       if (ch[i][j] == 'X')\n"", '60         for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)\n', ""61           if (ch[i + dx[k]][j + dy[k]] == '.')\n"", '62             ans[i][j] += ans[i + dx[k]][j + dy[k]];\n', '63       cout << ans[i][j] << "" "";\n', '64     }\n', '65     cout << ""\\n"";\n', '66   }\n', '67 }\n', '68 int main() {\n', '69   int T = 1;\n', '70   while (T--) solve();\n', '71   return 0;\n', '72 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const double eps = 1e-6;\n', '5 const double PI = acos(-1.0);\n', '6 inline long long read() {\n', '7   char ch;\n', '8   long long x = 0;\n', '9   bool f = true;\n', '10   for (ch = getchar(); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF32 = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const long long INF64 = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 struct IO {\n', '6   char ibuf[(1 << 21)], *ibs, *ibe, obuf[(1 << 21)], *O;\n', '7   int IOerror = 0;\n', '8   IO() : ibs(ibuf), ibe(ibuf), O(obuf) {}\n', '9   inline char getchar(void) {\n', '10     return (ibs == ibe &&\n', '11                     (ibe = (ibs = ibuf) + fread(ibuf, 1, (1 << 21), stdin),\n', '12                      ibs == ibe)\n', '13                 ? EOF\n', '14                 : *ibs++);\n', '15   }\n', '16   inline void flush(void) {\n', '17     fwrite(obuf, 1, O - obuf, stdout);\n', '18     O = obuf;\n', '19   }\n', '20   inline void putchar(char ch) {\n', '21     if (O - obuf >= (1 << 21)) flush();\n', '22     *O++ = ch;\n', '23   }\n', '24   ~IO() { flush(); }\n', '25   template <typename T>\n', '26   inline T getint(void) {\n', '27     char ch;\n', '28     T ret;\n', '29     bool flag = true;\n', '30     while (isspace(ch = getchar()) && ch != EOF)\n', '31       ;\n', ""32     if (ch == '-') flag = false, ch = getchar();\n"", '33     if (ch == EOF || !isdigit(ch)) {\n', '34       IOerror = 1;\n', '35       return (T)INF64;\n', '36     }\n', ""37     ret = ch - '0';\n"", ""38     while (isdigit(ch = getchar())) ret = ret * 10 + ch - '0';\n"", '39     return flag ? ret : -ret;\n', '40   }\n', '41   template <typename T>\n', '42   inline void putint(T x) {\n', '43     static char numbuf[65];\n', '44     int top = 0;\n', ""45     if (x < 0) putchar('-'), x = -x;\n"", ""46     do numbuf[top++] = x % 10 + '0';\n"", '47     while (x /= 10);\n', '48     while (top--) putchar(numbuf[top]);\n', '49   }\n', '50   inline void getstr(char *str) {\n', '51     do *str = getchar();\n', '52     while (*str != EOF && !isspace(*str++));\n', '53     *--str = 0;\n', '54   }\n', '55   inline void getline(char *str) {\n', ""56     while ((*str = getchar()) != '\\n') ++str;\n"", '57     *str = 0;\n', '58   }\n', '59   inline void putstr(char *str) {\n', '60     while (*str) putchar(*str++);\n', '61   }\n', '62 };\n', '63 IO io;\n', '64 int a[55], b[55];\n', '65 int main() {\n', '66   int T = io.getint<int>();\n', '67   while (T--) {\n', '68     int N = io.getint<int>();\n', '69     memset(a, 0, sizeof(a));\n', '70     memset(b, 0, sizeof(b));\n', '71     for (int i = 1; i <= N && flag; ++i)\n', '83       for (int j = i + 1; j <= N && flag; ++j) {\n', '84         if (a[j] - a[i - 1] == b[j] - b[i - 1]) {\n', '85           aa = i, bb = j;\n', '86           flag = false;\n', '87           break;\n', '88         }\n', '89       }\n', ""90     io.putint(aa), io.putchar(' '), io.putint(bb), io.putchar('\\n');\n"", '91   }\n', '92   return 0;\n', '93 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int INF32 = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '4 const long long INF64 = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 struct IO {\n', '6   char ibuf[(1 << 21)], *ibs, *ibe, obuf[(1 << 21)], *O;\n', '7   int IOerror = 0;\n', '8   IO() : ibs(ibuf), ibe(ibuf), O(obuf) {}\n', '9   inline char getchar(void) {\n', '10     return (ibs == ibe &&\n', '11                     (ibe = (ibs = ibuf) + fread(ibuf, 1, (1 << 21), stdin),\n', '12                      ibs == ibe)\n', '13                 ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int main() {\n', '4   int t;\n', '5   scanf(""%d"", &t);\n', '6   while (t--) {\n', '7     int n;\n', '8     scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '9     char s[n + 1];\n', '10     scanf(""%s"", s + 1);\n', '11     int a[100] = {0}, b[100] = {0};\n', '12     int aa = 0, bb = 0;\n', '13     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', ""14       if (s[i] == 'a') {\n"", '15         aa++;\n', '16         b[i] = b[i - 1];\n', '17         a[i] = a[i - 1] + 1;\n', '18       } else {\n', '19         bb++;\n', '20         a[i] = a[i - 1];\n', '21         b[i] = b[i - 1] + 1;\n', '22       }\n', '23     }\n', '24     int flag = 1;\n', '25     if (aa == 0 || bb == 0) {\n', '26       printf(""-1 -1\\n"");\n', '27       continue;\n', '28     } else {\n', '29       for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 mt19937_64 RNG(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '4 class Solution {\n', '5  private:\n', '6  public:\n', '7   void solve() {\n', '8     long long int n;\n', '9     cin >> n;\n', '10     string s;\n', '11     cin >> s;\n', '12     long long int prefix1[n + 1], prefix2[n + 1];\n', '13     prefix1[0] = 0;\n', '14     prefix2[0] = 0;\n', ""15     if (s[0] == 'a')\n"", '16       prefix1[1] = 1;\n', '17     else\n', '18       prefix2[1] = 1;\n', '19     for (long long int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const int N = 1e6 + 10;\n', '5 int power(int a, int b) {\n', '6   int res = 1;\n', '7   while (b > 0) {\n', '8     if (b % 2) {\n', '9       res = 1LL * res * a % mod;\n', '10     }\n', '11     a = 1LL * a * a % mod;\n', '12     b /= 2;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return res;\n', '15 }\n', '16 int main() {\n', '17   int test = 1, n;\n', '18   char s[100];\n', '19   scanf(""%d"", &test);\n', '20   while (test--) {\n', '21     int l = -1, r = -1;\n', '22     scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '23     scanf(""%s"", s + 1);\n', '24     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 bool even(long long int x) { return (x % 2 == 0); }\n', '4 bool odd(long long int x) { return (x % 2 != 0); }\n', '5 vector<int> sieve(int n) {\n', '6   bool prime[n + 1];\n', '7   memset(prime, true, sizeof(prime));\n', '8   for (int p = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 1e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int INF = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '6 int T, n;\n', '7 char s[MAXN];\n', '8 char a[66][66];\n', '9 int read() {\n', '10   int s = 0, f = 0;\n', '11   char ch = getchar();\n', ""12   while (!isdigit(ch)) f |= (ch == '-'), ch = getchar();\n"", ""13   while (isdigit(ch)) s = (s << 1) + (s << 3) + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '14   return f ? -s : s;\n', '15 }\n', '16 int main() {\n', '17   T = read();\n', '18   while (T--) {\n', '19     n = read();\n', '20     cin >> s + 1;\n', '21     int x = 0, y = 0, z = 0;\n', '22     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 1;\n', '4 long long fact[N];\n', '5 const int MOD = 998244353;\n', '6 long long power(long long x, long long y) {\n', '7   long long res = 1;\n', '8   x = x % MOD;\n', '9   while (y > 0) {\n', '10     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % MOD;\n', '11     y = y >> 1;\n', '12     x = (x * x) % MOD;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return res;\n', '15 }\n', '16 long long modInverse(long long x) { return power(x, MOD - 2); }\n', '17 long long modAdd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '18   return (a % MOD + b % MOD + 2 * MOD) % MOD;\n', '19 }\n', '20 long long modMult(long long a, long long b) {\n', '21   return (a % MOD * b % MOD) % MOD;\n', '22 }\n', '23 long long modDiv(long long a, long long b) {\n', '24   return (a % MOD * modInverse(b)) % MOD;\n', '25 }\n', '26 void getFact() {\n', '27   fact[0] = 1;\n', '28   for (auto i = 1; i < N; i++) {\n', '29     fact[i] = (fact[i - 1] * i) % MOD;\n', '30   }\n', '31 }\n', '32 long long nCrModP(long long n, long long r) {\n', '33   if (r == 0) return 1;\n', '34   return ((fact[n] * modInverse(fact[r])) % MOD * modInverse(fact[n - r])) %\n', '35          MOD;\n', '36 }\n', '37 int main() {\n', '38   ios_base ::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '39   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '40   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '41   int test;\n', '42   cin >> test;\n', '43   getFact();\n', '44   for (int t = 1; t <= test; t++) {\n', '45     int n;\n', '46     cin >> n;\n', '47     vector<long long> a(n);\n', '48     map<long long, int> m;\n', '49     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '50       cin >> a[i];\n', '51       m[a[i]]++;\n', '52     }\n', '53     sort(a.begin(), a.end());\n', '54     long long maxi = a[n - 1];\n', '55     int ind = n - 1;\n', '56     while (ind >= 0) {\n', '57       if (maxi == a[ind]) {\n', '58         ind--;\n', '59         continue;\n', '60       }\n', '61       if (maxi - a[ind] >= 2)\n', '62         maxi = -1;\n', '63       else\n', '64         maxi = a[ind];\n', '65       break;\n', '66     }\n', '67     if (maxi == -1 && m[a[n - 1]] == 1) {\n', '68       cout << ""0\\n"";\n', '69       continue;\n', '70     }\n', '71     int cnt2 = m[maxi];\n', '72     int cnt1 = m[a[n - 1]];\n', '73     if (cnt1 > 1) {\n', '74       cout << fact[n] << ""\\n"";\n', '75       continue;\n', '76     }\n', '77     int rem = n - cnt1 - cnt2;\n', '78     long long tot = fact[n];\n', '79     long long fs = fact[n - cnt1];\n', '80     fs = 0ll - fs;\n', '81     tot = modAdd(tot, fs);\n', '82     for (int i = 1; i <= rem; i++) {\n', '83       long long num = nCrModP(rem, i);\n', '84       long long rest = fact[n - 1 - i];\n', '85       long long no = fact[i];\n', '86       num = modMult(num, rest);\n', '87       no = modMult(no, num);\n', '88       no = 0ll - no;\n', '89       tot = modAdd(tot, no);\n', '90     }\n', '91     cout << tot << ""\\n"";\n', '92   }\n', '93   return 0;\n', '94 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 1;\n', '4 long long fact[N];\n', '5 const int MOD = 998244353;\n', '6 long long power(long long x, long long y) {\n', '7   long long res = 1;\n', '8   x = x % MOD;\n', '9   while (y > 0) {\n', '10     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % MOD;\n', '11     y = y >> 1;\n', '12     x = (x * x) % MOD;\n', '13   }\n', '14   return res;\n', '15 }\n', '16 long long modInverse(long long x) { return power(x, MOD - 2); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const double PI = 3.14159265389793238462643383279502884197169;\n', '4 const long long MOD = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const long long MOD1 = 998244353;\n', '6 const long long MODo = 1337377;\n', '7 const int MAXN = 2e5 + 2;\n', '8 const int oo = 1e9;\n', '9 const long long oo15 = 1e15;\n', '10 const long long oo18 = 1e18;\n', '11 const long long oooo = 9223372036854775807;\n', '12 int a[200005];\n', '13 long long fact[200005], infact[200005];\n', '14 long long power(long long x, long long y) {\n', '15   if (y == 0) return 1;\n', '16   long long yy = power(x, y / 2);\n', '17   if (y % 2)\n', '18     return yy * yy % MOD1 * x % MOD1;\n', '19   else\n', '20     return yy * yy % MOD1;\n', '21 }\n', '22 int main() {\n', '23   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '24   cin.tie(0);\n', '25   cout.tie(0);\n', '26   fact[0] = 1;\n', '27   for (long long i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 1e6 + 100;\n', '4 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '5 const int inf = 1e6;\n', '6 int T;\n', '7 int n, m, k;\n', '8 int x[maxn], y[maxn];\n', '9 int cntx[maxn], cnty[maxn];\n', '10 map<pair<int, int>, int> prex, prey;\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '13   cin >> T;\n', '14   while (T--) {\n', '15     prex.clear();\n', '16     prey.clear();\n', '17     memset(cntx, 0, sizeof(cntx));\n', '18     memset(cnty, 0, sizeof(cnty));\n', '19     long long ans = 0;\n', '20     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '21     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class T>\n', '4 inline bool ckmax(T &x, const T &y) {\n', '5   return x < y ? x = y, true : false;\n', '6 }\n', '7 template <class T>\n', '8 inline bool ckmin(T &x, const T &y) {\n', '9   return x > y ? x = y, true : false;\n', '10 }\n', '11 const int maxn = 1e6 + 10;\n', '12 int k, m, n, nxtx[maxn], nxty[maxn], px[maxn], py[maxn], sumx[maxn], sumy[maxn],\n', '13     t_case, x[maxn], y[maxn];\n', '14 bool vis[maxn], visx[maxn], visy[maxn];\n', '15 vector<int> c[maxn], r[maxn];\n', '16 int main() {\n', '17   scanf(""%d"", &t_case);\n', '18   while (t_case--) {\n', '19     scanf(""%d%d%d"", &n, &m, &k);\n', '20     for (register int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)\n', '21       scanf(""%d"", x + i), c[x[i]].clear(), visx[x[i]] = true;\n', '22     for (register int i = 1; i <= m; ++i)\n', '23       scanf(""%d"", y + i), r[y[i]].clear(), visy[y[i]] = true;\n', '24     for (register int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int power(long long int a, long long int b, long long int m) {\n', '4   long long int ans = 1;\n', '5   while (b > 0) {\n', '6     if (b & 1) {\n', '7       ans = (ans * a) % m;\n', '8     }\n', '9     a = (a * a) % m;\n', '10     b = b / 2;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return ans;\n', '13 }\n', '14 bool compare(pair<long long int, long long int>& a,\n', '15              pair<long long int, long long int>& b) {\n', '16   if (a.second == b.second)\n', '17     return a.first <= b.first;\n', '18   else\n', '19     return a.second < b.second;\n', '20 }\n', '21 int main() {\n', '22   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '23   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '24   int t;\n', '25   cin >> t;\n', '26   for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {\n', '27     long long int mod = 998244353;\n', '28     long long int n, m, k, a;\n', '29     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '30     vector<pair<long long int, long long int> > arr(k);\n', '31     set<long long int> myset1, myset2;\n', '32     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '33       cin >> a;\n', '34       myset1.insert(a);\n', '35     }\n', '36     myset1.insert(1000000);\n', '37     for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '38       cin >> a;\n', '39       myset2.insert(a);\n', '40     }\n', '41     myset2.insert(1000000);\n', '42     for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {\n', '43       cin >> arr[i].first >> arr[i].second;\n', '44     }\n', '45     sort(arr.begin(), arr.end());\n', '46     long long int ans = 0, cur = 0;\n', '47     for (auto val : myset1) {\n', '48       map<long long int, long long int> mymap;\n', '49       while (cur < k && arr[cur].first < val) {\n', '50         mymap[arr[cur].second]++;\n', '51         cur++;\n', '52       }\n', '53       while (cur < k && arr[cur].first == val) {\n', '54         cur++;\n', '55       }\n', '56       long long int sum = 0, temp = 0;\n', '57       for (auto l : mymap) {\n', '58         sum += l.second;\n', '59         temp += (l.second * (l.second - 1)) / 2;\n', '60       }\n', '61       ans += ((sum * (sum - 1)) / 2 - temp);\n', '62     }\n', '63     cur = 0;\n', '64     sort(arr.begin(), arr.end(), compare);\n', '65     for (auto val : myset2) {\n', '66       map<long long int, long long int> mymap;\n', '67       while (cur < k && arr[cur].second < val) {\n', '68         mymap[arr[cur].first]++;\n', '69         cur++;\n', '70       }\n', '71       while (cur < k && arr[cur].second == val) {\n', '72         cur++;\n', '73       }\n', '74       long long int sum = 0, temp = 0;\n', '75       for (auto l : mymap) {\n', '76   }\n', '83 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long int power(long long int a, long long int b, long long int m) {\n', '4   long long int ans = 1;\n', '5 "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 2e5 + 10;\n', '4 const int MAXM = 2e5 + 10;\n', '5 const int MAXK = 3e5 + 10;\n', '6 struct Pt {\n', '7   int x, y;\n', '8 };\n', '9 int n, m, kkk;\n', '10 int xx[MAXN], yy[MAXM];\n', '11 pair<int, int> p[MAXK];\n', '12 Pt pt[MAXM];\n', '13 inline bool cmpx(Pt qwq, Pt qaq) { return qwq.x < qaq.x; }\n', '14 inline bool cmpy(Pt qwq, Pt qaq) { return qwq.y < qaq.y; }\n', '15 void solve() {\n', '16   scanf(""%d%d%d"", &n, &m, &kkk);\n', '17   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%d"", &xx[i]);\n', '18   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) scanf(""%d"", &yy[i]);\n', '19   for (int i = 1; i <= kkk; i++) scanf(""%d%d"", &p[i].first, &p[i].second);\n', '20   int cnt_id = 0;\n', '21   for (int i = 1; i <= kkk; i++) {\n', '22     int pos1 = lower_bound(xx + 1, xx + n + 1, p[i].first) - xx;\n', '23     int pos2 = lower_bound(yy + 1, yy + m + 1, p[i].second) - yy;\n', '24     if (xx[pos1] == p[i].first && yy[pos2] == p[i].second) continue;\n', '25     pt[++cnt_id].x = p[i].first;\n', '26     pt[cnt_id].y = p[i].second;\n', '27   }\n', '28   long long ans = 0;\n', '29   sort(pt + 1, pt + cnt_id + 1, cmpx);\n', '30   map<int, int> mmp;\n', '31   int idx = 0;\n', '32   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '33     long long tot = 0;\n', '34     mmp.clear();\n', '35     while (idx + 1 <= cnt_id && pt[idx + 1].x < xx[i]) {\n', '36       idx++;\n', '37       ans += tot - mmp[pt[idx].y];\n', '38       mmp[pt[idx].y]++;\n', '39       tot++;\n', '40     }\n', '41     while (idx + 1 <= cnt_id && pt[idx + 1].x == xx[i]) idx++;\n', '42   }\n', '43   sort(pt + 1, pt + cnt_id + 1, cmpy);\n', '44   idx = 0;\n', '45   for (int i = 1; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Point {\n', '4   int x, y;\n', '5 } p[2][300005];\n', '6 struct Sta {\n', '7   int num, val, upd;\n', '8 } s[2][200005];\n', '9 int T, n, m, k, num[2];\n', '10 map<int, bool> r;\n', '11 map<int, bool> c;\n', '12 int rr[200005], cc[200005];\n', '13 inline int cmp1(const Point& a, const Point& b) { return a.x < b.x; }\n', '14 inline int cmp2(const Point& a, const Point& b) { return a.y < b.y; }\n', '15 int lower(int w, int t) {\n', '16   int ans;\n', '17   int l = 1, r;\n', '18   if (t == 0)\n', '19     r = m;\n', '20   else\n', '21     r = n;\n', '22   while (l <= r) {\n', '23     int mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '24     if (t == 0) {\n', '25       if (cc[mid] <= w)\n', '26         ans = mid, l = mid + 1;\n', '27       else\n', '28         r = mid - 1;\n', '29     }\n', '30     if (t == 1) {\n', '31       if (rr[mid] <= w)\n', '32         ans = mid, l = mid + 1;\n', '33       else\n', '34         r = mid - 1;\n', '35     }\n', '36   }\n', '37   return ans;\n', '38 }\n', '39 int main() {\n', '40   cin >> T;\n', '41   while (T--) {\n', '42     r.clear();\n', '43     c.clear();\n', '44     num[0] = num[1] = 0;\n', '45     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '46     int lim = max(n, m);\n', '47     for (int i = 0; i <= lim; ++i) {\n', '48       s[0][i].num = 0;\n', '49       s[0][i].upd = 0;\n', '50       s[0][i].val = -1;\n', '51       s[1][i].num = 0;\n', '52       s[1][i].upd = 0;\n', '53       s[1][i].val = -1;\n', '54     }\n', '55     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '56       cin >> rr[i];\n', '57       r[rr[i]] = true;\n', '58     }\n', '59     for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) {\n', '60       cin >> cc[i];\n', '61       c[cc[i]] = true;\n', '62     }\n', '63     sort(rr + 1, rr + n + 1);\n', '64     sort(cc + 1, cc + m + 1);\n', '65     for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) {\n', '66       int x, y;\n', '67       cin >> x >> y;\n', '68       if (r[x] && c[y]) continue;\n', '69       if (r[x])\n', '70         p[0][++num[0]].x = x, p[0][num[0]].y = y;\n', '71       else\n', '72         p[1][++num[1]].x = x, p[1][num[1]].y = y;\n', '73     }\n', '74     sort(p[0] + 1, p[0] + num[0] + 1, cmp1);\n', '75     sort(p[1] + 1, p[1] + num[1] + 1, cmp2);\n', '76     long long ans = 0;\n', '77     for (int i = 1; i <= num[0]; ++i) {\n', '78       int pos = lower(p[0][i].y, 0);\n', '79       if (p[0][i].x > s[0][pos].val)\n', '80         s[0][pos].num += s[0][pos].upd, s[0][pos].val = p[0][i].x,\n', '81                                         s[0][pos].upd = 1;\n', '82       else\n', '83         ++s[0][pos].upd;\n', '84       ans += s[0][pos].num;\n', '85     }\n', '86     for (int i = 1; i <= num[1]; ++i) {\n', '87       int pos = lower(p[1][i].x, 1);\n', '88       if (p[1][i].y > s[1][pos].val)\n', '89         s[1][pos].num += s[1][pos].upd, s[1][pos].val = p[1][i].y,\n', '90                                         s[1][pos].upd = 1;\n', '91       else\n', '92         ++s[1][pos].upd;\n', '93       ans += s[1][pos].num;\n', '94     }\n', '95     cout << ans << endl;\n', '96   }\n', '97   return 0;\n', '98 }\n']	['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct Point {\n', '4   int x, y;\n', '5 } p[2][300005];\n', '6 struct Sta {\n', '7   int num, val, upd;\n', '8 } s[2][200005];\n', '9 int T, n, m, k, num[2];\n', '10 map<int, bool> r;\n', '11 map<int, bool> c;\n', '12 int rr[200005], cc[200005];\n', '13 inline int cmp1(const Point& a, const Point& b) { return a.x < b.x; }\n', '14 inline int cmp2(const Point& a, const Point& b) { return a.y < b.y; }\n', '15 int lower(int w, int t) {\n', '16   int ans;\n', '17   int l = 1, r;\n', '18   if (t == 0)\n', '19     r = m;\n', '20   else\n', '21     r = n;\n', '22   while (l <= r) {\n', '23     int mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '24     if (t == 0) {\n', '25       if (cc[mid] <= w)\n', '26         ans = mid, l = mid + 1;\n', '27       else\n', '28         r = mid - 1;\n', '29     }\n', '30     if (t == 1) {\n', '31       if (rr[mid] <= w)\n', '32         ans = mid, l = mid + 1;\n', '33       else\n', '34         r = mid - 1;\n', '35     }\n', '36   }\n', '37   return ans;\n', '38 }\n', '39 int main() {\n', '40   cin >> T;\n', '41   while (T--) {\n', '42     r.clear();\n', '43     c.clear();\n', '44     num[0] = num[1] = 0;\n', '45     cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '46     int lim = max(n, m);\n', '47     for (int i = 0; i <= lim; ++i) {\n', '48       s[0][i].num = 0;\n', '49       s[0][i].upd = 0;\n', '50       s[0][i].val = -1;\n', '51       s[1][i].num = 0;\n', '52       s[1][i].upd = 0;\n', '53       s[1][i].val = -1;\n', '54     }\n', '55     for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n', '56       cin >> rr[i];\n', '57       r[rr[i]] = true;\n', '58     }\n', '59     for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) {\n', '60       cin >> cc[i];\n', '61       c[cc[i]] = true;\n', '62     }\n', '63     sort(rr + 1, rr + n + 1);\n', '64     sort(cc + 1, cc + m + 1);\n', '65     for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) {\n', '66       int x, y;\n', '67       cin >> x >> y;\n', '68       if (r[x] && c[y]) continue;\n', '69       if (r[x])\n', '70         p[0][++num[0]].x = x, p[0][num[0]].y = y;\n', '71       else\n', '72         p[1][++num[1]].x = x, p[1][num[1]].y = y;\n', '73     }\n', '74     sort(p[0] + 1, p[0] + num[0] + 1, cmp1);\n', '75     sort(p[1] + 1, p[1] + num[1] + 1, cmp2);\n', '76     int ans = 0;\n', '77     for (int i = 1; i <= num[0]; ++i) {\n', '78       int pos = lower(p[0][i].y, 0);\n', '79       if (p[0][i].x > s[0][pos].val)\n', '80         s[0][pos].num += s[0][pos].upd, s[0][pos].val = p[0][i].x,\n', '81                                         s[0][pos].upd = 1;\n', '82       else\n', '83         ++s[0][pos].upd;\n', '84       ans += s[0][pos].num;\n', '85     }\n', '86     for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int maxn = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 int n, m, k;\n', '5 int a[maxn], b[maxn], suma[maxn], sumb[maxn];\n', '6 unordered_map<int, int> mpa[maxn], mpb[maxn];\n', '7 inline int read() {\n', '8   int x = 0;\n', '9   char c = getchar();\n', '10   while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar();\n', '11   while (isdigit(c)) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (c ^ 48), c = getchar();\n', '12   return x;\n', '13 }\n', '14 inline void init() {\n', '15   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 inline long long read() {\n', '3   long long num = 0, f = 1;\n', '4   char c = getchar();\n', '5   while (c < 48 || c > 57) {\n', ""6     if (c == '-') f = -1;\n"", '7     c = getchar();\n', '8   }\n', '9   while (c > 47 && c < 58) num = num * 10 + (c ^ 48), c = getchar();\n', '10   return num * f;\n', '11 }\n', '12 inline long long re1d() {\n', '13   char c = getchar();\n', '14   while (c < 48 || c > 49) c = getchar();\n', '15   return c & 1;\n', '16 }\n', '17 inline long long min(long long a, long long b) { return a > b ? b : a; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long N = 1e6 + 9;\n', '4 const long long inf = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 vector<int> x, y;\n', '6 map<int, int> ma[N], mb[N], cntx, cnty;\n', '7 void solve() {\n', '8   int n, m, k;\n', '9   cin >> n >> m >> k;\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     int xx;\n', '12     cin >> xx;\n', '13     x.push_back(xx);\n', '14   }\n', '15   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '16     int yy;\n', '17     cin >> yy;\n', '18     y.push_back(yy);\n', '19   }\n', '20   long long ans = 0;\n', '21   for (int i = 1; i <= k; i++) {\n', '22     int xx, yy;\n', '23     cin >> xx >> yy;\n', '24     int pos1 = lower_bound(x.begin(), x.end(), xx) - x.begin();\n', '25     int pos2 = lower_bound(y.begin(), y.end(), yy) - y.begin();\n', '26     if (x[pos1] == xx && y[pos2] == yy) continue;\n', '27     if (x[pos1] == xx) {\n', '28       pos2--;\n', '29       ans += ++cnty[pos2] - ++ma[pos1][pos2];\n', '30     } else {\n', '31       pos1--;\n', '32       ans += ++cntx[pos1] - ++mb[pos2][pos1];\n', '33     }\n', '34   }\n', '35   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int qkpow(int a, int b) {\n', '5   int base = a, ans = 1;\n', '6   while (b) {\n', '7     if (b & 1) ans = 1ll * ans * base % mod;\n', '8     base = 1ll * base * base % mod;\n', '9     b >>= 1;\n', '10   }\n', '11   return ans;\n', '12 }\n', '13 int fac[1000005], inv[1000005];\n', '14 int C(int n, int m) {\n', '15   if (n < m || m < 0) return 0;\n', '16   return 1ll * fac[n] * inv[m] % mod * inv[n - m] % mod;\n', '17 }\n', '18 void init_C(int n) {\n', '19   fac[0] = 1;\n', '20   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) fac[i] = 1ll * fac[i - 1] * i % mod;\n', '21   inv[0] = 1;\n', '22   inv[n] = qkpow(fac[n], mod - 2);\n', '23   for (int i = n - 1; i >= 1; i--) inv[i] = 1ll * inv[i + 1] * (i + 1) % mod;\n', '24 }\n', '25 int read() {\n', '26   int x;\n', '27   scanf(""%d"", &x);\n', '28   return x;\n', '29 }\n', '30 long long t, n, m, k, now, len1, len2, x[200005], y[200005], f[2][300005];\n', '31 long long ans;\n', '32 set<long long> X, Y;\n', '33 struct node {\n', '34   long long x, y;\n', '35 } a[300005];\n', '36 bool cmp(node A, node B) { return A.x < B.x; }\n', '37 signed main() {\n', '38   scanf(""%lld"", &t);\n', '39   while (t--) {\n', '40     scanf(""%lld %lld %lld"", &n, &m, &k);\n', '41     X.clear(), Y.clear();\n', '42     len1 = len2 = 0;\n', '43     X.insert(1e9);\n', '44     Y.insert(1e9);\n', '45     for (long long i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf(""%lld"", &x[i]), X.insert(x[i]);\n', '46     for (long long i = 1; i <= m; i++) scanf(""%lld"", &y[i]), Y.insert(y[i]);\n', '47     for (long long i = 1; i <= k; i++) {\n', '48       scanf(""%lld %lld"", &a[i].x, &a[i].y);\n', '49       if (X.count(a[i].x))\n', '50         f[0][i] = 1;\n', '51       else\n', '52         f[0][i] = 0;\n', '53       if (Y.count(a[i].y))\n', '54         f[1][i] = 1;\n', '55       else\n', '56         f[1][i] = 0;\n', '57     }\n', '58     ans = 0;\n', '59     map<long long, vector<long long>> XX, YY;\n', '60     for (long long i = 1; i <= k; i++) {\n', '61       if (f[0][i] && f[1][i]) continue;\n', '62       if (f[0][i]) {\n', '63         long long Id = *Y.lower_bound(a[i].y);\n', '64         YY[Id].push_back(a[i].x);\n', '65       }\n', '66       if (f[1][i]) {\n', '67         long long Id = *X.lower_bound(a[i].x);\n', '68         XX[Id].push_back(a[i].y);\n', '69       }\n', '70     }\n', '71     for (auto pi : XX) {\n', '72       vector<long long>& v = pi.second;\n', '73       sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '74       long long tot = v.size(), now = 0;\n', '75       for (long long i = 0; i < tot; i++) {\n', '76         while (now < tot && v[now] == v[i]) now++;\n', '77         ans += tot - now;\n', '78       }\n', '79     }\n', '80     for (auto pi : YY) {\n', '81       vector<long long>& v = pi.second;\n', '82       sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n', '83       long long tot = v.size(), now = 0;\n', '84       for (long long i = 0; i < tot; i++) {\n', '85         while (now < tot && v[now] == v[i]) now++;\n', '86         ans += tot - now;\n', '87       }\n', '88     }\n', '89     cout << ans << endl;\n', '90   }\n', '91   return 0;\n', '92 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int qkpow(int a, int b) {\n', '5   int base = a, ans = 1;\n', '6   while (b) {\n', '7     if (b & 1) ans = 1ll * ans * base % mod;\n', '8     base = 1ll * base * base % mod;\n', '9     b >>= 1;\n', '10   }\n', '11   return ans;\n', '12 }\n', '13 int fac[1000005], inv[1000005];\n', '14 int C(int n, int m) {\n', '15   if (n < m || m < 0) return 0;\n', '16   return 1ll * fac[n] * inv[m] % mod * inv[n - m] % mod;\n', '17 }\n', '18 void init_C(int n) {\n', '19   fac[0] = 1;\n', '20   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int T;\n', '5 int n, k;\n', '6 long long A;\n', '7 long long h;\n', '8 int cnt[6] = {1, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16}, p[125];\n', '9 int rk[6];\n', '10 long long a[7], AA[25];\n', '11 bool in[10][125];\n', '12 long long qpow(long long a, long long b) {\n', '13   long long r = 1;\n', '14   while (b) {\n', '15     if (b & 1) r = r * a % mod;\n', '16     b >>= 1;\n', '17     a = a * a % mod;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return r;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void dfs(int x, int last, int c) {\n', '22   if (x == k) {\n', '23     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '24       if (!in[x][i >> k - x]) {\n', '25         p[i] = rk[x];\n', '26       }\n', '27     long long w = 0;\n', '28     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) w += AA[p[i]] * (i + 1);\n', '29     w %= mod;\n', '30     if (w == h) {\n', '31       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) printf(""%d "", p[i]);\n', '32       printf(""\\n"");\n', '33       exit(0);\n', '34     }\n', '35     return;\n', '36   }\n', '37   if (x == 4) {\n', '38     static int q[9];\n', '39     q[0] = 0;\n', '40     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '41       if (!in[5][i]) {\n', '42         if (i % 2 == 1 || in[5][i + 1])\n', '43           p[i] = rk[x + 1];\n', '44         else {\n', '45           q[++q[0]] = i;\n', '46           p[i] = rk[x];\n', '47           p[i + 1] = rk[x + 1];\n', '48           ++i;\n', '49         }\n', '50       }\n', '51     }\n', '52     long long w = 0;\n', '53     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) w += AA[p[i]] * (i + 1);\n', '54     w %= mod;\n', '55     long long det = (a[5] - a[6] + mod) % mod;\n', '56     for (int i = 0; i <= 8; ++i)\n', '57       if ((w + det * i) % mod == h) {\n', '58         for (int j = 1; j <= i; ++j) swap(p[q[j]], p[q[j] + 1]);\n', '59         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) printf(""%d "", p[i]);\n', '60         printf(""\\n"");\n', '61         exit(0);\n', '62       }\n', '63     return;\n', '64   }\n', '65   for (int i = last; i < n; ++i)\n', '66     if (!in[x][i >> k - x]) {\n', '67       p[i] = rk[x];\n', '68       for (int t = x; t <= k; ++t) in[t][i >> k - t] = 1;\n', '69       if (c == cnt[x])\n', '70         dfs(x + 1, 0, 1);\n', '71       else\n', '72         dfs(x, i + 1, c + 1);\n', '73       p[i] = 0;\n', '74       for (int t = x; t <= k; ++t) in[t][i >> k - t] = 0;\n', '75     }\n', '76 }\n', '77 int main() {\n', '78   cin >> k >> A >> h;\n', '79   AA[1] = a[1] = qpow(A, rk[0] = 1);\n', '80   AA[2] = a[2] = qpow(A, rk[1] = 2);\n', '81   AA[3] = a[3] = qpow(A, rk[2] = 3);\n', '82   AA[5] = a[4] = qpow(A, rk[3] = 5);\n', '83   AA[9] = a[5] = qpow(A, rk[4] = 9);\n', '84   AA[17] = a[6] = qpow(A, rk[5] = 17);\n', '85   n = 1 << k;\n', '86   dfs(0, 0, 1);\n', '87   puts(""-1"");\n', '88 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 int T;\n', '5 int n, k;\n', '6 long long A;\n', '7 long long h;\n', '8 int cnt[6] = {1, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16}, p[125];\n', '9 int rk[6];\n', '10 long long a[7], AA[25];\n', '11 bool in[10][125];\n', '12 long long qpow(long long a, long long b) {\n', '13   long long r = 1;\n', '14   while (b) {\n', '15     if (b & 1) r = r * a % mod;\n', '16     b >>= 1;\n', '17     a = a * a % mod;\n', '18   }\n', '19   return r;\n', '20 }\n', '21 void dfs(int x, int last, int c) {\n', '22   if (x == k) {\n', '23     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)\n', '24       if (!in[x][i >> k - x]) {\n', '25         p[i] = rk[x];\n', '26       }\n', '27     long long w = 0;\n', '28     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) w += AA[p[i]] * (i + 1);\n', '29     w %= mod;\n', '30     if (w == h) {\n', '31       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '41       if (!in[5][i]) {\n', '42         if (i % 2 == 1 || in[5][i + 1])\n', '43           p[i] = rk[x + 1];\n', '44         else {\n', '45           q[++q[0]] = i;\n', '46           p[i] = rk[x];\n', '47           p[i + 1] = rk[x + 1];\n', '48           ++i;\n', '49         }\n', '50       }\n', '51     }\n', '52     long long w = 0;\n', '53     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) w += AA[p[i]] * (i + 1);\n', '54     w %= mod;\n', '55     long long det = (a[5] - a[6] + mod) % mod;\n', '56     for (int i = 0; i <= 8; ++i)\n', '57       if ((w + det * i) % mod == h) {\n', '58         for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j) swap(p[q[j]], p[q[j] + 1]);\n', '59         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) printf(""%d "", p[i]);\n', '60         printf(""\\n"");\n', '61         exit(0);\n', '62       }\n', '63     return;\n', '64   }\n', '65   for (int i = last; t <= k; ++t) in[t][i >> k - t] = 0;\n', '75     }\n', '76 }\n', '77 int main() {\n', '78   cin >> k >> A >> h;\n', '79   AA[1] = a[1] = qpow(A, rk[0] = 1);\n', '80   AA[2] = a[2] = qpow(A, rk[1] = 2);\n', '81   AA[3] = a[3] = qpow(A, rk[2] = 3);\n', '82   AA[5] = a[4] = qpow(A, rk[3] = 5);\n', '83   AA[9] = a[5] = qpow(A, rk[4] = 9);\n', '84   AA[17] = a[6] = qpow(A, rk[5] = 17);\n', '85   n = 1 << k;\n', '86   dfs(0, 0, 1);\n', '87   puts(""-1"");\n', '88 }\n']"	"58         for (int j = 1; j <= i; ++j) swap(p[q[j]], p[q[j] + 1]);
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 long long sum(long long a, long long b) {\n', '5   a += b;\n', '6   if (a >= mod) a -= mod;\n', '7   if (a < 0) a += mod;\n', '8   return a;\n', '9 }\n', '10 long long p[1 << 5];\n', '11 map<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> mp;\n', '12 void solve(vector<pair<int, int>> &v, int t) {\n', '13   vector<int> x;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)\n', '15     if (v[i].second == 0) x.push_back(i);\n', '16   int k = x.size();\n', '17   if (k == 0) {\n', '18     long long s = 0;\n', '19     for (auto &i : v) s = sum(s, i.first * p[i.second] % mod);\n', '20     mp[s] = v;\n', '21     return;\n', '22   }\n', '23   if (k == 1) {\n', '24     v[x[0]].second = t;\n', '25     solve(v, t);\n', '26     v[x[0]].second = 0;\n', '27     return;\n', '28   }\n', '29   k /= 2;\n', '30   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) {\n', '31     for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {\n', '32       int y = x[2 * j + (i >> j & 1)];\n', '33       v[y].second = x.size() + 1;\n', '34     }\n', '35     solve(v, t);\n', '36     for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {\n', '37       int y = x[2 * j + (i >> j & 1)];\n', '38       v[y].second = 0;\n', '39     }\n', '40   }\n', '41 }\n', '42 int main() {\n', '43   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '44   cin.tie(0);\n', '45   int k, a, h;\n', '46   cin >> k >> a >> h;\n', '47   p[0] = 1;\n', '48   for (int i = 1; i <= (1 << k); i++) p[i] = p[i - 1] * a % mod;\n', '49   vector<pair<int, int>> f, s;\n', '50   for (int i = 1; i <= (1 << (k - 1)); i++) f.push_back({i, 0});\n', '51   for (int i = (1 << (k - 1)) + 1; i <= (1 << k); i++) s.push_back({i, 0});\n', '52   map<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> a1, a2, b1, b2;\n', '53   solve(f, 1);\n', '54   a1 = mp;\n', '55   mp.clear();\n', '56   solve(s, 1);\n', '57   b1 = mp;\n', '58   mp.clear();\n', '59   solve(f, 2);\n', '60   a2 = mp;\n', '61   mp.clear();\n', '62   solve(s, 2);\n', '63   b2 = mp;\n', '64   mp.clear();\n', '65   for (auto &i : a1) {\n', '66     if (b2.count(sum(h, -i.first))) {\n', '67       vector<pair<int, int>> ans = i.second;\n', '68       for (auto &j : b2[sum(h, -i.first)]) ans.push_back(j);\n', '69       for (auto &j : ans) cout << j.second << "" \\n""[&j == &ans.back()];\n', '70       exit(0);\n', '71     }\n', '72   }\n', '73   for (auto &i : a2) {\n', '74     if (b1.count(sum(h, -i.first))) {\n', '75       vector<pair<int, int>> ans = i.second;\n', '76       for (auto &j : b1[sum(h, -i.first)]) ans.push_back(j);\n', '77       for (auto &j : ans) cout << j.second << "" \\n""[&j == &ans.back()];\n', '78       exit(0);\n', '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81   cout << ""-1\\n"";\n', '82   return 0;\n', '83 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long mod = 998244353;\n', '4 long long sum(long long a, long long b) {\n', '5   a += b;\n', '6   if (a >= mod) a -= mod;\n', '7   if (a < 0) a += mod;\n', '8   return a;\n', '9 }\n', '10 long long p[1 << 5];\n', '11 map<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> mp;\n', '12 void solve(vector<pair<int, int>> &v, int t) {\n', '13   vector<int> x;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)\n', '15     if (v[i].second == 0) x.push_back(i);\n', '16   int k = x.size();\n', '17   if (k == 0) {\n', '18     long long s = 0;\n', '19     for (auto &i : v) s = sum(s, i.first * p[i.second] % mod);\n', '20     mp[s] = v;\n', '21     return;\n', '22   }\n', '23   if (k == 1) {\n', '24     v[x[0]].second = t;\n', '25     solve(v, t);\n', '26     v[x[0]].second = 0;\n', '27     return;\n', '28   }\n', '29   k /= 2;\n', '30   for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) {\n', '31     for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {\n', '32       int y = x[2 * j + (i >> j & 1)];\n', '33       v[y].second = x.size() + 1;\n', '34     }\n', '35     solve(v, t);\n', '36     for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {\n', '37       int y = x[2 * j + (i >> j & 1)];\n', '38       v[y].second = 0;\n', '39     }\n', '40   }\n', '41 }\n', '42 int main() {\n', '43   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '44   cin.tie(0);\n', '45   int k, a, h;\n', '46   cin >> k >> a >> h;\n', '47   p[0] = 1;\n', '48   for (int i = 1; i < (1 << k); i++) p[i] = p[i - 1] * a % mod;\n', '49   vector<pair<int, int>> f, s;\n', '50   for (int i = 1; i <= (1 << (k - 1)); i++) f.push_back({i, 0});\n', '51   for (int i = (1 << (k - 1)) + 1; i <= (1 << k); i++) s.push_back({i, 0});\n', '52   map<int, vector<pair<int, int>>> a1, a2, b1, b2;\n', '53   solve(f, 1);\n', '54   a1 = mp;\n', '55   mp.clear();\n', '56   solve(s, 1);\n', '57   b1 = mp;\n', '58   mp.clear();\n', '59   solve(f, 2);\n', '60   a2 = mp;\n', '61   mp.clear();\n', '62   solve(s, 2);\n', '63   b2 = mp;\n', '64   mp.clear();\n', '65   for (auto &i : a1) {\n', '66     if (b2.count(sum(h, -i.first))) {\n', '67       vector<pair<int, int>> ans = i.second;\n', '68       for (auto &j : b2[sum(h, -i.first)]) ans.push_back(j);\n', '69       for (auto &j : ans) cout << j.second << "" \\n""[&j == &ans.back()];\n', '70       exit(0);\n', '71     }\n', '72   }\n', '73   for (auto &i : a2) {\n', '74     if (b1.count(sum(h, -i.first))) {\n', '75       vector<pair<int, int>> ans = i.second;\n', '76       for (auto &j : b1[sum(h, -i.first)]) ans.push_back(j);\n', '77       for (auto &j : ans) cout << j.second << "" \\n""[&j == &ans.back()];\n', '78       exit(0);\n', '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81   cout << ""-1\\n"";\n', '82   return 0;\n', '83 }\n']"	"48   for (int i = 1; i <= (1 << k); i++) p[i] = p[i - 1] * a % mod;
"
"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int P = 998244353;\n', '4 const int N = 1 << 16, K = 1 << 6;\n', '5 int k, A, h;\n', '6 int ran[K + 5];\n', '7 int power[K + 5];\n', '8 map<int, vector<int> > rev[2], ver[2];\n', '9 deque<int> q;\n', '10 int main() {\n', '11   cin >> k >> A >> h;\n', '12   power[0] = 1;\n', '13   for (int i = 1; i <= (1 << k); i++) power[i] = 1ll * power[i - 1] * A % P;\n', '14   for (int i = 0; i < 1 << (1 << (k - 1)); i++) {\n', '15     q.clear();\n', '16     int mask = i;\n', '17     for (int j = 1; j <= (1 << (k - 1)); j++)\n', '18       ran[j] = (1 << (k - 1)), q.push_back(j);\n', '19     while (q.size() > 1) {\n', '20       int first = q.front();\n', '21       q.pop_front();\n', '22       int second = q.front();\n', '23       q.pop_front();\n', '24       if (mask & 1)\n', '25         ran[second] >>= 1, q.push_back(second), mask >>= 1;\n', '26       else\n', '27         ran[first] >>= 1, q.push_back(first), mask >>= 1;\n', '28     }\n', '29     int sum = 0;\n', '30     vector<int> ans;\n', '31     for (int j = 1; j <= (1 << (k - 1)); j++)\n', '32       sum = (sum + 1ll * j * power[ran[j] + 1] % P) % P,\n', '33       ans.push_back(ran[j] + 1);\n', '34     int ed = q.back();\n', '35     rev[0][sum] = ans;\n', '36     sum = (sum - 1ll * ed * power[ans[ed - 1]] % P + P) % P;\n', '37     ans[ed - 1]--;\n', '38     rev[1][(sum + 1ll * ed * power[ans[ed - 1]] % P) % P] = ans;\n', '39   }\n', '40   vector<int> all;\n', '41   for (int i = 0; i < 1 << (1 << (k - 1)); i++) {\n', '42     q.clear();\n', '43     int mask = i;\n', '44     for (int j = 1 + (1 << (k - 1)); j <= (1 << k); j++)\n', '45       ran[j] = (1 << (k - 1)), q.push_back(j);\n', '46     while (q.size() > 1) {\n', '47       int first = q.front();\n', '48       q.pop_front();\n', '49       int second = q.front();\n', '50       q.pop_front();\n', '51       if (mask & 1)\n', '52         ran[second] >>= 1, q.push_back(second), mask >>= 1;\n', '53       else\n', '54         ran[first] >>= 1, q.push_back(first), mask >>= 1;\n', '55     }\n', '56     int sum = 0;\n', '57     vector<int> ans;\n', '58     for (int j = 1 + (1 << (k - 1)); j <= (1 << k); j++)\n', '59       sum = (sum + 1ll * j * power[ran[j] + 1] % P) % P,\n', '60       ans.push_back(ran[j] + 1);\n', '61     int ed = q.back();\n', '62     if (rev[1].count((h - sum + P) % P)) {\n', '63       all = rev[1][(h - sum + P) % P];\n', '64       all.insert(all.end(), ans.begin(), ans.end());\n', '65       break;\n', '66     }\n', '67     sum = (sum - 1ll * ed * power[ans[ed - 1 - (1 << (k - 1))]] % P + P) % P;\n', '68     ans[ed - 1 - (1 << (k - 1))]--;\n', '69     (sum += 1ll * ed * power[ans[ed - 1 - (1 << (k - 1))]] % P) %= P;\n', '70     if (rev[0].count((h - sum + P) % P)) {\n', '71       all = rev[0][(h - sum + P) % P];\n', '72       all.insert(all.end(), ans.begin(), ans.end());\n', '73       break;\n', '74     }\n', '75   }\n', '76   if (all.empty())\n', '77     cout << ""-1"" << endl;\n', '78   else {\n', '79     for (int i = 0; i < (1 << k); i++) cout << all[i] << "" "";\n', '80     cout << endl;\n', '81   }\n', '82   return 0;\n', '83 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int P = 998244353;\n', '4 const int N = 1 << 16, K = 1 << 6;\n', '5 int k, A, h;\n', '6 int ran[K + 5];\n', '7 int power[K + 5];\n', '8 map<int, vector<int> > rev[2], ver[2];\n', '9 deque<int> q;\n', '10 int main() {\n', '11   cin >> k >> A >> h;\n', '12   power[0] = 1;\n', '13   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using pii = pair<int, int>;\n', '5 template <class T>\n', '6 int size(T &&a) {\n', '7   return (int)(a.size());\n', '8 }\n', '9 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, string str) {\n', '10   for (char c : str) os << c;\n', '11   return os;\n', '12 }\n', '13 template <class A, class B>\n', '14 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const pair<A, B> &p) {\n', '15   return os << \'(\' << p.first << "","" << p.second << \')\';\n', '16 }\n', '17 template <class T>\n', '18 auto operator<<(ostream &os, T &&x) -> decltype(x.begin(), os) {\n', ""19   os << '{';\n"", '20   for (auto it = x.begin(); it != x.end(); ++it)\n', '21     os << *it << (it == prev(x.end()) ? """" : "" "");\n', ""22   return os << '}';\n"", '23 }\n', '24 template <class T>\n', '25 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, vector<vector<T>> vec) {\n', '26   for (auto x : vec) os << ""\\n  "" << x;\n', '27   return os;\n', '28 }\n', '29 void dump() {}\n', '30 template <class T, class... Args>\n', '31 void dump(T &&x, Args... args) {\n', '32   cerr << x << ""; "";\n', '33   dump(args...);\n', '34 }\n', '35 vector<int> ans;\n', '36 void print_sequence(int st, int en) {\n', '37   if (en - st + 1 < 3) return;\n', '38   for (int i = st; i <= en - 2; i += 2) ans.emplace_back(i);\n', '39   for (int i = en - 4; i >= st; i -= 2) ans.emplace_back(i);\n', '40 }\n', '41 void solve() {\n', '42   int n;\n', '43   cin >> n;\n', '44   vector<int> a(n), pref_xor(n);\n', '45   for (int i = 0; i < (n); ++i) {\n', '46     cin >> a[i];\n', '47     if (i == 0)\n', '48       pref_xor[i] = a[i];\n', '49     else\n', '50       pref_xor[i] = pref_xor[i - 1] ^ a[i];\n', '51   }\n', '52   if (pref_xor[n - 1] == 1) {\n', '53     cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '54     return;\n', '55   }\n', '56   ans.clear();\n', '57   if (n % 2 == 1) {\n', '58     cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '59     print_sequence(0, n - 1);\n', ""60     cout << size(ans) << '\\n';\n"", ""61     for (int x : ans) cout << x + 1 << ' ';\n"", ""62     cout << '\\n';\n"", '63     return;\n', '64   }\n', '65   for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {\n', '66     if (pref_xor[i] == 0) {\n', '67       cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '68       print_sequence(0, i);\n', '69       print_sequence(i + 1, n - 1);\n', ""70       cout << size(ans) << '\\n';\n"", ""71       for (int x : ans) cout << x + 1 << ' ';\n"", ""72       cout << '\\n';\n"", '73       return;\n', '74     }\n', '75   }\n', '76   cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '77 }\n', '78 int main() {\n', '79   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '80   cin.tie(0);\n', '81   int T;\n', '82   cin >> T;\n', '83   while (T--) solve();\n', '84 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 using pii = pair<int, int>;\n', '5 template <class T>\n', '6 int size(T &&a) {\n', '7   return (int)(a.size());\n', '8 }\n', '9 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, string str) {\n', '10   for (char c : str) os << c;\n', '11   return os;\n', '12 }\n', '13 template <class A, class B>\n', '14 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const pair<A, B> &p) {\n', '15   return os << \'(\' << p.first << "","" << p.second << \')\';\n', '16 }\n', '17 template <class T>\n', '18 auto operator<<(ostream &os, T &&x) -> decltype(x.begin(), os) {\n', ""19   os << '{';\n"", '20   for (auto it = x.begin(); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void calc(vector<int> &arr, vector<int> &ids, int l, int r) {\n', '4   for (int i = r - 2; i >= l; i -= 2) {\n', '5     ids.push_back(i);\n', '6     int v = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1] ^ arr[i + 2];\n', '7     arr[i] = arr[i + 1] = arr[i + 2] = v;\n', '8   }\n', '9   for (int i = l; i <= r - 2; i += 2) {\n', '10     ids.push_back(i);\n', '11     int v = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1] ^ arr[i + 2];\n', '12     arr[i] = arr[i + 1] = arr[i + 2] = v;\n', '13   }\n', '14 }\n', '15 void solve() {\n', '16   int n;\n', '17   cin >> n;\n', '18   vector<int> arr(n + 1), pre(n + 1), ids;\n', '19   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '20     cin >> arr[i];\n', '21     pre[i] = pre[i - 1] ^ arr[i];\n', '22   }\n', '23   if (pre[n] != 0) {\n', '24     cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '25     return;\n', '26   }\n', '27   if (n & 1)\n', '28     calc(arr, ids, 1, n);\n', '29   else {\n', '30     bool f = false;\n', '31     for (int i = 1; !f && i <= n; i += 2) {\n', '32       if (pre[i] == 0) {\n', '33         f = true;\n', '34         calc(arr, ids, 1, i);\n', '35         calc(arr, ids, i + 1, n);\n', '36       }\n', '37     }\n', '38     if (!f) {\n', '39       cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '40       return;\n', '41     }\n', '42   }\n', '43   cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', '44   if (ids.empty()) {\n', '45     cout << ""0\\n"";\n', '46     return;\n', '47   }\n', '48   cout << (int)ids.size() << ""\\n"";\n', '49   for (int id : ids) cout << id << "" "";\n', '50   cout << ""\\n"";\n', '51 }\n', '52 int main() {\n', '53   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '54   cin.tie(0);\n', '55   cout.tie(0);\n', '56   int t;\n', '57   cin >> t;\n', '58   while (t-- > 0) solve();\n', '59   return 0;\n', '60 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void calc(vector<int> &arr, vector<int> &ids, int l, int r) {\n', '4   for (int i = r - 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 10;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '7   int t;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     int n;\n', '11     cin >> n;\n', '12     vector<int> a(n);\n', '13     for (auto& i : a) {\n', '14       cin >> i;\n', '15     }\n', '16     vector<int> ops;\n', '17     for (int i = 0; i < n - 2; ++i) {\n', '18       if (a[i] == 0) {\n', '19         continue;\n', '20       }\n', '21       int j = i + 1;\n', '22       while (j < n and a[j] == 1) {\n', '23         ++j;\n', '24       }\n', '25       int sz = j - i;\n', '26       if (sz % 2 == 0 or j + 1 >= n) {\n', '27         i = j;\n', '28       } else if (a[j + 1] == 0) {\n', '29         ops.push_back(j - 1);\n', '30         a[j] = a[j + 1] = 1;\n', '31         i = j;\n', '32       } else {\n', '33         ops.push_back(j - 1);\n', '34         a[j - 1] = a[j + 1] = 0;\n', '35         i = j;\n', '36       }\n', '37     }\n', '38     for (int i = 0; i < n - 2; ++i) {\n', '39       if (a[i] + a[i + 1] + a[i + 2] == 2) {\n', '40         ops.push_back(i);\n', '41         a[i] = a[i + 1] = a[i + 2] = 0;\n', '42       }\n', '43     }\n', '44     for (int i = n - 1; i >= 2; --i) {\n', '45       if (a[i] + a[i - 1] + a[i - 2] == 2) {\n', '46         ops.push_back(i - 2);\n', '47         a[i] = a[i - 1] = a[i - 2] = 0;\n', '48       }\n', '49     }\n', '50     if (count(a.begin(), a.end(), 1)) {\n', '51       cout << ""NO\\n"";\n', '52     } else {\n', '53       cout << ""YES\\n"";\n', ""54       cout << ops.size() << '\\n';\n"", '55       for (auto& i : ops) {\n', ""56         cout << i + 1 << ' ';\n"", '57       }\n', ""58       cout << '\\n';\n"", '59     }\n', '60   }\n', '61 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 1e5 + 10;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '7   int t;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     int n;\n', '11     cin >> n;\n', '12     vector<int> a(n);\n', '13     for (auto& i : a) {\n', '14       cin >> i;\n', '15     }\n', '16     vector<int> ops;\n', '17     for (int i = 0; i < n - 2; ++i) {\n', '18       if (a[i] == 0) {\n', '19         continue;\n', '20       }\n', '21       int j = i + 1;\n', '22       while (j < n and a[j] == 1) {\n', '23         ++j;\n', '24       }\n', '25       int sz = j - i;\n', '26       if (sz % 2 == 0 or j + 1 >= n) {\n', '27         i = j;\n', '28       } else if (a[j + 1] == 0) {\n', '29         ops.push_back(j - 1);\n', '30         a[j] = a[j + 1] = 0;\n', '31         i = j;\n', '32       } else {\n', '33         ops.push_back(j - 1);\n', '34         a[j - 1] = a[j + 1] = 0;\n', '35         i = j;\n', '36       }\n', '37     }\n', '38     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using LL = long long;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '6   cin.tie(0);\n', '7   int times;\n', '8   cin >> times;\n', '9   while (times--) {\n', '10     int n;\n', '11     cin >> n;\n', '12     vector<int> x(n);\n', '13     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 void solve() {\n', '4   int n;\n', '5   cin >> n;\n', '6   vector<int> a(n);\n', '7   for (int& x : a) cin >> x;\n', '8   int asum = 0;\n', '9   for (int x : a) asum ^= x;\n', '10   if (asum) {\n', '11     cout << ""NO"" << \'\\n\';\n', '12     return;\n', '13   }\n', '14   vector<int> b(n + 1);\n', '15   b[0] = a[0];\n', '16   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 void rd(T& x) {\n', '5   int f = 0, c;\n', '6   while (!isdigit(c = getchar())) f ^= !(c ^ 45);\n', '7   x = (c & 15);\n', '8   while (isdigit(c = getchar())) x = x * 10 + (c & 15);\n', '9   if (f) x = -x;\n', '10 }\n', '11 template <typename T>\n', '12 void pt(T x, int c = -1) {\n', ""13   if (x < 0) putchar('-'), x = -x;\n"", '14   if (x > 9) pt(x / 10);\n', '15   putchar(x % 10 + 48);\n', '16   if (c != -1) putchar(c);\n', '17 }\n', '18 const int N = 3005, INF = 0X3F3F3F3F;\n', '19 int T, n, a[N], dp[N][N], nex[N], pre[N];\n', '20 int sol(int l, int r) {\n', '21   if (l >= r) return 0;\n', '22   if (dp[l][r] != -1) return dp[l][r];\n', '23   if (a[l] == a[l + 1]) return dp[l][r] = sol(l + 1, r) + 1;\n', '24   int ret = sol(l + 1, r);\n', '25   if (nex[l] <= r) {\n', '26     for (int i = nex[l]; i; i = nex[i])\n', '27       if (i <= r) {\n', '28         ret = max(ret, sol(l + 1, i - 1) + sol(i, r) + 1);\n', '29       }\n', '30   }\n', '31   return dp[l][r] = ret;\n', '32 }\n', '33 int main() {\n', '34   rd(T);\n', '35   while (T--) {\n', '36     rd(n);\n', '37     for (int i = (1); i <= (n); ++i) rd(a[i]);\n', '38     map<int, int> lst;\n', '39     for (int i = (1); i <= (n); ++i) {\n', '40       if (lst.count(a[i])) {\n', '41         pre[i] = lst[a[i]];\n', '42       } else {\n', '43         pre[i] = 0;\n', '44       }\n', '45       lst[a[i]] = i;\n', '46     }\n', '47     lst.clear();\n', '48     for (int i = (n); i >= (1); --i) {\n', '49       if (lst.count(a[i])) {\n', '50         nex[i] = lst[a[i]];\n', '51       } else {\n', '52         nex[i] = n + 1;\n', '53       }\n', '54       lst[a[i]] = i;\n', '55     }\n', '56     for (int i = (0); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 void rd(T& x) {\n', '5   int f = 0, c;\n', '6   while (!isdigit(c = getchar())) f ^= !(c ^ 45);\n', '7   x = (c & 15);\n', '8   while (isdigit(c = getchar())) x = x * 10 + (c & 15);\n', '9   if (f) x = -x;\n', '10 }\n', '11 template <typename T>\n', '12 void pt(T x, int c = -1) {\n', ""13   if (x < 0) putchar('-'), x = -x;\n"", '14   if (x > 9) pt(x / 10);\n', '15   putchar(x % 10 + 48);\n', '16   if (c != -1) putchar(c);\n', '17 }\n', '18 const int N = 3005, INF = 0X3F3F3F3F;\n', '19 int T, n, a[N], dp[N][N], nex[N], pre[N];\n', '20 int sol(int l, int r) {\n', '21   if (l >= r) return 0;\n', '22   if (dp[l][r] != -1) return dp[l][r];\n', '23   if (a[l] == a[l + 1]) return dp[l][r] = sol(l + 1, r) + 1;\n', '24   int ret = sol(l + 1, r);\n', '25   if (nex[l] <= r) {\n', '26     for (int i = nex[l]; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 constexpr int N = 3e3;\n', '4 uint16_t a[N], lst[N], nxt[N], cnxt[20], dp[N][N + 1];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   cin.tie(0), ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '7   int t, n;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '12       cin >> a[i], --a[i];\n', '13     }\n', '14     memset(lst, 0, n * sizeof *lst);\n', '15     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '16       ++lst[a[i]];\n', '17     }\n', '18     int w = -1, r = 0, purged = 0;\n', '19     while (r < n) {\n', '20       if (w >= 0 && a[w] == a[r]) {\n', '21         if (--lst[a[r++]] == 1) {\n', '22           --w;\n', '23           ++purged;\n', '24         }\n', '25       } else if (lst[a[r]] == 1) {\n', '26         ++r;\n', '27         ++purged;\n', '28       } else {\n', '29         a[++w] = a[r++];\n', '30       }\n', '31     }\n', '32     memset(lst, -1, n * sizeof *lst);\n', '33     n = w + 1;\n', '34     memset(nxt, 127, n * sizeof *nxt);\n', '35     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '36       if (lst[a[i]] != (uint16_t)-1) {\n', '37         nxt[lst[a[i]]] = i;\n', '38       }\n', '39       lst[a[i]] = i;\n', '40     }\n', '41     for (int i = n - 1; i > -1; --i) {\n', '42       auto* cnxte = cnxt;\n', '43       for (int z = nxt[i]; z < n; z = nxt[z]) {\n', '44         *cnxte++ = z;\n', '45       }\n', '46       *cnxte = n;\n', '47       cnxte = cnxt;\n', '48       for (int j = i + 2; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '49         if (a[j - 1] == a[i]) {\n', '50           ++cnxte;\n', '51         }\n', '52         int t = dp[i + 1][j] - 1;\n', '53         for (const auto* z = cnxt; z < cnxte; ++z) {\n', '54           t = max(t, dp[i + 1][*z] + dp[*z][j]);\n', '55         }\n', '56         dp[i][j] = t + 1;\n', '57       }\n', '58     }\n', ""59     cout << (n ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long spf[101];\n', '4 long long fac[101];\n', '5 long long add(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   if (a + b > 1000000007)\n', '7     return a + b - 1000000007;\n', '8   else\n', '9     return a + b;\n', '10 }\n', '11 long long sub(long long a, long long b) {\n', '12   if (a - b < 0)\n', '13     return a - b + 1000000007;\n', '14   else\n', '15     return a - b;\n', '16 }\n', '17 void sieve() {\n', '18   spf[1] = 1;\n', '19   for (long long i = 2; i < 101; i++) spf[i] = i;\n', '20   for (long long i = 4; i < 101; i += 2) spf[i] = 2;\n', '21   for (long long i = 3; i * i < 101; i++) {\n', '22     if (spf[i] == i) {\n', '23       for (long long j = i * i; j < 101; j += i)\n', '24         if (spf[j] == j) spf[j] = i;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n', '28 map<long long, long long> getfactor(long long a) {\n', '29   map<long long, long long> m;\n', '30   while (a > 1) {\n', '31     m[spf[a]]++;\n', '32     a /= spf[a];\n', '33   }\n', '34   return m;\n', '35 }\n', '36 long long power(long long x, long long y, long long p) {\n', '37   long long res = 1;\n', '38   x = x % p;\n', '39   if (x == 0 || y < 0) return 0;\n', '40   while (y > 0) {\n', '41     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % p;\n', '42     y = y >> 1;\n', '43     x = (x * x) % p;\n', '44   }\n', '45   return res;\n', '46 }\n', '47 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '48   if (a == 0) return b;\n', '49   return gcd(b % a, a);\n', '50 }\n', '51 long long inverse(long long a, long long p) { return power(a, p - 2, p); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 3003, mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int n, a[N], dp[N][N], f[N][N];\n', '5 vector<int> s[N];\n', '6 void Main() {\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   for (int i = (1); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <class T>\n', '4 ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, vector<T>& v) {\n', '5   out << ""["";\n', '6   for (auto k : v) out << k << "","";\n', '7   out << ""]""\n', '8       << ""\\n"";\n', '9   return out;\n', '10 }\n', '11 template <class T>\n', '12 ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, set<T> s) {\n', '13   out << ""{"";\n', '14   for (auto k : s) out << k << "","";\n', '15   out << ""}""\n', '16       << ""\\n"";\n', '17   return out;\n', '18 }\n', '19 template <class T, class U>\n', '20 ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, pair<T, U> p) {\n', '21   out << ""[ "" << p.first << "" , "" << p.second << "" ] "";\n', '22   return out;\n', '23 }\n', '24 template <class T, class U>\n', '25 istream& operator>>(istream& in, pair<T, U>& p) {\n', '26   in >> p.first >> p.second;\n', '27   return in;\n', '28 }\n', '29 vector<int> app[(int)1e4];\n', '30 int dp[3500][3500];\n', '31 int a[4000];\n', '32 int DP(int i, int j) {\n', '33   if (i >= j) return 0;\n', '34   if (dp[i][j] != -1) return dp[i][j];\n', '35   dp[i][j] = DP(i + 1, j);\n', '36   for (auto k : app[a[i]]) {\n', '37     if (k > i and k <= j)\n', '38       dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], 1 + DP(i + 1, k - 1) + DP(k, j));\n', '39   }\n', '40   return dp[i][j];\n', '41 }\n', '42 int main() {\n', '43   cin.tie(0);\n', '44   cin.sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '45   int t;\n', '46   cin >> t;\n', '47   while (t--) {\n', '48     int n;\n', '49     cin >> n;\n', '50     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 constexpr int N = 3e3 + 1;\n', '4 int a[N], dp[N][N], nxt[N], prv[N], lst[N];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   cin.tie(0), ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '7   int t, n;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '12       cin >> a[i], --a[i];\n', '13     }\n', '14     memset(lst, -1, n * sizeof *lst);\n', '15     n = unique(a, a + n) - a;\n', '16     memset(prv, -1, n * sizeof *prv);\n', '17     memset(nxt, 127, n * sizeof *nxt);\n', '18     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '19       if (lst[a[i]] != -1) {\n', '20         prv[i] = lst[a[i]];\n', '21         nxt[lst[a[i]]] = i;\n', '22       }\n', '23       lst[a[i]] = i;\n', '24     }\n', '25     for (int le = 2; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 3003, mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 int n, a[N], dp[N][N], f[N][N];\n', '5 vector<int> s[N];\n', '6 void Main() {\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); ++i) s[i].clear();\n', '9   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); ++i) cin >> a[i], s[a[i]].push_back(i);\n', '10   for (int i = (1); i <= (n); ++i)\n', '11     for (int j = (i); j <= (n); ++j) dp[i][j] = f[i][j] = 1e9;\n', '12   for (int i = (1); "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 constexpr int N = 3e3;\n', '4 uint16_t a[N], lst[N], nxt[N], cnxt[20], dp[N][N + 1];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   cin.tie(0), ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '7   int t, n;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '12       cin >> a[i], --a[i];\n', '13     }\n', '14     memset(lst, 0, n * sizeof *lst);\n', '15     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '16       ++lst[a[i]];\n', '17     }\n', '18     int w = -1, r = 0, purged = 0;\n', '19     while (r < n) {\n', '20       if (w >= 0 && a[w] == a[r]) {\n', '21         if (--lst[a[r++]] == 1) {\n', '22           --w;\n', '23           ++purged;\n', '24         }\n', '25       } else if (lst[a[r]] == 1) {\n', '26         ++r;\n', '27         ++purged;\n', '28       } else {\n', '29         a[++w] = a[r++];\n', '30       }\n', '31     }\n', '32     memset(lst, -1, n * sizeof *lst);\n', '33     n = w + 1;\n', '34     memset(nxt, 127, n * sizeof *nxt);\n', '35     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n', '36       if (lst[a[i]] != (uint16_t)-1) {\n', '37         nxt[lst[a[i]]] = i;\n', '38       }\n', '39       lst[a[i]] = i;\n', '40     }\n', '41     for (int i = n - 2; i > -1; --i) {\n', '42       auto* cnxte = cnxt;\n', '43       for (int z = nxt[i]; z < n; z = nxt[z]) {\n', '44         *cnxte++ = z;\n', '45       }\n', '46       *cnxte = n;\n', '47       cnxte = cnxt;\n', '48       for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; ++j) {\n', '49         int t = dp[i + 1][j] - 1;\n', '50         for (const auto* z = cnxt; z < cnxte; ++z) {\n', '51           t = max(t, dp[i + 1][*z] + dp[*z][j]);\n', '52         }\n', '53         dp[i][j] = t + 1;\n', '54         if (a[j] == a[i]) {\n', '55           ++cnxte;\n', '56         }\n', '57       }\n', '58     }\n', ""59     cout << (n ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 long long spf[101];\n', '4 long long fac[101];\n', '5 long long add(long long a, long long b) {\n', '6   if (a + b > 1000000007)\n', '7     return a + b - 1000000007;\n', '8   else\n', '9     return a + b;\n', '10 }\n', '11 long long sub(long long a, long long b) {\n', '12   if (a - b < 0)\n', '13     return a - b + 1000000007;\n', '14   else\n', '15     return a - b;\n', '16 }\n', '17 void sieve() {\n', '18   spf[1] = 1;\n', '19   for (long long i = 2; i < 101; i++) spf[i] = i;\n', '20   for (long long i = 4; i < 101; i += 2) spf[i] = 2;\n', '21   for (long long i = 3; i * i < 101; i++) {\n', '22     if (spf[i] == i) {\n', '23       for (long long j = i * i; j < 101; j += i)\n', '24         if (spf[j] == j) spf[j] = i;\n', '25     }\n', '26   }\n', '27 }\n', '28 map<long long, long long> getfactor(long long a) {\n', '29   map<long long, long long> m;\n', '30   while (a > 1) {\n', '31     m[spf[a]]++;\n', '32     a /= spf[a];\n', '33   }\n', '34   return m;\n', '35 }\n', '36 long long power(long long x, long long y, long long p) {\n', '37   long long res = 1;\n', '38   x = x % p;\n', '39   if (x == 0 || y < 0) return 0;\n', '40   while (y > 0) {\n', '41     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % p;\n', '42     y = y >> 1;\n', '43     x = (x * x) % p;\n', '44   }\n', '45   return res;\n', '46 }\n', '47 long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {\n', '48   if (a == 0) return b;\n', '49   return gcd(b % a, a);\n', '50 }\n', '51 long long inverse(long long a, long long p) { return power(a, p - 2, p); }\n', '52 long long ncr(long long n, long long r, long long p) {\n', '53   if (r > n) return 0;\n', '54   if (r == 0 || r == n) return 1;\n', '55   return (fac[n] * inverse(fac[r], p) % p * inverse(fac[n - r], p) % p) % p;\n', '56 }\n', '57 void solve() {\n', '58   long long n;\n', '59   cin >> n;\n', '60   vector<long long> v[n + 1];\n', '61   long long a[n + 1];\n', '62   for (long long i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n;\n', '4 const int maxN = 3005;\n', '5 vector<int> where[maxN];\n', '6 int a[maxN];\n', '7 int dp[maxN][maxN];\n', '8 void solve() {\n', '9   cin >> n;\n', '10   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '11     where[i].clear();\n', '12   }\n', '13   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '14     cin >> a[i];\n', '15     where[a[i]].emplace_back(i);\n', '16   }\n', '17   for (int len = 1; len <= n; len++) {\n', '18     for (int i = 1; i + len - 1 <= n; i++) {\n', '19       int j = i + len - 1;\n', '20       dp[i][j] = len - 1;\n', '21       if (len == 1) continue;\n', '22       dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i + 1][j] + 1);\n', '23       int pt1 = lower_bound(where[a[i]].begin(), where[a[i]].end(), i) -\n', '24                 where[a[i]].begin();\n', '25       int pt2 = upper_bound(where[a[i]].begin(), where[a[i]].end(), j) -\n', '26                 where[a[i]].begin() - 1;\n', '27       for (int t = pt1 + 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 constexpr int N = 3e3 + 1;\n', '4 int a[N], dp[N][N], nxt[N], prv[N], lst[N];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   cin.tie(0), ios::sync_with_stdio(0);\n', '7   int t, n;\n', '8   cin >> t;\n', '9   while (t--) {\n', '10     cin >> n;\n', '11     for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"", ""unroll-loops"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 const int inf = 1000111222;\n', '5 const int max_n = 211;\n', '6 struct point {\n', '7   int x, y;\n', '8 };\n', '9 long long get_sqr(const point& p1, const point& p2, const point& p3) {\n', '10   long long res = 0;\n', '11   res += (p2.x - p1.x) * 1LL * (p1.y + p2.y);\n', '12   res += (p3.x - p2.x) * 1LL * (p2.y + p3.y);\n', '13   res += (p1.x - p3.x) * 1LL * (p3.y + p1.y);\n', '14   return abs(res);\n', '15 }\n', '16 point p[max_n];\n', '17 int dp[max_n][max_n], n, k;\n', '18 long long all_sqr[max_n][max_n][max_n], sums[max_n][max_n];\n', '19 bool check(long long sz) {\n', '20   for (int l = 2; l < n; ++l) {\n', '21     for (int st = 0; st < n; ++st) {\n', '22       int fn = (st + l) % n;\n', '23       if (sums[st][fn] < sz) {\n', '24         dp[st][fn] = 0;\n', '25         continue;\n', '26       }\n', '27       int ans = 0;\n', '28       long long curr_sqr = 0;\n', '29       int curr_st = 0;\n', '30       for (int i = st + 1; i != fn; ++i) {\n', '31         int pr = i - 1;\n', '32         if (i == n) i -= n;\n', '33         if (i == fn) break;\n', '34         if (curr_sqr < sz) {\n', '35           curr_st = i;\n', '36           curr_sqr += all_sqr[fn][pr][i];\n', '37         }\n', '38         if (all_sqr[st][fn][i] >= sz) {\n', '39           ans = max(ans, dp[st][i] + dp[i][fn] + 1);\n', '40         }\n', '41       }\n', '42       if (curr_sqr >= sz) {\n', '43         ans = max(ans, 1 + dp[curr_st][fn]);\n', '44       }\n', '45       int pr = (curr_st - 1 + n) % n;\n', '46       assert(curr_st != fn && ans);\n', '47       for (int fnn = fn - 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 struct pnt {\n', '4   long long x, y;\n', '5   pnt(long long _x = 0, long long _y = 0) : x(_x), y(_y) {}\n', '6 } P[300];\n', '7 long long operator*(pnt A, pnt B) { return A.x * B.y - A.y * B.x; }\n', '8 long long area(pnt A, pnt B, pnt C) { return A * B + B * C + C * A; }\n', '9 pair<int, long long> dp[300][300];\n', '10 long long sz[300][300];\n', '11 int main() {\n', '12   int n = 0, k = 0;\n', '13   scanf(""%d%d"", &n, &k);\n', '14   k++;\n', '15   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"", ""unroll-loops"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 const int inf = 1000111222;\n', '5 const int max_n = 211;\n', '6 struct point {\n', '7   int x, y;\n', '8 };\n', '9 long long get_sqr(const point& p1, const point& p2, const point& p3) {\n', '10   long long res = 0;\n', '11   res += (p2.x - p1.x) * 1LL * (p1.y + p2.y);\n', '12   res += (p3.x - p2.x) * 1LL * (p2.y + p3.y);\n', '13   res += (p1.x - p3.x) * 1LL * (p3.y + p1.y);\n', '14   return abs(res);\n', '15 }\n', '16 point p[max_n];\n', '17 int dp[max_n][max_n], n, k;\n', '18 long long all_sqr[max_n][max_n][max_n], sums[max_n][max_n];\n', '19 bool check(long long sz) {\n', '20   for (int l = 2; l < n; ++l) {\n', '21     for (int st = 0; st + l < n; ++st) {\n', '22       int fn = st + l;\n', '23       if (sums[st][fn] < sz) {\n', '24         dp[st][fn] = 0;\n', '25         continue;\n', '26       }\n', '27       int ans = 0;\n', '28       long long curr_sqr = 0;\n', '29       int curr_st = 0;\n', '30       for (int i = st + 1; i < fn; ++i) {\n', '31         if (curr_sqr < sz) {\n', '32           curr_st = i;\n', '33           curr_sqr += all_sqr[fn][curr_st - 1][i];\n', '34         }\n', '35         if (all_sqr[st][fn][i] >= sz) {\n', '36           ans = max(ans, dp[st][i] + dp[i][fn] + 1);\n', '37         }\n', '38       }\n', '39       if (curr_sqr >= sz) {\n', '40         ans = max(ans, 1 + dp[curr_st][fn]);\n', '41       }\n', '42       int pr = curr_st - 1;\n', '43       assert(curr_st != fn && ans);\n', '44       for (int fnn = fn - 1; fnn > st; --fnn) {\n', '45         curr_sqr += all_sqr[fnn][curr_st][fnn + 1];\n', '46         long long nxt_sqr = all_sqr[fnn][pr][curr_st];\n', '47         while (curr_sqr - nxt_sqr >= sz && curr_st != st) {\n', '48           curr_sqr -= nxt_sqr;\n', '49           curr_st = pr;\n', '50           --pr;\n', '51           nxt_sqr = all_sqr[fnn][pr][curr_st];\n', '52         }\n', '53         ans = max(ans, dp[curr_st][fnn] + 1);\n', '54         if (curr_st == st) {\n', '55           break;\n', '56         }\n', '57       }\n', '58       dp[st][fn] = ans;\n', '59       if (ans >= k + 1) {\n', '60         return true;\n', '61       }\n', '62     }\n', '63   }\n', '64   return false;\n', '65 }\n', '66 long long get_ans() {\n', '67   long long l = 1, r = 1LL * inf * inf;\n', '68   while (l + 1 < r) {\n', '69     long long mid = (l + r) / 2;\n', '70     if (check(mid)) {\n', '71       l = mid;\n', '72     } else {\n', '73       r = mid;\n', '74     }\n', '75   }\n', '76   return l;\n', '77 }\n', '78 void init() {\n', '79   for (int i = 0; ++i) {\n', '104     shift(rand() % (n - 1) + 1);\n', '105     init();\n', '106     l = max(l, get_ans());\n', '107   }\n', '108   cout << l << ""\\n"";\n', '109 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""Ofast"", ""unroll-loops"")\n', '3 using namespace std;\n', '4 const int inf = 1000111222;\n', '5 const int max_n = 211;\n', '6 struct point {\n', '7   int x, y;\n', '8 };\n', '9 long long get_sqr(const point& p1, const point& p2, const point& p3) {\n', '10   long long res = 0;\n', '11   res += (p2.x - p1.x) * 1LL * (p1.y + p2.y);\n', '12   res += (p3.x - p2.x) * 1LL * (p2.y + p3.y);\n', '13   res += (p1.x - p3.x) * 1LL * (p3.y + p1.y);\n', '14   return abs(res);\n', '15 }\n', '16 point p[max_n];\n', '17 int dp[max_n][max_n], n, k;\n', '18 long long all_sqr[max_n][max_n][max_n], sums[max_n][max_n];\n', '19 bool check(long long sz) {\n', '20   for (int l = 2; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 using ll = long long;\n', '4 struct P {\n', '5   ll x, y;\n', '6   P(ll xx = 0, ll yy = 0) { x = xx, y = yy; }\n', '7   P operator-(P r) { return P(x - r.x, y - r.y); }\n', '8 } p[205];\n', '9 ll Cross(P A, P B) { return A.x * B.y - A.y * B.x; }\n', '10 pair<int, ll> dp[205][205];\n', '11 int n, t;\n', '12 int main() {\n', '13   ios::sync_with_stdio(false), cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);\n', '14   cin >> n >> t;\n', '15   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 template <typename T>\n', '4 T powe(T a, T b) {\n', '5   if (b == 0) return 1;\n', '6   T x = powe(a, b / 2) % 1000000007;\n', '7   x = (x * x) % 1000000007;\n', '8   if (b & 1) x = (x * (a % 1000000007)) % 1000000007;\n', '9   return x;\n', '10 }\n', '11 void fun(long long int n) {\n', '12   for (long long int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 #pragma GCC optimize(""unroll-loops"")\n', '3 #pragma GCC optimize 03\n', '4 using namespace std;\n', '5 int n1, m1, q, r;\n', '6 int ans = 0;\n', '7 int gcd(int a, int b) {\n', '8   if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n', '9   return (a == 0) ? "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 const int N = 1e6 + 4;\n', '5 void generateParenthesis(int n, int open, int close, string s,\n', '6                          vector<string> &ans) {\n', '7   if (open == n && close == n) {\n', '8     ans.push_back(s);\n', '9     return;\n', '10   }\n', '11   if (ans.size() == n) {\n', '12     return;\n', '13   }\n', '14   if (open < n) {\n', '15     generateParenthesis(n, open + 1, close, s + ""("", ans);\n', '16   }\n', '17   if (close < open) {\n', '18     generateParenthesis(n, open, close + 1, s + "")"", ans);\n', '19   }\n', '20 }\n', '21 int main() {\n', '22   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '23   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '24   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '25   long long test = 1;\n', '26   cin >> test;\n', '27   while (test--) {\n', '28     int n;\n', '29     cin >> n;\n', '30     vector<string> ans;\n', '31     generateParenthesis(n, 0, 0, """", ans);\n', '32     for (int i = 0; ['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long modd = (1000LL * 1000LL * 1000LL + 7LL);\n', '4 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {\n', '5   mt19937 rang(chrono::steady_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count());\n', '6   uniform_int_distribution<int> rand_gen(0, modd);\n', '7   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '8   cin.tie(0);\n', '9   cout.precision(12);\n', '10   int test_cases = 1;\n', '11   for (int t = (1);
