"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int MAXN = 2e5 + 5;\n', '4 const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;\n', '5 long long a[MAXN];\n', '6 struct node {\n', '7   long long x, y;\n', '8 } b[MAXN];\n', '9 int n;\n', '10 int findpos(long long val) {\n', '11   int l = 1, r = n;\n', '12   int res = -1;\n', '13   while (l <= r) {\n', '14     int mid = (l + r) >> 1;\n', '15     if (a[mid] < val) {\n', '16       l = mid + 1;\n', '17     } else {\n', '18       res = mid;\n', '19       r = mid - "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 10;\n', '4 long long a[N];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   long long T, n, sum = 0, x, y, p;\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '9     scanf(""%lld"", &a[i]);\n', '10     sum += a[i];\n', '11   }\n', '12   cin >> T;\n', '13   sort(a, a + n);\n', '14   while (T--) {\n', '15     scanf(""%lld%lld"", &x, &y);\n', '16     long long p;\n', '17     p = lower_bound(a, a + n, x) - a;\n', '18     if (p == n) {\n', '19       printf(""%lld\\n"", max((long long)0, x - a[n - 1]) +\n', '20                            max((long long)0, y - sum + a[n - 1]));\n', '21     } else if (p == 0) {\n', '22       printf(""%lld\\n"",\n', '23              max((long long)0, x - a[0]) + max((long long)0, y - sum + a[0]));\n', '24     } else {\n', '25       printf(""%lld\\n"", min(max((long long)0, x - a[p]) +\n', '26                                max((long long)0, y - sum + a[p]),\n', '27                            max((long long)0, x - a[p - 1]) +\n', '28                                max((long long)0, y - sum + a[p - 1])));\n', '29     }\n', '30   }\n', '31   return 0;\n', '32 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const int N = 2e5 + 10;\n', '4 long long a[N];\n', '5 int main() {\n', '6   long long T, n, sum = 0, x, y, p;\n', '7   cin >> n;\n', '8   for (int i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 int main() {\n', '3   std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '4   std::cin.tie(0);\n', '5   int32_t n;\n', '6   std::cin >> n;\n', '7   int64_t* arr = new int64_t[n];\n', '8   for (int32_t i = 0; i < n; i++) std::cin >> arr[i];\n', '9   std::sort(arr, arr + n);\n', '10   int64_t sum = 0;\n', '11   for (int32_t i = 0; i < n; i++) sum += arr[i];\n', '12   int32_t m;\n', '13   std::cin >> m;\n', '14   for (int32_t i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '15     int64_t x, y;\n', '16     std::cin >> x >> y;\n', '17     int64_t answer = INT64_MAX;\n', '18     int32_t attacks = std::lower_bound(arr, arr + n, x) - arr;\n', '19     if (attacks < n)\n', '20       answer = std::min(answer, std::max((int64_t)0, y - (sum - arr[attacks])));\n', '21     attacks--;\n', '22     if (attacks >= 0)\n', '23       answer =\n', '24           std::min(answer, x - arr[attacks] +\n', '25                                std::max((int64_t)0, y - (sum - arr[attacks])));\n', '26     std::cout << answer << ""\\n"";\n', '27   }\n', '28   return 0;\n', '29 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 int main() {\n', '3   std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '4   std::cin.tie(0);\n', '5   int32_t n;\n', '6   std::cin >> n;\n', '7   int64_t* arr = new int64_t[n];\n', '8   for (int32_t i = 0; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long a[200001], sum = 0;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '6   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '7     scanf(""%lld"", &a[i]);\n', '8     sum += a[i];\n', '9   }\n', '10   std::sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);\n', '11   scanf(""%d"", &m);\n', '12   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '13     long long u, v;\n', '14     scanf(""%lld%lld"", &u, &v);\n', '15     int l = 1, r = n + 1, pos = n + 1;\n', '16     while (l < r) {\n', '17       int mid = l + r >> 1;\n', '18       if (a[mid] >= u) {\n', '19         r = mid;\n', '20         pos = std::min(pos, mid);\n', '21       } else {\n', '22         l = mid + 1;\n', '23       }\n', '24     }\n', '25     long long ans = 0;\n', '26     if (pos != n + 1) {\n', '27       if (sum - a[pos] >= v)\n', '28         ans = 0;\n', '29       else\n', '30         ans = v - (sum - a[pos]);\n', '31       if (pos > 1) {\n', '32         if (sum - a[pos - 1] >= v)\n', '33           ans = std::min(ans, u - a[pos - 1]);\n', '34         else\n', '35           ans = std::min(ans, u - a[pos - 1] + v - (sum - a[pos - 1]));\n', '36       }\n', '37     } else {\n', '38       pos = n;\n', '39       ans = u - a[pos];\n', '40       if (v > sum - a[pos]) ans += v - (sum - a[pos]);\n', '41     }\n', '42     std::cout << ans << std::endl;\n', '43   }\n', '44   return 0;\n', '45 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 long long a[200001], sum = 0;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 int main() {\n', '5   scanf(""%lld"", &n);\n', '6   for (int i = 1; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long int power(long long int x, long long int y) {\n', '5   long long int res = 1;\n', '6   x = x % mod;\n', '7   while (y > 0) {\n', '8     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % mod;\n', '9     y = y >> 1;\n', '10     x = (x * x) % mod;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return res;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long int exp(long long int x, long long int y) {\n', '15   if (y == 0) return 1;\n', '16   if (x == 0 || x == 1) return x;\n', '17   long long int p = exp(x, y / 2);\n', '18   p = (p * p);\n', '19   if (y % 2) p = (x * p);\n', '20   return p;\n', '21 }\n', '22 bool check_prime(long long int n) {\n', '23   if (n <= 1) return false;\n', '24   if (n <= 3) return true;\n', '25   if (n % 2 == 0 || n % 3 == 0) return false;\n', '26   for (long long int i = 5; i * i <= n; i = i + 6)\n', '27     if (n % i == 0 || n % (i + 2) == 0) return false;\n', '28   return true;\n', '29 }\n', '30 const long long int max_size = 1e7 + 5;\n', '31 bool prime[max_size];\n', '32 void prime_seive(long long int n) {\n', '33   memset(prime, true, sizeof(prime));\n', '34   for (long long int i = 2; i * i <= n; i++) {\n', '35     if (prime[i]) {\n', '36       for (long long int j = i * i; j <= n; j += i) prime[j] = false;\n', '37     }\n', '38   }\n', '39 }\n', '40 void solve();\n', '41 int main() {\n', '42   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n', '43   cin.tie(NULL);\n', '44   cout.tie(NULL);\n', '45   long long int t;\n', '46   t = 1;\n', '47   for (long long int z = 1; z <= t; z++) {\n', '48     solve();\n', '49   }\n', '50   return 0;\n', '51 }\n', '52 void solve() {\n', '53   long long int n;\n', '54   cin >> n;\n', '55   vector<vector<long long int> > A(n);\n', '56   for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '57     long long int cnt;\n', '58     cin >> cnt;\n', '59     for (long long int j = 0; j < cnt; j++) {\n', '60       long long int d;\n', '61       cin >> d;\n', '62       A[i].push_back(d);\n', '63     }\n', '64   }\n', '65   long long int m;\n', '66   cin >> m;\n', '67   vector<vector<long long int> > B(m);\n', '68   set<vector<long long int> > s;\n', '69   for (long long int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '70     for (long long int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '71       long long int d;\n', '72       cin >> d;\n', '73       B[i].push_back(d - 1);\n', '74     }\n', '75     s.insert(B[i]);\n', '76   }\n', '77   priority_queue<pair<long long int, vector<long long int> > > q;\n', '78   long long int sum = 0;\n', '79   vector<long long int> pp;\n', '80   for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '81     sum += A[i].back();\n', '82     pp.push_back(A[i].size() - 1);\n', '83   }\n', '84   q.push({sum, pp});\n', '85   vector<long long int> ans;\n', '86   while (!q.empty()) {\n', '87     pair<long long int, vector<long long int> > p = q.top();\n', '88     q.pop();\n', '89     long long int add = p.first;\n', '90     vector<long long int> pos = p.second;\n', '91     if (s.find(p.second) == s.end()) {\n', '92       ans = p.second;\n', '93       break;\n', '94     }\n', '95     for (long long int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '96       if (pos[i] > 0) {\n', '97         add -= A[i][pos[i]];\n', '98         add += A[i][pos[i] - 1];\n', '99         pos[i]--;\n', '100         q.push({add, pos});\n', '101         pos[i]++;\n', '102         add += A[i][pos[i]];\n', '103         add -= A[i][pos[i] - 1];\n', '104       }\n', '105       if (pos[i] < A[i].size() - 1) {\n', '106         break;\n', '107       }\n', '108     }\n', '109   }\n', '110   for (long long int i = 0; i < ans.size(); i++) {\n', '111     cout << ans[i] + 1 << "" "";\n', '112   }\n', '113   cout << ""\\n"";\n', '114   return;\n', '115 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 const long long int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n', '4 long long int power(long long int x, long long int y) {\n', '5   long long int res = 1;\n', '6   x = x % mod;\n', '7   while (y > 0) {\n', '8     if (y & 1) res = (res * x) % mod;\n', '9     y = y >> 1;\n', '10     x = (x * x) % mod;\n', '11   }\n', '12   return res;\n', '13 }\n', '14 long long int exp(long long int x, long long int y) {\n', '15   if (y == 0) return 1;\n', '16   if (x == 0 || x == 1) return x;\n', '17   long long int p = exp(x, y / 2);\n', '18   p = (p * p);\n', '19   if (y % 2) p = (x * p);\n', '20   return p;\n', '21 }\n', '22 bool check_prime(long long int n) {\n', '23   if (n <= 1) return false;\n', '24   if (n <= 3) return true;\n', '25   if (n % 2 == 0 || n % 3 == 0) return false;\n', '26   for (long long int i = 5; "['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int read() {\n', '4   int x = 0, f = 0;\n', '5   char ch = getchar();\n', ""6   while (!isdigit(ch)) f |= ch == '-', ch = getchar();\n"", ""7   while (isdigit(ch)) x = 10 * x + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '8   return f ? -x : x;\n', '9 }\n', '10 template <typename T>\n', '11 void print(T x) {\n', ""12   if (x < 0) putchar('-'), x = -x;\n"", '13   if (x >= 10) print(x / 10);\n', ""14   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '15 }\n', '16 template <typename T>\n', '17 void print(T x, char let) {\n', '18   print(x), putchar(let);\n', '19 }\n', '20 const int N = 1e5;\n', '21 int n, m, c[15];\n', '22 long long a[15][2 * N + 5], x[N + 5], y[N + 5], x1[N + 5];\n', '23 vector<int> v[N + 5], v1[N + 5];\n', '24 struct Node {\n', '25   int i, j, last;\n', '26   bool operator<(const Node &n2) const {\n', '27     return x[i] + y[j] < x[n2.i] + y[n2.j];\n', '28   }\n', '29 };\n', '30 priority_queue<Node> pq;\n', '31 set<vector<int> > s;\n', '32 int main() {\n', '33   n = read();\n', '34   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '35     c[i] = read();\n', '36     for (int j = 1; j <= c[i]; j++) {\n', '37       a[i][j] = read();\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40   int lx = min(c[1], N + 1);\n', '41   for (int i = 1; i <= lx; i++) {\n', '42     x[i] = a[1][c[1] - i + 1];\n', '43     v[i].push_back(c[1] - i + 1);\n', '44   }\n', '45   int ly;\n', '46   int tot = lx;\n', '47   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '48     while (!pq.empty()) pq.pop();\n', '49     ly = min(c[i], N + 1);\n', '50     for (int j = 1; j <= ly; j++) {\n', '51       y[j] = a[i][c[i] - j + 1];\n', '52     }\n', '53     Node start = {1, 1, false};\n', '54     pq.push(start);\n', '55     tot = 0;\n', '56     while (!pq.empty()) {\n', '57       Node u = pq.top();\n', '58       pq.pop();\n', '59       tot++;\n', '60       x1[tot] = x[u.i] + y[u.j];\n', '61       v1[tot] = v[u.i];\n', '62       v1[tot].push_back(c[i] - u.j + 1);\n', '63       if (tot >= N + 1) {\n', '64         break;\n', '65       }\n', '66       if (u.j < ly) {\n', '67         Node v1 = {u.i, u.j + 1, true};\n', '68         pq.push(v1);\n', '69       }\n', '70       if (u.last == false && u.i < lx) {\n', '71         Node v1 = {u.i + 1, u.j, false};\n', '72         pq.push(v1);\n', '73       }\n', '74     }\n', '75     lx = tot;\n', '76     for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {\n', '77       x[i] = x1[i];\n', '78       v[i] = v1[i];\n', '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81   m = read();\n', '82   vector<int> vt;\n', '83   int t;\n', '84   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '85     vt.clear();\n', '86     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n', '87       t = read();\n', '88       vt.push_back(t);\n', '89     }\n', '90     s.insert(vt);\n', '91   }\n', '92   for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {\n', '93     if (s.find(v[i]) == s.end()) {\n', '94       for (int j = 0; j <= n - 1; j++) cout << v[i][j] << "" "";\n', '95       cout << endl;\n', '96       break;\n', '97     }\n', '98   }\n', '99   return 0;\n', '100 }\n']"	"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int read() {\n', '4   int x = 0, f = 0;\n', '5   char ch = getchar();\n', ""6   while (!isdigit(ch)) f |= ch == '-', ch = getchar();\n"", ""7   while (isdigit(ch)) x = 10 * x + ch - '0', ch = getchar();\n"", '8   return f ? -x : x;\n', '9 }\n', '10 template <typename T>\n', '11 void print(T x) {\n', ""12   if (x < 0) putchar('-'), x = -x;\n"", '13   if (x >= 10) print(x / 10);\n', ""14   putchar(x % 10 + '0');\n"", '15 }\n', '16 template <typename T>\n', '17 void print(T x, char let) {\n', '18   print(x), putchar(let);\n', '19 }\n', '20 const int N = 1e5;\n', '21 int n, m, c[15];\n', '22 long long a[15][2 * N + 5], x[N + 5], y[N + 5], x1[N + 5];\n', '23 vector<int> v[N + 5], v1[N + 5];\n', '24 struct Node {\n', '25   int i, j, last;\n', '26   bool operator<(const Node &n2) const {\n', '27     return x[i] + y[j] < x[n2.i] + y[n2.j];\n', '28   }\n', '29 };\n', '30 priority_queue<Node> pq;\n', '31 set<vector<int> > s;\n', '32 int main() {\n', '33   n = read();\n', '34   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n', '35     c[i] = read();\n', '36     for (int j = 1; j <= c[i]; j++) {\n', '37       a[i][j] = read();\n', '38     }\n', '39   }\n', '40   int lx = min(c[1], N + 1);\n', '41   for (int i = 1; i <= lx; i++) {\n', '42     x[i] = a[1][c[1] - i + 1];\n', '43     v[i].push_back(c[1] - i + 1);\n', '44   }\n', '45   int ly;\n', '46   int tot = 0;\n', '47   for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {\n', '48     while (!pq.empty()) pq.pop();\n', '49     ly = min(c[i], N + 1);\n', '50     for (int j = 1; j <= ly; j++) {\n', '51       y[j] = a[i][c[i] - j + 1];\n', '52     }\n', '53     Node start = {1, 1, false};\n', '54     pq.push(start);\n', '55     tot = 0;\n', '56     while (!pq.empty()) {\n', '57       Node u = pq.top();\n', '58       pq.pop();\n', '59       tot++;\n', '60       x1[tot] = x[u.i] + y[u.j];\n', '61       v1[tot] = v[u.i];\n', '62       v1[tot].push_back(c[i] - u.j + 1);\n', '63       if (tot >= N + 1) {\n', '64         break;\n', '65       }\n', '66       if (u.j < ly) {\n', '67         Node v1 = {u.i, u.j + 1, true};\n', '68         pq.push(v1);\n', '69       }\n', '70       if (u.last == false && u.i < lx) {\n', '71         Node v1 = {u.i + 1, u.j, false};\n', '72         pq.push(v1);\n', '73       }\n', '74     }\n', '75     lx = tot;\n', '76     for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {\n', '77       x[i] = x1[i];\n', '78       v[i] = v1[i];\n', '79     }\n', '80   }\n', '81   m = read();\n', '82   vector<int> vt;\n', '83   int t;\n', '84   for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n', '85     vt.clear();\n', '86     for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n', '87       t = read();\n', '88       vt.push_back(t);\n', '89     }\n', '90     s.insert(vt);\n', '91   }\n', '92   for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {\n', '93     if (s.find(v[i]) == s.end()) {\n', '94       for (int j = 0; j <= n - 1; j++) cout << v[i][j] << "" "";\n', '95       cout << endl;\n', '96       break;\n', '97     }\n', '98   }\n', '99   return 0;\n', '100 }\n']"	"46   int tot = lx;

"['1 #include <bits/stdc++.h>\n', '2 using namespace std;\n', '3 int n, m;\n', '4 vector<vector<int> > a;\n', '5 vector<vector<int> > b;\n', '6 int main() {\n', '7   scanf(""%d"", &n);\n', '8   a.resize(n);\n', '9   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '10     int x;\n', '11     scanf(""%d"", &x);\n', '12     a[i].resize(x);\n', '13     for (int j = 0; j < x; j++) {\n', '14       scanf(""%d"", &a[i][j]);\n', '15     }\n', '16   }\n', '17   scanf(""%d"", &m);\n', '18   b.resize(m);\n', '19   for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '20     b[i].resize(n);\n', '21     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '22       scanf(""%d"", &b[i][j]);\n', '23       b[i][j]--;\n', '24     }\n', '25   }\n', '26   sort(b.begin(), b.end());\n', '27   vector<int> now(n);\n', '28   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '29     now[i] = (int)a[i].size() - 1;\n', '30   }\n', '31   if (!binary_search(b.begin(), b.end(), now)) {\n', '32     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n', '33       printf(""%d "", now[i] + 1);\n', '34     }\n', '35     printf(""\\n"");\n', '36     return 0;\n', '37   }\n', '38   int Max = 0;\n', '39   vector<int> ans(n, -1);\n', '40   for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {\n', '41     vector<int> temp = b[i];\n', '42     int sum = 0;\n', '43     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '44       sum += a[j][temp[j]];\n', '45     }\n', '46     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {\n', '47       if (temp[j] != 0) {\n', '48         temp[j]--;\n', '49         if (!binary_search(b.begin(), b.end(), temp) &&\n', '50             sum - a[j][temp[j] + 1] + a[j][temp[j]] > Max) {\n', '51           Max = sum - a[j][temp[j] + 1] + a[j][temp[j]];\n', '52           ans = temp;\n', '53         }\n', '54         temp[j]++;\n', '55       }\n', '56     }\n', '57   }\n', '58   for (int i = 0;
